284.quote: "Radcliffe, time and again, has expressed his deep regret for causing pain when all he ever wanted was to prevent it. He speaks often of the pain that you and Agent Simmons have had to suffer, having lost so many friends Lincoln Campbell, Andrew Garner, Antoine Triplett--""Okay, stop it, stop. You don't have to list them."

285.author: Arnim Zola
285.quote: "With this artefact, I am certain of nothing."

286.author: Arnim Zola
286.quote: "I merely developed the weapons. I cannot fire them."

287.author: Red Skull
287.quote: "I must congratulate you, Arnim. Your designs do not disappoint."

288.author: Chester Phillips to Arnim Zola
288.quote: "Here is my brilliant theory, you want to live."

289.author: Arnim Zola and Red Skull
289.quote: "The energy we have just collected could power my designs, all my designs. This will change the war.""Doctor Zola, this will change the world."

290.author: Arnim Zola and Chester Phillips
290.quote: "I don't eat meat.""Why not?""It disagrees with me.""How about Cyanide? Does that give you the rumbly tummy, too?"

291.author: Arnim Zola
291.quote: "Science could not save my body. My mind, however that was worth saving."

292.author: Arnim Zola
292.quote: "Cut off one head, two more shall take its place."

293.author: Arnim Zola to Captain America
293.quote: "We are both of us out of time."

294.author: Black Widow about Zola's recruitment
294.quote: "It was Operation Paperclip after World War II, S.H.I.E.L.D. recruited German scientists with strategic value."

295.author: Captain America and Arnim Zola
295.quote: "Arnim Zola was a German scientist who worked for the Red Skull. He's been dead for years.""First correction, I am Swiss. Second, look around you I have never been more alive."

296.author: Howard Stark and Tony Stark
296.quote: "Arnim, you in there? Arnim? Hey! Door's this way, pal."Oh, yeah." I'm looking for Dr. Zola. Have you seen him?"Yeah, no, Dr. Zol– No, I haven't seen a soul. Pardon me."

297.author: Arnim Zola to Johann Fennhoff
297.quote: "I know things seem bleak but you're in fact a fortunate man. You're in prison yes, but it is an American prison. And America is the land of opportunities."

298.author: Maximus and Auran
298.quote: "We have no option. We have to move on. Do you understand what this means?""Fully... My King."

299.author: Auran to Crystal
299.quote: "The sooner you accept Maximus as your King, the happier you're gonna be."

301.author: Auran to Medusa
301.quote: "I prefer to bring you back alive. You tell me if that's possible."

302.author: Crystal and Medusa
302.quote: "I stole Auran's Com-Link.""What?""It fell off.""No, Auran's too smart for that. It was a setup. They wanted you to call me."

303.author: Crystal and Auran
303.quote: "You think that little gun matches what I can do?""If not, I've got nine more guards outside who'd love to take target practice on a princess."

304.author: Maximus and Auran
304.quote: "Gather up whatever you need, whoever you need. Then transport to Earth and take care of the Royal Family."""Take care of"?""Bring back or kill. Black Bolt, definitely kill. Gorgon, too.""All I need is myself. It's best to be discreet."

305.author: Auran and Eldrac
305.quote: "I need you to transport me here.""No.""I say yes.""I said no. It's painful.""I don't care if it's painful. If you don't, I will kill your entire family and bring all their pieces to you in a garbage bag. If you do anything that harms me, the guards will make you pay."

306.author: Mordis to Auran
306.quote: "I didn't want to be here any more than you wanted me here."

307.author: Maximus and Auran
307.quote: "What's taking so long?""This is Earth. It's a lot bigger than the Moon."

308.author: Auran and Maximus
308.quote: "Don't send Mordis. He's not a fighter. He's just death. We'll be better off without him.""Next to Black Bolt, he's the most powerful weapon in Attilan.""I have no control over him.""You need to trust yourself, Auran. Trust that you can handle anything and anyone. I do. I believe in you, and I'm sending you Mordis.""Understood, my King."

309.author: Auran and Maximus
309.quote: "I don't like the idea of consorting with this human. I don't understand.""You don't need to. Just keep him safe, find Black Bolt and the rest of the Royal Family, and finish your mission! I'll be sending you some help soon.""Who?""Whatever happened to, "Yes, my King"?""Yes, my King."

310.author: Mordis and Auran
310.quote: "I like your new clothes.""Another word, and I kill you."

311.author: Auran to Loyolis
311.quote: "Yeah, grass is green, the flowers are bright, the birds sing so pretty. You're soldiers, not tourists!"

312.author: Gorgon
312.quote: "Hey, this is Hawaii, and I know how people act here. We help our friends. Most importantly, I want to rip the head off of Auran."

313.author: Gorgon to Karnak
313.quote: "Auran and her people don't know that you're broken. And they think that the almighty Karnak is gonna be heading their way. So give them what they expect. Now, there is no flaw if they don't know there is one."

314.author: Auran and Medusa
314.quote: "Medusa. I'm curious if Black Bolt still has that frankly disgusting fondness for his human friends Declan and Sammy.""He wants to know what you've done with them.""Nothing yet. But if you and Black Bolt don't come back for them, they will die.""Using hostages is a new low for you, Auran.""Gorgon used to tell us there was nothing more important than the mission.""So you think we're just gonna walk right into your trap?""Up to you.""Say we wanted to meet up. How would we do that?""You have Locus.""I'm sorry. We don't. Locus is dead.""We haven't gone anywhere. We're still at the lab."

315.author: Evan Declan and Auran
315.quote: "You're the one who should be worried about living through this.""I have no worries.""Because you think you can keep healing yourself. Have you ever had a DNA test before?""Get to the point.""Your telomeres are growing shorter.""Meaning?""Meaning you may not be able to regenerate yourself forever. One day, you'll die and that's it.""You're lying."

316.author: Auran to Karnak
316.quote: "Maybe death has a purpose. Maybe we're meant to come to terms with that instead of trying to avoid it."

318.author: Auran and Maximus
318.quote: "You want to become Inhuman.That's your motivation behind this revolt.""Why do you care about my motivation if it gets you what you want?""Because the reason I followed you is because I saw someone who, even though he was simply human, overcame that and became King. That was someone I could admire.""So I'm really good for a human. Is that the story you fell in love with?"

319.author: Auran and Karnak
319.quote: "I'm not gonna let you kill me again.""I'm here to help you.""Who said I need help?""You know my power. I see the flaw in everything. And exploit it. I see the flaw in you. And I want to help you overcome it. I saw you across the courtyard today. I've been watching you closely since Earth. You backed the wrong man and you know it. I know you feel regret for Gorgon's death. His sacrifice saved your life.""That wasn't his intention.""What if it was? He could always be counted on to do the right thing at the right time, and he trained you to be the same. But you are not there yet, are you? Neither am I.""The great Karnak admitting to weakness?""My time on Earth changed me. Maybe. A little.""I don't understand how I can help.""I'm gonna need a bit of your DNA."

320.author: Auran and Karnak
320.quote: "Your cousins are sabotaging the city.""Who's to say? Maybe Maximus just underestimated what it takes to keep a kingdom running smoothly.""And maybe I'm talking to the one who might know every crack in that kingdom's infrastructure.""That's possible. Now comes your part. You're kidding. Captain of the Royal Guard's afraid of needles.""I thought that was the weakness you were talking about.""Your regeneration powers will adhere through the transfer process using nanogene technology.""There's something you should know. My powers they may not be so strong anymore.""How do you mean?""Something Declan said. Well, it was really more of a warning, and I don't know if it's true or not. But whatever makes me me may not work the way it used to."

321.author: Medusa
321.quote: "We find a go-between. Who would want to protect both Maximus and Attilan?"

322.author: Maximus and Auran
322.quote: "Attilan is mine, not yours!""It's ours.""If I can't have Attilan, no one will."

323.author: Maximus and Auran
323.quote: "I can stop the dome from collapsing anytime I like.""What if you can't?""Of course I can. Need I remind you of Bronaja's vision? I will be the true King of Attilan.""Open your eyes!""I see quite clearly.""What do you see?""A city in motion, evolving.""Our city is in ruins! We can't stay here.""No one goes to Earth until I say so. Perhaps you should stand guard outside my door.""I will take my leave of you."

324.author: Ayesha
324.quote: "Our concern is the slight against our people... We hire them and they steal from us. That is heresy of the highest order."

325.author: Yondu Udonta and Kraglin Obfonteri
325.quote: "What is it Kraglin?""Hey, remember that Ayesha chick?""Yeah, why?""Uh...""Oh, hell!"

326.author: Ayesha and Peter Quill
326.quote: "We thank you Guardians for putting your lives on the line. We could not risk the lives of our own Sovereign citizens. Every citizen is born exactly as designed by the community: impeccable both physically and mentally. We control the DNA of our progeny, germinating them in bating pods.""Guess I prefer to make people the old fashioned way.""Well, perhaps some day you could give me a history lesson in the archaic ways of our ancestors, for academic purposes.""I would be honored, yes, in the name of research. I think that could be pretty, uh, pretty repulsive.""

327.author: Ayesha and Gamora
327.quote: "I understand she is your sister.""She's worth no more to me than the bounty due for her on Xandar.""Our soldiers apprehended her attempting to steal the batteries. Do with her as you please."

328.author: Peter Quill and Ayesha
328.quote: "We thank you High Priestess Ayesha.""What is your heritage Mr. Quill?""My mother is from Earth.""And your father?""Came from Missouri. That's all I know.""I see it within you: an unorthodox genealogy. A hybrid that seems particularly...reckless.""

329.author: Sovereign Chambermaid and Ayesha
329.quote: "High Priestess, the council is waiting.""They are perturbed I've wasted our resources. When they see what I've created here, their wrath will dissipate.""It's a new type of birthing pod, ma'am?""That, my child, is the next step in our evolution. More powerful, more beautiful, more capable of destroying the Guardians of the Galaxy. I think I shall call him...Adam."

330.author: Ben Urich to Mitchell Ellison
330.quote: "There used to be a time when the people in this building wrote the hell outta the news."

331.author: Silvio and Ben Urich
331.quote: "Did you hear about Rigoletto?"I heard he retired.""Yeah, in pieces."

332.author: Silvio and Ben Urich
332.quote: "You know when I went away to do my ten, every newspaper in town dragged my name through the shit. You were the only one who did it without mentioning my kids, always grateful for that."Then give me something, a name, anything."Take a pass on this one Benny. Some fights will just get you bloody."

333.author: Mitchell Ellison and Ben Urich
333.quote: "Got a minute? Talk about next weeks spread.""Already working on it.""Another organized crime thing?""All of Hell's Kitchen. There's a new player on the scene. No one knows who it is, or what they want. Everybody's scrambling.""Your assignments the city desk, Ben.""This is the city. No one else is on this yet. I'm the only one who sees it.""It's not sexy.""We're a newspaper, Ellison. Not a girly mag.""You know that's not what I meant. And nobody calls them that anymore."

334.author: Ben Urich and Mitchell Ellison
334.quote: "It's not just the Russians, I think maybe the Union Allied scandal might tie into this.""Right, and you remember what that expose did for circulation, dick, with a side of who gives a shit.""This is a real story.""Yeah, and it’s gonna end the same as it always does right? A bunch of fat old guys in some white color prison with more fat old guys.""The cops aren’t even on this yet. We could be the ones to connect the dots.""It doesn’t sell papers, Ben! Not anymore."

335.author: Karen Page and Ben Urich
335.quote: "I read your article.""About the subway line?""About Union Allied Construction. I think there's more to the story, if you're interested."

336.author: Karen Page and Ben Urich
336.quote: "I read every big story with your byline. The VA kickbacks, toxic runoff, the Teachers Union scandal. Hell, you pretty much brought down the Italian mob back when I was in diapers. Whatever happened to that reporter, Mr. Urich?""He got old. And a hell of a lot less stupid."

337.author: Ben Urich and Christian Blake
337.quote: "How long have I been doing this?""Long enough to be a pain in the arse."

338.author: Ben Urich
338.quote: "My experience, there are no heroes, no villains. Just people with different agendas."

339.author: Ben Urich to Karen Page
339.quote: "What part of don't tell anyone about this didn't you understand?!"

340.author: Ben Urich and Karen Page
340.quote: "This is the job, researching, gathering facts. It's long and boring and complicated and half the time you still come up empty.""Well you're just a little ray of sunshine.""Just giving you the lay of the land. For every exposé I've had published there were a dozen that didn't pan out."

341.author: Masked Man and Ben Urich
341.quote: "Do you believe that, what they're saying about me?""You've been in an awful lot of wrong places at the wrong time lately, but I've heard the other stories, about the man in the mask, helping people. Sounds like there's more than one side to it."

342.author: Ben Urich
342.quote: "You seen the news? Everything's changed. Fisk has gotten out in front of being dragged into the spotlight. My editor thinks he's the second coming, hell the whole city does."

343.author: Doris Urich
343.quote: "Your name is Ben Urich and you're a reporter. It's not a job. It is who you are."

344.author: Ben Urich to Karen Page
344.quote: "I used to be like you back in the day, good at turning heads, getting people's attention, pissing them off, and that's half of it, but the other half is knowing when not to."

345.author: Ben Urich and Karen Page discuss Wilson Fisk
345.quote: "I've been writing about crime in this city since before you were born. The only thing I know without a doubt is you don't get to be the man at the top without making enemies looking to tear you down to the ground."

346.author: Ben Urich and Mitchell Ellison
346.quote: "Run the article, it'll sell papers, it's sexy.""You sound like a whore.""Well I learned how to be one from you. I get lucky sometimes sure, land a story that makes a difference like Union Allied, but most of the time, now, working for this paper, I might as well be wearing lipstick and a red dress."

347.author: Wilson Fisk and Ben Urich
347.quote: "I've made mistakes in the years since I was a boy. I tried to learn from them but it isn't always enough.""Get out of my house""I'll leave, but first I... I'd like to have a conversation with you, off the record of course.""You think I'd believe anything you have to say?""I... I promise that I'll be honest with you Mr. Urich. Whether you choose to believe or not, that's up to you.""Alright. Let's hear it."

348.author: Ben Urich and Wilson Fisk
348.quote: "I wrote a lot of stories in my days pushing ink, you know how many times people have threatened me, getting me to keep my mouth shut?""But that's my mother that you brought into this Mr. Urich! My Mother! So I am not here to threaten you! I'm here to kill you!"

349.author: Brigid O'Reilly
349.quote: "When I was undercover, I kept case notes on playing cards. I learned it from this reporter in New York."

350.author: Benjamin Poindexter to Craig
350.quote: "What kind of gun do you have, Craig? I'm familiar with the M11. Did a couple years in the army. Got real cozy with the M11. It's reliable."

352.author: Benjamin Poindexter to Julie Barnes
352.quote: "I am so, so sorry about how things ended the other night. I'm sorry for scaring you. I just wanted to explain myself. When we worked together at the suicide hotline, I saw the way you were with other people. Patient, compassionate, and I really need that right now. My life is out of control. I have no family, and I'm about to lose my job. Please. I just want to talk. Anywhere you choose. And if you say no, I'll understand, and I'll never bother you again."

353.author: Benjamin Poindexter
353.quote: "FBI and the army before that, they helped keep me on the straight and narrow path. But now... without that it's all... I'm drowning in deep water and I don't know whether I'm swimming through the surface or the bottom."

354.author: Kingpin and Benjamin Poindexter
354.quote: "I want you to kill Karen Page.""Consider it done."

356.author: Thaddeus Ross and Leonard Samson
356.quote: "You did the right thing, calling us. I need to know where they're going. She'll be in incredible danger as long as she's with him.""From who?""He protected her. You almost killed her.""I give you my word, her safety is my main concern at this point.""You know, it's a point of professional pride with me that I can always tell when somebody's lying. And you are. I don't know where he's going. I know she'll help him, if she can.""Then she's aiding a fugitive. And I can't help either one of them.""I used to wonder why she never talked about you. Now I know!""Where does she meet these guys?"

357.author: Kathleen Sparr and Thaddeus Ross
357.quote: "Federal is already monitoring phones, plastic and Dr. Ross' web accounts, and local PD have been placed on alert. They'll pop up somewhere and when they do, it comes straight to us.""They're not gonna just pop up. He made it five years and got across borders without making any mistakes. He's not gonna use a damn credit card now. If he was trying to escape, he'd be long gone. He's not trying to escape this time. He's looking for help and that's how we're gonna get him. We know what they're after and we know he's been talking to somebody. You all have copies of the correspondence. The aliases 'Mr. Green' and 'Mr. Blue' have been added to the S.H.I.E.L.D. Operations Database. If he comes up for air, we'll be waiting. If he makes a peep, we'll hear him. And when he slips up, we'll be ready."

358.author: Bruce Banner and Betty Ross
358.quote: "You know, I know a few techniques that could help you manage that anger effectively.""You zip it. We're walking."

359.author: Betty Ross and Bruce Banner
359.quote: "What are you saying? You think you can control it?""No no no, not con-not control it, but, I don't know, maybe aim it."

360.author: Thaddeus Ross and Betty Ross
360.quote: "Betty.""I will never forgive what you've done to him.""He's a fugitive.""You made him a fugitive to cover your failures and to protect your career. Don't ever speak to me as your daughter again.""It's only because you're my daughter that you're not in handcuffs, too."

361.author: Leonard Samson and Betty Ross
361.quote: "Come home. Just come home.""Leonard, did you call someone the night Bruce was at our house? Is that why they came for him?""I... I was afraid. Please forgive me."

362.author: Hawley and Thaddeus Ross
362.quote: "Didn't he used to date your daughter?""Not really seeing the relevance of that question."

363.author: Bill Foster to Hank Pym
363.quote: "When S.H.I.E.L.D. collapsed, I took Ava in. I built the chamber to slow her decay, but her condition was progressive. I didn't know how to cure her. She wanted to kill you, Hank. But I told her, no. And that she should watch you instead. And sure enough, she discovered that you were building a Tunnel."

364.author: Scott Lang, Bill Foster and Hope van Dyne
364.quote: "How big did you get?""My record? Twenty-one feet. You?""Sixty-five feet.""Sixty-five?""If you two are finished comparing sizes.""Sixty-five."

365.author: Ghost and Bill Foster
365.quote: "I doubt Hank ever mentioned my father. Why would he? Elihas Starr. They were colleges at S.H.I.E.L.D.. Quantum research. Until my father dared disagree with the great Hank Pym. You had him fired. Oh, and discredited for good measure. My father tried to continue his research on his own, desperate to restore his name. So, he took risks. To many, until something went wrong. He told us to run. I could tell he was scared. I didn't want him to be alone. When I woke up, my parents were dead. I wasn't so lucky. They call it molecular disequilibrium. A rather dull name I think. Doesn't quite do justice to what it means. Every cell in my body is torn apart and stitched back together, over and over every day.""I was still at S.H.I.E.L.D. when I got a call about a quantum anomaly in Argentina.""Doctor Foster did his best to keep me safe. But others at S.H.I.E.L.D. saw an opportunity in my affliction they built me a containment suit so I could control my phasing. And trained me to be a stealth operative. They weaponised me. I stole for them, spied for them. I killed for them. And in exchange for my soul, they were going to cure me. They lied.""When S.H.I.E.L.D. collapsed, I took Ava in. I built a chamber to slow her decay, but her condition is progressing further without a cure. She wanted to kill you, Hank, but I told her no. That she should watch you instead."

366.author: Bill Foster and Hank Pym
366.quote: "For the last thirty years, she's been down there absorbing quantum energy. We can extract that energy. We can use it to repair Ava's molecular structure-""Extract it?""Yes!""Are you insane?! That would rip Janet apart!""You don't know that. I'm gonna fire up your Tunnel. When Janet's location pops into Lang's head, he's gonna give it to me or I'm gonna turn him over to the FBI."

367.author: Hank Pym and Bill Foster
367.quote: "I told you this was a waste of time. Come on, let's go.""Don't condescend, Hank. You're the one who's on the run from the FBI. All because you had to grow to a size that finally fit your ego.""That wasn't me in Germany. It was this idiot."

368.author: Ghost and Bill Foster
368.quote: "You said it yourself. I've hurt people. But you haven't. Go, please.""We can make it, Ava.""Bill-""I'm not leaving you."

369.author: Billy Keonig
369.quote: "So, the guy was bulletproof, huh? That's sweet."

370.author: Phil Coulson, Tilden and Billy Koenig
370.quote: "It's Private Tilden, isn't it?""Yes, sir.""Well, I don't care I about this register or that. I want General Jones and his friends sent directly to the ordnance depot to meet me.""Go bigger. Go bigger.""...Or I'll have you so deep in horse manure, son, you'll need a damn snorkel."

373.author: Antoine Triplett, Billy Koenig and Sam Koenig
373.quote: "I was just wondering, how many of you are there, any way? Brothers, I mean.""Thirteen.""Thirteen?""Look at him. He fell for it.""Yeah.""That gets people all the time.""Yeah, yeah, you, you got me. You got me good."

374.author: Antoine Triplett and Billy Koenig
374.quote: "Where's your brother been hiding?""Well, all this excitement fried his circuits. His cooling system kicked in and he's recharging his batteries.""I know what you're doing."

375.author: Sam Koenig
375.quote: "Agent Coulson, this is Agent Koenig. They've got Agent Koenig. I repeat they've got Agent Koenig!"

376.author: Tucker Shockley, Billy Koenig and Holden Radcliffe
376.quote: "You two will want to get acquainted. You're the last one the other's gonna see alive.""Yeah, well, we're ready to die!""No! No. No, no, no, no. I'm extremely not ready to die."

377.author: Tucker Shockley and Billy Koenig
377.quote: "The one who comes in this room next won't be me. The man who comes in here will do things to you that I can't even watch. He will break you.""Yeah, well, Koenigs don't break. All right? We're programmed to take pain, so bring it on! Bring it on! Oh, my God. I'm in so much pain. I don't think I can take this. That guy hits really hard."

378.author: Holden Radcliffe and Billy Koenig
378.quote: "I don't care what this is or what you guys do. I'm not gonna talk.""You won't have to. That's the beauty of it. This machine will allow me access to his mind. We'll get all the information we need without laying a hand on him.""Well, you're not gonna get anything out of me. Because my mind is a steel trap inside of a sealed box surrounded by quicksand and oh, is that a puppy?"

379.author: Black Bolt to Agon and Rynda

380.author: Maximus to Black Bolt
380.quote: "We do nothing. Brother, that's your strategy for everything."

381.author: Medusa and Maximus
381.quote: "We are not going to Earth anytime soon. It would only lead to war.""I'm sorry, Medusa. Are you speaking for yourself or for our King?""I'm speaking for myself.""Excellent. Now, please, can you tell us what the King thinks?"

382.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
382.quote: "Hello. I'm Medusa. I know everyone's afraid of you, but I'm not."

383.author: Maximus and Medusa
383.quote: "This is difficult, I know. But I'm here for you.""Thank you. But there's not much in this life that I can't handle.""You mean that Bolt can't handle. The rest of us have no choice. We're just bounced around according to his will.""Careful.""I'm just telling the truth. I would never treat you the way he does if you were my Queen."

384.author: Maximus and Kitang
384.quote: "Black Bolt is afraid that if we return to Earth, we will get into a war with the humans, but fear is not the emotion that should be dictating our actions. We need to be bold.""Your brother thinks different. And he is King, Maximus."

385.author: Maximus to Black Bolt
385.quote: "Hello, brother. You should've known this day was coming. But you didn't, did you? You've so completely taken me for granted that you can hardly imagine that I have thoughts of my own that I can carry through. It's your arrogance that has destroyed you."

386.author: Maximus to Black Bolt
386.quote: "Are you going to speak? Are you going to use your voice? Kill your only brother? Just like you murdered our parents?"

388.author: Maximus
388.quote: "The days of Black Bolt's rigid meritocracy are over."

389.author: Kalama to Black Bolt
389.quote: "Hey! Are you not speaking? Or you one of those smart-asses that's waiting for your lawyers to come and get you?"

390.author: Pena
390.quote: "Put him in gen pop, but stick it to him. If he gets rattled hard enough by our other guests, maybe he'll be more inclined to talk."

391.author: Sammy to Black Bolt
391.quote: "I get it. You can't talk. Were you experimented on? Did you get bit by a radioactive bug? Or maybe you woke up one morning covered in a funky, rock-like crust? Yeah. You know what I'm talking about. Look, I'm not your enemy. I just wanted to warn you. People like you are disappearing from all over. You got family? A wife? Me, too. If I were you, I'd get out any way I could, and find them before something bad happens to them, too."

392.author: Kitang, Rynda and Agon
392.quote: "According to our testing, Black Bolt's voice may very well be the most powerful and dangerous gift in all of Inhuman history. And I have every reason to believe that as your mature, your power will only grow stronger.""But what does it mean?""It means that your eldest son has the power to destroy all of Attilan, on purpose or accidentally. You will never again hear the voice of your oldest son. Perhaps we should consider placing the boy somewhere safe.""You mean lock him away?""For the safety of Attilan, my Queen, and himself.""No. Absolutely not. He will learn to control his gift.""But Your Highness...""He is my son. Someday, he will be King."

393.author: Agon, Black Bolt and Maximus
393.quote: "Being King isn't what you think it is. Requires sacrifice, responsibility.""I'm sorry, Dad, but from what I've seen, your job is pretty boring.""It's not boring. He's the King.""Of Attilan. All 1,400 people.""Black Bolt, the day you take the crown, you will inherit all of the power and all the weight of being the leader of a great people.""Honestly, I don't want that. I'd rather just be me.""I wish I could be King.""Sorry it doesn't work that way, Maximus.""Like, if I'm killed in battle?""We're not at war at the moment.""But if he does die, I'm King, right?""No one is going to die. I promise. Both my sons are destined for great things."

394.author: Evan Declan and Maximus
394.quote: "If I could replicate his genetic code, cancer could be cured, cystic fibrosis. Imagine a world where children don't die where you you could become anything you want.""You don't need him alive to obtain his DNA."

395.author: Louise Fisher and Medusa
395.quote: "Do you have a job on the Moon?""I'm their Queen.""No wonder you're so bossy.""Queen... Queen Medusa and King...""Black Bolt.""Ugh. Suddenly, "Louise" doesn't sound so bad."

396.author: Evan Declan and Sammy to Black Bolt
396.quote: "Your DNA, it's not human. Usually, when someone develops abilities, there's a there's a hiccup in their genetic code. A circle, suddenly, in a row of squares. But your DNA, it's... It's row after row of circles more... more perfect than anything I've ever seen.""I think he likes you.""Your fMRI scan shows you have a an unusually large neural pathway connecting your cerebral cortex to your temporal lobe, supercharging your vocal cords. I'm both in awe of you and slightly terrified. Extremely terrified of you. I don't know how you do it. A whisper in your sleep would kill your wife. You have the power to kill everyone you love."

397.author: Mordis to Black Bolt
397.quote: "They say you're the most powerful Inhuman in all of Attilan. Want to find out?"

398.author: Medusa and Maximus
398.quote: "Black Bolt says that when he gets home, he wants to have a few words with you.""Tell my brother I look forward to the family reunion."

399.author: Louise Fisher and Medusa
399.quote: "You married the son of the people who banished your parents?""It's not like it sounds. We were alone. His parents died shortly after mine did. We understood loss. It connected us."

400.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
400.quote: "They don't understand because you've been guarded for so long. Maybe it's time everyone knows you like I do."

401.author: Auran and Evan Declan
401.quote: "Tell me where Black Bolt is, or I'll snap your neck.""What's a Black Bolt?""The one who doesn't speak."

402.author: Karnak to Black Bolt
402.quote: "You're a welcome sight too, my King."

403.author: Medusa and Gorgon
403.quote: "He said we need to take down Maximus, but what he means by "take down", I'm not exactly sure. I know I said we needed to throw Maximus off the highest wall in Attilan, but I think I think we need to take him alive.""Then let me smash his head in in front of the whole city.""Gorgon, I love you, but you are not helping. Haven't we learned anything from my parents?"

404.author: Auran to Medusa
404.quote: "I'm curious if Black Bolt still has that frankly disgusting  fondness for his human friends Declan and Sammy."

405.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
405.quote: "Why did I bring my parents up? I brought them up because when you became King, you said you never wanted to be like your own parents, like any other King before you. I'm reminding you that you promised me that you would be more understanding. Yes, he hurt me, and there's a part of me that wants him to pay for that, but we have to be bigger than that. So, to answer your question, no. No, we don't just let him walk away. We give him a fair trial. We let the people decide. Look. I am not trying to protect Maximus. I am trying to protect you. From yourself."

406.author: Maximus and Tibor
406.quote: "The people love me. They'll do anything for me.""Yes, my King.""And if Black Bolt obliterates them all, well, then, that'll make the rest of our citizens hate him all the more."

407.author: Mordis to Karnak
407.quote: "Black Bolt was just as dangerous, but he was given far more opportunities than I was."

408.author: Medusa to the Attilan Royal Guard
408.quote: "I suggest you stop, unless you want to deal with my husband."

409.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
409.quote: "I want to do more than survive. Is this the life that you wanted? I understand that you have to deal with reality, and I know that Maximus sent assassins. But where does this end? And what if the parley doesn't work? I understand more than most what Maximus is capable of. And I know he has to pay for his actions, but please... please!"

410.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
410.quote: "You allowed us all to mourn Triton's death. You deny us our dignity when you lie. But it is your duty as my husband to be honest to me in all things, to make me your partner. When you make a decision like this, when you sideline me, it is insulting. This time away, on Earth, it allowed me to step back and take a look at things, to see how people perceived me. Us. And I love you, and that has never changed. But I am not going to just be your interpreter. I need to have a say in in the things that affect our people, our lives. I am the Queen, and we move together or not at all."

411.author: Evan Declan and Karnak
411.quote: "I don't really have anything to contribute to a war.""If Black Bolt brought you, then you have some value."

412.author: Maximus to Black Bolt
412.quote: "Alone at last. Brother against brother. It's not like you to hide in the dark. But I guess times change, and us along with it."

414.author: Kitang to Black Bolt
414.quote: "Upon the death of your parents, your gift now makes perfect sense. You're the only one who can protect us from this, our greatest enemy."

415.author: Maximus to Black Bolt
415.quote: "How insulting that you, a murderer, would make a better king than I."

416.author: Maximus to Black Bolt
416.quote: "Really? You didn't want to be King, you just had to be King. That's rich, Black Bolt."

417.author: Medusa
417.quote: "We can no longer stay on the Moon. It is time for us to return to our homeland. To Earth. And Black Bolt and I will lead the way."

418.author: Medusa
418.quote: "He says that he needs to resolve this, that Maximus is too dangerous to leave unchecked."

419.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
419.quote: "You should be happy. You saved the Inhumans."

420.author: Black Panther to Captain America
420.quote: "Move, Captain. I won't ask a second time."

421.author: T'Challa to Helmut Zemo, referencing the Avengers
421.quote: "Vengeance has consumed you. It's consuming them. I am done letting it consume me."

422.author: Captain America and Falcon
422.quote: "Sam, southwest rooftop.""Who the hell is the other guy?""I'm about to find out."

423.author: Sam Wilson and Steve Rogers
423.quote: "So you like cats?"Sam...""What? Dude shows up dressed like a cat and you don't wanna know more?"

424.author: Natasha Romanoff and Tony Stark
424.quote: "I have an idea.""Me too. Where's yours?""Downstairs... Where's yours?"

425.author: Black Widow to Black Panther
425.quote: "I said I'd help you find him, not catch him. There's a difference."

426.author: Natasha Romanoff and Tony Stark
426.quote: "T'Challa told Ross what you did so, they're coming for ya, that's how it works now.""I'm not the one who needs to watch their back."

427.author: T'Chaka and T'Challa
427.quote: "For a man who disapproves of diplomacy, you're getting quite good at it.""I'm happy, Father."

428.author: T'Challa and Natasha Romanoff
428.quote: "In my culture, death is not the end. it's more of a stepping off point. You reach out with both hands and Bast and Sekhmet, they lead you into a green veld where... you can run forever."" That sounds very peaceful.""My father thought so. I am not my father.""T'Challa, Task Force will decide who brings in Barnes.""Don't bother Ms. Romanoff. I'll kill him myself."

429.author: T'Challa and Steve Rogers
429.quote: "Your suit, it's vibranium?"The Black Panther has been a protector of Wakanda for generations. A mantle passed from warrior to warrior. Now because your friend murdered my father, I also wear the mantle of king. So I ask you, as both warrior and king, how long do you think you can keep your friend safe from me?"

431.author: Winter Soldier and Black Panther
431.quote: "I didn't kill your father.""Then why did you run?"

432.author: Hawkeye and Black Panther
432.quote: "We haven't met yet. I'm Clint.""I don't care."

433.author: T'Challa to Helmut Zemo
433.quote: "Justice will come soon enough.""Tell that to the dead.""The living are not done with you yet."

434.author: Steve Rogers, Bucky Barnes, and T'Challa before Bucky goes into cryogenic hibernation
434.quote: "Are you sure about this?""I can't trust my own mind.""Your friend and my father, they were both victims. If I can help one of them find peace."

435.author: Steve Rogers and T'Challa
435.quote: "You know if they find out he's here, they'll come for him.""Let them try."

436.author: Spider-Man recording his reaction to the Clash of the Avengers
436.quote: "Okay, there's Captain America, Iron Man, Black Widow. Who's that new guy?"

437.author: Black Panther
437.quote: "The Black Panther has been a protector of Wakanda for generations. And now, it is time to show the outside world who we are."

438.author: T'Challa
438.quote: "If anyone found out what we truly are, what we possess... it could destroy the world."

440.author: Black Panther
440.quote: "You were wrong! All of you were wrong! To turn your backs on the rest of the world! We let the fear of discovery stop us from doing what is right. No more! I cannot stay here with you. I cannot rest while he sits on the throne. He is a monster of our own making. I must take the mantle back. I must! I must right these wrongs."

441.author: T'Challa
441.quote: "Wakanda will no longer watch from the shadows. We can not. We must not. We will work to be an example of how we, as brothers and sisters on this earth, should treat each other. Now, more than ever, the illusions of division threaten our very existence. We all know the truth: more connects us than separates us. But in times of crisis the wise build bridges, while the foolish build barriers. We must find a way to look after one another, as if we were one single tribe."

443.author: Shuri
443.quote: "The Black Panther fights for us. And I will be there beside him."

445.author: T'Challa and T'Chaka
445.quote: "Tell me how to best protect Wakanda. I want to be a great king, Baba. Just like you.""You're going to struggle. So you'll need to surround yourself with people you trust. You're a good man with a good heart. And it's hard for a good man to be king."

447.author: Okoye and Black Panther
447.quote: "Just don't freeze when you see her.""What are you talking about? I never freeze."

448.author: Black Panther and Nakia
448.quote: "My uncle N'Jobu betrayed us, but my father...He may have created something even worse.""Hey. Look at me. You can't let your father's mistakes define who you are. You get to decide what kind of king you are going to be."

449.author: Black Panther and Erik Killmonger
449.quote: "What do you want?""I want the throne!"

450.author: Shrui and T'Challa
450.quote: "Wooh! Let's go! Look at your suit! You've been taking bullets and it's charging it up with kinetic energy!""Pull around the truck!""Show off!"

451.author: Erik Killmonger and T'Challa
451.quote: "Black Panther, you seem to be comfortable.""What do you want?""I want your secrets, your weapons. I'm gonna burn it all!"

452.author: Ramonda, Black Panther, Shuri, Nakia, Everett Ross and M'Baku
452.quote: "T'Challa, we will not leave Wakanda.""It is my duty to keep you safe.""If he gets control of our technology, nowhere will be safe. The Black Panther lives. And when he fights for the fate of Wakanda, I will be right there beside him.""As will I.""I'm in too. What? You're gonna need all the help you can get.""Are you're done? A-Are you-are you- are you done?""Give me and M'Baku a moment. Please allow my mother to stay here.""No harm will come to her. I give you my word.""You know, I could use an army as well.""I bet you could. But no."

453.author: Erik Killmonger and T'Challa
453.quote: "N'Jadaka!""Wassup?!""I never yielded! And as you can see, I am not dead!""All that challenge shit is over with! I'm the king now!"

454.author: T'Challa
454.quote: "Evacuate the City. Engage all defenses, And get this man a shield."

455.author: Black Panther
455.quote: "Today we don't fight for one life, we fight for all of them."

456.author: Okoye and T'Challa
456.quote: "The Kingsguard and the Dora Milaje have been alerted.""And the Border Tribe?""Those that are left.""Send word to the Jabari as well. M'Baku likes a good fight.""And what of this one?""This one may be tired of war, but the White Wolf has rested long enough."

459.author: Okoye and T'Challa
459.quote: "When you said we were going to open Wakanda to the rest of the world, this is not what I imagined.""What did you imagine?""The Olympics. Maybe even a Starbucks."

460.author: Natasha Romanoff, Proxima Midnight, Steve Rogers and T'Challa
460.quote: "Where's your other friend?""You will pay for his life with yours. Thanos will have that stone.""That's not going to happen.""You are in Wakanda now. Thanos will have nothing but dust and blood.""We...have blood to spare."

461.author: Black Panther and Shuri
461.quote: "How much longer, Shuri?""I've barely begun, brother.""You might want to pick up the pace."

462.author: T'Challa offers to take the Nano Gauntlet from Hawkeye during the Battle of Earth

464.author: Tony Stark and Pepper Potts
464.quote: "Oh wow, very, very impressive individual. She's fluent in French, Italian, Russian, Latin. Who speaks Latin?""No one speaks Latin, it's a dead language. You can read Latin, or you can write Latin, but you can't speak Latin.""Did you model in Tokyo? 'Cuz she modeled in Tokyo."

465.author: Tony Stark and Black Widow
465.quote: "Huh! You're... fired.""That's not up to you."

466.author: Black Widow and Tony Stark
466.quote: "I'm surprised you can keep your mouth shut.""God you're good. You are mind blowingly duplicitous. How do you do it? You're a triple impostor, I've never seen anything like it. Is there anything real about you? Do you even speak Latin?""Fallaces sunt rerum species et hominum spes fallunt."[1]"Which means? Wait, what did you just say?""It means you can either drive yourself home or I can have you collected."

467.author: Black Widow and Tony Stark
467.quote: "Well done with the new chest piece. I'm reading significantly higher output and your vitals all look promising.""Yes, for the moment, I'm not dying. Thank you."

469.author: Black Widow to Captain America
469.quote: "It was quite the buzz around here, finding you in the ice. I thought Coulson was gonna  swoon."

471.author: Black Widow
471.quote: "These guys come from legend, Captain. They're basically gods."

472.author: Phil Coulson and Black Widow
472.quote: "I'll brief you on everything when you get back. But first, we need you to talk to the big guy.""Coulson, you know that Stark trusts me about as far as he can throw me.""Oh, I've got Stark. You get the big guy.""Bozhe moi![2]"

473.author: Thor and Black Widow
473.quote: "Loki is beyond reason, but he is of Asgard and he is my brother!""He killed eighty people in two days.""He's adopted."

474.author: Loki and Natasha Romanoff
474.quote: "Is that love, Agent Romanoff?""Love is for children; I owe that man a debt."

475.author: Black Widow and Loki
475.quote: "Regimes fall every day. I tend not to weep over that, I'm Russian, or I was.""And what are you now?""It's really not that complicated. I've got red in my ledger, I'd like to wipe it out.""Can you? Can you wipe out that much red? Drakoff's daughter? Sao Paulo? The hospital fire? Barton told me everything."

476.author: Black Widow and Steve Rogers
476.quote: "How do we do this?""As a team!"

477.author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
477.quote: "Just like Budapest, all over again.""You and I remember Budapest

478.author: Black Widow to Captain America
478.quote: "Most of the intelligence community doesn't believe he exists. The ones that do call him the Winter Soldier. He's a ghost. You'll never find him."

479.author: Black Widow to Nick Fury, while watching him 'die'.

480.author: Black Widow
480.quote: "When I first joined S.H.I.E.L.D., I thought it was going straight. But I guess I just traded in the KGB for HYDRA."

481.author: Black Widow
481.quote: "If you want to arrest me, arrest me. You'll know where to find me"

482.author: Black Widow and Captain America evading Brock Rumlow
482.quote: "Kiss me.""What?""Public displays of affection make people uncomfortable.""Yes, they do.""Still feel uncomfortable?"

483.author: Captain America and Black Widow
483.quote: "Believe it or not, it's kinda hard to find someone with shared life experiences.""Oh that's all right, just make something up.""What, like you?""I don't know, the truth is a matter of circumstances. It's not all things to all people all the time, and neither am I.""That's a tough way to live.""It's a good way not to die though."

484.author: Sam Wilson, Natasha Romanoff and Nick Fury
484.quote: "Please tell me you got those choppers in the air!""Sam, where are you?""41st floor, northwest corner!""Got it! Stay where you are!""Not an option! 41st floor! Forty-first!""It's not like they put the floor numbers on the outside of the building."

485.author: Black Widow to Hulk
485.quote: "Hey, big guy. Sun's getting real low."

486.author: Natasha Romanoff to Bruce Banner
486.quote: "All my friends are fighters, and here comes a guy avoiding a fight 'cause he knows he'll win."

487.author: Natasha Romanoff to Tony Stark and Bruce Banner
487.quote: "When you two programmed him to protect the human race, you amazingly failed."

488.author: Black Widow
488.quote: "I'm always picking up after you boys."

491.author: Thor and Black Widow
491.quote: "Loki's Scepter must be here. Strucker couldn't mount this defense without it. At long last."""At long last" is lasting a little long, boys."

492.author: Natasha Romanoff and Madame B.
492.quote: "You'll break them.""Only the breakable ones. You're made of marble. We'll celebrate after the graduation ceremony.""What if I fail?""You never fail."

493.author: Madame B. and Natasha Romanoff
493.quote: "Sloppy. Pretending to fail. The ceremony is necessary... for you to take your place in the world.""I have no place in the world.""Exactly."

494.author: Nick Fury, Natasha Romanoff and Steve Rogers
494.quote: "Ultron says the Avengers are the only thing between him and his mission. And whether or not he admits it, his mission is global destruction. All this, laid in a grave. So stand. Outwit the platinum bastard.""Steve doesn't like that kind of talk.""You know what, Romanoff?"

495.author: Iron Man and Black Widow
495.quote: "Romanoff. You and Banner better not be playing "hide the zucchini."""Relax, shellhead. Not all of us can fly."

496.author: Captain America and Black Widow
496.quote: "You wanna keep staring at the wall, or do you wanna go to work? I mean, it's a pretty interesting wall.""I thought you and Tony were still gazing into each other's eyes. How do we look?""Well, we're not the '27 Yankees.""We got some hitters.""They're good. They're not a team.""Let's beat them into shape."

498.author: Natasha Romanoff to Steve Rogers
498.quote: "After everything that happened with S.H.I.E.L.D., during my little hiatus, I went back to Russia and tried to find my parents. Two little gravestones by a chain-link fence. I pulled some weeds and left some flowers. We have what we have when we have it."

499.author: Black Widow to Captain America
499.quote: "Steve, you know what's about to happen. Do you really want to punch your way out of this?"

501.author: Captain America, Scarlet Witch and Black Widow
501.quote: "You see that ranger over half way up the block?""You mean the red one? It's cute.""It's also bullet proof, which means private security, which means more guns, which means more headaches for somebody, probably us.""You guys know I can move things with my mind, right?""Looking over your shoulder needs to become a second nature."

502.author: Black Widow and Falcon
502.quote: "Thanks, Sam.""Don't thank me.""I'm not thanking that thing.""His name is Redwing.""I'm still not thanking it.""He's cute. Go on, pet 'em."

503.author: Thaddeus Ross and Natasha Romanoff
503.quote: "Three days from now, the UN meets in Vienna to ratify the Accords. So, talk it over.""And if we come to a decision you don't like?""Then you retire."

504.author: Natasha Romanoff and Sam Wilson
504.quote: "Maybe Tony is right. If, we have one hand on the wheel that can still steer.""Aren't you the same woman who told the government to kiss our ass a few years ago?""I'm just... monitoring. We have made some very public mistakes."

505.author: Tony Stark and Natasha Romanoff
505.quote: "I'm sorry, did I mishear you or did you agree with me?""Oh, I want to take it back."

506.author: Natasha Romanoff and Steve Rogers
506.quote: "I know how much Barnes mean to you. I really do. Stay at home. You'll only make this worse for all of us. Please.""Are you saying you'll arrest me?""No. Someone will, if you interfere. That's how it works now.""If he's this far gone, then... I should be the one to bring him in.""Why?""Because I'm the one least likely to die trying."

507.author: Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanoff, Sam Wilson and Tony Stark
507.quote: "I'm not getting that shield back, am I?""Technically, it's the government's property. Wings too.""That's cold.""Warmer than jail."

508.author: Natasha Romanoff and Thaddeus Ross
508.quote: "What happens when the shooting starts, let them kill Steve Rogers?""If we are provoked. Barnes would have been eliminate in Romania if it wasn't for Rogers. There are dead people who would be alive now. Feel free to check my math."

509.author: Natasha Romanoff and Tony Stark
509.quote: "We're seriously understaffed.""Oh, yeah. It would be great if we had a Hulk, right about now. Any shot?""You really think he'd be on our side?"

510.author: Ant-Man and Black Widow
510.quote: "Look, I really don't want to hurt you.""I wouldn't stress about it."

511.author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
511.quote: "We're still friends, right?""Depends on how hard you hit me."

512.author: Tony Stark and Natasha Romanoff
512.quote: "They're coming for you.""I'm not the one that needs to watch their back."

513.author: Spider-Man recording his reaction to the Clash of the Avengers
513.quote: "Okay, there's Captain America, Iron Man, Black Widow. Who's that new guy?"

514.author: Roger Harrington and Flash Thompson
514.quote: "Flash, you're in for Peter.""I don't know. I gotta check my calendar first. I got a hot date with Black Widow coming up."

515.author: Thor and Bruce Banner
515.quote: "Banner. Hey, hey, hey. You all right, Banner? Sun's going down. Sun's going down. That's it, breathe. I won't hurt you. Sun's going down.""Thor.""Yeah.""What happened to your hair?""Some creepy old man cut it off.""It looks good.""Thanks.""Where are we? How's Nat?""Nat is good, I'm sure.""Is she okay?"

516.author: Black Widow to Proxima Midnight and Corvus Glaive
516.quote: "We don't want to kill you. But we will."

517.author: Nick Fury, Tony Stark, Vision, Thor, and Natasha Romanoff in the trailer
517.quote: "There was an idea...""To bring together, a group of remarkable people...""To see if we could become something more... ""So when they needed us, we could fight the battles...""That they never could."

518.author: Thaddeus Ross and Natasha Romanoff
518.quote: "You've got some nerve, I'll give you that.""You could use some of that right now."

519.author: Bruce Banner, Natasha Romanoff, and Sam Wilson
519.quote: "I think you look great. Yeah. I'm back.""Hi, Bruce.""Nat.""This is awkward."

520.author: Bruce Banner and Natasha Romanoff
520.quote: "Thanos has the biggest army in the universe. And he is not gonna stop until he... he gets... Vision's stone.""Well, then we have to protect it."

521.author: Vision, Natasha Romanoff, T'Challa, Steve Rogers, and Wanda Maximoff
521.quote: "It's too late. We need to destroy the stone now.""Vision, get your ass back on the table.""We will hold them off.""Wanda. As soon as that stone is out of his head, you blow it to hell.""I will.""Evacuate the city, engage all defenses and get this man a shield."

522.author: Proxima Midnight and Black Widow
522.quote: "He'll die alone. As will you.""She's not alone."

523.author: Black Widow and Proxima Midnight
523.quote: "Where's your other friend?""You will pay for his life with yours. Thanos will have that stone."

524.author: Steve Rogers and Natasha Romanoff
524.quote: "This is a nightmare.""I've had better nightmares."

525.author: Steve Rogers, James Rhodes, Bruce Banner and Natasha Romanoff
525.quote: "I thought we bypassed the battery.""We did. It's still plugged in, it just... it just stopped.""Reboot and send the signal again.""We don't even know what this is.""Fury did. You tell me the second you get a signal. I wanna know who's on the other end of that thing."

526.author: Black Widow
526.quote: "Thanos did what exactly he said he was gonna do. He wiped out 50% of all living creatures."

528.author: Clint Barton, Thor, Bruce Banner and Steve Rogers
528.quote: "Can't get her back.""What?""It can't be undone. It can't.""Look, I'm sorry, no offence, but you're a very earthly being, okay, and we're talking about space magic, and can't seems very definitive.""Yeah, look, I know that I'm way outside my pay grade here, but she's still isn't here, isn't she?""No. That's my point.""It can't be undone! Or that's at least what the red floating guy had to say! Maybe you wanna go talk to him! Okay, go grab your hammer, and you go fly and you talk to him! It was supposed to be me. Sacrificed her life for that goddamned stone, she bet her life on it!""She's not coming back. We have to make it worth it. We have to.""We will."

529.author: Black Widow, Hulk, War Machine, Captain Marvel and Captain America
529.quote: "He used the stones again.""Hey, hey, hey, hey. We'd be going in short-handed, you know?""Look, he still got the stones, so...""So let's get 'em. We use them to bring everyone back.""Just like that?""Yeah. Just like that.""Even if there's a small chance that we can undo this, I mean we owe it to everyone who's not in this room to try."

530.author: Hulk, War Machine and Captain Marvel
530.quote: "If we do this, how do we know it's gonna end any differently than it did before?""Because before you didn't have me.""Hey, new girl? Everybody in this room is about that superhero life. And if you don't mind my asking, where the hell have you been all this time?""There are a lot of other planets in the universe, and unfortunately, they didn't have you guys."

531.author: Black Widow and Captain America
531.quote: "This is gonna work, Steve.""I know it is. 'Cause I don't know what I'm gonna do if it doesn't."

532.author: Ant-Man, Captain America, and Black Widow
532.quote: "Hi! Uh, is anyone home? This is Scott Lang. We met a few years ago, at the airport, in Germany? I got really big.""Is this an old message?""Ant-Man? Ant-M - I know you know wh - I know you know that!""That's the front door.""That's me. Can you buzz me in?"

533.author: Phil Coulson to Grant Ward
533.quote: "Agent Hill did a very detailed assessment of your last three missions. Combat, top grades. Espionage, she gave you the highest marks since Romanoff."

534.author: Victoria Hand and Phil Coulson
534.quote: "Barton, Romanoff, they never have an extraction plan.""They know that going in!"

535.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
535.author: Eric Koenig and Grant Ward
535.quote: "Fury designed this himself. He wanted a Lie Detector Romanoff couldn't beat.""Did she?""Like Fury would tell!"

536.author: Grant Ward and Maria Hill
536.quote: "If he needed eye candy around, he could have at least picked Romanoff.""That's funny, I'll tell her you said that."

537.author: Sam Koenig and Daisy Johnson
537.quote: "Did you know that online, there's a library of fan fiction about Quake?""Did not need to know that.""Oh, well, you should Google it. Because it's... it's... Actually, no, you shouldn't. You shouldn't. Forget I said that. Some of it is a little on the steamier side. Not that I've read it! You But you hear things. I mean, they got you 'shipping with Black Widow."

538.movie: WHIH Breaking News: Attack in Lagos
538.author: Christine Everhart and Jackson Norris
538.quote: "Now, Jackson, which Avengers were there exactly? Tony Stark?""Captain Rogers involvement has been mentioned and corroborated. Some accounts indicate Sam Wilson and Natasha Romanoff, but nothing else definitive at this time."

539.movie: The Avengers Prelude: Black Widow Strikes
539.author: Black Widow
539.quote: "Fortunately, the Miniaturized Smoke Grenades that Coulson gave me have a variety of uses."

540.author: Donnie Gill
540.quote: "Kids at my home town wouldn't talk to me and when S.H.I.E.L.D. told my dad that I was gifted he said, "at what?""

541.author: Donnie Gill
541.quote: "Oh god, oh god. What is this? Hey what's happening to me?! Help me help me! Get it off! Make it stop! Help me get it off! No! Make it stop!."

542.author: Leo Fitz and Donnie Gill
542.quote: "You shouldn't keep these big ideas to yourself, you should run them by your instructors.""These aren't my big ideas."

543.author: Seth Dormer and Donnie Gill
543.quote: "The ice stopped, so it's ending?""No, it's just beginning. We're in the eye of the storm."

544.author: Leo Fitz and Donnie Gill
544.quote: "Donnie, I wanted to wish you good luck and I'm very sorry.""Don't say you're sorry, my only friend is dead because of me.""I don't know what else to say.""Then don't say anything."

545.author: Donnie Gill
545.quote: "A degree. I used to study engineering."

546.author: Donnie Gill
546.quote: "I want to be left alone but you people won't stop coming after me. So I'm done hiding. It's time HYDRA learn once and for all I'm not interested. I'm not afraid. I'm pissed off. And every HYDRA agent they send is going to feel it."

547.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May discuss Donnie's Gill's training
547.quote: "Most likely scenario, HYDRAs looking for another weapon. From what we've been able to piece together Donnie Gill had limited powers when he entered the sandbox but...""While there he was taught to control, amplify those powers."

548.author: Antoine Triplett
548.quote: "Iceberg in the Middle East? Gill's not subtle."

549.author: Elias and Donnie Gill
549.quote: "Marrakech has a long history of giving shelter to travellers hiding from their past.""Why would you think I'm hiding? Who were you speaking to? Huh?!""They threatened me, they said you were dangerous."

550.author: Gill and Jemma Simmons
550.quote: "Which side are you? S.H.I.E.L.D.? HYDRA? What side did you wind up on?""I'd like to think that I'm on your side."

551.author: Sunil Bakshi and Donnie Gill
551.quote: "You know what is best. What is best is you comply.""I don't...""Compliance will be rewarded. Mr. Gill, are you ready to comply?""I'm happy to comply."

552.author: Isabelle Hartley and Lance Hunter
552.quote: "He's not a big picture kind a guy.""Sound like my ex-wife.""And you should have listened to her, too."

553.author: Skye and Lance Hunter
553.quote: "How did you guys meet?""Through my psychotic ex-wife."

554.author: Lance Hunter
554.quote: "I packed your chute. And according to my ex, my folding skills are abysmal."

555.author: Lance Hunter about Bobbi Morse
555.quote: "I first met her on a spring night. She was on the pier, facing the Outer Banks; the moonlight glinting off her face. She resembled a goddess. Of course, that was her cruel trick."

556.author: Lance Hunter, Alphonso Mackenzie, Antoine Triplett and Skye
556.quote: "Ha ha, and no. It didn't work out because interspecies relationships are hard. I was a human, whereas she was a demonic hell-beast.""He doesn't like her.""You don't say.""She's pure evil.""Hey, at least you got away from your ex, the guy I had a crush on is now the psycho living in our basement.""You know, I wish I could relate, but all my exes are awesome.""Is that right? I seem to remember an entire year when you had to pretend you liked quinoa.""Yeah, that was a dark time."

557.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
557.author: Bobbi Morse
557.quote: "We have a mole, ladies and gentlemen, right here in our very facility!"

558.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
558.author: Jemma Simmons and Phil Coulson
558.quote: "She's amazing.""That's why I asked her to join the team."

559.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
559.author: Lance Hunter, Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
559.quote: "Anyone want to tell me what the bloody hell she's doing here?""Bobbi's one of our best agents.""Oh that's rich, mind telling me what I'm doing here?!""That's easy, I vouched for you."

560.author: Bobbi Morse
560.quote: "S.H.I.E.L.D.'s not S.H.I.E.L.D. anymore. I'm trying to figure out where I fit in, too."

561.author: Lance Hunter and Melinda May
561.quote: "Try being married to somebody who remembers every single little detail. It's not that charming. ... You think I'm being petty, don't you? Well, I'm not. I don't have a problem with Bob kissing that guy.""Good. Because you had a hickey on your neck for a week after our mission in Miami.""Well excuse me doing my job thoroughly. And with style."

562.author: Lance Hunter
562.quote: "She can handle it; deception's her forte."

563.author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
563.quote: "You ever been married?"" ... ""You still talk to him?"" ... ""Right. Good advice."

564.author: Grant Ward and Bobbi Morse
564.quote: "It can't be that interesting.""Why do you say that?""Because you were on page 117 when you were waiting outside. And you're still on page 117. So either you're a really slow reader, or you're working for Coulson.""Who?""I am impressed. And you can tell him I said that. I almost missed you.""What are you talking about?""I'm sure they told you about this. If you try or say anything, everyone in this bus will be flying. So just keep reading your book, and hope for a happy ending."

565.author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
565.quote: "Subtlety is key.""You were dressed like a cowboy!"

567.author: Skye and Phil Coulson
567.quote: "Didn't want to crack him yourself?""Bobbi is as good as they come."

569.author: Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
569.quote: "You ever had the fried plantains here?""From Tostones? Yeah, why?""I heard about this place down the street where they put crab in them. I wouldn't mind trying that. You know, after we save the world."

570.author: Bobbi Morse and Phil Coulson
570.quote: "With all due respect, sir, this kind of op, Fury would have a number.""A number?""Of acceptable losses.""My number is zero."

571.author: Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
571.quote: "Look around you. Venders, selling their wares to bring home a modest income. Locals, buying fresh vegetables for dinner tonight. Tourists, on their one vacation a year.""Point?""They are the point. The're the reason I'm here. The reason there's a S.H.I.E.L.D.. There are three million people on this island. I don't want HYDRA turning them into collateral damage."

572.author: Jemma Simmons and Bobbi Morse
572.quote: "We were in the bottom of the ocean, in a storage pod, left for dead. And Fitz... he said something that caught me completely off-guard.""Ah, those three little words.""Yes! Well, no. I mean, not exactly. I barely had a moment to process what he said or how I felt about it, next thing I know, he's giving me the oxygen, water's rushing in and... He's ... He's laying there, in the hospital bed. He was so pale.""How long was Fitz in the coma?""Nine of the longest days of my life. When it finally broke, he couldn't speak. He just stared at me, confused. All I wanted to do was help him. All I wanted was... My best friend back.""Your best friend?""I never thought of him as anything else. That said, I can't imagine my life without him. It's all very confusing.""You've never told him any of this, have you?""Oh, lord no."

573.author: Phil Coulson, Lance Hunter, and Bobbi Morse
573.quote: "Two goals; stop the drill, find Skye.""Aren't you forgetting the third?""What's that?""Don't die out there. We tend to remind each other not to die.""I thought that was implicit.""He likes to hear it.""Who doesn't like to hear it?"

574.author: Bobbi Morse and Skye
574.quote: "I've been in quarantine before, and I know it can drive you absolutely nuts.""Thanks. I was beginning to feel like a leper.""Are you kidding? You managed to be taken hostage by three known murderers, you gunned Ward down, then were blasted by an alien chemical weapon and walked out unscathed. Leper? I think you're a rock star."

575.author: Phil Coulson,Alphonso Mackenzie,Melinda May, Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse, Skye, and Leo Fitz
575.quote: "I shouldn't have to ask any of you to save one of our own.""You never ask! You just give your orders, no matter cracked up they are!""Mack, you'd do well to remember your rank right now.""Really? Rank at a time like this? Why don't you shove your rank up your...""Not helping, Hunter.""Guys, stop.""No, it's cathartic. Do you have any thoughts of your own on it, or do you just parrot his?""Coulson's trying to stop HYDRA.""We didn't stop anything! We unleashed something on the planet!""Please.""No one knows what happened yet.""It could have been a lot worse.""And Skye barely made it out alive!""Thanks to Trip. He sacrificed his life, Mack!""No! He traded his life for hers! And then he was shattered into a thousand pieces!""That's enough! If Trip was here, he wouldn't be arguing, he wouldn't be bitching. He would be gearing up to do what needs to be done. Yes, we're dealing with forces we don't understand, but HYDRA I do understand. I want everyone ready when the sun comes up. End of discussion."

576.author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
576.quote: "(in American accent)Your presence is most welcome.""Drop the accent. It makes you sound like a douche bag.""(Reverting to normal voice)Now you know what it feels like for me to live in this country."

577.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
577.quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

578.author: Bobbi Morse
578.quote: "We're spies, we lie for a living."

579.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
579.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
579.quote: "Everything I felt for you, that was real.""Yeah maybe so, but in the end you still got that intel didn't you?"

580.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
580.author: Robert Gonzales and Bobbi Morse
580.quote: "This is your op, Morse, so tell me how do you want to proceed?""Skye's not the main concern. Coulson and his secrets, that's the threat. And I think it's time that we remove that threat."

581.author: Bobbi Morse
581.quote: "We can't keep pretending that everything's the same as it was yesterday. I mean, look around. Half of our friends are either dead or have turned. This isn't a time to go down with the ship. We need to do something. We need to stop this."

582.author: Bobbi Morse and Isabelle Hartley
582.quote: "Got to get you a gun one of these days.""Save my bullets for the real fight."

583.author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Isabelle Hartley, and Bobbi Morse
583.quote: "What's the plan? What are you even doing here?""Fury left us orders.""To do what?""To save S.H.I.E.L.D.."

584.author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
584.quote: "There's no need for the gun; I can explain.""Can't wait."

585.author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
585.quote: "I work for S.H.I.E.L.D., I do. I swear. But you don't.""Try again.""What Coulson's doing here, this isn't S.H.I.E.L.D - not the real S.H.I.E.L.D., anyway.""The last person who betrayed me... I broke his larynx. Hand that over."

586.author: Robert Gonzales and Bobbi Morse
586.quote: "Seven agents down, Calderon barely hanging on, and you want to defend that thing?""What happened wasn't her fault. I was there. Calderon fired at her.""She was armed and hostile.""She was scared and defending herself.""I don't care if she was chasing butterflies. We can't wear kid gloves around something with powers of that magnitude."

587.author: Robert Gonzales, Jemma Simmons, Bobbi Morse, and Leo Fitz
587.quote: "Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons, the ones that got away. I had my eye on you two when you were at the Academy. I wanted to recruit you, but Coulson beat me to it. I heard he actually bribed Weaver with cupcakes. Robert Gonzales.""We know who you are, and we are quite aware of your commendable reputation. Under different circumstances, we might even be flattered... Which is why this is so hard to comprehend.""Under different circumstances, we would have preferred to be invited guests, but that forced our hand. We had to take it out of play.""What's inside that's so important?""All we know is that Coulson and Fury both believed it was valuable enough or dangerous enough to protect with extreme measures.""Maybe it was their favorite recipes."

588.author: Bobbi Morse and Alphonso Mackenzie
588.quote: "Finally, an actual partner...Little tip; could have avoided losing your footing if you would have flipped into it.""A flip? Now you're just making fun of me.""Maybe a little. It's not like I can bench-press a small hatchback.""Yeah. We all have our talents."

589.author: Robert Gonzales and Bobbi Morse
589.quote: "These people are a threat.""We don't know that.""We don't know anything about them."

590.author: Bobbi Morse to Grant Ward and Kara Palamas
590.quote: "If I ever apologize or beg for mercy while you torture me, know that I don't mean a word of it... not a word. I made a hard call. I'd make the same one again right now."

591.author: Melinda May
591.quote: "But if anyone can handle him, it's Bobbi."

592.author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
592.quote: "You look better, stupid but better, taking a bullet for me was stupid.""Walking into a trap when you know it's a trap is stupid.""You were the bait."

593.author: Joey Gutierrez and Bobbi Morse
593.quote: "Who the hell are you?""My name's Bobbi. As in the name usually short for "Robert," but in my case, "Barbara," which, to me, is worse. This room is all yours, so feel free to make yourself at home. When you change, just put your clothing and any personal belongings in the drawer over here for analysis. The screen will then ask you to perform a series of medical scans. I know that you're not a huge fan of check-ups, but this will be painless.""No offense, but I don't know you, so don't act like you know a damn thing about me.""I know you put off your yearly physicals at least once every year. I know that your ex-boyfriend was a health nut and was on you to take better care of yourself. But it wasn't until you two broke up that you finally got your gym membership.""You've been spying on me?""Looked at your Facebook page. I did see enough to know that you're generally more concerned for others than you are for yourself."

594.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
594.quote: "Want to tell me why you're not speaking to me?""Because... You're not supposed to see the bride on the wedding day. So, are we gonna do this or what?""I asked for the ring back because I paid for it, not as a meaningful gesture of any kind. But thanks, oh, great master of melodrama.""Why? Because it wasn't at all melodramatic when you whispered on your death bed, "I can't do this anymore."""I meant pretend not to... You know... I didn't mean that we should make the tragic mistake of marrying each other... again.""Call it what you will, but you've got the ring you once threw in my face, and we're shagging on the regular, so only thing missing is a piece of paper.""And your ring, not that you know where it is.""I know exactly where it is. Just don't personally own the scuba-diving equipment to retrieve it."

595.author: Leo Fitz, Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
595.quote: "I won't give up. I can't give up.""None of us want to, Fitz, but...""Fitz, you tried. Okay? You tried your hardest. Everybody knows that.""No. I missed something."

596.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
596.quote: "Damn it. I wanna go after him with you.""You're still on the mend. Plus, you've been undercover with HYDRA, and that face makes an impression. The rest of you makes a bloody statement.""You like me stuck here in the lab.""Too bloody right. You're missing half a lung because you took a bullet Ward intended for me. Nearly bled out in my arms. If you being in the lab means I never have to see something like that again, I'm all for it."

597.author: Bobbi Morse and Jemma Simmons
597.quote: "You're safe. That portal won't open again.""But it has to. I have to go back."

598.author: Melinda May and Lance Hunter
598.quote: "What if there are innocent lives at risk?""There are always lives at risk! You were there when Bobbi was bleeding out in my arms, Ward did that. If I have a shot at finding him I'm taking it. I have to, before Bobbi gets back in the field."

599.author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
599.quote: "Coulson still has me off combat duty. The tests say that my lung isn't healed all the way yet.""My test says otherwise. Wheels up in 20. Welcome back, Agent Morse."

600.author: Kebo and Bobbi Morse
600.quote: "I've taken down men three times your size, girl. What makes you think you can beat me?""Experience."

601.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
601.quote: "I don't want either of us to go after Ward.""You're joking right? Since when? Whatever it is lay it on me.""I think you've been reckless and stupid.""Can I take back what I just said?"

602.author: Steve Wilson and Bobbi Morse undercover as "Agent Phillips"
602.quote: "This guy does not look like FBI.""He wasn't. Dane here crashed the Pentagon servers, Mossad's, Ashley Madison. He's the best consultant we have. Otherwise, he'd be in jail or... I'd have shot him by now."

603.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
603.quote: "Well, once again, too little and too late.""I'll remind you that we're basically the same height. I just don't wear bloody heels. I even had a pine for the days where we didn't have to fight bloody aliens. It's just not a fair fight.""Let's see if we can level the playing field.""Really? Your batons? That's your game-changer?"

604.author: Phil Coulson, Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
604.quote: "I figured out a way to track down Ward, but we got to go off book.""My specialty.""I'm not sure taking Hunter is really such a good idea.""You're going, too, Agent Morse. We need a pilot."

605.author: Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
605.quote: "How long till we reach HYDRA airspace?""We're about 10 minutes out. Sir? About what happened back there...""We got what we needed. End of story.""I understand. But that look on your face...I've seen it before. It's the same look Hunter had when he went after Ward.""Not sure I'm getting your point.""It's dangerous going into a mission that emotional. You need to be able to separate the job from your own feelings.""You're wrong. I've been keeping my feelings in check, and look what it got us. Rosalind's dead, Ward has Fitz and Simmons. My only regret is that I didn't kill that son of a bitch when I had the chance.""Coulson...""Let me know when we're close."

606.author: Joey Gutierrez and Bobbi Morse
606.quote: "I might be able to reinforce the doors. You know, using my, uh...my, uh...""Amazing new superpower.""Yeah. That."

607.author: Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse and Alphonso Mackenzie
607.quote: "Invisibility... Imagine the possibilities.""What are you imagining?""Nothing fun.""Get used to it. We can't put the Terrigen genie back in the bottle. Powers are the new normal.""I think you're just jealous.""Damn right I am. Tell me you didn't try one of those little fish-oil pills. I had my fingers crossed for x-ray vision. I was just curious. I wasn't the only one.""I mean, I-I thought about it. I didn't actually do it. Rehab was a bitch.""Man, you two deserve each other."

608.author: Melinda May, Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
608.quote: "Great. Coulson's in trouble, the place is crawling with armed HYDRA Agents, and we have no weapons.""Not strictly true. Buon appetito.""I love you.""I don't hate you quite as much."

609.author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
609.quote: "What's wrong, Tremors?""Well, aside from the fact that this thing is ancient, I do not read Cyrillic.""Yet.""Forever the optimist.""Come on, Daisy. You can hack the Pentagon and shake the Earth. You're gonna let a few backwards letters trip you up?"

610.author: Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
610.quote: "Wait, wait, hold on. The letter that looks like New Hampshire with legs that's "D," right?""Da.""Great."

611.author: Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
611.quote: "Converting to Unicode, and...""Spasibo, Daisy.""De nada.""Pretty sure that's not Russian.""Whatever."

613.author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
613.quote: "Ex-SVR, Special Ops The same Special Ops division the two men who tried to assassinate the Director were in.""And there's our link to Nadeer.""Get this. They all have ties to Prime Minister Olshenko.""The Russian Prime Minister who was attacked by an Inhuman And then threw Bobbi and Hunter under the bus after they saved his life."

614.author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
614.quote: "Officer of the law, defense attorney. We're supposed to be enemies.""First of, we've been enemies since we were four, Brett, so let's not blame it on career choices. Secondly, I'm not a particularly good defense attorney."

615.author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
615.quote: "Please stop giving my mom cigars, Foggy.""What? She'll outlive us all."

616.author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
616.quote: "Homicide, female suspect found at the scene, definitely qualifies as interesting.""She hasn't been charged yet?""Assistant D.A. hasn't made the call yet."

617.author: Brett Mahoney and Matt Murdock
617.quote: "You're going after Tully?""Yeh you know him?""Yeh, guys a real scumbag, but he stays just the right side of the law so there's nothing we can do."

618.author: Brett Mahoney and Karen Page
618.quote: "Multiple stab wounds. The ambulance got there quick, but my mom says all the family she knew about's passed on. I knew you were looking into her tenancy case. I thought you might be able to point us toward the next of kin.""No, she didn't have anyone. Just us."

619.author: Brett Mahoney and the Masked Man
