Started calling him Killmonger. He joined a J-SOC ghost unit, now these guys are serious, they would drop off the grid so they could commit assassinations and take down governments."

1673.author: Museum Curator and Erik Killmonger
1673.quote: "Good morning, how can I help you?""I'm just checking out these artifacts. They're telling me you're the expert.""Ah, you could say that.""They're beautiful. Where's this one from?""Bobo Ashanti Tribe. Present day guarder, nineteenth century.""Really? What about this one?""It's from the Induu people of Benin. Sixteenth century.""Now tell me about this one.""Also from Benin, seventh century. The Fula tribe I believe.""Nah.""I beg your pardon?""It was taken by British soldiers in Benin, but it's from Wakanda. And it's made out of Vibranium. Don't trip, I'm gonna take it off your hands for you.""These items aren't for sale.""How do you think your ancestors got these? Do you think they paid a fair price? Or did they take it, like they took everything else?""Sir, I'm going to have to ask you to leave.""You got all this security in here to watch me once I walked in, yet you ain't checking what you put in your body."

1674.author: Erik Killmonger, Ulysses Klaue and Linda
1674.quote: "You sell to the CIA?""I sell to the highest bidder. Don't you worry, when I get back to Johannesburg, I'll lay low for a bit. I'll make sure you guys get paid.""I won't worry about the money bro, I know you're good for it. On our way back, just drop us off at Wakanda.""You don't want to go there, boy.""Yeah, I do.""Drop it! Or your little Bonnie and Clyde routine ends today! Put your gun down now!""Sorry, I'm sorry Erik...""It'll be okay.""You... you want to go to Wakanda? They're savages! This is what they do to people like us.""I don't worry about no brand. Check these out. Each one is for a kill.""You can scar yourself as much as you like. To them, you'll just be an outsider. You're crazy to think that you can just walk in there. Ahh...and to think I saw you as a crazy American."

1675.author: T'Challa, Erik Killmonger, Ramonda, Shuri and River Tribe Elder
1675.quote: "Speak.""I'm staying in your house. I served justice to a man who stole your vibranium and murdered your people. Justice your king couldn't deliver.""I don't care that you brought Klaue, the only reason I don't kill you where you stand is because I know who you are. Now what do you want?""I want the throne. You are all sitting up here comfortable. Must feel good. There's about two billion people around the world who look like us and their lives are a lot harder. Wakanda has the tools to liberate them all.""And what tools are those?""Vibranium. Your weapons.""Our weapons will not be used to wage war on the world. It is not our way to be judge, jury and executioner for people who aren't our own.""Not your own? Didn't life start here on this continent? So ain't all people your people?""I am not king of all people. I am king of Wakanda. And it is my responsibility to make sure that our people are safe. That vibranium doesn't fall into the hands of people like you.""Son, we have entertained this charlatan for too long. Reject his request.""Oh, I ain't requesting nothing. Ask who I am.""You are Erik Stevens, an American Black Operative, a mercenary nicknamed Killmonger, that's who you are.""That's not my name, princess. Ask me, king.""No.""Ask me.""Take him away.""Who are you?""I am N'Jadaka, son of Prince N'Jobu! I found my daddy with panther claws in his chest! You ain't the son of a king, you're the son of a murderer!""You're lying!""I'm afraid not, Queen Mother.""Hey Auntie. I'm exercising my blood right. I challenge for the mantle of king and Black Panther!"

1676.author: Zuri and Erik Killmonger
1676.quote: " I had your father killed! Take me!""I'ma take you both, Uncle James!"

1677.author: Black Panther and Erik Killmonger
1677.quote: "You will destroy the world, Wakanda included!""The world took everything away from me! Everything I ever loved! But I'ma make sure we're even. I'ma track down anyone who would even think of being loyal to you! And I'ma put their ass in the dirt, right next to Zuri!"

1678.author: Erik Killmonger and Black Panther
1678.quote: "Black Panther, it must feel good sitting here comfortable.""What do you want?""I want your secrets, your weapons. I'm gonna burn it all!"

1679.author: Killmonger and T'Challa
1679.quote: "This ends today!""This challenge shit is over. I'm the king now!"

1680.author: Erik Selvig
1680.quote: "Let me contact one of my colleagues. He's had some dealings with these people before."

1681.author: Thor and Erik Selvig
1681.quote: "You know, I had it all backwards. I had it all wrong.""It's not a bad thing finding out that you don't have all the answers. You start asking the right questions.""For the first time in my life, I have no idea what I'm supposed to do.""Anyone who's ever going to find his way in this world, has to start by admitting he doesn't know..."

1682.author: Erik Selvig, Darcy Lewis, and Jane Foster
1682.quote: "I thought you were a scientist.""Political science.""She was the only applicant."

1683.author: Jane Foster, Erik Selvig and Darcy Lewis
1683.quote: "Where'd you find this?""The children's section. I just wanted to show you how silly his story was.""But you're the one who's always pushing me to chase down every possibility, every alternative.""I'm talking about science, not Magic.""Well, "magic's just science we don't understand yet." Arthur C. Clarke.""Who wrote science-fiction.""A precursor to science fact!""In some cases, yeah.""Well, if there's an Einstein-Rosen bridge, then there's something on the other side. And advanced beings could have crossed it!""Oh, Jane.""A primitive culture like the Vikings might have worshiped them as deities.""Yes! Yes, exactly. Thank you."

1684.author: Jane Foster, Thor and Erik Selvig
1684.quote: "What happened?""He's fine! We drank, we fought - he made his ancestors proud!""Put him on the bed.""Oh, I still don't think you're the God of Thunder. But you ought to be!"

1685.author: Phil Coulson and Nick Fury
1685.quote: "Dr. Selvig read an energy surge from the Tesseract four hours ago.""NASA didn't authorize Selvig to go to test phase.""He wasn't testing it, he wasn't even in the room. Spontaneous event."

1686.author: Loki, Nick Fury, Erik Selvig and Hawkeye
1686.quote: "Please don't. I still need that.""This doesn't have to get any messier.""Of course it does. I've come too far anything else. I am Loki, of Asgard and I am burdened with glorious purpose.""Loki, brother of Thor.""We have no quarrel with your people.""An ant has no quarrel with a boot.""Are you planning to step on us?""I come with glad tidings of a world made free.""Free from what?""Freedom. Freedom is life's great lie. Once you accept that, in your heart...you will know peace.""Yeah, you say "peace," I kind of think you mean the other thing.""Sir, Director Fury is stalling. This place is about to blow and drop a hundred feet of rock on us. He means to bury us.""Like the pharaohs of old.""He's right. The portal is collapsing in on itself. We've got maybe two minutes before this goes critical.""Well, then..."

1687.author: Jemma Simmons
1687.quote: "These are the same readings Dr. Selvig and Dr. Foster picked up in New Mexico and in London. They herald the arrival of an Asgardian."

1688.author: Everett Ross
1688.quote: "Great. Come on, guys, get me eyes on Barnes. Go."

1689.author: Captain America, Everett Ross and Sharon Carter
1689.quote: "What's gonna happen to him?""Same thing that ought to happen to you. Psychological evaluation and extradition.""This is Everett Ross, Deputy Task Force Commander.""What about our lawyer?""Lawyer. That's funny. See their weapons are placed in lockup. Oh, we'll write you a receipt."

1690.author: Everett Ross and Black Panther
1690.quote: "You'll be provided with an office instead of a cell. Now, do me a favour, stay in it?""I'm not intending on going anywhere."

1691.author: Everett Ross and Helmut Zemo
1691.quote: "Meals at eight and five. Toilet privileges twice a day. Raise your voice, zap. Touch the glass, zap. You step out of line, you deal with me. Please, step out of line. Hmm? So how does it feel? To spend all that time, all that effort... and, to see it fail so spectacularly?""Did it?"

1692.author: Everett Ross
1692.quote: "Your Highness, that is quite the entourage!"

1693.author: Ulysses Klaue and Everett Ross
1693.quote: "Tell me something. What do you know about Wakanda?""It's a third world country. Textiles, shepherds, cool outfits.""All a front. Explorers have searched for it. Called it El Dorado. They looked for it in South America, but it was in Africa the whole time. I'm the only who's seen it... and made it out alive."

1694.author: Everett Ross and Ulysses Klaue
1694.quote: "Well, that is quite the entourage. Do you have a mixtape coming out?""Oh yeah! Yeah, actually there is one. I would send you the Soundcloud link if you want."

1695.author: Everett Ross and Ulysses Klaue
1695.quote: "You're telling me that the king of a Third World country runs around in a bulletproof cat suit?""Why don't you ask him yourself? He's right outside this very moment."

1696.author: Everett Ross and Okoye
1696.quote: "Does she speak English?""When she wants to."

1697.author: Shuri and Everett Ross
1697.quote: "It's like riding a hover-bike.""You have hover-bikes?"

1698.author: Skurge
1698.quote: "Heimdall was an idiot. This job should have made him rich. Now, the job ain't easy, but it does have its benefits. The Bifrost gives me access to everything the Nine Realms have to offer. I mean it's all mine for the taking. Behold...my stuff. I'm particularly fond of these. I pulled 'em out of a place on Midgard called Tex-as. I even named them. Des and Troy. You see, when you put them together...they destroy."

1699.author: Skurge to Thor
1699.quote: "You chase off my company, cover me and my workplace in brains..."

1701.author: Hela to Skurge
1701.quote: "Skurge, do you know the purpose of an executioner? An executioner doesn't just execute people, but he executes his leader's vision. But he mainly executes them too. I was Odin's executioner. Now, you shall be mine."

1702.author: Asgardian Woman to Skurge
1702.quote: "Skurge, is that important?""You girls are in for a treat."

1703.author: Skurge and Thor
1703.quote: "Girls! Well, well, look who decided to pop in. Thanks for scaring away my company and drenching my workplace in brains.""Who are you?""Don't you remember? I'm Skurge. We fought together on Vanaheim.""Right. Where's Heimdall?""That traitor. No one knows, he's a fugitive of the throne.""Traitor?""Yeah, you see, Odin charged Heimdall with negligence of duty, but he disappeared before the trial. Hard to catch a guy who can see everything in the Universe.""Sure.""Hold on. I'm supposed to announce your arrival..."

1704.author: Skurge and Loki
1704.quote: "Behold! Thor Odinson...""No! You had one job!"

1705.author: Hela and Skurge
1705.quote: "I'm Hela.""I'm just a janitor.""You look like a smart boy with good survival instincts. How would you like a job?"

1706.author: Skurge and Hela
1706.quote: "Odin's treasures...""Fake! Most of the stuff in here is fake."

1707.author: Hela and Executioner
1707.quote: "Tell me about yourself, Skurge.""Well, me dad was a stonemason, me mum was...""I'll just stop you there. What I meant was what is your ambition?""I just want a chance to prove myself.""Recognition. When I was young every great King had an executioner. Not just to execute people, but also to execute their vision. But mainly to execute people. Still a great honor. I was Odin's executioner. And you will be my executioner. Let's begin our conquest."

1708.author: Executioner, Hela and Asgardian
1708.quote: "Asgardians! Some misguided soul has stolen the Bifrost sword! Tell us were it is, or there will be consequences.""You.""Wait! Wait! I know where the sword is!"

1710.author: F.R.I.D.A.Y. to Iron Man
1710.quote: "He's burning Ultron out of the 'net; he won't escape through there."

1712.author: F.R.I.D.A.Y. and Iron Man
1712.quote: "The Vibranium core's got a magnetic field. That's what's keeping the rock together.""If it drops?""Right now, the impact can kill thousands. Once it gets high enough? Global extinction."

1713.author: Iron Man and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
1713.quote: "I got it. Create a heat seal. I could... I could supercharge the spire from below.""Running numbers. A heat seal could work with enough power."

1714.author: F.R.I.D.A.Y. and Iron Man
1714.quote: "Boss, power levels are way below...""Reroute everything. We get one shot at this."

1716.author: F.R.I.D.A.Y. and Iron Man
1716.quote: "Multiple contusions detected.""Yeah, I detected that too."

1717.author: Iron Man and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
1717.quote: "F.R.I.D.A.Y.?""We have some weapon systems that are offline.""They're what?"

1718.author: Tony Stark and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
1718.quote: "Did you run a facial recognition yet?""What do I look like?""Uh, I don't know, I've been picturing a red head.""You must be thinking of someone else.""Must be."

1719.author: F.R.I.D.A.Y. and Iron Man
1719.quote: "You can't beat him hand-to-hand.""Analyze his fight patterns.""Scanning! Countermeasures ready.""Let's kick his ass."

1721.author: Tony Stark and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
1721.quote: "F.R.I.D.A.Y., evac anyone south of 43rd Street, notify first responders.""Will do."

1722.author: F.R.I.D.A.Y., Pepper Potts and Tony Stark
1722.quote: "Boss, incoming call from Miss Potts.""Tony? Oh, my God. Are you all right? What's going on?""Yeah, I'm fine. I just think we might have to push our 8:30 res.""Why?""Just 'cause I'll probably not make it back for awhile.""Tell me you're not on that ship.""Yeah.""God, no. Please tell me you're not on that ship.""Honey, I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I don't know how to say this. Pep...""Come back here, Tony. I swear to God... Come back here right now! Come back!""Boss, we're losing her. I'm going, too..."

1724.author: Tony Stark and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
1724.quote: "I've got a mild inspiration. I'd like to see if it checks out. So, I'd like to run one last sim before we pack it in for the night. This time, in the shape of a Mobius strip, inverted, please.""Processing.""Right, give me the eigenvalue of that particle... factoring in spectral decomp. That'll take a second.""Just a moment.""And don't worry if it doesn't pan out. I'm just kinda...""Model rendered."

1725.author: Tony Stark and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
1725.quote: "F.R.I.D.A.Y., do me a favor and activate Barn Door Protocol, will you?""Yes, Boss."

1726.author: Tony Stark and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
1726.quote: "F.R.I.D.A.Y., what are they firing at?""Something just entered the upper atmosphere!"

1729.author: Sam Wilson to Nick Fury
1729.quote: "Don't look at me, I do what he does, just slower."

1730.author: Sam Wilson
1730.quote: "I'm more of a soldier than a spy."

1731.author: Steve Rogers and Sam Wilson
1731.quote: "On your left!""Uh-huh. On my left. Got it."

1732.author: Sam Wilson and Steve Rogers
1732.quote: "Don't say it! Don't you say it!""On your left.""Come on man!"

1733.author: Steve Rogers and Sam Wilson
1733.quote: "You lose someone?"My wingman Riley, flying a night mission, standard PJ rescue op, nothing we hadn't done a thousand times before, til an RPG knocked Riley's damn ass out of the sky. Nothing I could do, like I was up there just to watch."

1734.author: Natasha Romanoff and Sam Wilson
1734.quote: "Everyone we know is trying to kill us.""Not everyone."

1735.author: Captain America and Sam Wilson
1735.quote: "I thought you said you were a pilot.""I never said pilot."

1736.author: Sam Wilson and Steve Rogers
1736.quote: "Look, whoever he used to be, the guy he is now, I don't think he's the kind you save. He's the kind you stop.""I don't know if I can do that."

1737.author: Falcon and Captain America
1737.quote: "Cap, how do we know the good guys from the bad guys?""If they're shooting at you they're bad."

1738.author: Brock Rumlow and Sam Wilson
1738.quote: "There are no prisoners with HYDRA. Just order. And order only comes through pain. Are you ready for yours?""Man, shut the hell up!"

1739.author: Sam Wilson and Steve Rogers starting their search
1739.quote: "You're going after him.""You don't have to come with me.""I know. When do we start?"

1740.author: Sam Wilson and Steve Rogers
1740.quote: "Sounds like a hell of a fight, sorry I missed it.""If I had known it was going to be a firefight I absolutely would have called you.""No, I'm not actually sorry. I'm just trying to sound tough. I'm very happy chasing cold leads on our missing persons case. Avenging is your world. Your world is crazy.""Be it ever so humble.""You find a place in Brooklyn yet?""I don't think I can afford a place in Brooklyn.""Well, home is home, you know."

1741.author: Luis to Scott Lang
1741.quote: "Yeah, this dude sounds like a badass, man!"

1742.author: Falcon and Ant-Man
1742.quote: "It's okay; he can't see me.""I can see you!""Hi, I'm Scott!""What are you doing here?""First off, I’m a big fan.""Appreciate it. So who the hell are you?""I’m Ant-Man.""Ant-Man?""What, you haven’t heard of me? No, you wouldn’t have heard of me.""You want to tell me what you want?""I was hoping I could grab a piece of technology, just for a few days, and then return it. I need it to save the world. You know how that is.""I know exactly how that is. Located the breach. Bringing him in.""Sorry about this!""Breach is an adult male who has some sort of shrinking tech!""Sorry. Sorry about this. Sorry ""That’s enough! He’s inside my pack!""Sorry. You seem like a really great guy.""It’s really important to me that Cap never finds out about this."

1743.author: Steve Rogers and Sam Wilson
1743.quote: "We're on our own.""Maybe not. I know a guy."

1744.author: Sam Wilson to Steve Rogers
1744.quote: "I just wanna make sure we consider all our options. Because people who shoot at you usually wind up shooting at me,  too."

1746.author: War Machine to Vision
1746.quote: "Vision, I got a bandit on my six. Vision, do you copy? Target his thrusters, turn him into a glider."

1747.author: Thaddeus Ross and Tony Stark
1747.quote: "Stark, did he give you anything on Rogers?""No, he told me to go to hell."

1748.author: Captain America and Falcon
1748.quote: "Eyes on target, folks. It's the best lead we have on Rumlow in six months. I don't want to lose him.""If he sees us coming there won't be a problem, he kind of hate us."

1749.author: Black Widow and Falcon
1749.quote: "Thanks, Sam.""Don't thank me.""I'm not thanking that thing.""His name is Redwing.""I'm still not thanking it.""He's cute. Go on, pet 'em."

1750.author: Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanoff, Sam Wilson and Tony Stark
1750.quote: "I'm not getting that shield back, am I?""Technically, it's the government's property. Wings too.""That's cold.""Warmer than jail."

1751.author: Scott Lang and Sam Wilson
1751.quote: "Hey, man.""What's up, Tic Tac?""Uh, good to see you. Look, what happened last time-""It was a great audition, but it'll... It'll never happen again."

1752.author: Spider-Man and Falcon
1752.quote: "Are those wings carbon fiber?""Is this stuff coming out of you?""That would explain the rigidity flexibility ratio which, gotta say, that's awesome, man.""I don't know if you've been a fight before but there's usually not this much talking.""Alright, sorry, my bad."

1755.author: Falcon
1755.quote: "Hey, Cap, we got a situation here."

1757.author: James Rhodes and Sam Wilson
1757.quote: "You guys... really look like crap. Must've been a rough couple of years.""Yeah, well, the hotels weren't exactly five star."

1758.author: Sam Wilson and War Machine
1758.quote: "You see the teeth on those things?""All right, back up, Sam. You're gonna get your wings singed."

1759.author: Falcon, Winter Soldier and War Machine
1759.quote: "Hey, Cap, we got a situation here.""God, I love this place.""Yeah, don't start celebrating yet, guys. We got more incoming outside the dome."

1760.author: War Machine and Falcon
1760.quote: "Focus that fire on the left flank, Sam."I'm doing it."

1761.author: Sam Wilson, Steve Rogers, Bruce Banner and Wanda Maximoff
1761.quote: "Guys, we got a Vision situation here.""Somebody get to Vision!""I got him!""On my way."

1762.author: Sam contacts Captain America before reinforcements arrive for the Battle of Earth

1763.author: Sam notices the Sanctuary II firing at something else

1764.author: Sam discovers that Steve Rogers had chosen to live in the past and is giving him his shield
1764.quote: "Cap?""Hi, Sam.""So did something go wrong or did something go right?""Well, after I put the stones back, I thought... maybe I'll try some of that life that Tony was telling me to get.""How'd that work out for you?""I'm happy for you. Truly.""Thank you.""Only thing bumming me out is the fact that I have to live in a world without Captain America.""Oh, that reminds me. Try it on."

1765.author: Steve gives Sam the shield and mantle of Captain America
1765.quote: "How does it feel?""Like it's someone else's.""It isn't.""Thank you. I'll do my best.""That's why it's yours."

1766.author: Steve declines to tell Sam about his wife
1766.quote: "You want to tell me about her?""No. No, I don't think I will."

1767.movie: WHIH Breaking News: Attack in Lagos
1767.author: Christine Everhart and Jackson Norris
1767.quote: "Now, Jackson, which Avengers were there exactly? Tony Stark?""Captain Rogers involvement has been mentioned and corroborated. Some accounts indicate Sam Wilson and Natasha Romanoff, but nothing else definitive at this time."

1768.author: Thor and Fandral
1768.quote: "We're going to Jotunheim.""What? This isn't like going to Earth, where you summon a little lightning and thunder and the mortals worship you as a god! This is Jotunheim!"

1769.author: Fandral and Volstagg
1769.quote: "Our dearest friend banished! Loki on the throne! Asgard on the brink of war! Yet you managed to consume four wild boars, six pheasants, a side of beef and two caskets of ale! Shame on you! Don't you care?""Do not mistake my appetite for apathy!"

1770.author: Heimdall and Fandral
1770.quote: "I am bound by honor to our king. I cannot open the bridge to you.""Complicated fellow, isn't he?"

1771.author: Fandral
1771.quote: "Perhaps next time you should start with the big one!"

1772.author: Fandral
1772.quote: "It's as if they resent being imprisoned."

1773.author: Fandral to Loki
1773.quote: "I see your time in the dungeon has made you no less graceful, Loki!"

1774.author: Volstagg and Fandral
1774.quote: "To our right, soldiers of fortune, their blades dripping with blood and who was there to face the horde, but Fandral the Dashing.""I was."

1775.author: Karen Page and Matt Murdock
1775.quote: "Would you have a shirt I could borrow, maybe? This one's a little wet, and I'm a Hellions fan.""Then don't tell Foggy."

1776.author: Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson over the phone
1776.quote: "Hello.""Good morning, sunshine!""What time is it?""Half-passed get the hell up. Let's go! We gotta meet the real estate agent in 45."

1777.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1777.quote: "I gotta go bribe a cop.""Ugh. Foggy.""Kidding, NSA, if you're listening! But seriously, yeah, I gotta go bribe a cop."

1778.author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
1778.quote: "Officer of the law, defense attorney. We're supposed to be enemies.""First of, we've been enemies since we were four, Brett, so let's not blame it on career choices. Secondly, I'm not a particularly good defense attorney."

1779.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1779.quote: "You don't necessarily show the best judgement when beautiful women are involved, Matt.""How would I even know if she's a beautiful woman?""I don't know. It's kinda spooky, actually. But if there's a stunning woman with questionable character in the room, Matt Murdock's gonna find her and Foggy Nelson is gonna suffer."

1780.author: Foggy Nelson
1780.quote: "Matt, it's me again. Where are you? I'm here introducing Karen to Josie's and I have high hopes it's gonna go terribly. Climb off of your own and get down here"

1781.author: Foggy Nelson
1781.quote: "This city will protect us! This city's beautiful."

1782.author: Foggy Nelson and Karen Page
1782.quote: "Could you could you hear me just now?""Nope.""The correct answer is 'Yes, and you sound amazing.'""Well, of the two lies, I took the lesser."

1783.author: Foggy Nelson and Karen Page
1783.quote: "What are you still doin' here?""Uh, I could ask you the same.""Yes, but I... am a partner at a prestigious law firm with very important documents needing to be documented so we can start generating some revenue. While you are... also very integral in your own special... I dug myself in too deep and I can't climb out.""You need a hand with that?"Please.""Oh, not gonna happen!"

1784.author: Karen Page, Foggy Nelson, and Josie
1784.quote: "You saved the best for last, huh?""Oh, yeah, this place is a shithole. But it's our shithole. City's tried to shut it down half a dozen times, but I helped Josie with the leans and as a result we get to drink for free!""You absolutely do not get to drink for free.""Let's agree to disagree!"

1785.author: Foggy Nelson to John Healy
1785.quote: "You have quite the legal vocabulary, Mr. Healy; am I correct to assume that this is not your first rodeo?"

1786.author: Foggy Nelson to the jury
1786.quote: "And in the state of New York, I'll remind you that my client is not required to prove that he was justified in his actions. Instead, it's up to the prosecution to prove beyond a reasonable doubt that he was not justified in defending his life, and they will come nowhere close to meeting this burden. At the end of this case, the only verdict... that you can render... will be not guilty."

1787.author: Foggy Nelson, Matt Murdock, and Karen Page
1787.quote: "Was that a knock?""Someone's at the door.""Our door?""Uh, Karen.""Right... okay."

1788.author: Foggy Nelson to Marci Stahl
1788.quote: "Marci, convincing my client to agree to your terms, that's your job and I'm not going to do it for you. See you think there are only two options, these tenants take the pay out and leave or leave without taking it, but given how long they've put up with Tully's bullshit, I think you're actually afraid that Mrs. Cardenas and her neighbours will find a way to get by."

1789.author: Karen Page and Foggy Nelson
1789.quote: "Foggy you're bleeding.""Oh that explains it.""Explains what?""The stabbing pain in my side."

1790.author: Karen Page and Foggy Nelson speak to Ben Urich
1790.quote: "Foggy's not just anyone alright, he's a kick-ass attorney and sooner or later we're going to need one of those, and he just plain kicks ass.""When the need arises."

1791.author: Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
1791.quote: "We know the law, we'll use that to our advantage.""Do we have a choice?""Not so much."

1792.author: Foggy Nelson to Ben Urich
1792.quote: "Somebody knows something, it's just a matter of asking the right people the right questions in the right tone of voice."

1793.author: Foggy Nelson and Karen Page
1793.quote: "What are we supposed to do, against somebody who owns everything, everyone. What can we do to someone like that?""The only thing you can, you make them pay."

1794.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1794.quote: "If you weren't half dead I would kick your ass, Murdock; am I lying about that?""No."

1795.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1795.quote: "Watch out evrybody! I'm blind Matt Murdock! Whoa.""Most- Most people just say Matt Murdock.""I look like most people?""I don't know. I can't see you.""Well, at the moment that may be a blessing."

1796.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1796.quote: "Hey, how old were you when you had your first drink?""Nine.""Nine? How much?""My dad gave me a sip from his bottle of scotch.""Go dad!""He didn't want my hands shaking while I stitched him up. He got cut pretty bad over his eye. Boxing match.""He win?""No."

1797.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1797.quote: "Me and you, pal... We're gonna do this. We're gonna be the best damn avocados this city has ever seen.""Best damn avocados."

1798.author: Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
1798.quote: "Foggy? What are you doing?""Well, I'm gonna steal as many bagels as I can fit in this box. With you as my partner, there's no telling when I'll be able to afford a real meal again."

1799.author: Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
1799.quote: "This city needs me in that mask Foggy.""Maybe you're right, maybe it does. But I don't, I only ever needed my friend. I wouldn't have kept this from you Matt, not from you.""You don't know that, you don't know that."

1800.author: Foggy Nelson and Karen Page
1800.quote: "And what? You got a crazy old lady with a story about a young Willy Fisk beating his dad with a hammer.""He beat his father to death.""He was twelve, forty something years ago."

1801.author: Foggy Nelson to Karen Page
1801.quote: "What you said last night, you were right. No matter what's going on between me and Matt, it doesn't change anything with Fisk. I'm gonna keep digging, you can't just run around killing people and call yourself a human being."

1802.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1802.quote: "Last time you went after Fisk I found you half dead, more than half. You go after him in the mask again he might kill you, or you might kill him while would probably have the same effect on someone as catholic as you are.""What am I supposed to do? How do I stop him?""By using the law."

1803.author: Foggy Nelson and Karen Page
1803.quote: "Now everybody knows what kind of asshole Fisk really is.""And we are the ones who made it happen."

1804.author: Karen Page and Foggy Nelson talk about Daredevil
1804.quote: "That is a serious upgrade.""I don't know, I think the horns are a little much."

1805.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1805.quote: "You ever wake up in the morning from the second you get out of bed, it's like every molecule in your body hurts?""No, never.""I'm in agony, dude.""What, did you go back to the gym?""Hell, no. Do I look capable of making healthy life choices?"

1806.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1806.quote: "That's the tragedy of you being blind, you've never seen me dance.""Yeah, but I can cite the legends I heard in law school."

1807.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1807.quote: "You know, Karen's been asking questions. The cuts, the scrapes, the bruises.""What do you tell her?""You have a drinking problem.""That's horrible.""Well, it's more plausible than you put on a devil suit and beat the shit out of strangers."

1808.author: Matt Murdock, Karen Page, Foggy Nelson and Maxwell
1808.quote: "What have we got?""All right. Well, uh, Mr. Marino's dog was viciously beaten by his neighbour after the dog, um defiled the neighbour's statue of Saint Francis."""Defiled"?""Um, humped repeatedly until completion.""That's a dog I want to defend.""Oh, he's all yours, cowboy."

1809.author: Foggy Nelson, Brett Mahoney and Matt Murdock
1809.quote: "I would say it's good to see you, but under the circumstances...""Would you please step aside, sir?""We got a couple of questions, Brett.""If you're here to chase ambulances, you might notice: there are none.""Any leads on what happened?""Oh, you wanna know what went down? Read about it in the papers like everybody else.""We're not everybody else, my man.""Did you just say "my man"?"

1810.author: Brett Mahoney, Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
1810.quote: "There's a total clampdown on any of this getting out to the press. I'd like to keep it that way.""Brett, you can trust us.""We're lawyers."

1811.author: Brett Mahoney, Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
1811.quote: "DA's going bat shit trying to figure it out. This isn't the first hit that matches this MO. Call it massive gang-on-gang overkill. Downtown office thinks we got new players in Hell's Kitchen, and whoever they are, we're talking some kind of paramilitary-type organization with the training, knowledge and hardware to take out half the city.""What do they want?""That's what's driving the DA nuts. We don't know who they are. We just know who they're not.""I'd say they're definitely not fond of the Irish.""You think?"

1812.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1812.quote: " What are we stepping into?""I don't know. I think I can rattle some cages, see who talks but, uh...""Did you even listen to Brett? We're talking about a squad of trained killers loose on the streets. Not the kind of guys you challenge to a fist fight in your underwear.""Hey! It's not underwear, Foggy. Underwear is comfortable.""You're a lot of things. Bulletproof is not one of them."

1813.author: Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
1813.quote: "Blood is being shed, Foggy.""And you've donated more than your fair share to the cause."

1814.author: Foggy Nelson and Blake Tower
1814.quote: "A profile?""Even got a code name.""Like what? "Killdozer", or "Dumbass With A Gun"?""Not quite. They're calling this one "the Punisher"."

1815.author: Foggy Nelson and Grotto
1815.quote: "You told us the Irish were attacked by a whole gang of guys. I'm pretty sure the word you used was "army". You want to tell me why I'm now hearing this is all being done by one man?""Look, I didn't know you guys were.""Who does he work for?""I got no idea!""Well, what do you know?""I know he's a sociopath, that's what. I mean, yeah, fine I heard the rumors, okay, but I didn't think... I thought it was ridiculous, okay? Ten, 20 guys could be mowed down at a time. And with precision? You know, tactically. Every hit was like some kind of SEAL Team Six. Then people started saying it was one guy doing all that. One man? I thought it was a ghost story. Some campfire shit you tell freshies to make 'em crap their pants. But now...You saw. That guy was the Grim Reaper."

1816.author: Brett Mahoney and Foggy Nelson
1816.quote: "The DA's office says the shooter's independent. Vigilante type, targeting different crime families. And not in a Daredevil way. In a Death Wish way.""Holy shit.""Yeah. Daredevil kicks ass, this whole city cheers like we just won the World Series. But this guy? He does it, and the streets get bloody. Makes everybody stop and think twice about the whole "hero" proposition."

1817.author: Foggy Nelson and Samantha Reyes
1817.quote: "Really? You're using my client as bait for the Punisher?""Probably the first useful thing your client's ever done in his life.""Oh, I'm gonna have so much fun suing you."

1818.author: Foggy Nelson and Matt Murdock
1818.quote: "Every time I walk up those stairs, I wonder if today's the day you're dead in your living room.""I'm not gonna stop, Foggy. Not anytime soon. And to be honest, I'm done apologizing to you for who I am."

1819.author: Foggy Nelson
1819.quote: "Matt shows up alive, then tells me I'm never gonna see him again. Only I, Foggy Nelson, can be ghosted by a ghost."

1820.author: Foggy Nelson and Luke Cage
1820.quote: "The law firm of Hogarth, Chao and Benowitz is at your disposal. In case you need help starting over.""I'm not starting over, Mr. Nelson. I'm moving forward.""People call me Foggy.""And you let them?"

1821.author: Foggy Nelson to Matt Murdock
1821.quote: "I'm here 'cause I'm trying to help you keep your two lives separate, so they don't lump you in with Mr Bulletproof and Super Joan Jett in there."

1822.author: Frigga
1822.quote: "Thor is banished. The line of succession falls to you. Until Odin awakens, Asgard is yours. Make your father proud. My king."

1824.author: Frigga and Thor
1824.quote: "It's alright to be nervous.""Why does everyone keep saying that? I am not nervous.""You may be able to fool the rest of Asgard.""Yes, but never you. I know.""Thor, just remember that you have something even the great Allfather never had.""And what's that?""Me for a mother. Now don't keep your father waiting."

1825.author: Frigga and Odin
1825.quote: "How could you have done this?""Do you understand what he has set in motion? He's taking us to the brink of war.""But banishment? You would lose him forever? He's your son!""What would you have done?""I would not have exiled him to a world of mortals, stripped of his powers to suffer alone. Who would no have had the heart?""That is why I am king. I, too, grieve the loss of out son. There's some things even I cannot undo.""You can bring him back""No. His fate is in his own hands now."

1826.author: Frigga and Loki
1826.quote: "I asked him to be honest with you from the beginning. There should be no secrets in the family.""So why did he lie?""He kept the truth from you so that you would never feel different. You are our son, Loki. And we're your family. You must know that."

1827.author: Frigga and Loki
1827.quote: "You can speak to him. He can see and hear us even now.""How long will last?""I don't know. But this time is different. We were unprepared.""I'm not used to seeing him like this. The most powerful being in the Nine Realms, laying helpless, until his body has restored.""He's put it off for so long now, that I fear... You're a good son. We mustn't lose hope that your father will return to us. And your brother.""What hope is there for Thor?""There's always a purpose to everything your father does. Thor may yet find a way home."

1828.author: Thor and Loki talking about their mother
1828.quote: "You think you alone were loved of mother? You had her tricks, but I had her trust!""Trust. Was that her last expression? Trust? When you let her die!""What help were you in your cell?""Who put me there? Who put me there?!""You know damn well! You know damn well who! She wouldn't want us to fight.""Well, she wouldn't exactly be shocked."

1829.author: Loki to Thor
1829.quote: "You really think I cared about Frigga, about any of you?"

1830.author: Frigga, Loki and Odin
1830.quote: "Loki...""Hello, mother. Have I made you proud?""Please, don't make this worse.""Define worse.""Enough! I will speak to the prisoner alone."

1831.author: Frigga and Loki
1831.quote: "The books I sent, did they not interest you?""Is that how I'm to while away eternity, reading?""I've done everything in my power to make you comfortable, Loki."

1832.author: Frigga and Loki
1832.quote: "You know full well it was your actions that brought you here.""My actions. I was merely giving truth to the lie that I had been fed my entire life, that I was born to be a king.""A king? A true king admits his faults. What of the lives you took on Earth?""A mere handful compared to the number that Odin has taken himself.""Your father...""He's not my father!""Then am I not your mother?""You're not.""Always so perceptive about everyone but yourself."

1833.author: Thor and Frigga
1833.quote: "My father doesn't know everything.""Don't let him hear you say that."

1834.author: Odin and Frigga
1834.quote: "It's a skirmish, nothing to fear.""You've never been a very good liar.""Take her to you chambers, I'll come for you when it's safe.""You take care.""Despite all I have survived, my queen still worries over me.""It's only because I worry over you that you have survived."

1835.author: Frigga and Jane Foster
1835.quote: "Listen to me now, I need you to do everything I ask and no questions.""Yes, ma'am."

1836.author: Frigga and Malekith
1836.quote: "Stand down, creature. You may still survive this.""I have survived worse, woman.""Who are you?""I am Malekith, and I would have what it is mine. "

1837.author: Malekith and Frigga
1837.quote: "Where is the Aether?""I'll never tell.""I believe you."

1838.author: Odin
1838.quote: "Your mother, she calls me. Do you hear it?"

1839.author: Odin
1839.quote: "Took me quite a while to break free from your spell. Frigga would have been proud."

1840.author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
1840.quote: "You still got a mom, though?""Killed by a dark elf."

1841.author: Frigga to Maidens
1841.quote: "Send Loki some soup. I don’t think he’s eating. And ask our librarians to pull some volumes from the astronomy shelves. He won’t read them, but at least they’ll keep him company."

1842.author: Frigga to Maidens
1842.quote: "My ladies, I'll see you after. Go on."

1843.author: Thor to the Avengers
1843.quote: "We were dating at the time, you see. I got to introduce her to my mother... who's dead, and oh you know, Jane and I aren't even dating anymore, these things happen though you know, nothing last forever."

1844.author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
1844.quote: "Who's the fancy brood?""That's my mother. She dies today."

1845.author: Frigga and Thor
1845.quote: "You're better leaving the sneaking to your brother."Yeah, I was simply going for a walk, and uh..."What are you wearing?"I always wear this. This is one of my favorites."What's wrong with your eye."Oh, my eye. That's... you remember the Battle of Harokin? When I got hit in the face with a broadword?"

1846.author: Frigga and Thor
1846.quote: "You're not the Thor I know at all, are you?""Yes, I am.""I didn't say I was from the future.""I was raised by witches, boy. I see you more than eyes, and you know it.""I am totally, totally from the future.""Yes, you are.""I really need to talk to you.""We can talk."

1847.author: Thor and Frigga
1847.quote: "His head was over there... His body over there... What was the point? I was too late. I was just standing there. Some idiot with an axe."You're no idiot. You're here aren't you? Seeking counsel from the wisest person in Asgard."I guess, yeah."You do know what that makes you?Just like everyone else."I'm not supposed to be like everyone else, am I?Everyone fails at who they are supposed to be, Thor. The measure of a person, of a hero, is how well they succeed at being who they are."

1848.author: Thor and Frigga
1848.quote: "Ma, I have to tell you something."No, son. You don't. You're hear to repair your future, not mine."But this is about your future."It's none of my business."

1849.author: Rocket Raccoon, Thor, and Frigga
1849.quote: "Hey. You must be Mom. I got the thing. Come on, we got to move."I wish we had more time."No, this was a gift. And you're going to be the man you're meant to be."I love you, Mom."I love you. And eat a salad."Come on. We gotta go."Goodbye."Three... two..."No, wait!"Wh- what am I looking at?"Oh, sometimes it takes a second."Oh, boy."Goodbye, Mom."Goodbye."

1850.author: Gamora
1850.quote: "I go by many names, Earthian, but I'm sure the one that most know me by is Gamora, the deadliest woman in the whole galaxy."

1851.author: Gamora
1851.quote: "I am going to die surrounded by the biggest idiots in the galaxy."

1852.author: Gamora
1852.quote: "I have spent most of my life surrounded by my enemies. I will be grateful to die among my friends."

1853.author: Gamora
1853.quote: "You have the bearing of a man of honor."

1854.author: Gamora
1854.quote: "Whatever nightmares the future holds, are dreams compared to what's behind me."

1855.author: Garthan Saal to Irani Rael
1855.quote: "Well, some good news. It looks like we've apprehended one of Ronan's compatriots."

1856.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal
1856.quote: "Gamora. Surgically modified and trained as a living weapon. The adopted daughter of the Mad Titan, Thanos. Recently, Thanos lent her and her sister Nebula out to Ronan, which leads us to believe that Thanos and Ronan are working together."

1857.author: Gamora and Star-Lord
1857.quote: "Fool! You should've learned!""I don't learn. It's one of my issues."

1858.author: Rocket Raccoon and Gamora
1858.quote: "Well, supposedly these bald-bodies find you attractive, so maybe you can work out some kind of trade.""You've got to be joking.""No, they really do find you attractive."

1859.author: Gamora and Peter Quill
1859.quote: "I'm a warrior, and an assassin. I do not dance.""Really? Well, on my planet, there's a legend about people like you. It's called Footloose. And in it, a great hero, named Kevin Bacon, teaches an entire city full of people with sticks up their butts that dancing, well, is the greatest thing there is...""Who put the sticks up their butts?""What? No. That's just a...""That is cruel.""It's a phrase people use."

1860.author: Peter Quill, Drax, Rocket Raccoon, Gamora and Groot
1860.quote: "I look around at us, you know what I see? Losers. I mean like, folks who have lost stuff. And we have, man, we have, all of us. Our homes, our families, normal lives. And usually life takes more than it gives, but not today. Today it's giving us something. It is giving us a chance.""To do what?""To give a shit, for once, not run away. I for one am not gonna stand by and watch as Ronan wipes out billions of lives.""But Quill, stopping Ronan, it's impossible. You're asking us to die.""Yeah, I guess I am. I-""Quill. I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies, I will be grateful to die among my friends.""You are an honorable man, Quill. I will fight beside you. And in the end, see my wife and daughter again.""I am Groot.""What the hell, I ain't got that long of a life span anyway. Now I'm standing, you all happy? We're all standing up now. Bunch of jackasses standing in a circle."

1861.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal
1861.quote: "Gamora. Soldier, assassin. Wanted on over a dozen counts of murder."

1862.author: Drax the Destroyer and Star-Lord
1862.quote: "There are two types of beings in the universe. Those who dance, and those who do not.""I get it, yes. I'm a dancer, Gamora is not.""You just need to find a woman that is pathetic, like you.""Thanks, buddy."

1863.author: Star-Lord and Gamora
1863.quote: "Is that a rifle?""You don't know what a rifle looks like?""It's just... swords were your thing and guns were mine, but... I guess we're both doing guns now. I just didn't know that."

1864.author: Guardians of the Galaxy
1864.quote: "Show time, A-holes! it will be here any minute.""And it will be its last.""I thought your thing was a sword?""We've been hired to stop an inter-dimensional beast from feeding on those batteries and I'm going to stop it with a sword?""It's just... swords were your thing and guns were mine, but... I guess we're both doing guns now. I just didn't know that.""Drax, why aren't you wearing one of Rocket's Aero-Rigs?""It hurts.""Hurts?""I have sensitive nipples.""Wa-ha-ha-ha! My nipples hurt! Oh, goodness me!""What about him, what's he doing?""I'm finishing this so we can listen to tunes while we work.""How is that important?""Blame Quill, he's the one who loves music so much!""No, I actually agree with Drax on this, that's hardly important right now.""Oh, ok, sure Quill""No, seriously, I side with Drax.""I understand that, your being very serious right now.""I can clearly see you winking!""Dam, I'm using my left eye?""I am Groot.""They were not looking at you funny.""Oh, well that's intense.""Groot!""Groot, get out of the way your going to get hurt! Oh, hi!""No, no! Spit it out! Come on! That's disgusting!""The beast's hide is too thick to be pierced from the outside! I must cut through it from the inside.""What? No, Drax! Drax!""What's he doing?!""He said that the skin is to thick to be pierced on the outside so...""That doesn't make any sense!""I tried telling him that!""Skin has the same level of thickness on the inside as it is on the outside!""I realize that!""There's a cut on its neck! Rocket, get it to look up!"."Alright, you giant sea monkey, up here! Whoa, watch it Quill!""Yes! I have single-handedly vanquished the beast! What?"

1865.author: Gamora, Star-Lord and Drax the Destroyer
1865.quote: "Either one of you could have gotten us through that field, if you had flown with what’s between your ears instead of what’s between your legs!""If what’s between my legs had a hand on it, I guarantee I could have landed this ship.""It’s not funny, Peter. We almost died. Because of your arrogance.""More like because he stole Anulax Batteries!""They’re called Harbulary batteries.""No, they’re not!"

1866.author: Ego, Drax the Destroyer, Star-Lord and Gamora
1866.quote: "I created what I imagined biological life to be like. Down to the most minute detail. ""Did you make a penis?""Dude!""What is wrong with you?""If he's a planet, how could he make a baby with your mother? He would smush her.""I don't need to hear how my parents...""Why? My father would tell the story of impregnating my mother every winter solstice.""That's disgusting.It was beautiful. You earthers have hang-ups.""Yes, Drax, I got a penis.""Thank you.""And it's not half bad."

1867.author: Rocket Raccoon and Gamora
1867.quote: "Keep that transmitter nearby so I can find you. We're in an old piece of construction equipment Yondu once used to slice open the bank of A'askavariia.""Ego's unhinged.""I know. Get ready."

1868.author: Gamora and Nebula
1868.quote: "Nebula, I was a little girl, trying to live day by day, not knowing or understanding what that meant to you. There are many other girls out there, like us. You can stay with us, and help them."I can help them, by killing Thanos."

1869.author: Peter Quill and Gamora
1869.quote: "So I guess this could all be mine someday.""Rocket? Rocket, you there?  Dammit. What are you doing, Peter?""Dance with me.""No. I’m not...""Come on. This is Sam Cooke, one of the greatest Earth singers of all time. Drax thinks you’re not a dancer.""If you ever tell anyone about this, I’ll kill you.""When are we going to do something about this...unspoken thing between us?""What unspoken thing?""This Cheers-Sam-and-Diane-guy-andgirl-on-a-TV-show-who-dig-eachother-but-never-say-it-’cause-whenthey-do-the-ratings-would-go-down sort of thing?""There is no unspoken thing between us.""Well, that’s a Catch-22. Because if you said there was, it would be spoken, and then you’d be a liar. So by saying there isn’t, you’re telling the truth, and admitting there is.""That’s not...What we should be discussing right now is that something about this place doesn’t feel right.""What are you talking about? You were the one who wanted me to come here!""That girl, Mantis. She’s afraid of something.""Why are you trying to take this from me?""I’m not...""He’s my father. He’s blood...""You have blood on earth. You never wanted to return there.""Again, you made me come here! And Earth?! Earth is the place my mother died in front of me.""No, it’s because that’s real, and this is a fantasy.""This is real. I’m only half human, remember?""That’s the half I’m worried about.""Oh, I get it. You’re jealous because I’m part god! You like me being the weak one!""Uh. You were insufferable to begin with. I haven’t been able to reach Rocket. I’m going to see if I can get a signal outside.""You know, this isn’t Cheers after all. It’s whatever the show is where one person is willing to, you know, open themselves up to new possibilities, and the other person is just kind of a jerk who doesn’t trust anyone! It’s a show that doesn’t exist - it would never be made, it would be so horrible! It would get zero ratings!""You’re having a conversation with yourself! I don’t know what Cheers is!""I finally found my family, don’t you understand that!?""I thought you already had.""So this is how it ends, then? Our whole story. Like this? You and me?""Get it through your head, Peter. There is no you and me. There never was."

1870.author: Drax, Gamora, Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon, Mantis, Nebula and Groot
1870.quote: "Out of the way, dumber, smaller Groot!""I told you something didn’t feel right!""‘I told you so.’ That’s really what I need right now.""I came back, didn’t I?""Because there’s an unspoken thing.""There is no unspoken thing.""What are you doing? You could have killed us all crashing in here like that!""Uh, ‘Thank you, Rocket’?""We had it under control.""We did not. That is only an extension of his true self. He will be back soon.""What’s Smurfette doing here!?""Back rubs, dishes, killing gods, whatever I need to do to get a damn ride home.""She tried to murder me!""I saved you, you stupid fox.""He’s not a fox.""I am Groot.""I’m not a raboon either!""I am Groot.""‘Raccoon,’ whatever!""How do we kill a Celestial?""There’s the centre to him - his brain, his soul, whatever it is, in some sort of shell...""It’s in the caverns below the surface.""Yondu?""If he’s got that fin back, I am so screwed."

1871.author: Gamora
1871.quote: "He won't stop until he destroys half the universe. Everything you know, everything you love, it will all be gone."

1872.author: Rocket Raccoon, Gamora and Star-Lord
1872.quote: "Why are we doing this again?""It's a distress signal, Rocket. Someone could be dying.""I get that, but why are we doing it?""'Cause we're nice. And maybe whoever it is will give us a little cheddar cheese for our help.""Which isn't the point.""Which isn't the point... I mean… If he doesn't pony up…""We'll take his ship.""B-b-b-bingo!"

1873.author: Nebula and Gamora
1873.quote: "The entire time I knew him, he only ever had one goal: To wipe out half the universe. If he gets all the Infinity Stones...""He can do it with the snap of his fingers. Just like that."

1874.author: Star-Lord, Drax and Gamora
1874.quote: "How is this dude still alive?""He's not a dude. You're a dude. This is a man. A handsome, muscular man.""It's like his muscles are made of Cotati metal fibers...""Stop massaging his muscles!"

1875.author: Gamora and Thanos
1875.quote: "I hate that chair.""So I’ve been told. Even so, I’d hope you would sit in it one day.""I hated this room. This ship. I hated my life.""You told me that too. Every day. For almost 20 years.""I was a child when you took me.""I saved you.""No, no, we were happy on my home planet.""Going to bed hungry. Scrounging for scraps. Your planet was on the brink of collapse. I was the one who stopped that. You know what’s happened since then? The children born have known nothing but full bellies and clear skies. It’s a paradise.""Because you murdered half the planet!""A small price to pay for salvation.""You’re insane.""Little one, it’s a simple calculus. This universe has finite its resources, finite… if life is left unchecked, life will cease to exist. It needs correcting.""YOU DON’T KNOW THAT!""I’m the only one who knows that. At least I’m the only one who has the will to act on it. For a time, you had that same will. As you fought by my side, daughter.""I’m not your daughter. Everything I hate about myself, you taught me.""And in doing so, made you the fiercest woman in the Galaxy."

1876.author: Red Skull, Gamora and Thanos
1876.quote: "What you seek lies in front of you. As does what you fear.""What's this?""The price. Soul holds a special place among the Infinity Stones. You might say, it is a certain wisdom.""Tell me what it needs.""To ensure that whoever possesses it, understands its power. The stone demands a sacrifice.""Of what?""In order to take the stone, you must lose that which you love. A soul for a soul."

1877.author: Gamora, Thanos and Red Skull
1877.quote: "All my life I dreamed of a day, a moment, when you got what you deserved. And I was always so disappointed. But now, you kill and torture and you call it mercy. The universe has judged you. You asked it for a prize and it told you no. You failed. And do you wanna know why? Because you love nothing. No one.""No.""Really, tears?""They are not for him.""No. This isn't love.""I ignored my destiny once, I can not do that again. Even for you. I'm sorry Gamora.""No!"

1878.author: Gamora and Thanos
1878.quote: "Daughter.""Did you do it?""Yes.""What did it cost?""Everything."

1879.author: Nebula and Natasha Romanoff
1879.quote: "Thanos found the Soul Stone on Vormir.""What's Vormir?""A dominion of death, at the very center of Celestial existence. It's where... Thanos murdered my sister."

1880.author: Black Widow and Hawkeye
1880.quote: "Thanos left here with the stone, without his daughter. It's not a coincidence."Yeah."

1881.author: Nebula and War Machine
1881.quote: "Let's take cover. We're not the only ones in 2014 looking for the stones."Wait a minute, what are you talking about? Who else is looking for these stones?"My sister, my father, and me."

1882.author: Gamora and Nebula
1882.quote: "You're welcome."I didn't ask for your help."And yet, you always need it. Get up. Father wants us back on his ship."Why?"Father's found an Infinity Stone."Where?"On a planet called Morag."Father's plan is finally in motion."One stone isn't six, Nebula."It's a start. If he gets them all..."

1883.author: Thanos and Gamora
1883.quote: "Ronan has located the Power Stone. I'm dispatching you to his ship.""He won't like that.""His alternative is death. Ronan's obsession  clouds his judgement"

1884.author: Thanos and Gamora
1884.quote: "Avengers. Unruly wretches. What's that reflection? Amplify this, Maw.""I don't understand. Two Nebulas.""No. The same Nebula. From two different times."

1885.author: Gamora and Nebula
1885.quote: "Tell me something. In the future, what happens to you and me?""I tried to kill you. Several times. But eventually, we become close, we become friends. We become sisters."

1886.author: Gamora and Nebula
1886.quote: "This is the one? Seriously?""The choices were him, or a tree."

1888.author: Ava Starr
1888.quote: "I doubt Hank ever mentioned my father. Why would he? Elihas Starr. They were colleagues at S.H.I.E.L.D.. Quantum research. Until my father dared disagree with the great Hank Pym. You had him fired. Oh, and discredited for good measure. My father tried to continue his research on his own, desperate to restore his name. So, he took risks. Too many, until something went wrong. He told us to run. I could tell he was scared. I didn't want him to be alone. When I woke up, my parents were dead. I wasn't so lucky."

1889.author: Ghost to Ant-Man
1889.quote: "S.H.I.E.L.D. saw an opportunity in my affliction. They built me a containment suit so I could control my phasing and trained me to be a stealth operative. They weaponized me. I stole for them. Spied for them. I killed for them. And in exchange for my soul... they were going to cure me. They lied."

1890.author: Ava Starr
1890.quote: "They call it “molecular disequilibrium.” A rather dull name, I think. Doesn't quite do justice to what it means. Every cell in my body is torn apart... and stitched back together. Over and over. Everyday."

1891.author: Ghost and Bill Foster
1891.quote: "I doubt Hank ever mentioned my father. Why would he? Elihas Starr. They were colleges at S.H.I.E.L.D.. Quantum research. Until my father dared disagree with the great Hank Pym. You had him fired. Oh, and discredited for good measure. My father tried to continue his research on his own, desperate to restore his name. So, he took risks. To many, until something went wrong. He told us to run. I could tell he was scared. I didn't want him to be alone. When I woke up, my parents were dead. I wasn't so lucky. They call it molecular disequilibrium. A rather dull name I think. Doesn't quite do justice to what it means. Every cell in my body is torn apart and stitched back together, over and over every day.""I was still at S.H.I.E.L.D. when I got a call about a quantum anomaly in Argentina.""Doctor Foster did his best to keep me safe. But others at S.H.I.E.L.D. saw an opportunity in my affliction they built me a containment suit so I could control my phasing. And trained me to be a stealth operative. They weaponised me. I stole for them, spied for them. I killed for them. And in exchange for my soul, they were going to cure me. They lied.""When S.H.I.E.L.D. collapsed, I took Ava in. I built a chamber to slow her decay, but her condition is progressing further without a cure. She wanted to kill you Hank, but I told her no. That she should watch you instead."

1892.author: Ant-Man and Ghost
1892.quote: "You're not gonna reach into my chest and crush my heart, are you?""You're funny. I'm not gonna hurt you, Scott, unless I have to."

1893.author: Ghost and Bill Foster
1893.quote: "You said it yourself. I've hurt people. But you haven't. Go, please.""We can make it, Ava.""Bill-""I'm not leaving you."

1894.author: Ghost Rider to Quake
1894.quote: "So... you've got the devil inside you too."

1895.author: M. Scott
1895.quote: "They say when the Rider burns you, he burns your soul. And a soul can never heal."

1896.author: Felix and Daisy Johnson
1896.quote: "Word is he hit again last night, two dead in the street.""Who?""The Ghost Rider... You must not be from around here."

1897.author: T. Mitchell and Robbie Reyes
1897.quote: "No, no! I don't deserve to die!""Everyone says that..."

1898.author: Ghost Rider and Quake
1898.quote: "I only kill assassinos who deserve it. It's vengeance, chica.""For what? You killed a detective.""He had blood on his hands.""A teacher!""A pedophile."

1899.author: Quake and Ghost Rider
1899.quote: "You don't get to decide who deserves to die.""I'm not the one who decides."

1900.author: Robbie Reyes and Gabe Reyes
1900.quote: "You never accept rides, bus break down or you still trying to howler Janet's little sister?""Maybe, I only needed a ride to help Canelo balance the books because my brother didn't finish high school.""Yo I finished high school... In the eleventh grade."

1901.author: Frederick and Leo Fitz to the Ghost Rider

1902.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1902.quote: "You get lost, or I'll get angry, so angry I may not remember what I do to you... Sometimes I prefer it that way.""In front of them?"

1903.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1903.quote: "You're here to counsel me? You want to save my soul? I'm telling you, girl, I sold mine.""To the devil?""He was the only one buying, you know?"

1904.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1904.quote: "You see, this is new for me. I've never been--""A kidnapper?""Caught. You know who I am, which is a problem. For both of us. A problem that has to go away."

1905.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1905.quote: "No doubt you got a death wish, coming back to find me after I let you live. You told me not to, said you deserved it, I'm just looking for proof that you do.""And then?""My problem goes away, and your wish comes true."

1906.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1906.quote: "You know what happens to people during a blackout? They think they can get away with whatever they want.""That nothing can stop them."

1907.author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
1907.quote: "Calm down before you go all Carrot Top again.""Stress has nothing to do with it.""What exactly is "it"? Because I still don't buy the whole "sold my soul" story.""Well, I don't give a damn what you buy. I'm the one stuck with it.""So you want to get rid of it.""I thought that if I settled the score, took down the gangbangers that put Gabe in a wheelchair, it would go away. Didn't happen. So I started settling other people's scores."

1908.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1908.quote: "I don't get hurt. You gave me a pretty bad gash at the junkyard, now..""Not a scratch.""I've been stabbed, shot, run over, twice. Next day I'm good as new."

1909.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
1909.author: Robbie Reyes to Hellfire
1909.quote: "It's time to pay for your sins."

1910.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
1910.author: Phil Coulson to Alphonso Mackenzie
1910.quote: "I get his car now, right? Isn't that how this works?"

1911.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
1911.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Phil Coulson
1911.quote: "Did two fire dudes just drop into a warehouse full of fireworks?""You had to see that coming."

1912.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
1912.author: Robbie Reyes, Alphonso Mackenzie and Phil Coulson
1912.quote: "You really think this thing can hold me?""It's contained a lot more dangerous people than you.""Is that a dare?""I've heard rumors from your part of the world about a man with a flaming skull. Always seemed like an urban legend to me. You've managed to escape capture all this time. "And we nab you in a parking lot. That's got to hurt." "We got facts, too. Robbie Reyes dropped out of Garfield High. Took work at Canelo Auto and Body to help pay the rent. A halfway decent driver with a few bad habits. Well, one really bad habit of killing people.""Only those who have it coming.""From what I can tell, that seems to be true. Which makes you a little more interesting.""Well, I have a code I try to live by.""And a penchant for spontaneous combustion, which, I must say, sounds painful. How do you do it? You're not an Inhuman, are you?""Why do you guys keep asking me that?""Then where does your power come from?""I made a deal with the devil."

1913.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
1913.author: Robbie Reyes and Phil Coulson
1913.quote: "Yo, listen, I held up my end of the deal, all right? Either we go and get after it, or I take my car, and I do it myself.""That's not how things work here. We need to make a detour. We could use your help if you're still interested in our arrangement. That depends on you."

1914.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
1914.author: Hellfire and Robbie Reyes
1914.quote: "I don't know who the hell you think you are, but you just made a big mistake.""Funny. I was gonna say the same thing... without the accent."

1915.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1915.quote: "I need to get off this plane now.""That should put you in... rural Utah."

1916.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1916.quote: "I should be down there, getting answers, my way.""Oh, yeah? How you gonna do that? Cracking skulls?""It's worked so far."

1917.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1917.quote: "I've been careful. I've never been caught, not even a parking ticket. Then you show up, and you bring S.H.I.E.L.D. with you.""Careful? Really? You've been murdering people while possessed and on fire."

1918.author: Robbie Reyes to Gabe Reyes
1918.quote: "When I was thrown from the car I begged God, I begged the universe, I begged anyone who would listen, that you be spared. I swore that I'd give anything to save you."

1919.author: Robbie Reyes to Gabe Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1919.quote: "Then I hit the street... and I died. And there's nothing. It's just darkness. Then I heard a voice. It was asking me if I wanted a second chance. Did I want to punish those who hurt my brother? Did I wanna avenge my own death? I answered yes. More than anything, yes."

1920.author: Robbie Reyes to Gabe Reyes
1920.quote: "And you're right, there was someone there when I came to. But it wasn't a good samaritan; it was the devil. Whatever was inside him, he passed it into me."

1921.author: Jeffrey Mace to Phil Coulson
1921.quote: "Yesterday, your fiery friend killed a prisoner named Santino Noguera. Was the man a murderer with three strikes? Yes. But the legal system sentenced him to prison, not to death. Listen, Phil, I understand your desire to protect Daisy Johnson. She's a former S.H.I.E.L.D. agent. But this other guy is a problem. The world has its eyes on S.H.I.E.L.D. and we can't afford to be in business with a murderer."

1922.author: Jeffrey Mace and Phil Coulson
1922.quote: "Will it hold?""No one's broken out yet, and it's held some pretty potent individuals."

1923.author: Phil Coulson and Leo Fitz
1923.quote: "He claims he made a deal with the devil.""Which is nonsense.""You know, the rationalist in me wants to agree, but the skull on fire makes a pretty compelling argument for "hail Satan"."

1924.author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
1924.quote: "Robbie! Don't give them more reasons to be afraid of you.""It's not me they need to be afraid of! It's the other guy and he wants out!"

1925.author: Lucy Bauer and Robbie Reyes
1925.quote: "Am I supposed to be afraid of you?""My Uncle is Eli Morrow.""Of course. I've seen your picture. You're his nephew Gabriel, like the angel.""No. I'm the other one."

1927.author: Robbie Reyes to the Spirit of Vengeance
1927.quote: "I won't survive this without you, but the truth is, you need me, too. We had a deal! How about a new one? Give me my vengeance on Eli. Settle my score, and I'll settle yours. All of yours!"

1928.author: Gabe Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1928.quote: "They were my closest family and I didn't know them at all. They both... I knew Robbie was disturbed, but... but I was afraid it was because of me. Because I was holding him back.""No, you... you were what he held onto. You grounded him.""But I want him to leave. You know, figure himself out. I didn't know that was what he was up against.""Your brother loves you more than anything.""I just wish we had talked. You really think he's not gone?""I know the feeling when someone's gone. And I don't feel that now. Plus, your brother is pretty damn stubborn.""You have no idea. If he is out there, he's gonna go straight for Uncle Eli."

1929.author: Daisy Johnson and Alphonso Mackenzie
1929.quote: "Mack? What happened?""Robbie, that... that thing... He took it out of me.""Are you all right? Some of those things you said you... You said you were in pain.""No, it's just a rough day. I'm okay.""Good. Where'd he take it?""Hell."

1930.author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
1930.quote: "It heals itself. Scientifically impossible self-healing car.""That only works when I'm the Rider."

1931.author: Robbie Reyes and the Spirit of Vengeance
1931.quote: "Hey! Mack.""No. You're smarter than that.""You.""I've been a voice in your head all these years. Now, finally, we get to speak face-to-face.""I've wanted you gone. But our work isn't done. Eli is out there. We need to stop him."""We"? There is no we. Your time is over."

1932.author: Robbie Reyes and the Spirit of Vengeance
1932.quote: "We had a deal. You still owe me vengeance. Your neighborhood is soaked in the blood I spilled for you.""None of that matters if I don't take down the monster behind all of this. Eli. He's my blood.""He will meet me, too."

1933.author: Robbie Reyes and the Spirit of Vengeance
1933.quote: "You can't hold on to Mack's body forever. He's a good man. He doesn't have vengeance in him.""It's not ideal, but Mack, he has a lot of pain. He lost hope. I could survive off his pain for years. I know where you're being dragged down to. I've escaped it before."

1934.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Robbie Reyes
1934.quote: "I thought I'd be seeing you. And I know you're not alone.""Want to help settle my last score?"

1935.author: Robbie Reyes
1935.quote: "You like playin' with fire, Eli? Let's play."

1936.author: Phil Coulson and Jeffrey Mace
1936.quote: "We need the big guns on this one. And Yo-Yo, Daisy and Reyes are the biggest guns we have."

1937.author: Eli Morrow and Robbie Reyes
1937.quote: "I am becoming a god!""You'd better be. Because the Devil is coming for you."

1938.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
1938.quote: "So, how did things end with Robbie Reyes? Last I remember, we were chasing down his uncle.""Oh, you know, guy tried to become a God, so we opened up a portal beneath his quantum-power cube, then Ghost Rider dragged him to another dimension with his Hellfire Chain.""So, things ended well, then.""Well as can be expected."

1939.author: Aida and Anton Ivanov
1939.quote: "My arm still hurts. Why won't it heal?""Let me see.""Don't touch me! If you want to make me feel better, then explain why my arm hasn't healed.""That flame-headed demon was born in the same darkness that created you. You will need to be careful."

1940.author: Phil Coulson, Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
1940.quote: "How'd you find Aida?""There was a tear in the dark world when she was created. It's how I escaped. The thing in me is drawn to dark matter the way your GPS tracks my car.""So you're saying Aida's made of the same stuff as the Darkhold?""Yeah. And the Rider wants to send them both back to where they came from.""I hope that means Hell.""Hell is relative. Dimensions, space, planets it's all connected. Plenty of them qualify as Hell. The Earth is just one territory in a war that's been going on forever."

1941.author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
1941.quote: "You really have to leave right away?""Yeah. I have to get this book someplace safe. Keep an eye on my brother?"

1942.author: Daisy Johnson, Phil Coulson, and Alphonso Mackenzie
1942.quote: "So is there anything you wanna fill us in on, Coulson? Cause now's the time.""You know what I know.""This doesn't have anything to do with the little bargain you made with the Ghost Rider?""Yeah, that thing doesn't ride for free, there has to be some price."

1943.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Jemma Simmons
1943.quote: "Can we all agree this is magic at play?""Magic is just science we don't understand yet.""Ah, please. We just got zapped through space by Stonehenge, and we're trying to rule out the involvement of a flame-headed demon from east L.A.? Science my ass."

1944.author: Lance Hunter and Leo Fitz
1944.quote: "Just his head set on fire? Nothing else?""Um, no.""That's the strangest thing I've ever heard."

1945.author: Ghost Rider
1945.quote: "I didn't ask for this, this curse. But vengeance calls."

1947.author: Glenn Talbot
1947.quote: "This is Colonel Glenn Talbot, U.S. Air Force. I need to speak with whoever is in charge over there."

1948.author: Glenn Talbot and Phil Coulson
1948.quote: "On behalf on the United States Armed Forces I order you to stand down! I repeat, stand down!""Colonel Talbot? There have to be better things for you to do than chase four S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.""I wasn't a huge fan before chasing you into the damn tundra Coulson, I wouldn't push it."

1949.author: Glenn Talbot and George Stephanopoulos
1949.quote: "They're fugitives, and they deserve to be punished. We witnessed the single greatest intelligence collapse in recorded history, George. We have a duty to the American people to hunt down those responsible. So, no, I don't sleep most nights.""General Talbot, you said you have S.H.I.E.L.D. personnel and weaponry locked in a secure facility, so is it fair to say that S.H.I.E.L.D. and the HYDRA terrorists who poisoned its ranks have been defeated?""The corrupt institution has been dismantled, yes. We cut down the tree, we pulled up the roots, but let's just say I'll rest easier when we throw it all on the bonfire."

1950.author: Glenn Talbot and Lance Hunter
1950.quote: "Look, Hunter, we're pretty like-minded guys so let's not waste each other's time, you know what I'm after.""I'm guessing it's not Carl Creel.""Creels small time, think big fish."

1951.author: Glenn Talbot to Phil Coulson
1951.quote: "Well if this is indeed as important as you say it is you should probably hand it over, along with any other HYDRA assets you happen to have in your possession."

1952.author: Glenn Talbot to the United Nations
1952.quote: "Now, I was here in 2012 when the sky tore open and the Chitauri rained down on us. Aliens. Aliens were running through the streets, and it was then that S.H.I.E.L.D. revealed themselves and stood with the Avengers, leading us to believe that we could put our faith in them, which we did. We stood idly by while they collected super-powered individuals, garnered alien weapons, built bases on virtually every continent. We thought S.H.I.E.L.D. was protecting us, but in truth, they took advantage of our good faith, and they still are."

1953.author: Glenn Talbot and Phil Coulson
1953.quote: "Sunil Bakshi... the man tied to the Navy wedding massacre, the U.N. attack, and who tried to kill you, Coulson.""While dressed up as you, sir.""Safe to say, I'm not a fan.""Perfect. I'll trade him to you to add to your collection."

1954.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
1954.author: Glenn Talbot
1954.quote: "There is a mole on our base, this mole infiltrated security by posing as my wife and could be anyone in this room right now. Make no mistake, this is an enemy combatant, one not to be taken lightly. But rest assured I will find this perpetrator, because if there is one thing I cannot stand, it is a spy in my house."

1955.author: Phil Coulson and Glenn Talbot
1955.quote: "I'm technically your boss now right? But I'd prefer to be partners.""You are not now, nor will you ever be, my boss, and we will never be partners! I didn't ask to get up in front of this sideshow circus."

1956.author: Glenn Talbot and Gideon Malick
1956.quote: "Alright. I kept up my end of the bargain, I delivered Coulson, all the delegates are on your side, now give me back my son!""I'm sorry, I can't do that.""No! We had a deal!""Yes, but unfortunately, we must all be sacrificed to the greater good."

1957.author: Glenn Talbot and Phil Coulson
1957.quote: "I had a little help.""That's what partners are for, General.""Call me Glenn... Occasionally."

1958.author: Glenn Talbot and Phil Coulson
1958.quote: "I don't care what they call it. It's a dress. You must be loving this.""You're the president's official representative. It's a customary way to honor them for hosting the symposium, and you look very dignified. ""It's all loosey-goosey under there."

1959.author: Glenn Talbot
1959.quote: "The head has been cut. I repeat, the head has been cut."

1960.author: Glenn Talbot to Phil Coulson
1960.quote: "I'm here because the President sent me. The Sokovia Accords are the law of the land now and he's concerned you might have some undocumented "assets" working for you."

1961.author: Glenn Talbot and Lincoln Campbell
1961.quote: "Why do you think this Lash can defeat Hive? And who in tarnation names these things?!""Every Inhuman is here for a reason and serves a purpose. I believe Lash's purpose is to kill Hive."

1962.author: Glenn Talbot and Phil Coulson
1962.quote: "Do you have any idea how to stop him? I mean, you make him sound invincible.""Calm down, General. You'll pull something.""Calm down? This is an end of the world type deal. Don't you tell me to calm down. I'm the one that tells you to calm down. How are you so calm, anyway?""I'm getting used to this sort of thing."

1963.author: Glenn Talbot and Holden Radcliffe
1963.quote: "I can tell by your beady little eyes that you're a worm, so let me be absolutely honest with you. If you don't find a solution to this problem, you're going to end up looking like one of those mouth breathers you made. Do you understand?""How could I not?"

1964.author: Jemma Simmons to Melinda May
1964.quote: "As soon as Talbot gave the location of this base to the president, things changed. I knew we'd be divided, undermined, kept in the dark, so I have been clawing for as much power as I can possibly grab to keep a modicum of control over any of this."

1965.author: Jeffrey Mace and Ellen Nadeer
1965.quote: "If you have nothing to hide, I'm sure you wouldn't mind us taking a quick look around.""Actually, I would mind. Does General Talbot even know you're here?""This operation doesn't concern Talbot.""It will once I return to D.C. Unless you have some paperwork from the U.N."

1966.author: Glenn Talbot to Phil Coulson
1966.quote: "Coulson, we're initiating Contingency Plan Foxhole. Get the Director out of here, pronto."

1967.author: Glenn Talbot to Matthew Ellis
1967.quote: "Mr. President. We don't know who survived, but I've got our top agents searching for the Quinjet. Agent Burrows has the package, but we don't know if he was onboard. Yes, sir. Let's hope for all our sakes that Director Mace got it."

1968.author: Glenn Talbot
1968.quote: "Actually, we used a modified version of that formula you confiscated from Agent Johnson's father."

1969.author: Glenn Talbot
1969.quote: "The decision was made that the new Director had to be enhanced, no candidate fit that criteria. So we made one."

1970.author: Phil Coulson and Glenn Talbot
1970.quote: "Really, Glenn?""You should be thanking me. We're in the middle of an arms race. World War III is gonna be decided by whoever has more enhanced assets. You need Inhumans to trust S.H.I.E.L.D.""And your plan to earn their trust was to lie to them?
