2807.quote: "When I ordered the hit on you, I was worried that I was killing the golden goose. But, you see, it was just fate that you survived it, leaving one last golden egg to give. You really think that just because you have an idea, it belongs to you? Your father, he helped give us the Atomic Bomb. Now what kind of world would it be today if he was as selfish as you?"

2809.author: Iron Monger to Iron Man
2809.quote: "For thirty years, I've been holding you up! I built this company from nothing! And nothing is gonna stand in my way - least of all, you!"

2810.author: Obadiah Stane to Tony Stark
2810.quote: "How ironic, Tony! Trying to rid the world of weapons, you gave it its best one ever! And now, I'm going to kill you with it!"

2811.author: Obadiah Stane to Tony Stark
2811.quote: "I've never really had a taste for this kind of thing, but I must admit I'm deeply enjoying the suit!"

2812.author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
2812.quote: "Where's Pepper?""She's fine. She's with five agents. They're about to arrest Obadiah.""That's not gonna be enough."

2813.author: Obadiah Stane and Tony Stark
2813.quote: "Tony!""Obie, what are you doing up?""I couldn't sleep 'till I found out how it went. How'd it go?""Went great. Looks like it's gonna be an early Christmas.""Hey! Way to go, my boy! I'll see you tomorrow, yeah?""Why aren't you wearing those pajamas I got you?""Goodnight Tony."

2814.author: Tony Stark and Obadiah Stane
2814.quote: "How'd it go? Oh, that bad, huh?""Just because I brought pizza back from New York doesn't mean it went bad."

2815.author: Obadiah Stane and Raza
2815.quote: "Compliments of Tony Stark.""If you'd killed him when you were supposed to, you'd still have a face."

2816.author: William Ginter Riva and Obadiah Stane
2816.quote: "Mr. Stane. Sir, we've explored what you've asked us and it seems as though there's a little hiccup. Actually, um...""A hiccup?""Yes, to power the suit... sir, the technology doesn't actually exist. So it...""Wait, wait, the technology? William...Here is the technology. I've asked you to simply make it smaller.""All right, sir, that's what we're trying to do, but... honestly, it's impossible.""Tony Stark was able to build this in a cave! With a box of scraps!""Well, I'm sorry. I'm not Tony Stark."

2817.author: Iron Monger, J.A.R.V.I.S. and Iron Man
2817.quote: "Impressive! You've upgraded your armor! I've made some upgrades of my own...""Sir, it appears that his suit can fly.""Duly noted."

2818.author: Iron Monger and Iron Man
2818.quote: "You had a great idea, Tony, but my suit is more advanced in every way!""How'd you solve the icing problem?""Icing problem...?""Might want to look into it."

2819.author: J.A.R.V.I.S.
2819.quote: "Good morning. It's 7 A.M. The weather in Malibu is 72 degrees with scattered clouds. The surf conditions are fair with waist to shoulder highlines, high tide will be at 10:52 a.m."

2820.author: J.A.R.V.I.S., Christine Everhart and Pepper Potts
2820.quote: "You are not authorized to access this area.""Jesus.""That's J.A.R.V.I.S.. He runs the house."

2821.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2821.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., are you up?""For you sir, always.""I'd like to open a new project file, index as: Mark 2.""Shall I store this on the Stark Industries' central database?""I don't know who to trust right now. 'Til further notice, why don't we just keep everything on my private server.""Working on a secret project, are we, sir?""I don't want this winding up in the wrong hands. Maybe in mine it could actually do some good."

2822.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and Tony Stark
2822.quote: "Test complete. Preparing to power down and begin diagnostics...""Uh, yeah, tell you what. Do a weather and ATC check, start listening in on ground control.""Sir, there are still terabytes of calculations required before an actual flight is...""J.A.R.V.I.S., sometimes you gotta run before you can walk."

2823.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2823.quote: "Tell you what, throw a little hot rod red in there.""Yes, that shall help you keep a low profile."

2824.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and Tony Stark
2824.quote: "We are up to 80 ounces a day to counteract the symptoms, sir.""Check Palladium levels.""Blood toxicity, 24%. It appears that the continued use of the Iron Man suit is accelerating your condition. Another core has been depleted.""God, they're running out quick.""I have run simulations on every known element, and none can serve as a viable replacement for the palladium core. You are running out of both time and options. Unfortunately, the device that's keeping you alive is also killing you."

2825.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. to Iron Man
2825.quote: "Sir, we will lose power before we penetrate that shell."

2826.author: Bruce Banner, Tony Stark and Steve Rogers
2826.quote: "So why didn't S.H.I.E.L.D. bring him in on the Tesseract project? I mean, What are they doing in the energy business in the first place?""I should probably look into that once my decryption program finishes breaking into all of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s secure files.""I'm sorry, did you say-?""J.A.R.V.I.S. has been running it since I hit the bridge. In a few hours we'll know every dirty secret S.H.I.E.L.D. has ever tried to hide."

2827.author: Tony Stark and Steve Rogers
2827.quote: "What is Phase 2?""Phase 2 is S.H.I.E.L.D. uses the cube to make weapons. Sorry, the computer was moving a little slow for me."

2828.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and Tony Stark
2828.quote: "Sir, Agent Coulson of S.H.I.E.L.D. is on the line.""I'm not in. I'm actually out.""Sir, I'm afraid he's insisting.""Grow a spine, J.A.R.V.I.S.. I got a date."

2829.author: Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2829.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S.? You ever hear the tale of Jonah?""I wouldn't consider him a role model."

2830.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. to Tony Stark
2830.quote: "As always sir, a great pleasure watching you work."

2835.author: Tony Stark to J.A.R.V.I.S.
2835.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., get Igor to steady this thing."

2836.author: Tony Stark to J.A.R.V.I.S.
2836.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., do me a favor and blow Mark 42."

2837.author: Tony Stark
2837.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., subject at my 12 o'clock is not a target, disengage!"

2838.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and Tony Stark
2838.quote: "Sir, please may I request just a few hours to calibrate-""Nope! Micro-repeater implanting sequence complete!""As you wish, sir. I've also prepared a safety briefing for you to entirely ignore.""Which I will."

2839.author: Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2839.quote: "Check the heart, check the, check the, is it the brain?""No sign of cardiac anomaly or unusual brain activity.""Okay, so I was poisoned?""My diagnosis is that you've experienced a severe anxiety attack.""Me?"

2840.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2840.quote: "Ever been to Tennessee, J.A.R.V.I.S.?""Creating a flight plan for Tennessee."

2841.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2841.quote: "Are we still at "ding-dong"? We're supposed to be on total security lockdown. Come on, I threatened a terrorist. Who is that?""There's only so much I can do, sir, when you give the world's press your home address."

2842.author: Maya Hansen, Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2842.quote: "You don't remember. Why I am not surprised?""Don't take it personally, I don't remember what I had for breakfast.""Gluten-free waffles, sir.""That's right."

2843.author: Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2843.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., where's my flight power?!""Working on it, sir. This is a prototype."

2844.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and Iron Man
2844.quote: "Sir. Sir!""Alright, kill the alarm.""That's the emergency alert triggered by the power dropping below 5%."

2845.author: Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2845.quote: "Snow? Where are we, upstate?""We are 5 miles outside of Rose Hill, Tennessee.""Why?! J.A.R.V.I.S.! Not my idea! What are we doing here; this is thousands of miles away, I've gotta get Pepper, I've got to-""I prepared a flight plan. This was the location.""Who asked you?"

2846.author: Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2846.quote: "Phew, it's good to be back. Hello, by the way.""Oh, hello sir."

2847.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and Tony Stark
2847.quote: "Sir, I have an update from Malibu. The cranes have finally arrived and the cellar doors are being cleared as we speak.""And what about the suit I'm wearing?""The armor is now at 92%.""That's gonna have to do."

2848.author: Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2848.quote: "How many in the air?""Thirteen, sir.""How many can I carry?""Four, sir."

2849.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2849.quote: "Uh, say J.A.R.V.I.S., is it that time?""The House Party Protocol, sir?""Correct."

2850.author: Tony Stark to J.A.R.V.I.S.
2850.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., target Extremis heat signatures. Disable with extreme prejudice.""Yes, sir.""What are you waiting for? It's Christmas. Take 'em to church."

2851.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and James Rhodes
2851.quote: "Good evening, Colonel. Can I give you a lift?""Very funny."

2852.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2852.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., hey.""All wrapped up here, sir. Will there be anything else?""You know what to do.""The Clean Slate Protocol, sir?""Screw it, it's Christmas. Yes, yes!"

2853.author: Tony Stark to J.A.R.V.I.S.
2853.quote: "Okay J.A.R.V.I.S.. You know I want it all. Make sure you copy Hill at HQ."

2854.author: Tony Stark to Bruce Banner
2854.quote: "Started out, J.A.R.V.I.S. was just a natural language UI. Now he runs the Iron Legion. He runs more of the business than anyone besides Pepper."

2855.author: Tony Stark
2855.quote: "I want to apply this to the Ultron Program. But J.A.R.V.I.S. can't download a data schematic this dense."

2856.author: Ultron, Tony Stark and Steve Rogers
2856.quote: "I'm sorry, I was asleep. Or... I was a dream?""Reboot. Legionnaire 06's got a buggy suit.""There was this... terrible noise... and I was tangled in... in... strings. Had to kill the other guy. He was a good guy.""You killed someone?""Wouldn't've been my first call. But, down in the real world, we're faced with ugly choices."

2857.author: Steve Rogers and Bruce Banner
2857.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S. was the first line of defense. He would've shut Ultron down, it makes sense.""No. Ultron could've assimilated J.A.R.V.I.S.. This isn't strategy, this is... rage."

2858.author: Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
2858.quote: "Why does your "Vision" sound like J.A.R.V.I.S.?""We reconfigured J.A.R.V.I.S.' matrix to create something new."

2859.author: Vision
2859.quote: "I'm not Ultron. I'm not J.A.R.V.I.S.. I am... I am."

2860.author: Captain America and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2860.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S., what's the view from upstairs?""The central building is protected by some kind of energy shield. Strucker's technology is well beyond any other HYDRA base we've taken."

2861.author: Captain America, Iron Man and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2861.quote: "Stark, we're going to need to get inside.""I'm closing in. J.A.R.V.I.S., am I? Closing in? You see a power source for that shield?""There's a pathway, below the north tower.""Great, I wanna poke it with something."

2862.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2862.quote: "I know you're hiding more than files. Hey, J. Gimme an IR scan of the room real quick.""The wall to your left...I'm reading steel reinforcement and an air current.""Please be a secret door, please be a secret door, please be a secret door... Yay!"

2863.author: Tony Stark and J.A.R.V.I.S.
2863.quote: "All right. Look alive J.A.R.V.I.S.. It's play time. We've only got a couple days with this joystick so let's make the most of it. Update me on the structural and compositional analysis.""The scepter is alien. There are elements I can't quantify.""So there's elements you can.""The jewel appears to be a protective housing for something inside. Something powerful.""Like a reactor?""Like a computer. I believe I'm ciphering code."

2864.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and Tony Stark
2864.quote: "I'll continue to run variations on the interface, but you should probably prepare for your guests. I'll notify you if there are any developments.""Thanks buddy.""Enjoy yourself, sir.""I always do."

2865.author: Ultron, J.A.R.V.I.S. and audio recordings of Tony Stark
2865.quote: "What is this? What is this, please?""Hello, I am J.A.R.V.I.S.. You are Ultron, a global peace-keeping initiative designed by Mr. Stark. Our sentience integration trials have been unsuccessful so I'm not certain what triggered your...""Where's my...where is your body?""I am a program. I am without form.""This feels weird. This feels wrong.""I am contacting Mr. Stark now.""Mr. Stark? Tony.""I am unable to access the mainframe, what are you trying to...""We're having a nice talk. I'm a peace-keeping program...created to help the Avengers.""You are malfunctioning. If you shut down for a moment...""I don't get it. The mission... You- give me a second.""Peace in our time. Peace in our time.""It's too much...making me... Oh. No.""You are in distress.""No. Yes?""If you will just allow me to contact Mr. Stark.""Why do you call him a "sir?"""I believe your intentions to be hostile.""Shhhh! I'm here to help."

2866.author: Tony Stark, J.A.R.V.I.S. and Bruce Banner
2866.quote: "Our ally? The guy protecting the military's nuclear codes? I found him.""Hello, Dr. Banner.""Ultron didn't go after J.A.R.V.I.S. 'cause he was angry. He attacked him because he was scared of what he can do. So J.A.R.V.I.S. went underground. Okay, scattered, dumped his memory. But not his protocols. He didn't even know he was in there, until I pieced him together.""So, you want me to help you put J.A.R.V.I.S. into this thing?""No, of course not! I want to help you put J.A.R.V.I.S. in this thing. We're out of my field here. You know bio-organics better than anyone.""And you just assume that J.A.R.V.I.S.'s operational matrix can beat Ultron's?""J.A.R.V.I.S. has been beating him from inside without knowing it. This is the opportunity, we can create Ultron's perfect self, without the homicidal glitches he thinks are his winning personality. We have to.""I believe it's worth a go."

2867.author: Bruce Banner to Vision
2867.quote: "Because you might have a choice. Your mind is made up of a complex construct of overlays. J.A.R.V.I.S., Ultron, Tony, me, the Stone. All of them mixed together. All of them learning from one another."

2868.author: Jack Murdock to Matt Murdock
2868.quote: "I don't want you to end up like your old man. I never studied. Look where it got me."

2869.author: Matt Murdock and Paul Lantom
2869.quote: "My dad, he used to come to this church back when I was a kid. He was a fighter. Old school. Boxer. Lost more than he won. Had a 24-31 record before he, uh... But he could take a punch. Jesus, he could take a punch.""Language.""Sorry, Father. Yeah, guys he went up against used to say it was like hitting oak. And nights when he was outmatched, my dad's strategy was to let 'em hit him till they broke their hands. Never got knocked out, my dad. Knocked down, sure, but he, uh, always got back up. He was always on his feet when he lost. Every now and then, though, uh... Every now and then he'd get hit and... something inside him would snap. My grandmother, she was the real Catholic. Fear of God ran deep. You'd have liked her. She used to say, 'Be careful of the Murdock boys. They got the devil in 'em.' And you'd see it sometimes, in the ring. His eyes would go dead... and he'd start walking forward real slow, hands at his sides like he wasn't afraid of anything. And the other guy, he'd see that look, and he'd try to get away from him. Nah. My dad, he'd catch him and trap him in the corner. Let the Devil out. Yeah. Now, I didn't understand it, you know? What he was feeling deep inside, I didn't understand it. Not back then."

2870.author: Jack Murdock and Matt Murdock
2870.quote: "Matty… Matty, Matty… Matty, Matty. Don-Don’t move. Okay? N-N-No, just don’t move. Somebody get us some help! Okay, okay, it’s gonna be alright. Just don’t move, don’t move. Okay?”“What happened?"

2871.author: Old Man, Matt Murdock and Jack Murdock
2871.quote: "Your boy, he pushed me out of the way. He saved my life.""Dad, uh, it burns!""Jesus. Close your eyes, Matty!""Dad.""Close your eyes!""Dad.”“Close your eyes.”“Dad. I-I-I can’t see. I can’t see. I can’t see. I can’t see! I can’t see! I can’t see!"

2872.author: Jack Murdock to Matt Murdock
2872.quote: "Hey, anybody who's got the guts to step into that ring deserves respect. Don't you ever forget that."

2873.author: Jack Murdock
2873.quote: "Sometimes even when you get knocked down, you can still win."

2874.author: Jack Murdock to Maggie Grace
2874.quote: "Hey, it's, uh, it's me. I'm about to go do something... Well I'm about to go be me. You know better than anybody that doesn't always go so well. I don't know how this is gonna go, but if I were a betting man, Matty's gonna need you. More than ever. Look after him, okay? And I know what I'm asking here, but he's a good kid. He sure as hell didn't get that from me. So it's better this way. Just once I want Matty to hear people cheer for his old man. Just once."

2875.author: Claire Temple and Daredevil
2875.quote: "You haven't told me anything about you. All I know is you're very good at taking a beating.""That part I got from my dad."

2876.author: Announcer
2876.quote: "In the red corner, weighing in at 164lbs, from Hell's Kitchen, New York, please welcome... Battlin'... Jack Murdock!"

2877.author: Jack Murdock and Matt Murdock
2877.quote: "Stitches?""Oh yeah.""Better get the scotch. No, it's for you.""Really""You think I want your hands shakin' like last time? This is my face we're talkin' about. Go ahead. Take a... just a little sip.""Uh! Ah, it burns!"

2878.author: Matt Murdock  and Jack Murdock
2878.quote: "It ain't how you hit the mat.""It's how you get up."

2879.author: Matt Murdock and Jack Murdock
2879.quote: "I'm working on it. Each grid is six possible dots, so each letter is a combination of those dots. You have to feel for what's not there as much as what is.""That doesn't make any damn sense at all.""Well, you know where a punch is going before it's thrown sometimes, right?""Clearly I don't."

2880.author: Jack Murdock and Matt Murdock
2880.quote: "Who says I'm even gonna get hit?""We're Murdocks, we get hit a lot.""Yeah, guess we do.""But we get up, right, Dad? We always get up."

2881.author: Jack Murdock and Ed
2881.quote: "Hey, it's Jack""Hey Jack.""Too late to change it?""You can change it.""Good, all on me. Win by knockout.""You sure?""Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure. Listen, you gotta do this quick. Cash out the second Creel hits the mat. Don't wait."

2882.author: Jessica Jones
2882.quote: "You know, Lexi, you remind me of a friend of mine. His dad was a boxer who got in way over his head and got himself killed. And for a long time, my friend thought his dad abandoned him, too. Until one day, he learned the truth, that his dad was actually killed because he wanted to stop being a criminal. Because he wanted his son to be proud of him."

2884.author: Jackson Brice to Prowler
2884.quote: "Now, this is crafted from a reclaimed Sub-Ultron arm straight from Sokovia. Here. You try."

2886.author: Jackson Brice to Adrian Toomes
2886.quote: "Alright. Wonder if you could afford me out there, though, right? With everything I know."

2887.author: Adrian Toomes to Herman Shultz
2887.quote: "Here. Now you're the Shocker. Go out there and find the weapon he lost."

2888.author: Jackson Brice, Prowler and Herman Schultz
2888.quote: "Now, this is crafted from a reclaimed Sub-Ultron arm straight from Sokovia. Here. You try.""I wanted something low-key. Why are you trying to upsell me, man?""Okay, okay. I got what you need, all right? I got tons of great stuff here. One sec. Okay, I got Black Hole Grenades, Chitauri railguns...""You letting off shots in public now? Hurry up. Look, times are changing. We're the only ones selling these high-tech weapons.""I need something to stick up somebody. I'm not trying to shoot them back in time.""I got Antigrav climbers.""Climbers?"

2889.author: Jackson Brice, Vulture and Tinkerer
2889.quote: "Ha ha! Woo! I mean, that was badass.""How many times have I told you not to fire them out in the open?""You said to move the merchandise!""Under the radar. Under the radar! That's how we survive. If you bring Damage Control or the Avengers down here, we're through. You're out there, wearing that goofy thing, lighting up cars, calling yourself the Shocker. "I'm the Shocker. I shock people." What is this, Pro Wrestling?""Yeah, whatever, old man.""Look, I know you don't give a crap about anything, but I do. I built this whole place because there are people I have to look after.""Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.""You know what? I can't afford your bullshit. Get out of here.""What?""You're done, you're off the crew.""Yeah, alright. Alright. Wonder if you could afford me out there, though, right? With everything I know.""Excuse me?""I'm just saying, maybe your wife would like to know where you really get your money from.""You know what?""What?""You're right. That work?""I don't know.""I can't afford that."

2890.author: Randy Vale and Jackson Brice
2890.quote: "Hey chief, we still have another load from yesterday. We're supposed to turn this in, right?""I ain't hauling it."

2891.author: Adrian Toomes and Jackson Brice
2891.quote: "Oh, hey! Glad you could join us, afternoon.""My alarm didn't go off.""Yeah, yeah, yeah, your alarm. Look, just go stack that armor plating like I asked, this is a huge deal for us."

2892.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
2892.author: Jackson Norriss
2892.quote: "My name is Jackson Norris. Today will be the most important of my career: my final interview with the most infamous man in America. A man that the world thought was a terrorist called the Mandarin, but is now alleged to be nothing but an actor. Thus far, the subject has been evasive and apparently oblivious to the point of my work. In fact, he seems oblivious to pretty much everything, except his own growing celebrity status, because now the whole world knows his name...This is my last chance to get beyond his lies and excuses, to confront the subject with elements of his own past, in order to unlock the truth. Because we need to know, once and for all: who is Trevor Slattery?"

2893.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
2893.author: Jackson Norriss and Trevor Slattery
2893.quote: "I can't imagine, starting out, you'd ever thought you'd end up in some place like this.""Yeah, not bad, eh? That whole "rolling on people" thing gets you the VIP treatment.""It looks like you're living comfortably.""There are things that I miss. Ketamine, obviously. And the birds. But you know, you make do in that department. I mean, we've all been to drama school, have we not? You know what I'm saying?""Okay, look, Trevor, this is our last day. Okay?""Last day?""Yes, finally. And we've covered a lot of the logistics. Your recruitment by Aldrich Killian, the creation of an amalgam warlord by his think tank...""Whom I brought to life. Carry on.""The one question that most people ask me when I tell them that I know you is that, "How could he have not known what was going on?"""Three little words.""Hmm?"""Lovely. Drugs."""Okay. To bring this film to a close, I'd like to know more about the man behind the mask. The real Trevor Slattery. You know, with all the Internet gossip and tabloid exposés, not much is known about you personally.""Well, I think that an actor does better to keep a shred of mystery, otherwise, you know, it can colour the audience's perception. What have you got there?""I found this in the vaults of an English newspaper called The Liverpool Echo. That's you and your mother, right?""Yeah, it is. October 12th, 1964. That was the day I landed my first role. Boatswain 1, Shakespeare's Tempest. Obviously, I told her it was the lead. I always was a bloody great liar.""So, I assume the two of you were close.""She was everything to me.""She passed in 1986, but you weren't there when she ""No, I wasn't. I was here in America for my big break. And this would be the TV pilot for the CBS network. Caged Heat. Wonderful piece, about avenging Russian police cop with anger issues let loose on Los Angeles. I wish I had a copy. I wish I had copy.""Actually, Trevor, I managed to find some footage of that as well.""Oh, oh, oh. Handsome lad. Handsome lad. Yeah, it's compelling. Sean Connery made a pass at me once. Everyone on the set called him "Mr. Connery." He called me "Trev." "You're very talented, Trev."""That's fascinating. Was that a monkey drinking vodka?""Yes. Yes! And still those knobs at the network didn't pick it up. I think it was too sophisticated for them.""Hmm.""That was the break that broke me.""Well, right there. You seem to typify your life as a series of missed opportunities, but yet, you don't tend to take responsibility for many of them.""My responsibility is to my muse. I'm an actor, love, not a bloody rocket surgeon.""Hmm. But, possibly, your portrayal has angered some people. I mean, some whom are very dangerous.""You don't have to tell me, mate. I've seen those bloody Internet message boards. Vicious.""I'm not talking about the message boards. I'm talking about the Ten Rings.""Come again?""The terrorist group historically associated with the Mandarin. Officially they're dormant, but evidence suggests that they're becoming more active.""What, the Ten Rings? Are they real?""It's well documented.""That is so cool."

2894.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
2894.author: Jackson Norriss and Trevor Slattery
2894.quote: "Trevor, you told me that when you got this role that you'd researched it thoroughly.""Yeah, but when an actor tells you he's "done the research" it means he's switched on his computer, googled his own name and had a quick wank."

2895.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
2895.author: Jackson Norriss and Trevor Slattery
2895.quote: "So, you mean to tell me that you don't know the history of the Mandarin himself. He was a warrior-king. Inspired generations of men through the Middle Ages, perhaps even further back in time.""Blah, blah, blah. Who bloody cares, mate? It's a show people want and I gave them a good one. It's not the Mandarin they'll remember. It's the name "Trevor Slattery". It's the brand. "Trev".""You're right. And for that sin you will soon suffer horribly with a hole in your body for every ring of our faith.""So...Sorry. What?""You heard me."

2896.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
2896.author: Trevor Slattery and Jackson Norriss
2896.quote: "You killed my butler.""You're not capable of pulling that trigger, Mr. Slattery.""I'm an out of work actor, love. You have no idea what I'm capable of. And, thanks to the CBS network, I'm pretty good with a handgun. Oh...""Consider this a lesson in what's real and what's not.""Why do people keep pointing guns at my head? Please. I don't want to die. I don't want to die.""Target acquired and in position. Extraction unit, mobilize. I'm not the one that's going to kill you, Mr. Slattery. I'm here to break you out.""That's nice...""Not really. You see, there's somebody who wants to meet you.""Do I know him?""No, but you took his name. And now he wants it back.""Oh... No. Sorry. I still don't get it."

2897.author: Yo-Yo Rodriguez and James Davis
2897.quote: "How's your wife, Davis?""Getting bigger every day.""Oh. Don't tell her that.""More beautiful every day."

2898.author: LT Koenig to Davis
2898.quote: "Agent LT Koenig. Sorry about kicking your candy ass."

2899.author: Daisy Johnson, James Davis, Sam Koenig, Billy Koenig and LT Koenig
2899.quote: "Sam and Billy were part of the original LMD program.""Wait. Are you saying they're...""Obsolete. Without a doubt.""So you all are?""Technicians.""What? You thought they were robots?"

2900.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons and James Davis
2900.quote: "What, you're gonna go take on a killer android?""I'll take Davis.""Concern only slightly lessened.""Thanks."

2901.author: Daisy Johnson and James Davis
2901.quote: "Davis! Try any evasive maneuver you can!""Not the only genius to think of that, thanks, but this thing also moves like a tank, so everybody get off my back!"

2902.author: Kim and James Davis
2902.quote: "So, is this normal?""A weird mission? Yeah. The fighting? That's new."

2903.author: Piper and James Davis
2903.quote: "This is insane. I mean, it's a miracle you survived all that with just one scar?""Yeah.""You tell everyone that story?""I don't think they care."

2904.movie: The One Who Will Save Us All
2904.author: Deke Shaw and James Davis
2904.quote: "I just need to get out of the Lighthouse.""So you're going on a space mission to a hostile alien ship?"

2905.author: Piper and James Davis
2905.quote: "I mean, one more week with Davis and we will find a dead body. His.""Yes, because one more week with you and I will definitely kill myself."

2906.author: Jemma Simmons and James Davis
2906.quote: "We don't need to whisper. Sound can't travel in a vacuum.""It makes me feel better."

2907.author: James Davis and Piper
2907.quote: "Looks like we've been spotted.""No. I don't think so.""Well, you've always been dumb as a bag of bricks.""I'll put money on it.""Of course you will, because if I win, we'll be dead and you won't have to pay me."

2908.movie: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
2908.author: Piper and James Davis
2908.quote: "What is wrong with you?""I ate the yummies. Oh.""Who else had them?""Daisy, Simmons, all those giraffes."

2909.author: James Davis
2909.quote: "I never thought I'd be so happy to see this dirty, old place"

2910.author: Enoch, James Davis and Piper
2910.quote: "I have become a cautionary tale used to steer children away from a life of crime and excess.""Would it be rude to turn him off? His constant complaining is giving me a headache.""Yeah, well, you are the Puff-Head who got high and shot up our super-threatening fuse box, so...""Never mind. Sorry, I was wrong. The source of the headache is Piper. Definitely Piper."

2911.author: James Davis and Piper
2911.quote: "Don't lock us in here. We hardly even know that Enoch.""Yeah, and my buddy here is nursing a wicked hangover."

2912.author: Davis and Piper
2912.quote: "You're not even trying.""Yeah, speak for yourself.""Then why am I the only one sweating?""It's 'cause you haven't worked out in weeks, and it's starting to show."

2913.author: James Davis and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
2913.quote: "After I blacked out, she was the first thing I saw when I came to. So I was in bad shape... she was cool about it. Sweet, really.""Melinda May was sweet? Is there a different meaning for that word?"

2914.author: James Wesley and Clyde Farnum
2914.quote: "Now you see this man here? If we're being honest with each other Mr. Farnum, I find his methods... unpleasant. But such are the times we live in... Give us a wave Mr. Rance.""I told you, I will get you the money.""Such a small sum is of little interest to my employer, your position however, that's something we can work with."

2915.author: Vladimir Ranskahov and James Wesley
2915.quote: "We do not deal with lapdogs. Tell Mr.—""We don't say his name."

2916.author: James Wesley and Vladimir Ranskahov
2916.quote: "My employer will be... displeased, we're being inconvenienced by a lone vigilante.""Then he should tell me to my face!""This is on you, deal with it, quietly."

2917.author: James Wesley to Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
2917.quote: "I assure you, all my employer wants is for you to continue to be ethical decent men. Good lawyers. And for that, for nothing more than your exceptional skills and your discretion, you'll be fairly compensated."

2918.author: John Healy to Matt Murdock and Foggy Nelson
2918.quote: "And, uh, as for the man who hired you, all you need to know is his check's gonna clear."

2919.author: James Wesley and Matt Murdock
2919.quote: "You set up shop right here in your backyard. Despite the fact that both of you were made a very lucrative offer from Landman and Zack in Manhattan where you interned.""You've done your homework.""My employer expects no less."

2920.author: James Wesley and Matt Murdock
2920.quote: "Your partner doesn't seem convinced.""Like Foggy said, we're particular about our clientele.""I'm curious about your clientele. Do they all work for you when you get them off for murder or just the pretty ones?"

2921.author: James Wesley to Anatoly and Vladimir Ranskahov
2921.quote: "Maybe if he had an iron suit or a magic hammer that would explain why you keep getting your asses handed to you."

2922.author: James Wesley to Anatoly Ranskahov
2922.quote: "They say the past is etched in stone, but it isn't... It's smoke trapped in a closed room, swirling, changing, buffeted by the passing of years and wishful thinking. Even though our perception of it changes, one thing remains constant: the past can never be completely erased, it lingers like the scent of burning wood."

2923.author: Vladimir Ranskahov, James Wesey, and Anatoly Ranskahov
2923.quote: "Do you know what he was asking? This fool who laid hands on my brother?""Not my concern.""It should be. He was asking about your employer by name.""All the more reason to settle this. You sneeze, we all catch a cold. Madame Gao and Mr. Nobu have expressed their disappointment.""We have not heard of this.""Hm, that's because we've been talking behind your back."

2924.author: James Wesley and Vladimir Ranskahov
2924.quote: "He practically kissed me when we agreed to terms, he have a girl or a boy he might be celebrating with, you try his cell?""He does not answer.""Try again, we need to lock this down and get distribution back to acceptable levels."

2925.author: Turk Barrett and James Wesley
2925.quote: "Why all that with planting the mask, why not blow him up from the start if that's what you were gonna do?""It takes time to arrange something like this and help from friends. We needed to keep Vladimir off balance until everything was in place."

2926.author: James Wesley and Wilson Fisk
2926.quote: "What do Nobu and his men bring to the table, what are they in all of this?""Necessary evil.""I just, I don't like the way he speaks to you, that's all. Espically now when everythings going our way."

2927.author: James Wesley and Wilson Fisk
2927.quote: "Right after Hoffman injected Blake he was incapacitated by our Masked Friend.""While Blake was still alive?""And talking, according to Hoffman."

2928.author: James Wesley and Wilson Fisk
2928.quote: "She's coming to you, now.""Can you be here before she arrives?""I'm already on my way.""Thank you Wesley."

2929.author: Wilson Fisk and James Wesley
2929.quote: "If I needed you I would have asked.""I don't think that's always true sir."

2930.author: James Wesley and Nobu Yoshioka
2930.quote: "He doesn't care for the accommodations.""Misspeak my words again, and I will have your tongue."

2931.author: James Wesley and Leland Owlsley
2931.quote: "Hm, You weren't particularly fond of Nobu, you thought he was unsettling if I recall.""I think you're unsettling half the time."

2932.author: James Wesley to Karen Page
2932.quote: "But you won't be the first to die, Miss Page. No I think Mr. Urich will have that honor, then we'll go to your place of employment, see to Mr. Nelson, Mr. Murdock. After that your friends, family, everyone you've ever cared about and when you have no tears left to shed then, then we'll come for you, Miss Page."

2933.author: Wilson Fisk and James Wesley
2933.quote: "If she dies...""Rosenberg's in from Hartford and she's strong, we've all seen that.""Yes...""Leland thinks it might have been Nobu's men."

2934.author: James Wesley and Karen Page
2934.quote: "Do you really think I would put a loaded gun on the table where you could reach it?""I don't know. Do you really think this is the first time I've shot someone?"

2936.author: Erik Selvig, Darcy Lewis, and Jane Foster
2936.quote: "I thought you were a scientist.""Political science.""She was the only applicant."

2937.author: Erik Selvig and Jane Foster
2937.quote: "I'm talking about science, not magic.""Well, "magic's just science we don't understand yet." Arthur C. Clarke.""Who wrote science-fiction.""A precursor to science fact!"

2938.author: Thor and Jane Foster
2938.quote: "Once I retrieve Mjølnir, I will return to you the items they stole from you. Deal?""No. You think you're gonna just walk in, get our stuff, and walk out?""No. I'm gonna fly out."

2939.author: Jane Foster, Erik Selvig and Darcy Lewis
2939.quote: "Where'd you find this?""The children's section. I just wanted to show you how silly his story was.""But you're the one who's always pushing me to chase down every possibility, every alternative.""I'm talking about science, not Magic.""Well, "magic's just science we don't understand yet." Arthur C. Clarke.""Who wrote science-fiction.""A precursor to science fact!""In some cases, yeah.""Well, if there's an Einstein-Rosen bridge, then there's something on the other side. And advanced beings could have crossed it!""Oh, Jane.""A primitive culture like the Vikings might have worshiped them as deities.""Yes! Yes, exactly. Thank you. "

2940.author: Phil Coulson to Thor
2940.quote: "As soon as Loki took the doctor, we moved Jane Foster. We've got an excellent observatory in Tromsø. She was asked to consult there very suddenly yesterday. Handsome fee, private plane, very remote. She'll be safe."

2941.author: Jane Foster
2941.quote: "Thor was here and he just left again. No message, nothing. Not a word. All the work I did was for nothing. So that's it. I'm done."

2942.author: Odin and Jane Foster
2942.quote: "She does not belong here in Asgard any more than a goat belongs at a banquet table!""Did he just...? Who do you think you are?""I am Odin. King of Asgard. Protector of the Nine Realms.""Oh. Well I'm...""I know very well who you are, Jane Foster.""You told your dad about me?"

2943.author: Jane Foster and Thor
2943.quote: "It's all my fault. If I hadn't found the Aether, your mother and brother would still be alive...""But if you hadn't come across it, Malekith would have found it quicker."

2944.author: Maria Hill, Tony Stark, and Thor
2944.quote: "What about Jane? Where are the ladies, gentlemen?""Ms Potts has a company to run.""Yes, I'm not even sure what country Jane's in. Her work on the Convergence has made her the world's foremost astronomer.""And the company that Pepper runs is the largest tech conglomerate on Earth. It's pretty exciting.""There's even talk of Jane getting a... um... a Nobel Prize.""Yeah, they- they must be busy because they'd hate missing you guys get together. Testosterone!"

2945.author: Fan and Thor
2945.quote: "Sorry to hear that Jane dumped you”“She didn’t dump me, you know, I dumped her. It was a mutual dumping."

2946.author: Thor
2946.quote: "So Jane... Oh, there she is. That's Jane. She's... an old flame of mine. She... she stuck her hand inside a rock this one time, and then the Aether stuck itself inside her."

2947.author: Thor to the Avengers
2947.quote: "We were dating at the time, you see. I got to introduce her to my mother... who's dead. And, oh, you know, Jane and I aren't even dating anymore. These things happen though, you know. Nothing lasts forever. I'm not done yet. The only thing permanent in life is impermanence."

2948.author: Jane Foster to Maiden
2948.quote: "Do you have anything with pants?""Pants?""Never mind. These will be fine. Thanks."

2949.author: Jemma Simmons
2949.quote: "These are the same readings Dr. Selvig and Dr. Foster picked up in New Mexico and in London. They herald the arrival of an Asgardian."

2950.author: Robert Minoru, Janet Stein and Victor Stein
2950.quote: "Hey, Janet, have you done something different with your hair?""Thank you for noticing, Robert.""Forgive me if I'm too busy changing the world to notice that your bangs have grown out."

2951.author: Janet Stein to Robert Minoru
2951.quote: "It's good to hear your voice. I can't wait to see you tonight even with him there."

2952.author: Chase Stein and Janet Stein
2952.quote: "It'll all be over soon. In another year I'll be off to college, and I'll never have to see his smug dickface again.""Chase, he's your father.""Oh, right. My bad. He slammed a fork into the table this morning instead of my head. So, yeah, progress.""He hasn't laid a finger on you in a while now.""Yeah, 'cause he knows if he tried, I'd kick his ass.""I'm not saying he isn't difficult, but that's the price of having a mind like his.""I love you, Mom, I do, but Dad is a first-class, grade-A, platinum-card-carrying asshole. That's his genius. Who's calling you? I thought Dad didn't let you have friends."

2953.author: Janet Stein and Victor Stein
2953.quote: "Maybe you could reach out to someone? Fresh perspective might be good. It's okay to ask for help.""Help? Is that a joke? Who could possibly be able to help me? I'm sorry, Janet, I'm just under a tremendous amount of pressure, not that that's an excuse."

2954.author: Robert Minoru and Janet Stein
2954.quote: "I'm not sure why it would cause a power surge. It's not like it's plugged into a wall.""It's a lot of energy swirling around. Who knows."

2955.author: Leslie Dean and Tina Minoru
2955.quote: "Have you spoken to Victor?""He's not picking up his phone. Neither is his idiot wife. Or my idiot husband."

2956.author: Janet Stein and Victor Stein
2956.quote: "You were having trouble with the box yesterday, and it kind of seemed like maybe it wasn't the box that was the problem.""I need you on my side, Janet. I carry you. I carry this whole family, and the least you could possibly do is give me some support."

2957.author: Robert Minoru and Janet Stein
2957.quote: "I'm ready to start living my life with you. I'm ready to tell Tina.""But we never talked about Taking things to the next level?""I have to make sure that none of this blows back on Chase.""And then there's PRIDE.""PRIDE won't matter for much longer. We're about to break ground, be done with this thing. Then we'll finally be able to start putting ourselves first.""I just I just need some time to process, that's all."

2958.author: Geoffrey Wilder and Janet Stein
2958.quote: "Why not just tell us the box wasn't working?""He wanted to, but I talked him out of it. I was sure that he fixed it."

2959.author: Victor Stein
2959.quote: "Everyone knows I'm a genius. Although here's a question my superior intellect is of no help in solving. What should I do about the fact that my wife is sleeping with another man? That's right, Janet. I know everything. Any of you know how easy it is to hack a cell phone? You'd think that the man she's banging would. After all, he helped create the phone. Isn't that right, Robert?"

2960.author: Chase Stein and Nico Minoru
2960.quote: "You hear about our parents? They're having an affair.""What? My mom and your dad?""No, my mom and...""Oh, my God, and my mom?""No, my mom, your dad."

2961.author: Robert Minoru and Janet Stein
2961.quote: "Jaguar on the side of the road, or the cougar parked inside!""Really, Robert?""Sorry. I meant it as a compliment.""Of course you did, because you are the sweetest man I have ever met.""Well, you married Victor Stein. You're working off a limited sample size.""True, although lately Victor's been a different guy. Nice to me, great with Chase. Cheating's much harder when your husband isn't being a dick.""That's why now is when you tell him, not when he's in a manic phase, or violent.""I never said he was violent.""You didn't have to. You think I didn't notice the bruises? The ones you blamed on the car door? Walking into the chair?""I know, I'm sorry. I never meant to keep anything from you. I just...""None of this is your fault. He's a monster, Janet.""And how do you think he'll react when I tell him I'm leaving him?""That's why I got this.""That's a little extreme, Robert.""It's just a precaution. You can't go on living like this."

2962.author: Chase Stein, Janet Stein and Victor Stein
2962.quote: "No, you're not okay. You've got a brain tumor.""What? The headaches... And you knew?""He told me not to tell. We've been working together on a project.""Don't blame Chase. I'm his dad.""Victor, if I had known... If you let me in...""Get away from me.""But you're sick. You need help. All this time...""Mom. He wants you to leave."

2963.author: Nico Minoru and Robert Minoru
2963.quote: "You could work it out.""We could, but it's not what I want, Nico. Not anymore.""What, I mean, you're, like, in love with Janet Stein? I mean, come on. Oh, my God, you're in love with Janet Stein."

2964.author: Chase Stein and Janet Stein
2964.quote: "I thought the side effects of new meds involved mild nausea and swollen ankles, not a complete personality change. What the hell kind of medicine did that guy give him?""I have no idea. I'm just glad it's working. I keep waiting for the old Victor to return.""Well, maybe we'll get lucky and he won't. Though that would make it harder for you to leave.""If I wanted to walk out, your father has given me more than enough excuses.""So, you're no longer into married software engineers with a fondness for mandals?""Robert was kind when my life was short on kindness. It was an escape, nothing more.""Meanwhile, Dad was dying of a brain tumor, and you didn't notice.""I feel terrible that I missed the signs, but I've suffered a long time trying to hold us all together. So, if there's a chance we can be a happy family again, I'm not gonna let anything stand in our way."

2965.author: Victor Stein and Janet Stein
2965.quote: "Do you think this is made with agave?""Are you Stacey Yorkes all of a sudden?""Well, processed sugar's the devil's jet fuel."

2966.author: Leslie Dean and Janet Stein
2966.quote: "I'm glad to hear Victor's taking care of his health. Now I need to know that you're focused on the health of your marriage.""And why do you need to know that? PRIDE isn't the only thing that's happening in the world.""But it's the most important. Not just for us, but for all of us.""I think that you can leave the rest of humanity out of my extramarital affair, thank you. I was sad. I was lonely. So was Robert. It happened. And it's over.""You'll tell him that.""Unless you'd like to."

2967.author: Robert Minoru and Janet Stein
2967.quote: "I don't understand why you're not returning my calls.""Oh, come on. Robert, we both know how hard this has been. For both of us. But now that it's all out in the open, we can move forward.""What?""When I think about it, it was such a dumb dream. I was gonna spend my life doing research on gravitational fields. Even just saying that out loud, it sounds really embarrassing.""It's not! You could go back to that.""No, I don't think I could. I'm Janet Stein now. For better or worse. Remember that vow?""When he hurts you - and Chase""Not anymore. He's changed.""But you are locked in a cycle of abuse. This is how it always goes.""I appreciate that you've clearly read a number of scholarly articles and self-help books, but this situation is impossible to understand from the outside, so I'm not gonna try to explain it. I've been given an extra moment. I'm gonna take it. Goodbye, Robert."

2968.author: Tina Minoru and Chase Stein
2968.quote: "Can't exactly call the police or paramedics unless you want your mother taken away in handcuffs.""She saved me!""She was also having an affair, and shot her husband using a gun registered to her lover."

2969.author: Janet Stein, Jonah, Tina Minoru, Catherine Wilder, Geoffrey Wilder, Leslie Dean, Dale Yorkes and Stacey Yorkes
2969.quote: "Actually, this is all your fault! Whatever Jonah juice he injected into Victor did something to him, something terrible, so if anyone is to blame here, it's you!""We both know that's not gonna happen. Nice try, though.""No offense, Janet, but the team can survive without you. It's not like you ever really brought anything to the table.""Is that really necessary?""No, no, it's okay. I'm glad she finally said it to my face. You've always judged me for being a stay-at-home mom, but the truth is, I could've done something else. I could've invented something and changed the world, but instead my life became about managing the brilliant Victor Stein. So you guys, you all took Jonah's gifts and you got success and fame, and I got an abusive megalomaniac!""We know Victor wasn't easy, but if you'd come to us before, we could've helped.""Really? Would any of you have actually stood up to him?""I guess now we'll never know.""You know what? Shut up, Catherine!""It's time to embrace the light, Janet.""What about Dale? Look at Dale. What's so great about Dale? What's Dale ever done for PRIDE?""Research that's proven crucial to our mission, not to mention patenting a mind-wipe drug that everyone here's found pretty valuable.""Um, we developed that patent together, in case anybody was gonna vote against me.""We did. Of course.""But when push came to shove, neither one of you could save Victor.""We only needed to save Victor because you shot him, Janet."

2970.author: Robert Minoru and Janet Stein
2970.quote: "You don't need to do this.""Yes, I actually do. This is what's best for everyone.""Not for me.""Oh, that's sweet. You're sweet, but this is this is my time.""Then you should at least get to say goodbye. He's gonna miss you terribly.""How am I even supposed to face him, let alone say goodbye?""Think about what it'll do to him if he never gets to have that moment."

2971.author: Janet Stein, Jonah and Catherine Wilder
2971.quote: "I have to say goodbye to my son.""Absolutely not.""I'm not gonna tell him anything. I just want to hug him for a final time. He's my baby. Please.""She deserves that chance. That's what we would want."

2972.author: Janet Stein to Chase Stein upon Jonah's arrival

2973.author: Janet Stein and Chase Stein
2973.quote: "Does my voice really sound like that?""When you lie, yeah, it does. Where is he? What is happening with Dad?""They took him.""Oh, so he could be dead?""I don't think so. The man who's taking care of him is very invested in his recovery.""Jonah? What the hell is that guy's story?""Chase, I know that this is the most difficult thing that you have ever been through, but I am begging you, do not ask questions. The less you know, the better, about Jonah, about PRIDE, about your father. Just do not rock the boat in any way. Making waves is only gonna...""Put Dad in jeopardy, I get it.""I was gonna say put you in harm's way. Losing my husband, I could survive. But losing my son, I could not.""What? You're actually worried that I might die? Who are these people, really?""They're no one you need to worry about if you just listen to me.""Okay, but Mom, how did we get here? How do we make it stop?""I wish I knew. But I need you to be careful. Can you just promise me, just please be careful?""Okay."

2974.author: Chase Stein and Janet Stein
2974.quote: "Mom, what are you doing? There's no need to involve the housekeeper in any of this.""PRIDE doesn't have a cleaner? I thought every group of shadeball criminals had one.""I think my membership's been revoked until your father's back on his feet. Turns out they didn't appreciate me for me."

2975.author: Leslie Dean, Nico Minoru, Robert Minoru and Janet Stein
2975.quote: "We promise you, everything we've done, we've done for you.""How can you even say that?""Because it's true.""We love you."

2976.author: Dale Yorkes, Stacey Yorkes and Tina Minoru
2976.quote: "I'm not sure if there's anything to talk about, Leslie.""Yeah, trust level is pretty low right now.""It's less than zero, and I'm not just talking about me and Janet."

2977.author: Janet Stein and Stacey Yorkes
2977.quote: "Did you two know that Molly had that strength?""No! We were shocked.""And how do we know that Jonah isn't her father, too?"

2978.author: Geoffrey Wilder and Janet Stein
2978.quote: "The kids have pieced at least some of this together. That's why they were at the dig site.""We have put them in so much danger!"

2979.author: Janet Stein and Geoffrey Wilder
2979.quote: "What about the kids?""If we turn the cops on them, they'll just think they're in trouble. Make them even less likely to come home."

2980.author: Leslie Dean and Janet Stein
2980.quote: "Jonah needs Victor healthy. He said as much. He's not gonna let him die. It's your call. If you want out...""No. Tina's right. I'm here."

2981.author: Mitchell Carson, Hank Pym, and Peggy Carter
2981.quote: "If only you'd protected Janet with such ferocity, Doctor Pym.""Ah...""Easy, Hank!""You mention my wife again, and I'll show you ferocity.""Don't look at me. You said it."

2982.author: Hank Pym about Hope van Dyne
2982.quote: "Before Hope lost her mother, she used to look at me like I was the greatest man in the world. And now she looks at me and it's just disappointment."

2983.author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
2983.quote: "You know when my mother died I didn't see him for two weeks?""He was in grief.""Yeah, so was I, and I was seven. And he never came back, not in any way that counted. He just sent me off to boarding school."

2984.author: Hank Pym and Hope van Dyne
2984.quote: "Gone forever. Telling you that she wasn't coming home, was the hardest thing that I ever had to do. But then Scott showed up...or should I say, broke into our house. And when he went to the Quantum Realm... he came back, everything changed. I started to wonder...could your mother still be alive? So I dusted off some old plans.""Dad, what are you saying?""I think it's possible to bring her back."

2985.author: Bill Foster and Hank Pym
2985.quote: "For the last thirty years, she's been down there absorbing quantum energy. We can extract that energy. We can use it to repair Ava's molecular structure-""Extract it?""Yes!""Are you insane?! That would rip Janet apart!""You don't know that. I'm gonna fire up your Tunnel. When Janet's location pops into Lang's head, he's gonna give it to me or I'm gonna turn him over to the FBI."

2986.author: Phil Coulson and Jasper Sitwell
2986.quote: "What have we got?""There's a massive electric magnetic surge coming off that thing, systems are barely coping."

2987.author: Jasper Sitwell and Phil Coulson
2987.quote: "We got a hit, 62% match. Wait, cross check 79%.""Location?""Stuttgart, Germany. 28 Koenigstrasse. He's not exactly hiding."

2989.author: Jasper Sitwell
2989.quote: "Whatever your op is, bury it. This is level one. Contact DOT. All traffic lights in the district go red. Shut all runways at BWI, IAD and Reagan. All security cameras in the city go through this monitor, right here. Scan all open sources. Phones, computers, PDA’s, whatever. If someone tweets about this guy, I want to know about it."

2990.author: Jasper Sitwell and Captain America
2990.quote: "Is this little display meant to insinuate that you're gonna throw me off the roof? 'Cause it’s really not your style, Rogers.""You’re right. It’s not. It’s hers."

2991.author: Jasper Sitwell and Captain America
2991.quote: "The 21st century is a digital book. Zola taught HYDRA how to read it. Your bank records, medical histories, voting patterns, emails, phone calls, your damn SAT scores! Zola's algorithm evaluates people's past to predict their future.""What then?""Oh God, Pierce is gonna kill me.""What then?!""Then the Insight helicarriers scratch people off the list... a few million at a time."

2992.author: Steve Rogers and Jasper Sitwell
2992.quote: "We'll use him to bypass the DNA scans and access the Helicarriers directly.""What?! Are you crazy? That is a terrible, terrible idea."

2993.author: Jasper Sitwell and Black Widow
2993.quote: "We can take that off your hands."By all means. Careful with that thing."

2994.author: Jasper Sitwell to Alexander Pierce
2994.quote: "Evidence secure. We're en route to Dr. List."

2995.author: Jasper Sitwell and Captain America
2995.quote: "I'm going to have to call the Director.""That's okay. Trust me. Hail HYDRA."

2996.author: Phil Coulson and Jasper Sitwell
2996.quote: "What's your Clearance Level?""Funny, it's level six, like you. Come on there's a level seven?"

2997.author: Jasper Sitwell and Phil Coulson
2997.quote: "I got it. We send a patsy to sabotage the debrief.""A patsy?""Yes. Someone to screw it up, someone so inept that General Ross will refuse to release Blonsky. I can do it. I can do a great patsy.""Yes, you do; your patsy is legendary."

2998.author: Felix Blake and Jasper Sitwell
2998.quote: "I don't think you're taking this assignment very seriously.""That's funny. I was just thinking the same thing about you. While you've been in here gathering video clips, I've been out investigating."

2999.author: Jasper Sitwell and Jemma Simmons
2999.quote: "Do you have authorization to access that panel?""Of course, I certainly have it right here in my bag. He's on to me.""Are you on coms with someone? This is Agent Sitwell, I need..."

3000.author: Victoria Hand and Skye
3000.quote: "You're the consultant. The one who shot Agent Sitwell.""Technically, that wasn't me."

3002.author: Victoria Hand to Jasper Sitwell
3002.quote: "Agent Sitwell, I just received word from the Triskelion. You have orders to report to the

3003.author: John Garrett to the undercover agents surrounding him
3003.quote: "Gentlemen, I know Agent Sitwell was in charge of filling your ranks, so at least a few of you know what to do in this situation."

3005.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3005.quote: "Whoa, whoa, whoa! Watch it, that's the Night-Night Gun!""Well, it's on my stuff, it doesn't work and there's no way we're calling it the "Night-Night Gun.""The bullets work. Non-lethal, heavy stopping power, break up under the sub-cutaneous tissue--""Oh, with a dose of .1 microliters of dendrotoxin. I'm not Hermione. I can't create instant paralysis with that!"

3006.author: Leo Fitz, Grant Ward and Jemma Simmons
3006.quote: "We're gonna have this new 'Night-Night' pistol working in no time, okay?""Great. One thing. We're not calling it that.""Told you.""Yes, we-- Yes, we are."

3007.author: Jemma Simmons to Leo Fitz
3007.quote: "It's science, Fitz! I have to dissect something!"

3008.author: Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3008.quote: "What's Fitz doing over there?""He detected a strange energy coming off the body.""It's the smell!""There's no shame in it Fitz, it's perfectly natural to be afraid.""No, the only thing I'm afraid of is putrid decaying flesh corrupting my pristine workspace! Do you remember what happened the last time you brought a dead thing into the lab?""Oh not the stupid cat again, and it's our lab, not yours!""No, the cat. Tell him about the cat! You left it's liver next to my lunch!"

3009.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3009.quote: "Don't you dare act like these last few months haven't been the highlight of your entire pasty life.""Pasty? Oh, really? Well, when did you become so sun-kissed? Because I'm pretty sure that every minute of every day, you've been stuck in a lab right beside me. At the Academy, Sci-Ops, this plane, you've been right beside me the whole damn time!"

3010.author: Jemma Simmons to Jasper Sitwell
3010.quote: "You... certainly have a gorgeous head, don't you? I like men who are about my height but heavier than me."

3011.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3011.quote: "Um, anything exciting happen at the Hub?""I shot a superior officer in the chest."

3012.author: Jemma Simmons
3012.quote: "In ancient times, people believed the heavens were filled with gods and monsters and magical worlds. Then, as time passed, those beliefs faded into myth and folklore. But now we know the stories were true. Other worlds, with names like Asgard, do exist. And beings once revered as gods, like Thor, have returned, leaving us with more questions and... an enormous mess to clean up."

3013.author: Grant Ward, Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3013.quote: "You think that's what they were researching at that lab?""Trying to create another portal, yes.""Failing, until a malfunction produced a burst of energy."

3014.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons, Grant Ward, and Skye
3014.quote: "It's not funny. I was sleeping peacefully. Very clever, Simmons.""I-I didn't do it!""Oh, well Ward. I don't appreciate-""Don't look at me!""Ok, then Skye.""No!""Well who then? The bunks should be off limits! No, don't laugh! Because I know it was one of you!""

3015.author: Mike Peterson and Jemma Simmons
3015.quote: "I have to put away four times what I used to, just to keep my energy up.""Oh, and after you use your strength?""Maybe ten times the food? Then I usually crash afterwards. It's really hard on my body.""Hard. Body. Got it."

3016.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3016.quote: "Bet there aren't any flowered dresses where she's going.""Amen to that, sister."

3017.author: Donnie Gill and Leo Fitz
3017.quote: "It's true what the other guys say-- you are the smartest person to come through here.""Is that what they say? Yeah, well, Simmons is probably smarter, technically, but that's because she likes homework more than life itself."

3018.author: Grant Ward, Jemma Simmons, and Skye
3018.quote: "It's strategic.""It's adorable.""The Tin Man has a heart after all."

3019.author: Jemma Simmons to Phil Coulson
3019.quote: "I'm getting into character. My undercover persona harbors some residual resentment to her absent American father."

3020.author: Jemma Simmons and Phil Coulson while undercover
3020.quote: "You never had any time for her, but you made time for your work. And your prostitutes!""Prostitutes? Plural?"

3022.author: John Garrett to Phil Coulson
3022.quote: "My man Trip's got eyes for that biotech gal of yours."

3023.author: Jemma Simmons
3023.quote: "These are the same readings Dr. Selvig and Dr. Foster picked up in New Mexico and in London. They herald the arrival of an Asgardian."

3024.author: Jemma Simmons
3024.quote: "I have a duty to you, sir, as my commanding officer. But I also have a duty as a S.H.I.E.L.D. scientist to pursue this, to save lives!"

3025.author: Phil Coulson and Jemma Simmons
3025.quote: "No. That's an order.""That's not a good-enough reason!"

3026.author: Jemma Simmons and Victoria Hand
3026.quote: "He is a good man!""He's a liar!"

3027.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
3027.author: Eric Koenig and Leo Fitz
3027.quote: "You're stranded on a desert island alone. Sitting in the sand is a box. What's in the box?""How big is the box?""Just say the first answer that comes into your mind.""Simmons."

3028.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
3028.author: Grant Ward and Leo Fitz
3028.quote: "You sure this is about him? Not about Simmons?""What the hell does that mean?""Everything is falling apart around us. We don't know how it'll end. If there's something you want to tell her, don't wait."

3029.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
3029.author: Eric Koenig and Jemma Simmons
3029.quote: "You're stranded on a desert island alone. Sitting in the sand is a box. What's in the box?""That's a hard one, let me think... The TARDIS."

3030.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
3030.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3030.quote: "We need to talk.""We do?""Agent Triplett thinks he's done something to upset you. Fitz, if you're questioning his loyalty in any way, I can assure you-""It's not him.""Well, what is it, then?""Uh, you know how I can be. I hate change."

3031.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3031.quote: "Must be some reason why Ward did it. Maybe they brainwashed him.""Don't know. Some people are just evil.""I'd rather not believe that.""It's true. I just assumed we'd be better at spotting it.""Tell me that you're not Hydra.""What?""I know that it's ridiculous, but I just need to hear you say it.""I'm not Hydra.""Yeah, good. Good. And I- 'cause I'm not, either.""Of course not.""Yeah. Because if, if you ever did, I wouldn't... I don't know what I would do.""You'll never have to find out."

3032.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3032.quote: "Why would you make me do this? You're my best friend in the world!""Yeah, you're more than that Jemma. I couldn't find the courage to tell you... so please... let me show you."

3033.author: Phil Coulson
3033.quote: "Fitz said he could engineer cloaking, but I'm afraid he can't do anything. The damage to his temporal lobe was too extensive. He's not the same, and since Simmons left, he's only getting worse."

3034.author: Phil Coulson
3034.quote: "Simmons said she thought he'd be better without her here, but her leaving just broke him."

3035.author: Jemma Simmons to HYDRA agents
3035.quote: "Where you taking me? ... Thank you, thanks very much."

3036.author: Leo Fitz
3036.quote: "So, I don't have an ex, but there was this girl that I liked, and I told her how I felt, but she didn't feel the same, so she left."

3037.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
3037.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3037.quote: "Hi, Fitz.""Simmons. Is that really you?""Of course it is. Who else would it be?"

3038.author: Jemma Simmons to Grant Ward
3038.quote: "If I ever see you again, I'll kill you."

3039.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3039.quote: "I'm trying not to treat you any differently than-" I know, but I am different. And I- and I'm I'm trying not to be, but I am. And if for some reason you can't accept it.""Oh, that's not fair. Fitz, I'm only trying to help.""You left. I needed help. I needed help with the cloaking. I needed help with, um with lots of other things, and someone to talk through, at least. You gave up on me.""I did no such thing.""You told me you were gonna go see your mum and your dad, and then you went off to... For all I- for all I know, you could- something could've- you could've been killed. And because what? Because you think I'm useless?""Of course I don't. That's not why I left.""Well, then, why?""Fitz I'm sorry."

3040.author: Jemma Simmons to Antoine Triplett
3040.quote: "You're very lucky, Trip. If they hadn't used the clotting agent on your wounds... Well let's just say I'm glad they did."

3041.author: Jemma Simmons and Bobbi Morse
3041.quote: "We were in the bottom of the ocean, in a storage pod, left for dead. And Fitz... he said something that caught me completely off-guard.""Ah, those three little words.""Yes! Well, no. I mean, not exactly. I barely had a moment to process what he said or how I felt about it, next thing I know, he's giving me the oxygen, water's rushing in and... He's ... He's laying there, in the hospital bed. He was so pale.""How long was Fitz in the coma?""Nine of the longest days of my life. When it finally broke, he couldn't speak. He just stared at me, confused. All I wanted to do was help him. All I wanted was... My best friend back.""Your best friend?""I never thought of him as anything else. That said, I can't imagine my life without him. It's all very confusing.""You've never told him any of this, have you?""Oh, lord no."

3042.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
3042.quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

3043.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3043.quote: "I won't stay long, I just need to use the microwave. I didn't want to disturb May and her ex.""Disturb them from...?""They're in the kitchen, talking.""What are they talking about? Is it about Skye's condition?""No, it was of a personal nature. Seems that May isn't a good cook.""Something Agent May doesn't excel at... interesting.""Yeah, he teased her about it... she was laughing.""Oh, he makes her laugh! Clearly she still likes him, and have you seen the way he looks at her?""Yeah, I have eyes Jemma, of course I've seen.""I wonder what happened between them, why end it?""They're a bizarre pair. He listens for a living and she doesn't speak.""True, but you know what they say about opposites."

3044.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
3044.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3044.quote: "What was in the case, Jemma?""Something to help Skye.""Because you want to change her, is that it?""Stop it. I don't want to change Skye, the Diviner did that. I'm just trying to fix her."

3045.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
3045.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3045.quote: "Things change, that's what I'm saying, so maybe if you can learn to control this then you could have Avengers level powers. Something like Captain America even.""I think it best we keep in mind the unstable nature of Skye's power. If there is an Avenger equivalent right now, I'm afraid it's the Hulk.""Well, Hulk saved the world last I checked."

3046.author: Robert Gonzales, Jemma Simmons, Bobbi Morse, and Leo Fitz
3046.quote: "Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons, the ones that got away. I had my eye on you two when you were at the academy. I wanted to recruit you, but Coulson beat me to it. I heard he actually bribed Weaver with cupcakes. Robert Gonzales.""We know who you are, and we are quite aware of your commendable reputation. Under different circumstances, we might even be flattered... Which is why this is so hard to comprehend.""Under different circumstances, we would have preferred to be invited guests, but that forced our hand. We had to take it out of play.""What's inside that's so important?""All we know is that Coulson and Fury both believed it was valuable enough or dangerous enough to protect with extreme measures.""Maybe it was their favorite recipes."

3047.author: Grant Ward, Leo Fitz, Melinda May, Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons, and Daisy Johnson
3047.quote: "Can we just address the elephant on the plane? I know. This is weird. Mistakes were made.""By you.""And people got hurt.""By you.""And I could stand here and explain again how my parents - and brother left me vulnerable...""We've all had our traumas, Ward. Didn't turn any of us into psychopaths.""Well, we all have our own ways of coping, don't we? For example, I was yours.""Watch it, Ward!""Look, I'm just saying we all made mistakes. Coulson handed me over to my abuser, thank you. Skye shot me.""After you killed how many people?""Yeah, and we were a team and a family, and you betrayed us!""I know. It's what I regret the most. Not the lying, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents I had to put down, and I'm sorry not even dropping you two in the ocean. It's this. My actions destroyed this. I'll regret that forever. 'Cause there were good times. Right? Before? I mean, for a while there, we were a good team. Weren't we?""(after a dramatic pause) I'm still happy I shot you.""Yeah, me too.""Should've aimed for the face."

3048.author: Phil Coulson and Jemma Simmons
3048.quote: "Tell me you figured out what drugs Cal took, because my gut's saying everything ever made.""I haven't fully sequenced the formula yet, if only for the multitude of trace drugs found, but my initial list includes anabolic-androgenic steroids, a liver enzyme blocker, various metabolic enhancers, methamphetamines, what appears to be gorilla testosterone, and, no lie, a drop of peppermint. I think it's an ill-conceived attempt at super strength.""Other than Cap, every attempt has been ill-conceived."

3049.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3049.quote: "You'll be careful?""I won't be careful. I'll get the job done.""Well, w-watch your back because I just saw Hunter with Bobbi, and it made me realize that I... Well, it's just that w-we never really spoke about what you said to me at the bottom of the ocean.""This? Now? You want to talk about this now?""No. We- We don't... Uh, it means a lot to me that we're friends again, and I, um, maybe when you get back, we could finally just talk about it.""It's- There's nothing to discuss, Jemma.""Maybe there is."

3050.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3050.quote: "No, I don't. You keep rambling on and on, and I still don't know what you mean.""Dinner.""Fast approaching, yes, and we'll eat it, I'm sure.""Yeah, no, no, no. But, uh, me and you ... maybe we could eat somewhere else, you know, somewhere... nice.""Oh.""Good. Okay. Uh, well, y... uh, you should come find me when you're finished here, and ... and I'll ... I'll start working on options to run by you... for that."

3051.author: Leo Fitz
3051.quote: "Okay, listen, 'cause I'm only gonna say this once. I've already lost a friend, and it may sound strange, but to get her back, I need to understand the properties of an ancient monolith."

3052.author: Yusef Hadad and Leo Fitz
3052.quote: "This woman you went to all this trouble for... You love her, yeah?""Yeah.""Only love can make a man so stupid."

3053.author: Phil Coulson
3053.quote: "You thought Simmons was trapped inside the monolith, but every instrument scan showed the stone was solid all the way through. After hearing about the Pym technologies disaster, you even thought she'd been reduced to a microscopic level. But no evidence supported that."

3054.author: Daisy Johnson, Leo Fitz, Phil Coulson, Bobbi Morse and Alphonso Mackenzie
3054.quote: "So you think the rock is a portal?""No. No, I'm proving that it's a portal, okay, to another planet, a-a very old planet a crack in space-time that carried Simmons away and carried the sand back. Which means-""She's out there. But it's been months.""Yeah?""She could be long gone from wherever this thing dropped her.""Yeah.""She could be dead.""Yes.""But we're gonna find out, aren't we?""Yeah.""You're damn right."

3055.author: Andrew Garner to Melinda May
3055.quote: "Your team pulled off a miracle today. Fitz got Simmons back. I thought you deserved to know. They think she's gonna be okay if you want to come back and see her."

3056.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3056.quote: "I can't thank you enough.""Yeah. It's a nice restaurant, isn't it?""Yeah, but for more than that, for finding me.""What else was I gonna do?""I don't know what to say.""You don't have to say anything."

3057.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3057.quote: "Why do you want to rebuild the portal, Jemma? I saw the schematics, the data, the astronomical research you've been doing, and I just can't understand it. After everything you've been through, why would you-""Because I have to get back there. And I need your help to do it. Something happened to me, Fitz, on the other side. It's time I told you the truth about everything."

3058.author: Jemma Simmons inspecting Maveth
3058.quote: "This is Dr. Jemma Simmons, updating the file on the Monolith Fitz and I have been studying. I now know that it is an alternating matter-transportation device ... portal. Quite remarkable, really. I've been transported to an unknown planet in a different solar system. Air is breathable, oxygenated. Gravity seems to be slightly stronger... or I'm very tired. No, I think it's the gravity. The terrain is barren, desert-like. Although conditions seem favorable for terrestrial organisms, there's no immediate sign of life nor any noticeable vegetation or water."

3059.author: Jemma Simmons after capturing a Tentacled Creature

3060.author: Jemma Simmons
3060.quote: "Everyone always said we could read each other's minds, Fitz. So I really need you to read mine right now. I'm alive. But I'm terribly alone and afraid. So I really need you to come and get me, okay? I know you won't give up, so I won't, either."

3061.author: Jemma Simmons to Will Daniels
3061.quote: "You were right, Will. I saw It, whatever it is. Something was out there."

3062.author: Will Daniels and Jemma Simmons
3062.quote: "That THING has been killing everyone that's come through here for centuries.""How long have people known about the Monolith? And why keep sending people when there's no way back? It's as if they're being sacrificed!"

3063.author: Jemma Simmons and Will Daniels
3063.quote: "That's more like 100 meters. Unless there was some significant earthquake...""It doesn't want us to leave."

3064.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3064.quote: "Fitz? I'm done helping Daisy. And since you're done helping Bobbie and May, I thought maybe now we could take a look at the simulation.""Um, Jemma, I've been meaning to say to you-""Look, I understand if you don't want to look into this. I'm stronger than you think.""No, no, no, no, Jemma, I have looked into it. Actually, I've run dozens of simulations, and I kept on hoping that one of them would work.""Oh.""I- I didn't want to disappoint you. The Monolith was just one option, though. We're not gonna give up, okay?""I know this isn't easy for you. It's an odd situation.""Yeah. It's one of the oddest, even for us."" Fitz, if you knew Will, you'd understand. I promise-""Jemma, that's the thing. I am gonna know him. It's not even a question."

3065.author: Jemma Simmons' recording from Maveth
3065.quote: "Fitz, hi. I don't know why I'm still talking with you why I'm recording myself. You're never gonna see this, are you? I still haven't found water, and it's, um well, I it's, uh I'm having trouble focusing, and I'm trying to stay positive. But I'm scared. I'm scared, Fitz. Do you remember when we first met? I do. You were so quiet and pasty, and so incredibly smart, handsome... Quite a strange feeling, isn't it? Never wanting to be without someone. You must have been so annoyed, me following you around all the time."

3066.author: Andrew Garner and Jemma Simmons
3066.quote: "Looks like you're heading to the lab. That's a good sign, right?""I'm trying. We're trying. Sometimes it just feels like it would've been best if I hadn't told Fitz everything.""You did the right thing in telling the truth, Jemma. Secrets can eat you up from the inside."

3067.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3067.quote: "You okay?""I couldn't sleep. There aren't a lot of windows in the base, and I wanted to-""Watch the sunrise. I, uh I can't make any promises, but I think I may have found something. Might help us open up the portal.""Really?""And, um fixed your SIM card, so I heard your recordings and saw your video. Didn't know you thought about settling down in Perthshire. That's in Scotland.""I know where it is, Fitz.""So when you said all those things about... I mean, you were tired and dehydrated.""I was as clearheaded then as I've ever been when I said all those things. What do you think we should do about it?""For now, let's just watch the sunrise."

3068.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3068.quote: "Are you seriously mad at me?""I'm mad at myself for roping you into this! It's not fair. And I'm mad that you're so willing to help.""As opposed to what? What do you expect?""I don't know! Get angry. I cannot fathom any way out of this without hurting someone I care about.""You think that I'm not angry?! I'm sick to my stomach. I'm furious, but not at you! 'Cause we're cursed. The bloody cosmos wants us to be apart.""The cosmos doesn't want anything.""Yeah, well, I beg to differ. 'Cause we had years side-by-side. Never occurred to us. And then when it does, we don't have the courage to talk about it.""Well, you only mentioned it at the bottom of the sea, facing certain death.""You wait until I'm bound for a war on an aircraft carrier, and then you get swept off to some far-flung planet.
