3588.quote: "Has a Skrull ever simmed you?""Once. It was deeply disturbing.""Why?""Because I stared into the face of my mortal enemy and the face staring back was my own.""Maybe if you were more attractive, then it would be less disturbing.""You think you’re funny. I’m not laughing."You never laugh.""I laugh, on the inside. I’m not doing it now.""It’s funny, because objectively speaking, you’re quite handsome.""Well, thank you."

3589.author: Korath and Yon-Rogg
3589.quote: "If the Skrulls got to her, she’s compromised.""She’s stronger than you think."

3590.author: Yon-Rogg, Ronan and Korath
3590.quote: "Ronan.""The Accusers completes their operation... but the greater mission was a failure, thanks to your team."It was a trap to lure our operative Vers to Torfa and kidnap her.""Give is their location. We'll take care of the terrorist threat.""By bombing them out of the galaxy? No, we'll handle this.""A cell of Skrulls everywhere is a threat to Kree everywhere. Where are they?""They are...""Lost. They are lost for now. But we will find them.""Do so, or we will."

3591.author: Yon-Rogg, Minn-Erva, Korath, Talos and Carol Danvers
3591.quote: "What did you do to your uniform""They got in her head. Just like we thought.""The Supreme Intelligence will set her straight.""You can see they're not soldiers. Let 'em go. You can have me.""And the core?""You lies to me.""I made you the best version of yourself. What's given can be taken away."

3593.author: Korg
3593.quote: "Hey, hey, hey. Hey. Take it easy, man. Over here. The pile of rocks waving at you. Here. Yeah, I'm actually a thing. I'm a being. Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Korg. I'm kind of like the leader in here. I'm made of rocks, as you can see. But don't let that intimidate you. You don't need to be afraid unless you're made of scissors. Just a little rock-paper-scissor joke for you."

3594.author: Korg
3594.quote: "I'm made of rocks. You don't need to be afraid unless you're made of scissors."

3597.author: Thor and Korg
3597.quote: "How did you end up here?""I tried to start a revolution... but I didn't print enough pamphlets so hardly anyone turned up. Except for my mum and her boyfriend, who I hate. As punishment, I was forced to be in here and become a gladiator. Bit of a promotional disaster that one, but I' m actually organizing another revolution. I don't know if you'd be interested in something like that? Do you reckon you'd be interested?"

3598.author: Korg and Thor
3598.quote: "Oh, yeah, no, this whole thing is a circle...but not a real circle, more like a freaky circle.""This doesn't make any sense.""No, nothing makes sense here, man. The only thing that does make sense is that nothing makes sense."

3599.author: Thor and Korg
3599.quote: "Has anyone here fought the Grandmaster's champion?""Doug has. Doug! ...Doug's dead. Anyone who fights the Grandmaster's champion perished.""What about you? You’re made of rocks.""Perishable rocks. There you go. Another one gone. Yeah, no, I just do the smaller fights, warm up the crowd and whatnot. Wait. You’re not gonna face him, are you?""Yes, I am. I'm gonna fight him, win, and get the hell off this planet!""That's exactly what Doug used to say! See you later, New Doug!"

3600.author: Korg and Thor
3600.quote: "Yuck! There’s still someone’s hair and blood all over this. Guys, can you clean up the weapons once you finish your fight? Disgusting slobs. Thor...wanna use a big wooden fork?""No.""Yeah, not really useful unless you’re fighting off three vampires that were huddled together.""I really wish I had my hammer.""Hammer?""Quite unique. It was made from this special metal from the heart of a dying star. And when I spun it really, really fast it gave me the ability to fly.""You rode a hammer?""No, I didn’t ride the hammer.""The hammer rode you on your back?""No. I used to spin it really fast, and it would pull me off the...""Oh, my God. The hammer pulled you off?""The ground. It would pull me off the ground, up into the air, and I would fly. Every time I threw it, it would always come back to me.""Sounds like you had a pretty special and intimate relationship with this hammer and that losing it was almost comparable to losing a loved one.""That’s a nice way of putting it. See her, the one that put me in here.""Yeah, Scrapper 142. She’s strong. And she drinks a lot. Gotta watch out for those Asgardians, man. They are hard to perish."

3601.author: Korg and Valkyrie
3601.quote: "Is that some sort of protoplasm, all the stuff that’s coming out of you? Or are they eggs? Looks like eggs.""I’m looking for Korg.""Who’s asking? I know you’re asking. Is anyone else asking, or is it just you?""The Lord of Thunder sends his best.""The revolution has begun!"

3602.author: Thor and Korg
3602.quote: "Miek, where are you from?""Oh, Miek's dead. I accidentally stomped on him on the bridge and I've felt so guilty, I've been carrying him around all day. Oh, Miek, you're alive! He's alive, guys. What was the question again, bruv?""Earth it is."

3604.author: Korg and Loki
3604.quote: "Hey, man. I'm Korg. We're gonna get outta here on that big spaceship. Wanna come?""Well, it seems that you are in dire need of leadership.""Thank you!"

3605.author: Korg and Thor
3605.quote: "Thor, he's back. That kid on the TV just called me a dickhead again.""Noobmaster.""Yeah, Noobmaster69.""Noobmaster, hey, it's Thor again. You know, the God of Thunder? Listen, buddy, if you don't log off this game immediately, I am gonna fly over to your house, come down to that basement you're hiding in, rip off your arms and shove them up your butt! Oh, that's right, yes, go cry to your father, you little weasel!""Thank you, Thor.""Let me know if he bothers you again, okay?""Thank you very much, I will."

3607.author: Yondu Udonta and Kraglin Obfonteri
3607.quote: "Put a bounty on him, forty k, but I want him back alive!""Yes sir!"

3608.author: Yondu Udonta and Kraglin Obfonteri
3608.quote: "Sorry, boy. But a captain's gotta teach his men what happens to those what cross him.""Captain's gotta teach stuff!"

3609.author: Kraglin Obfonteri and Drax the Destroyer
3609.quote: "Won't there be hundreds of Sakaaran soldiers inside?""I think of Sakaaran as paper people."

3610.author: Kraglin Obfonteri
3610.quote: "I didn't mean to do a mutiny. They killed all my friends."

3611.author: Kraglin Obfonteri
3611.quote: "Pete. Cap’n found this for you in a junker shop. Said someday you’d come back to the fold. It’s called a Zune - what everyone listens to on earth nowadays. It’s got three hundred songs on it."

3612.author: Kraglin Obfonteri to Yondu Udonta
3612.quote: "That ain't right. I just gotta say this one time Captain: no matter how many times Quill betrays you, you protect him like that none of the rest of us matter."

3613.author: Star-Lord and Kraglin
3613.quote: "Rocket grabbed the pieces and reassembled it. I think Yondu would want you to have it.""Thanks Captain."

3614.author: Kurse to Malekith
3614.quote: "I'll destroy their defenses and resurrect the universe."

3616.author: Kurse to Malekith
3616.quote: "Malekith, Asgard's forces are upon us.""Send in the Kurse."

3617.author: Kurse to Malekith
3617.quote: "Our survival will be your legacy.""The Asgardians will suffer as we have suffered. I will reclaim the Aether and put an end to this poisoned universe."

3618.author: Kurse to Malekith
3618.quote: "The worlds are nearly aligned.""You will be the Last of the the Kursed.""Let my life my sacrificed. It is no less than our people did or you have done.""You will become darkness cursed to this existence until it consumes you. Until then, no power our enemies possess can stop you.""I will tear down their defenses and ensure your return to a universe reborn."

3619.author: Kurse to Malekith
3619.quote: "Heal. You will need your strength to reclaim the Aether. And when you awake, we will kill them all."

3620.author: Kurse to Malekith
3620.quote: "We must strike now.""No. Asgard is meaningless. The Aether has found its way home."

3621.author: Kurse to Malekith
3621.quote: "He is an enemy of Asgard. He was a prisoner in their dungeons."

3622.author: Rocket Raccoon to Thor
3622.quote: "You still got a mom, though?""Killed by a dark elf."

3624.author: Luis introducing Kurt to Scott Lang.
3624.quote: "That’s Kurt. He was in Folsom for five years, he’s a wizard on that laptop."

3625.author: Scott Lang advising Hank Pym to recruit Luis, Dave, and Kurt.
3625.quote: "So we expand our team. What do we need? A fake security guard on the inside to de-pressurize the water system, somebody else to hack in the power supply and kill the laser grid, and a gateaway guy.""No, no. No, no, no. Not those three wombats. No way."

3626.author: Kurt trying to help Scott Lang understand with a very long summary given by Luis.
3626.quote: "What?""Old man have safe.""And he's gone for a week.""All right, there's an old man, he's got a safe, and he's gone for a week. Let's just work with that.""You know what I'm saying?"

3627.author: Luis, Scott Lang, Dave, and Kurt talking in the process of robbing Hank Pym.
3627.quote: "Oh, man.""What is it?""Well, they weren't kidding. This safe is serious.""How serious are we talking, Scotty?""It's a Carbondale. It's from 1910. Made from the same steel as the Titanic.""Wow. Can you crack it?""Well, here's the thing. It doesn't do so well in the cold. Remember what that iceberg did?""Yeah, man. It killed DiCaprio.""Killed everybody.""Did not kill the old lady. She still threw the jewel into the oceans."

3628.author: Luis, Kurt, and Dave when Scott Lang demonstrating his powers in front of them for the first time.
3628.quote: "Damn. Whoa! That's so cool, bro!""Now, look. This is gonna get weird, all right? It's pretty freaky, but it's safe. There's no reason to be scared.""Oh, no, no. Daddy won't be scared.""Yeah. Good.""This is the work of gypsies.""That's witchcraft.""Wow, that's amazing.""That's like David Copperfield shit.""That's some kind of wizardry.""This is sorcery!""How'd you do that, bro?"Don't freak out. Look at your shoulder."(Screaming) "Ahhh! Get off! Get off!""Wait, I thought Daddy didn't get scared?!"

3629.author: Luis, Kurt, and Dave declaring to help Scott Lang but decided to retreat upon seeing a bunch of cops.
3629.quote: "Scotty needs us, you know what I'm saying? Ain't nothing gonna stop us!""Back it up. Back it up, slow. Yeah.""Back it up.""Yeah.""Back it up.""Okay.""B-B-B-B-Back it up.""That's it.""That's right.""Backin' up?""Yep, just backin' up.""No, no. Just back it up.""

3630.author: Lance Hunter to Isabelle Hartley and Phil Coulson
3630.quote: "Look, you both have your S.H.I.E.L.D. traditions and all that nonsense, and personal reasons for being dedicated to the cause, but you've known me a long time, Izzy. And what gets me out of bed in the morning..."

3631.author: Isabelle Hartley and Lance Hunter
3631.quote: "He's not a big picture kind a guy.""Sound like my ex-wife.""And you should have listened to her, too."

3632.author: Isabelle Hartley to Lance Hunter
3632.quote: "Cut it off.""What? No! We'll get you to a hospital, they'll fix this.""This thing is killing me; I can feel it. I need you to cut it off, or I won't make it to the hospital."

3633.author: Glenn Talbot and Lance Hunter
3633.quote: "Sierra Leone, three years ago. Ring a bell? How about Basra, '08? Operation Panther's claw? Come on, lieutenant. Tell me the stories are true!""I'm not a lieutenant anymore, sir."

3634.author: Glenn Talbot and Lance Hunter
3634.quote: "Look Hunter we're pretty like minded guys so let's not waste each others time, you know what I'm after.""I'm guessing it's not Carl Creel.""Creels small time, think big fish."

3635.author: Carl Creel to Lance Hunter
3635.quote: "I'm not gonna sugar coat it pal, this is really gonna hurt."

3636.author: Skye and Lance Hunter
3636.quote: "How did you guys meet?""Through my psychotic ex-wife."

3637.author: Lance Hunter
3637.quote: "I packed your chute. And according to my ex, my folding skills are abysmal."

3638.author: Lance Hunter, Phil Coulson and Antoine Triplett
3638.quote: "Agent May shot me.""Repeat?""May shot me.""Man, I wanted to be the one."

3639.author: Lance Hunter, Alphonso Mackenzie, Antoine Triplett and Skye
3639.quote: "Ha ha, and no. It didn't work out because interspecies relationships are hard. I was a human, whereas she was a demonic hell-beast.""He doesn't like her. ""You don't say.""She's pure evil.""Hey, at least you got away from your ex, the guy I had a crush on is now the psycho living in our basement.""You know, I wish I could relate, but all my exes are awesome.""Is that right? I seem to remember an entire year when you had to pretend you liked quinoa.""Yeah, that was a dark time."

3640.author: Lance Hunter, Leo Fitz and Alphonso Mackenzie
3640.quote: "Guys, drop everything!""No. This is worth a fortune; I'm not going to drop it.""Just put it down.""What's all this?""We survived a HYDRA attack, saved the Bus. I turned out to be a genius at mechanical engineering. Calls for a celebration.""I like the way you think.""Um, no, actually, I should probably, um...""Fitz, this team wouldn't be here if it weren't for you. This is big. Let me buy you a beer, mate. We haven't gotten to work together much yet, but I thought this was a successful mission. And if we keep up with this teamwork, there will be more successful missions and plenty more beer, plenty more...""Yeah, hey, so, um, I don't have an ex. But there was this girl that I like, and I told her how I felt, but she doesn't feel the same way as I do, so she left.""Her loss, then, mate. From what I can see, she's missing out. To moving on.""Yeah. Moving on."

3641.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
3641.author: Lance Hunter and Raina
3641.quote: "If you ask me, Coulson let you off easy.""I didn't ask."

3642.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
3642.author: Lance Hunter, Phil Coulson and Bobbi Morse
3642.quote: "Anyone want to tell me what the bloody hell she's doing here?""Bobbi's one of our best agents.""Oh that's rich, mind telling me what I'm doing here?!""That's easy, I vouched for you."

3643.author: Lance Hunter
3643.quote: "She can handle it; deception's her forte."

3644.author: Melinda May to Lance Hunter
3644.quote: "Hunter, you know I don't like you, right?"

3645.author: Lance Hunter and Melinda May
3645.quote: "Try being married to somebody who remembers every single little detail. It's not that charming... You think I'm being petty, don't you? Well, I'm not. I don't have a problem with Bob kissing that guy.""Good. Because you had a hickey on your neck for a week after our mission in Miami.""Well excuse me doing my job thoroughly. And with style."

3646.author: Lance Hunter to Marcus Scarlotti
3646.quote: "I'm a merc, mate, like you lot. And if you're looking to take out a few S.H.I.E.L.D. agents higher up the food chain, I happen to know a couple. They just need about - 90 seconds to get in position."

3647.author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
3647.quote: "Subtlety is key.""You were dressed like a cowboy!"

3650.author: Lance Hunter
3650.quote: "Join S.H.I.E.L.D. Travel to exotic, distant lands; meet exciting, unusual people - and kill them."

3651.author: Phil Coulson, Lance Hunter, and Bobbi Morse
3651.quote: "Two goals; stop the drill, find Skye.""Aren't you forgetting the third?""What's that?""Don't die out there. We tend to remind each other not to die.""I thought that was implicit.""He likes to hear it.""Who doesn't like to hear it?"

3652.author: Phil Coulson, Alphonso Mackenzie, Melinda May, Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse, Skye, and Leo Fitz
3652.quote: "I shouldn't have to ask any of you to save one of our own.""You never ask! You just give your orders, no matter cracked up they are!""Mack, you'd do well to remember your rank right now.""Really? Rank at a time like this? Why don't you shove your rank up your...""Not helping, Hunter.""Guys, stop.""No, it's cathartic. Do you have any thoughts of your own on it, or do you just parrot his?""Coulson's trying to stop HYDRA.""We didn't stop anything! We unleashed something on the planet!""Please.""No one knows what happened yet.""It could have been a lot worse.""And Skye barely made it out alive!""Thanks to Trip. He sacrificed his life, Mack!""No! He traded his life for hers! And then he was shattered into a thousand pieces!""That's enough! If Trip was here, he wouldn't be arguing, he wouldn't be bitching. He would be gearing up to do what needs to be done. Yes, we're dealing with forces we don't understand, but HYDRA I do understand. I want everyone ready when the sun comes up. End of discussion."

3653.author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
3653.quote: "(in American accent)Your presence is most welcome.""Drop the accent. It makes you sound like a douche bag.""(Reverting to normal voice)Now you know what it feels like for me to live in this country."

3654.author: Lance Hunter and Alphonso Mackenzie
3654.quote: "I barely touched it, I swear.""Trust me, there is no universe in which I think you did that on your own."

3655.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
3655.quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

3656.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Lance Hunter
3656.quote: "Bobbi and I work for an organization, an outlier that came out of the wreckage from what Fury left.""What organization, Mack? Who the hell are you working for?""S.H.I.E.L.D. The real S.H.I.E.L.D."

3657.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
3657.author: Lance Hunter to Robert Gonzales
3657.quote: "You guys don't want Coulson in charge. I'll be the first to admit the guy's not perfect. Sometimes chews with his mouth open, tends to hog the mic on karaoke nights. But other than that, he's not so bad, really."

3658.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
3658.author: Robert Gonzales and Lance Hunter
3658.quote: "You must be Lance Hunter.""And you must be crazy.""I assure you, none of us wanted this."

3659.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
3659.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
3659.quote: "Everything I felt for you, that was real.""Yeah maybe so, but in the end you still got that intel didn't you?"

3661.author: Lance Hunter and Phil Coulson
3661.quote: "Maybe we should forget all this, head down to Mexico. We can lay low, enjoy the quiet life.""That's not an option. The problem is... there are no good options.""Well, maybe it's time for the bad ones."

3662.author: Phil Coulson and Lance Hunter
3662.quote: "I'm not going down without a fight. We're gonna find Skye and we're gonna take back S.H.I.E.L.D., and we're gonna need more than Honest Eddie's Jeep to do it.""You want to take their Quinjet, the two of us, while we're trapped in here, surrounded. Brilliant.""I have reinforcements on the way. We just have to hold down the fort until they get here.""Yeah, well, I have reinforcements of my own.""I.C.E.R.s only.""Oh, you can't be serious.""Those are S.H.I.E.L.D. agents out there. We're not gonna hurt them.""I somehow doubt they feel the same about us.""It won't come to that. It may not look like it, but this place was built to withstand a Hulk-sized force. On the other hand, let's just hope they didn't bring a...(a battering ram hits the safe house)""...battering ram.""'Cause then we've only got about an hour."

3663.author: Lance Hunter and Phil Coulson
3663.quote: "Where's are the reinforcements?""I don't know. Stuck in traffic?""Are they traveling by clown car?"

3664.author: Phil Coulson and Lance Hunter
3664.quote: "Maybe he's got a point. I was dead, after all. I shouldn't even be here.""We all have our bad days."

3665.author: Lance Hunter and Phil Coulson
3665.quote: "This would have been a piece of cake if you'd let us use these big boy guns. Now we have to get close enough to get shot by their big boy guns.""By the time they recognize us it'll be too late.""Then there's the small matter of who's gonna fly that thing. Do you even know how?""I've watched May fly. I know a little.""How little?""I can get us off the ground.""You do know there's more to it than that like getting us back on the ground... for example..."

3666.author: Lance Hunter, Phil Coulson, and Deathlok
3666.quote: "At some point, you might have mentioned that backup was a lethal cyborg.""Truthfully, I just wanted to see the look on your face when he showed up. Priceless.""Glad I amuse you.""You know I can hear you up here."

3667.author: Lance Hunter to Leo Fitz
3667.quote: "We're infiltrating HYDRA, our options are limited. Ward is a psychopath but for now he's our psychopath, so we use him to stay one step ahead."

3668.author: Lance Hunter, Grant Ward, and Phil Coulson
3668.quote: "Three men, heavily armed - bet there's more where they came from.""Does it matter? They got a cyborg on board with rockets in his arm.""He's not a cyborg. He's a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent... with rockets in his arm."

3669.author: Lance Hunter to Phil Coulson
3669.quote: "Hate to break it to you but S.H.I.E.L.D. will also fall apart if a dozen angry enhanced blokes rain terror on us all."

3670.author: Melinda May and Lance Hunter
3670.quote: "There's a piece Ward doesn't understand yet. When I find him I'm going to kill him.""Glad we're on the same page."

3671.author: Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
3671.quote: "You look better, stupid but better, taking a bullet for me was stupid.""Walking into a trap when you know it's a trap is stupid.""You were the bait."

3672.author: Lance Hunter and Joey Gutierrez
3672.quote: "We'll be right there with you. It's not like this day can get any crazier, right?""Right..."

3673.author: Lance Hunter and Phil Coulson
3673.quote: "Sir I have trouble counting it out using my fingers but I think there's more of them than us.""Roger that, thanks Hunter."

3674.author: An ATCU operative and Lance Hunter
3674.quote: "Two teams in position at the next stop, ma'am.""That's one team for each of us. Again, killing it with math."

3675.author: Lance Hunter to Melinda May
3675.quote: "A lot of speculation back at HQ as to why you went AWOL. Spiritual walkabout, midlife crisis..""(May gives Hunter an angry look)""

3676.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
3676.quote: "Damn it. I wanna go after him with you.""You're still on the mend. Plus, you've been undercover with HYDRA, and that face makes an impression. The rest of you makes a bloody statement.""You like me stuck here in the lab.""Too bloody right. You're missing half a lung because you took a bullet Ward intended for me. Nearly bled out in my arms. If you being in the lab means I never have to see something like that again, I'm all for it."

3677.author: Melinda May and Lance Hunter
3677.quote: "What's your way in?""From below, climb the ranks, Hail HYDRA and all that.""He sees your face, you're made.""If he's close enough to see my face then I'm close enough to put a bullet in his."

3678.author: Lance Hunter to Spud
3678.quote: "Are you not tired yet?! Cause that was sort of my strategy."

3679.author: Lance Hunter to Melinda May
3679.quote: "I've rarely lost a fight when I'm sober, which I plan on being. And I can take a punch, so worst case, I'll do that till the other guy tires out."

3680.author: Spud, Melinda May and Lance Hunter
3680.quote: "You have something to unload?""Weapons. Next gen, high potential damage.""We need buyers with deep pockets and bad intentions."

3681.author: Lance Hunter and Kebo
3681.quote: "You certainly don't make it easy to get a meeting.""The boss doesn't want it to be easy. But he's always interested in meeting people who can prove themselves.""Sounds like an interesting bloke. I look forward to meeting him some day."

3682.author: Melinda May and Lance Hunter
3682.quote: "So, what's the job?""Don't know.""When's it going down?""Don't know.""Any idea where?""Not yet.""You do realize the point of intelligence gathering is to gather intelligence?"

3683.author: Melinda May and Lance Hunter
3683.quote: "What if there are innocent lives at risk?""There are always lives at risk! You were there when Bobbi was bleeding out in my arms, Ward did that. If I have a shot at finding him I'm taking it. I have to, before Bobbi gets back in the field."

3684.author: Kebo, Grant Ward and Lance Hunter
3684.quote: "Turn around Richy.""Yeah, Richy. Why so shy?""My name isn't Richy... Director."

3685.author: Grant Ward and Lance Hunter
3685.quote: "Come on Hunter, you weren't dumb enough to come here all cowboy, were you?""Sorry, but this coming from the guy who shot his own girlfriend by mistake?"

3686.author: Lance Hunter to Daisy Johnson and Alphonso Mackenzie

3687.author: Lance Hunter, Melinda May and Phil Coulson
3687.quote: "I just want to make sure he's all right.""You're the reason he's not.""Ward was gonna hurt him no mat... I made the most logical choice.""Logical? You wanted revenge.""Hey, hey, hey!""Coulson's orders were to end him. I had one shot. I took it.""And you missed. You're off that assignment."

3688.author: Lance Hunter and Daisy Johnson
3688.quote: "Lash is an Inhuman. Inhumans have markers in their DNA, if we test Banks' blood for markers we'll know if he's Inhuman or not.""That's actually kinda smart."

3689.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
3689.quote: "I don't want either of us to go after Ward.""You're joking right? Since when? Whatever it is lay it on me.""I think you've been reckless and stupid.""Can I take back what I just said?"

3690.author: Lance Hunter
3690.quote: "Aliens, I pine for the days when we didn't have to fight bloody aliens. It's just not a fair fight."

3691.author: Bobbi Morse and Lance Hunter
3691.quote: "Well, once again, too little and too late.""I'll remind you that we're basically the same height. I just don't wear bloody heels. I even had a pine for the days where we didn't have to fight bloody aliens. It's just not a fair fight.""Let's see if we can level the playing field.""Really? Your batons? That's your game-changer?"

3692.author: Lance Hunter intimidating customers at a jewelry store
3692.quote: "We got no heroes here today, mate."

3693.author: Phil Coulson, Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
3693.quote: "I figured out a way to track down Ward, but we got to go off book.""My specialty.""I'm not sure taking Hunter is really such a good idea.""You're going, too, Agent Morse. We need a pilot."

3694.author: Lance Hunter to Joey Gutierrez
3694.quote: "This is how S.H.I.E.L.D. works. You make a plan, plan turns to rubbish, we make a new plan. Oh, just to be crystal clear, this is the part where the plan turns to rubbish."

3695.author: Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse and Alphonso Mackenzie
3695.quote: "Invisibility... Imagine the possibilities.""What are you imagining?""Nothing fun.""Get used to it. We can't put the Terrigen genie back in the bottle. Powers are the new normal.""I think you're just jealous.""Damn right I am. Tell me you didn't try one of those little fish-oil pills. I had my fingers crossed for x-ray vision. I was just curious. I wasn't the only one.""I mean, I-I thought about it. I didn't actually do it. Rehab was a bitch.""Man, you two deserve each other."

3696.author: Lance Hunter to HYDRA operatives
3696.quote: "I hate to be a buzzkill, but this is a gun-free zone, so I'm gonna have to take that off you."

3697.author: Melinda May, Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
3697.quote: "Great. Coulson's in trouble, the place is crawling with armed HYDRA Agents, and we have no weapons.""Not strictly true. Buon appetito.""I love you.""I don't hate you quite as much."

3698.author: Leo Fitz, Lance Hunter and Phil Coulson
3698.quote: "They've wiped out almost 30 square kilometers of forest just to make room for this place. You wonder why the planet's dying.""Got that right, mate. You and Jemma watch that documentary I mentioned?""Oh, yes! The one about the Amazon? It ...""And you'll talk about it later."

3700.author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
3700.quote: "Ex-SVR, Special Ops The same Special Ops division the two men who tried to assassinate the Director were in.""And there's our link to Nadeer.""Get this. They all have ties to Prime Minister Olshenko.""The Russian Prime Minister who was attacked by an Inhuman And then threw Bobbi and Hunter under the bus after they saved his life."

3701.author: Lance Hunter
3701.quote: "Get those cuffs off my client and get the hell out of here."

3702.author: Lance Hunter to Enoch
3702.quote: "Look, there's only so much crazy talk I can take before I start shooting holes in it."

3703.author: Lance Hunter to Leo Fitz
3703.quote: "Every light needs a shadow. You just have to learn to control it and use it when you need it."

3704.author: Leo Fitz and Lance Hunter
3704.quote: "How are things with Bobbi?""Good. Yeah. We're 100% compatible 50% of the time. Nearly got married again. Until the ninjas showed up.""So you are together?""Together forever, just doing our own thing. Distance is our savior. How about you and Simmons? Did you find a way to work it out?""Distance is our curse."

3705.author: Enoch and Lance Hunter
3705.quote: "I've been expecting you.""What? Wait. No. We're here to surprise you, so act surprised."

3706.author: Enoch and Lance Hunter
3706.quote: "My Earth name is Enoch. I am a sentient Chronicom from a planet which revolves around a star in the constellation you know as Cygnus.""Yeah, we'll just go with Enoch."

3707.author: Lance Hunter and Leo Fitz, quoting The Empire Strikes Back

3708.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
3708.quote: "What do I think? I think, what the hell Melinda. You show up asking for a favor but when I call you after S.H.I.E.L.D. collapsed to check if you were alright, not a word.""It was a busy time.""Busy? Yeah alright. Thanks for the apology."

3709.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
3709.quote: "I haven't worked with S.H.I.E.L.D. in a long while. I moved on for a reason.""It's a different S.H.I.E.L.D., Coulson's the director now.""Okay, but why me? Is this Skye that bad?""She's that good; good agent."

3710.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
3710.quote: "I talked to your mum, she told me you were alive, we had a nice talk, she invited me over for dinner.""I'm not surprised, she still hasn't forgiven me for divorcing you."

3711.author: Andrew Garner and Skye
3711.quote: "Sarcasm, same strategy, avoidance.""What am I avoiding exactly?""The truth."

3712.author: Skye and Andrew Garner
3712.quote: "My father's involved and, for better or worse, I matter to him and we can use that.""I'm with May, this is an emotional powder keg you shouldn't be anywhere near."

3713.author: Melinda May and Andrew Garner
3713.quote: "Would you consider consulting for us?""No, I can suggest someone but it can't be me. S.H.I.E.L.D. hasn't changed, none of it's changed. There was a reason I moved on back then, and I have another reason now. Those photos on my desk. Goodbye, Melinda."

3714.author: Melinda May and Andrew Garner
3714.quote: "You're up early.""Hey, we got a family to make, and there's only one way to do that."

3715.author: Phil Coulson to Melinda May
3715.quote: "I went to him for counseling; he was the only therapist I could talk to about my alien writing impulses."

3716.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
3716.quote: "You haven't made a call like this since Bahrain, then I know it's not good. You want to tell me what's going on? How bad are we talking?""There's no way it will end well. Andrew, there's a lot I didn't say that I wish I did.""Me too. Do good Melinda, and get home safe."

3717.author: Phil Coulson and Andrew Garner
3717.quote: "So, May asked off some time for the first time in the history of ever. Does that have anything to do with you being around these last few days?""Now, you know I can't discuss personal matters with patients."

3718.author: Lash
3718.quote: "Tell me where to find the Inhuman...never mind."

3719.author: Daisy Johnson and Andrew Garner
3719.quote: "Let me guess, Joey Gutierrez is unfit for action physically, psychologically and emotionally?""The man can't open a doorknob without melting it."

3720.author: Andrew Garner and Werner von Strucker
3720.quote: "You know why most people take Psych, right? They're trying to figure out families.""You got me there; you wouldn't believe how messed up mine is."

3721.author: Alisha Whitley
3721.quote: "He's here, he's here to kill us, and you can't stop him."

3722.author: Daisy Johnson and Alphonso Mackenzie
3722.quote: "We've gotta figure how this thing is finding Inhumans and why it's killing them.""I know why.""Yeah, why?""Instinct. It's like a Great White Shark. Built to eat, sleep...""And kill.""I was gonna say make little baby sharks, but then Jaws was probably twenty years before you were born, so...""Do we have movement?""I don't know. I can't see a damn thing.""Well, do you want me to take point?""I'm going. I'm going."

3723.author: Andrew Garner and Jemma Simmons
3723.quote: "Shock? Rage? Depression?""I know you're looking for signs of PTSD but I assure you I'm fine.""You've been through something pretty extreme, there will be after effects and that's okay, it's okay to struggle. To feel uncomfortable in your own skin."

3724.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
3724.quote: "I had a great time.""So did I, until you fell off the face of the Earth. No calls, no texts.""That had nothing to do with you."

3725.author: Dwight Frye and Lash
3725.quote: "I only told them the truth, that you're being merciful.""I'm not merciful, I'm necessary."

3726.author: Werner von Strucker and Andrew Garner
3726.quote: "Hey professor, where you been? You know you're a tough guy to track down.""What's going on here Alex?"

3727.author: Andrew Garner
3727.quote: "I'm lucky, can't see how anyone would have survived that. I know Alex was troubled but I'm not sorry he's gone. Ward would have made him finish the job."

3728.author: Andrew Garner to Melinda May
3728.quote: "I felt different, like, like a part of me was unlocked."

3729.author: Andrew Garner to Melinda May
3729.quote: "I didn't know why, it was intense. I had this new desire, I had a hunger on my skin. It wasn't until I finally met one that my body took over and I, I lashed out and I felt relief."

3730.author: Lincoln Campbell and Daisy Johnson
3730.quote: "He won't always be able to shift between monster and man. He's still in transition. Becoming Inhuman.""And when that transition's complete?""He'll stay Lash, permanently."

3731.author: Melinda May and Andrew Garner
3731.quote: "What would you say if I didn't go back to S.H.I.E.L.D..""You're serious?""At least not right away.""So is this the island talking or..."

3732.author: Joey Gutierrez and Andrew Garner
3732.quote: "Daisy thinks I could be a real asset to S.H.I.E.L.D., but she says my fate is in your hands.""Yes Joey, it is."

3733.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
3733.quote: "I needed time to explain. You don't know how many times I almost told you, but I didn't know how. I didn't ask for this.""Oh god, what have you done?"

3734.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
3734.quote: "I don't know what I'll do! Instinct will take over again, like it did at the convenience store.""Instinct?""Look I didn't want to hurt anyone but I didn't know what was happening.""You killed all those people..."

3735.author: Phil Coulson and Lash
3735.quote: "Andrew, listen to me, we can help you, the ATCU is close to a cure.""I am the cure."

3736.author: Lash and Melinda May
3736.quote: "Move!""Go on, might as well, I've thought about my death enough times."

3737.author: Bobbi Morse
3737.quote: "Andrew was a PhD in psychology. Now he's a specimen."

3738.author: Gideon Malick and Andrew Garner
3738.quote: "It strikes me that no ones asked if you even want treatment. They haven't even asked your opinion on the subject at all have they?""No. But then all they see is a killer."

3739.author: Andrew Garner and Jemma Simmons
3739.quote: "Jemma, we may disagree about the Inhumans but we both hate HYDRA, open this door and I'll protect you. I would never ever hurt you, but HYDRA will kill you.""Maybe you wouldn't, but what about that thing you become?"

3740.author: Andrew Garner to Melinda May
3740.quote: "Lash is taking over, I'm about to turn for the last time May. I came to say goodbye."

3741.author: Lash's last words to Daisy Johnson

3742.author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Lincoln Campbell, Glenn Talbot, Melinda May and Phil Coulson
3742.quote: "Lash could kill Daisy. Did you stop to think about that?""It's a risk we had to take. But he had the opportunity once before, and he let her go. I don't think he's meant to kill her.""Who put him on the Quinjet?""I did while Coulson was keeping you distracted.""You knew about this?""I run a tight ship.""Why do you think this Lash can defeat Hive? And who in tarnation names these things?""Every Inhuman is here for a reason and serves a purpose. I believe Lash's purpose is to kill Hive."

3743.author: Holden Radcliffe
3743.quote: "We're being attacked. Some kind of a monster."

3744.author: Leo Fitz, Lincoln Campbell and Melinda May
3744.quote: "What if Lash wasn't here to kill Hive?""He was here to save Daisy.""That wasn't Lash."

3745.author: Leo Fitz and Melinda May
3745.quote: "Well, we have pissed-off Inhumans and a pissed-off Hive, so good and bad. But, I mean, at least Lash... at least Andrew didn't die in vain. The information Daisy brought back has been useful.""You're trying to make us feel better. Find meaning in Andrew's death or what Daisy's done.""Maybe.""Don't do that."

3746.author: Hive to Daisy Johnson
3746.quote: "It's what that creature stole from you. He made you... impervious."

3747.author: Aida and Leo Fitz
3747.quote: "Radcliffe, time and again, has expressed his deep regret for causing pain when all he ever wanted was to prevent it. He speaks often of the pain that you and Agent Simmons have had to suffer, having lost so many friends Lincoln Campbell, Andrew Garner, Antoine Triplett--""Okay, stop it, stop. You don't have to list them."

3748.author: Laura Barton to Clint Barton
3748.quote: "You know I totally support your Avenging - I couldn't be prouder."

3749.author: Tony Stark, Clint Barton and Laura Barton
3749.quote: "This is an agent of some kind.""Gentlemen, this is Laura.""I know all of your names."

3751.author: Laura Barton and Clint Barton
3751.quote: "I see those guys... those gods...""You don't think they need me.""I think they do, which is a lot scarier. They're a mess."

3752.author: Laura Barton to Clint Barton
3752.quote: "You need to be sure that this team is really a team, and that they have your back. Things are changing for us. In a few months time, you and me are going to be outnumbered."

3753.author: Clint Barton and Laura Barton
3753.quote: "I’m gonna finish re-flooring that sunroom as soon as I get back.""Yeah, and then you’ll find another part of the house to tear apart.""No. It’s the last project. I promise."

3754.author: Tony Stark to Clint Barton
3754.quote: "You're all grown up, you got a wife and kids. I don't understand, why didn't you think about them before you chose the wrong side?"

3756.author: Laura Barton and Clint Barton
3756.quote: "Hey guys, enough practice, soup's on.""Alright, we're coming, we're hungry."

3758.author: Lei Kung to Danny Rand
3758.quote: "Because of who you are, there will always be forces gathering against you... preparing, waiting... looking for a weakness in you. Disguised as a friend. Slipping past you as a stranger. They are everywhere. You must always be aware of their presence, because they are aware of you. They study your every move, looking for what you reveal to them. In this way, you are your own worst enemy. And this is why I tolerate no questioning from you... because doubt leads... to death."

3759.author: Lei Kung to Danny Rand
3759.quote: "You cannot be in two places at once. You must be a double-edged sword. The enemy will try and divide you. You are a living weapon. Drive all other thoughts out of your mind except this... Destroy the Hand."

3760.author: Lei Kung to Danny Rand
3760.quote: "I hear you crying at night in your room. Weeping over your parents and their loss. That grief is a weakness. Banish it. Reject or accept the darkness. It is your choice. Both are acceptable. But your choice... reveals who you are."

3761.author: Lei Kung to Danny Rand
3761.quote: "At the entry to every door is the opportunity to choose a different path. If you wish to continue as you are, do not enter. But if you choose to face the dragon inside, know that you risk everything. Should you live... your former self will be destroyed. If you choose to take this up... you will be forever marked... as one of us. Are you willing to kill Danny Rand so that the Iron Fist might live?"

3762.author: Lei Kung to Danny Rand
3762.quote: "Cast away your childish needs. Bury your mother Bury your father. You belong to me and to me alone. You must submit, can you do it? Then tell me who you are! A child... touched by fire... delivered from heaven to become the greatest warrior, destined for victory. Guardian of the Gate... Destroyer of the Hand. Your purpose. Destroy the Hand. No room for doubt. Finish it. Finish it now. You belong to me... and I command you."

3763.author: Leland Owlsley
3763.quote: "I'm glad to hear there's some new blood running around out there. Heroes and their consequences are why we have our current opportunities."

3764.author: Leland Owlsley
3764.quote: "Again, I have to ask, why do we care? Every time one of these guys punches someone through a building, our margins go three percent. We should be celebrating."

3765.author: Leland Owlsley and Anatoly Ranskahov
3765.quote: "Anyone here speak Chinese? Nobu?""The man is Japanese.""I know, I know. I just thought that… Forget it."

3766.author: Leland Owlsley to James Wesley
3766.quote: "You ever tried to put a puzzle together with a piece missing? It's damn aggravating."

3767.author: Leland Owlsley
3767.quote: "Masked Vigilanttes, Crazy Russians. I'm getting my stun gun out of storage."

3768.author: Leland Owlsley to Nobu Yoshioka
3768.quote: "The funds have been reallocated as requested, all the arrangements made as per your agreement with the guy we're not supposed to blah blah blah."

3769.author: Leland Owlsley
3769.quote: "The numbers are like tea leaves. Nobody reads them like I can."

3770.author: Leland Owlsley and Nobu Yoshioka
3770.quote: "What happened to the Russians, we need to be careful, all of us. I look out for you, you look out for me, all I'm saying.""Each man must stand for himself, or fall with the unworthy."

3771.author: Leland Owlsley to Wilson Fisk
3771.quote: "My son was coming to visit, I had to tell him no stay out of New York Lee, shit's going on. I'm 73 years old, you know how many times I have left to see him."

3772.author: Leland Owlsley and Wilson Fisk
3772.quote: "Kid's half an idiot.""It's the other half that counts."

3773.author: James Wesley and Leland Owlsley
3773.quote: "Hm, You weren't particularly fond of Nobu, you thought he was unsettling if I recall.""I think you're unsettling half the time."

3774.author: Wilson Fisk and Leland Owlsley
3774.quote: "Change is inevitable for me this city and certain relationships.""All right. All right, I'll go speak with her.""I appreciate your support in the matter.""Sure, why not, we're all in this together right? What's left of us."

3775.author: Leland Owlsley to Wilson Fisk
3775.quote: "Whatever war you're thinking about starting, don't lose sight of the endgame. Once Senator Cherryh has cleared the last of the zoning issues, you can tear down the rest of Hell's Kitchen and build your better tomorrow. It's a shame not everyone will be there to see it, but, uhm, shit happens."

3776.author: James Wesley and Leland Owlsley
3776.quote: "Speak with Gao, if she wasn't involved we might need her support against further unpleasantries.""And if she was involved?""Then it's been an honor doing business with you."

3777.author: Leland Owlsley to Wilson Fisk
3777.quote: "But I'm a fair sort, that's why I'm only taking half your money. You go your way, I go mine, not exactly what I'd call win win, but it's as close as we're going to get with this. So, we on the same page?"

3778.author: Leland Owlsley and Wilson Fisk
3778.quote: "You've been distracted, emotional, erratic. We just wanted to nudge you back on track. But obviously that went south so we will be parting ways, and I'll be taking half your assets with me.""You think that I would let you walk away?! After what you've done?!"

3780.author: Leo Fitz to Skye
3780.quote: "So, uh, uh, when... When you get back, I'll show you my thing.

3781.author: Leo Fitz
3781.quote: "It's like magic. But, it's-- it's science."

3782.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3782.quote: "Whoa, whoa, whoa! Watch it, that's the Night-Night Gun!""Well, it's on my stuff, it doesn't work and there's no way we're calling it the "Night-Night gun.""The bullets work. Non-lethal, heavy stopping power, break up under the sub-cutaneous tissue--""Oh, with a dose of .1 microliters of dendrotoxin. I'm not Hermione. I can't create instant paralysis with that!"

3783.author: Leo Fitz to Jemma Simmons
3783.quote: "I said there would come a moment when we would regret the decision to go in the field. I didn't think that would happen in week one."

3784.author: Leo Fitz
3784.quote: "If we had a small monkey, he could slip through the sensors and disable the fence's power source with his adorable little hands."

3785.author: Leo Fitz, Grant Ward and Jemma Simmons
3785.quote: "We're gonna have this new 'Night-Night' pistol working in no time, okay?""Great. One thing. We're not calling it that.""Told you.""Yes, we-- Yes, we are."

3786.author: Grant Ward and Leo Fitz
3786.quote: "Who has tech like this?""We don't. Not like this. Not this small and internal. That's at least a decade ahead of anything I've seen."

3787.author: Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3787.quote: "What's Fitz doing over there?""He detected a strange energy coming off the body.""It's the smell!""There's no shame in it Fitz, it's perfectly natural to be afraid.""No, the only thing I'm afraid of is putrid decaying flesh corrupting my pristine workspace! Do you remember what happened the last time you brought a dead thing into the lab?""Oh not the stupid cat again, and it's our lab, Fitz, not your lab!""No, the cat. Tell him about the cat! You left its liver next to my lunch!"

3788.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3788.quote: "Don't you dare act like these last few months haven't been the highlight of your entire pasty life.""Pasty? Oh, really? Well, when did you become so sun-kissed? Because I'm pretty sure that every minute of every day, you've been stuck in a lab right beside me. At the Academy, at Sci-Ops, this plane, you've been beside me the whole damn time!"

3789.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3789.quote: "Fitz, I don't know what you think you're doing but...""I'm doing what we always do. We're gonna fix this. Together."

3790.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3790.quote: "I was going to do it.""I know you were.""I had the antiserum, the chute, everything. I just couldn't get the straps on it.""Fitz, please...""And, you know, I could've done the whole James Bond mid-air type of thing but...""Fitz, stop! Please, just... Ward did an amazing thing, yes. But it wasn't Ward by my side in that lab searching for a cure. It wasn't Ward giving me hope when I had none. It was you. You're the hero.""Yeah.""Yeah. Thank you."

3791.author: Leo Fitz
3791.quote: "What the hell?! Who designed this?! And in the Hub, of all places!"

3792.author: Leo Fitz to Grant Ward
3792.quote: "Well, you should know by now, Agent Ward, that looks can be deceiving."

3793.author: Leo Fitz to Grant Ward
3793.quote: "I am every bit the S.H.I.E.L.D. agent you are!"

3794.author: Grant Ward and Leo Fitz
3794.quote: "How long can you hold your breath underwater?""I-I don't know.""Are you familiar with the term 'Slam and Cram'?""No, and I do- I don't think I want to be.""How attached are you to your pinky?""Very, very attached, and before you ask another terrifyingly vague question, let me be clear. Any plan that involves even one of those scenarios isn't going to work for me."

3795.author: Leo Fitz and Grant Ward
3795.quote: "Checking for alien spectrographic signatures one teeny rock at a time.""Necessary precaution. We don't want anything alien getting into the wrong hands.""Still, this is definitely the type of work a monkey could easily do.""You're our little monkey."

3796.author: Grant Ward, Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3796.quote: "You think that's what they were researching at that lab?""Trying to create another portal, yes.""Failing, until a malfunction produced a burst of energy."

3797.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons, Grant Ward, and Skye
3797.quote: "It's not funny. I was sleeping peacefully. Very clever, Simmons.""I-I didn't do it!""Oh, well Ward. I don't appreciate-""Don't look at me!""Ok, then Skye.""No!""Well who then? The bunks should be off limits! No, don't laugh! Because I know it was one of you!"

3799.author: Grant Ward and Leo Fitz
3799.quote: "Sounds like riding a bull for eight seconds.""Yeah. Exactly. It's that simple."

3800.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3800.quote: "Bet there aren't any flowered dresses where she's going.""Amen to that, sister."

3801.author: Leo Fitz to the students of S.H.I.E.L.D. Academy
3801.quote: "If you don't know the history of S.H.I.E.L.D. by now, there's no excuse. Unless you fell asleep in Professor Vaughn's class; that's a perfectly acceptable excuse."

3802.author: Daisy Johnson and Jemma Simmons
3802.quote: "Simmons had boyfriends.""Well, not quite. I never found anyone that interesting. Except Fitz. He was clearly the smartest one here.""Were you guys... best friends or were you...?""We weren't friends. We were enemies. Bitter rivals. The two youngest in class though he is twenty days older than me, for the record. We were so competitive. Constantly trying to one-up each other. He hated me.

3803.author: Donnie Gill and Leo Fitz
3803.quote: "It's true what the other guys say-- you are the smartest person to come through here.""Is that what they say? Yeah, well, Simmons is probably smarter, technically, but that's because she likes homework more than life itself."

3804.author: Leo Fitz to Skye
3804.quote: "You are the least supportive pretend girlfriend I've ever had!"

3805.author: Jemma Simmons
3805.quote: "Poor thing! He's always getting knocked out, isn't he?"

3806.author: Leo Fitz to John Garrett
3806.quote: "You're going to suffer for what you've done. And I- I plan to be a very big part of that."

3807.author: Leo Fitz and John Garrett
3807.quote: "It's called a 'Mouse Hole'. Cuts through anything, really. I designed it a year ago and submitted it for testing, but it never reached distribution.""Top agents always hog the good stuff."

3808.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3808.quote: "At least we still have each other.""Good, 'cause the last thing I want is for things to change.""Fitz... It's too late for that."

3809.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
3809.author: Leo Fitz and Grant Ward
3809.quote: "Everything is falling apart around us. We don't know how it'll end. If there's something you want to tell her, don't wait.""Maybe Simmons should check you again for a head injury... 'Cause that is not the Ward that I know.""You know what? Do what you want. I don't care.""Good to have you back."

3810.author: Phil Coulson and Leo Fitz
3810.quote: "We have no authority to do this. We're no longer S.H.I.E.L.D. agents. We're...""We're vigilantes.""I was gonna say, 'doing this because it's the right thing to do,' but... yeah."

3811.author: Leo Fitz to Jemma Simmons
3811.quote: "You're more than that, Jemma. I just never had the courage to tell you. So please... Let me show you."

3812.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3812.quote: "Ah, yeah. Well, my mum always said that you shouldn't be afraid, because it's just like the way life was before you were born. Which wasn't that bad, was it?""That's sweet. Although apparently I was miserable before I was born. Upside down, umbilical cord all wrapped around my neck.""Well, I meant pre-conception-""I know, I was joking.""Yeah I know you were joking, that's fine."

3815.author: Leo Fitz
3815.quote: "So, I don't have an ex, but there was this girl that I liked, and I told her how I felt, but she didn't feel the same, so she left."

3816.author: Fitz' hallucination of Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3816.quote: "You won't even talk to me now.""Because it's embarrassing."

3817.author: Leo Fitz and Alphonso Mackenzie
3817.quote: "Besides, brains never delete files, they just lose connections. But there's always a backup, it's just a matter of digging and finding them.""So you've got backup files, too?"

3818.author: Jemma Simmons and Bobbi Morse
3818.quote: "We were in the bottom of the ocean, in a storage pod, left for dead. And Fitz... he said something that caught me completely off-guard.""Ah, those three little words.""Yes! Well, no. I mean, not exactly. I barely had a moment to process what he said or how I felt about it, next thing I know, he's giving me the oxygen, water's rushing in and... He's ... He's laying there, in the hospital bed. He was so pale.""How long was Fitz in the coma?""Nine of the longest days of my life. When it finally broke, he couldn't speak. He just stared at me, confused. All I wanted to do was help him. All I wanted was... My best friend back.""Your best friend?""I never thought of him as anything else. That said, I can't imagine my life without him. It's all very confusing.""You've never told him any of this, have you?""Oh, lord no."

3819.author: Phil Coulson, Alphonso Mackenzie, Melinda May, Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse, Skye, and Leo Fitz
3819.quote: "I shouldn't have to ask any of you to save one of our own.""You never ask! You just give your orders, no matter cracked up they are!""Mack, you'd do well to remember your rank right now.""Really? Rank at a time like this? Why don't you shove your rank up your...""Not helping, Hunter.""Guys, stop.""No, it's cathartic. Do you have any thoughts of your own on it, or do you just parrot his?""Coulson's trying to stop HYDRA.""We didn't stop anything! We unleashed something on the planet!""Please.""No one knows what happened yet.""It could have been a lot worse.""And Skye barely made it out alive!""Thanks to Trip. He sacrificed his life, Mack!""No! He traded his life for hers! And then he was shattered into a thousand pieces!""That's enough! If Trip was here, he wouldn't be arguing, he wouldn't be bitching. He would be gearing up to do what needs to be done. Yes, we're dealing with forces we don't understand, but HYDRA I do understand. I want everyone ready when the sun comes up. End of discussion."

3820.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
3820.quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

3821.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3821.quote: "I won't stay long, I just need to use the microwave. I didn't want to disturb May and her ex.""Disturb them from...?""They're in the kitchen, talking.""What are they talking about? Is it about Skye's condition?"" No, it was of a personal nature. Seems that May isn't a good cook.""Something Agent May doesn't excel at... interesting.""Yeah, he teased her about it... she was laughing.""Oh, he makes her laugh! Clearly she still likes him, and have you seen the way he looks at her?""Yeah, I have eyes Jemma, of course I've seen.""I wonder what happened between them, why end it?""They're a bizarre pair. He listens for a living and she doesn't speak.""Well you know what they say, opposites attract."

3822.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
3822.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3822.quote: "What was in the case, Jemma?""Something to help Skye.""Because you want to change her, is that it?""Stop it. I don't want to change Skye, the Diviner did that. I'm just trying to fix her."

3823.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
3823.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3823.quote: "Things change, that's what I'm saying, so maybe if you can learn to control this then you could have Avengers level powers. Something like Captain America even.""I think it best we keep in mind the unstable nature of Skye's power. If there is an Avenger equivalent right now, I'm afraid it's the Hulk.""Well, Hulk saved the world last I checked."

3824.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Leo Fitz
3824.quote: "I hate to see you leave, Turbo.""Only my friend Mack calls me that."

3825.author: Robert Gonzales, Jemma Simmons, Bobbi Morse, and Leo Fitz
3825.quote: "Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons, the ones that got away. I had my eye on you two when you were at the academy. I wanted to recruit you, but Coulson beat me to it. I heard he actually bribed Weaver with cupcakes. Robert Gonzales.""We know who you are, and we are quite aware of your commendable reputation. Under different circumstances, we might even be flattered... Which is why this is so hard to comprehend.""Under different circumstances, we would have preferred to be invited guests, but that forced our hand. We had to take it out of play.""What's inside that's so important?""All we know is that Coulson and Fury both believed it was valuable enough or dangerous enough to protect with extreme measures.""Maybe it was their favorite recipes."

3826.author: Grant Ward, Leo Fitz, Melinda May, Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons, and Daisy Johnson
3826.quote: "Can we just address the elephant on the plane? I know. This is weird. Mistakes were made.""By you.""And people got hurt.""By you.""And I could stand here and explain again how my parents - and brother left me vulnerable...""We've all had our traumas, Ward. Didn't turn any of us into psychopaths.""Well, we all have our own ways of coping, don't we? For example, I was yours.""Watch it, Ward!""Look, I'm just saying we all made mistakes. Coulson handed me over to my abuser, thank you. Skye shot me.""After you killed how many people?""Yeah, and we were a team and a family, and you betrayed us!""know. It's what I regret the most. Not the lying, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents I had to put down, and I'm sorry not even dropping you two in the ocean. It's this. My actions destroyed this. I'll regret that forever. 'Cause there were good times. Right? Before? I mean, for a while there, we were a good team. Weren't we?""(after a dramatic pause) I'm still happy I shot you.""Yeah, me too.""Should've aimed for the face."

3827.author: Gordon and Leo Fitz
3827.quote: "I'm trapped in here! That's not possible! What did you do?!""Science, biatch."

3828.author: Leo Fitz and Yusef Hadad
3828.quote: "I'll open it and give you what's inside, no problem. But only in exchange for something in your possession.""How about in exchange for your life?""No deal."

3829.author: Leo Fitz to Yusef Hadad
3829.quote: "You can spill my guts in the sand and use the case as a booster seat. It's your call."

3830.author: Leo Fitz
3830.quote: "And now I think... I know it's a black hole. It's dark matter made solid. It can warp space-time."

3831.author: Leo Fitz to the Monolith
3831.quote: "Do something... Do something!... DO SOMETHING!... DO SOMETHING!"

3832.author: Leo Fitz, Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
3832.quote: "I won't give up. I can't give up.""None of us want to, Fitz, but...""Fitz, you tried. Okay? You tried your hardest. Everybody knows that.""No. I missed something."

3833.author: Will Daniels to Jemma Simmons
3833.quote: "You talk about him a lot. His name is like your favorite word. I mean, that's... a little bit more than a best friend."

3835.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3835.quote: "You think that I'm not angry? I'm sick to my stomach! I'm furious, but not at you! 'Cause we're cursed! The bloody cosmos wants us to be apart!""The cosmos doesn't want anything.""Yeah, well, I beg to differ. 'Cause we had years side by side. Never occurred to us. And then when it does, we don't have the courage to talk about it.""Well, you only mentioned it at the bottom of the sea, facing certain death!""You wait until I'm bound for a war on an aircraft carrier, and then you get swept off to some far-flung planet. With him. Top-marks pilot astronaut hero man.""I would do anything...""Do you love him?""I don't know. I think... Yes.""Yeah. Yeah, of course you do. Of course you do. He's strong and smart, and you gave each other hope on the edge of nowhere.""Don't do this, Fitz""You think I didn't look for dirt on him? I did. And there's nothing. I can't hate him. He's great. Why else would you fall for him? He did everything right.""And you dove through a hole in the universe for me!"

3836.author: Leo Fitz to Jemma Simmons
3836.quote: "I lost you once. I can't lose you again. I'm just... I'm not strong enough to live in a world that doesn't have you in it"

3837.author: Grant Ward to Jemma Simmons
3837.quote: "I always thought Fitz would give up the world for you. Looks like now he finally has his chance"

3838.author: Hive and Leo Fitz
3838.quote: "They had a chance to become something great, something beautiful, but in the end...""How do you know so much about it?""Because I was there."

3839.author: Leo Fitz and Hive
3839.quote: "You're not Will.""No. Will died saving Jemma... from me."

3840.author: Jemma Simmons to Leo Fitz
3840.quote: "You've been nothing less than extraordinary this whole time."

3841.author: Phil Coulson and Leo Fitz about Androvich
3841.quote: "Minister of Defense, former KGB assassin.""And still at it, apparently."

3842.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3842.quote: "Fitz and I believe the General has the ability to manifest a form of sentient Darkforce, able to shift its density at will.""Judging by the way he's elsewhere at the moment, it operates independently of him."

3843.author: Leo Fitz, Lance Hunter and Phil Coulson
3843.quote: "They've wiped out almost 30 square kilometers of forest just to make room for this place. You wonder why the planet's dying.""Got that right, mate. You and Jemma watch that documentary I mentioned?""Oh, yes! The one about the Amazon? It...""And you'll talk about it later."

3844.author: Jemma Simmons to Melinda May
3844.quote: "Will died trying to save me. And Fitz... Poor Fitz nearly got himself killed a number of times, and that's not even the worst of it."

3845.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons and Melinda May
3845.quote: "Time is an illusion. It's how we perceive the fourth dimension. Simmons.""It's mathematics. He's talking about space-time.""How do you... How can I explain this? Right. We're 3D, yeah? Okay, but imagine... imagine we lived in a 2-dimensional existence... flat, just like a piece of paper. We wouldn't be able to conceive of three dimensions, of... of... of a... a cube or anything that's not 2-dimensional, okay? Yeah. Right, so, we flat paper people would perceive this 3-dimensional cube as many separate 2-dimensional moments. As time passing... the point on the line traveling through space and time.""But, in fact, the cube, the line is fixed.""Yeah, it's just sitting there. There's no future. There's no past. It just... it just is. And nothing you can do will change that.""You're hurting my brain."

3846.author: Leo Fitz and Phil Coulson
3846.quote: "Is there something wrong, sir?""You were there. You saw."""We do what we have to do." That's your words.""Yeah. And that's what I've been telling myself.""And now you don't believe that that's true?""It was true for you. You were left no choice on that planet. You did the right thing, but I crossed the line. Ward deserved to be punished, but no one deserves to have the life...""No, he did deserve it. He did deserve to have his chest caved in...no question.""That's not the point. It was payback. That's not what we do here.""Well, what was the alternative? I mean, letting him live, letting him win?""Don't you see? When I killed him, he did. I knew it would come back to haunt me, I just didn't think it would actually come back to haunt me."

3847.author: Leo Fitz to Jemma Simmons
3847.quote: "Who needs space? Because I've got something magnificent right here."

3848.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3848.quote: "Fitz, it's been 10 years. We can't waste any more time.""Really? 'Cause I thought that ...""Really! And since we're cursed or whatever nonsense...""Oh, I said that one time.""Well, and you and your fourth-dimension idea...""And for the record, actually...""...that we can't change fate.""...today is more evidence that the cosmos is against us.""I'm tired of seeing our friends ripped apart from each other. That can't happen to us again. I won't let it.""Then we won't let it."

3849.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
3849.quote: "When did you...""I thought it would be cool if the Director of S.H.I.E.L.D. had a shield. Fitz agreed, so..."

3850.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3850.quote: "The crux of our relationship is like the singularity in transhumanism.""It is?""Yeah, think about it. Singularity is the defining moment.""The point at which a measurable variable becomes infinite.""Right. So, our friendship is linear. It's simple, comfortable.""Effortless, really.""As soon as we deviate from that path...""... change becomes exponential.""It's point of no return.""Just to be clear. Are you comparing us sleeping together to crossing the event horizon?""Yeah.""It's quite lovely when you think about it like that. And also terrifying.""Yeah, exactly. So... We should stop thinking altogether...""... and just do. Yeah. Of course."

3851.author: Leo Fitz to Giyera
3851.quote: "I have a weapon in place on this plane that's designed to kill you. So if you shoot me, I can't tell you what that is. But you won't see it coming."

3852.author: Leo Fitz to Giyera
3852.quote: "People that are under sway...they're not in control of their actions. They're not bad people. Well...except you. You were a murderous wank before all this."

3853.author: Leo Fitz to Giyera after shooting him
3853.quote: "I did tell you. A few times."

3854.author: Leo Fitz to Phil Coulson
3854.quote: "And for you, Direct... uh, Agent Coulson, with new bells and whistles. And the directions will be there when you boot it up."

3855.author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Leo Fitz and Quake
3855.quote: "Why? Why are you doing this?""Because she's turned her back on us, Mack! Because something terrible happened and she didn't want our help getting through it.""Slow down, Turbo.""We've all been through terrible things, all of us! And we've never turned our back!""I'm... doing what I need to do."

3856.author: Leo Fitz and a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent
3856.quote: "What the hell?!""Director's orders. Stairwell's clear.""I'm sorry. Well, in that case, you should check under the microscope and in the fridge, 'cause those Inhumans can be tricky bastards. Yeah, you can tell the Director this is just one giant snark hunt.""Hallway's clear.""That's British for a bloody waste of time."

3857.author: Phil Coulson and Leo Fitz
3857.quote: "He claims he made a deal with the devil.""Which is nonsense.""You know, the rationalist in me wants to agree, but the skull on fire makes a pretty compelling argument for "hail Satan"."

3858.author: Jeffrey Mace to Melinda May
3858.quote: "I know what agent Fitz means to her."

3859.author: Melinda May and Leo Fitz
3859.quote: "What's going on?""Oh, nothing. Just Mack's the Ghost Rider now, but you can't hear us, so bloody hell."

3860.author: Phil Coulson and Leo Fitz
3860.quote: "Fitz, that was not your call to make.""Absolutely, it is. Whose is it? It's not yours. You're not the director anymore. I have just as much say in this as you do.""What are you so angry about?""Because you used to make decisions like that all the time, and then you stepped down.""I did what was best for S.H.I.E.L.D.""Everybody is trying to do their best to prevent another tragedy like Lincoln. For you and Daisy, that meant throwing in the towel, but we built Aida to protect agents like him.""I didn't throw in the towel. I ran an illegal spy agency using powered operatives on American soil. Do you think the President loved that about me? I had to step down so that you could all continue in S.H.I.E.L.D.""You handed it over to a Director who betrayed Simmons! He sent her off, God knows where! We were having an argument. Now she's out there, alone, and I'm gone.""Listen to me. He would never hurt her. Everything's gonna be all right. We're gonna make sure of that.""All right, well, I need you in this fight, 'cause I got to get back to her.""I'm in this fight."

3861.author: Leo Fitz
3861.quote: "It's made of light, but it's functioning like a corporeal, biological brain. Quantum energy storing data..it's as if synapses are interacting"

3862.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3862.quote: "Maybe I'm stuck in a loop. Radcliffe, Ward, my dad... They're all the same. It keeps happening.""I don't see it that way.""Come on, Jemma. You know that it's true.""Yes, they betrayed you. And after all you've been through, no one would blame you if you put up your own firewall. But you didn't. Instead you became the most open, loyal, caring person I've ever met.""Maybe that's why it keeps happening.""It's why I fell in love with you."

3863.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3863.quote: "Don't do that!""What, help save the day?""No, do that. Just don't risk your life when you're doing it! You could've been blown to bits."

3864.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons and Daisy Johnson
3864.quote: "It's a high-pitch frequency caused by Shockley's cellular vibration.""The ramping up of his kinetic energy at an atomic level, and once it reaches a critical threshold, that massive energy transforms his body from a solid to a flammable gaseous state and then..""Boom."

3865.author: Alphonso Mackenzie to Leo Fitz
3865.quote: "You're one of the smartest people I know. I really hope you figure this one out."

3866.author: Quake to Jemma Simmons
3866.quote: "This is not a sacrifice play. You know why? Because I will beat them, you hear me? I know it, if for no other reason than this: through all the insane crap we have gone through, the one thing I've known without a doubt, the whole time, is that you and Fitz belong together."

3867.author: The Doctor to Daisy Johnson
3867.quote: "I guess you don't know me at all."

3868.author: Jemma Simmons to Grant Ward/Framework
3868.quote: "I know him, not as The Doctor, but as a brilliant awkward heroic scientist named Leopold James Fitz. He is a good man and I love him."

3869.author: The Doctor to Holden Radcliffe
3869.quote: "Look at him! That's my father lying there, murdered in the home that I bought for him. You're gonna lead me to Jemma Simmons, where it is

3870.author: Leo Fitz to Phil Coulson
3870.quote: "I think that I'm a bad person."

3871.author: Jemma Simmons and The Doctor
3871.quote: "I love you.""And you mean nothing to me."

3872.author: Leo Fitz to Aida
3872.quote: "If you really believe that all the awful things you did were not your choice, make your own choice now. Do the right thing."

3873.author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
3873.quote: "She's afraid Fitz will be the same guy he was in the Framework.""No. She's afraid he still loves someone else."

3874.author: Aida and Leo Fitz
3874.quote: "I know you're struggling with who you were in there.""No, I'm not, I'm struggling with who I

3875.author: Phil Coulson to Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3875.quote: "Look, I know you two have still a lot to work out, but right now, I need you on the same page, O.K.?"

3876.author: Leo Fitz and Aida
3876.quote: "O.K., remember what we talked about before?""How there isn't room in your heart for me?""No, that being human sometimes means...""That there's pain and tears and suffering? Yeah, I'm catching onto that pretty quickly. Now I understand why humans have written so many sad songs.""Yeah! Hey, that's a great example. There are lots of ways to express sadness and pain. There's music and art...""And smashing heads on the floor. That's the one I like the best so far."

3877.author: Leo Fitz, Daisy Johnson, Melinda May and Jemma Simmons
3877.quote: "No, I'm gonna stay. This is my fault. Aida, the LMDs, all the deaths. Those aren't on S.H.I.E.L.D., those are on me. And, uh, I can explain that I built the LMD that shot Talbot. That way...""Fitz. We were all in the Framework together. We understand how confusing and screwed-up that world is. And trust me, it's gonna take me years to process everything that happened in there. But the one thing that I don't need time to understand is that we are all in this together. I tried to take the blame for everything not too long ago. I dyed my hair. I ran away. I thought that separating myself from the team would help me protect it. But in truth, I kind of just lost myself. And you... you were the one who pulled me back in. This is not on you, okay? We all lost ourselves in there. And yeah, it might take you a long time to forgive yourself. But speaking on behalf of the team, you have nothing to apologize for.""If there's a price to pay, we pay it. Together.""Amen."

3878.author: Leo Fitz to Lt. Lucas
3878.quote: "As much as you want to find them and bring them to justice, I want to find them so I know that they're okay. I am more than happy to pay for my sins, but I honestly do not know where they are or what happened to them."

3879.author: General Hale and Lance Hunter
3879.quote: "Alright, that's it. We're done with you. No more books, no more television, you've wasted our time. You're going to grow old and die alone in that cell. What? Here? How? ... Your attorney is here.""Get those cuffs off my client and get the hell out of here."

3880.author: Lt. Evans, Leo Fitz, and Lt. Lucas
3880.quote: "In 6 months, you haven't brought us a single plausible theory.""I know, I know, and I have been wracking my brains. But... I think...""No more thinking. You're out of time. We want an answer.""Ok... I have one, I know what happened.""By all means, enlighten us.""...They were abducted by aliens."

3881.author: Lance Hunter and Leo Fitz
3881.quote: "I remember when you couldn't even admit that you liked her.""Maybe it should have stayed that way. Everything that keeps happening to us does seem like the universe doesn't want us to be together.""The universe doesn't want or care about anything. And even if it did, why wouldn it want you to be together? You two are so perfect for each other, it makes everyone a little bit nauseous.""Maybe it's trying to protect her.""From what?""From me. From what I was in the Framework. 'Cause that came from inside me. That's wasn't programming.""Was that the Fitz I saw back at Enoch's place?""Yeah.""I have to admit I kind of liked seeing that side of you. And it worked for us. Got Enoch on the right page.""Yeah, well, it also got people killed.""Look, I don't know what you went through, but I know you're not a cold-blooded killer. Every light needs a shadow. You just have to learn how to control it, use it when you need it.""I can't stand it being anywhere inside of me. I think that's why they left me behind, I think 'cause I'm too much of a risk to them... Too much of a risk to Jemma.""Bollocks. You want to know why you were left behind? Ask the one that kicked you off the guest list."

3882.author: Enoch and Leo Fitz
3882.quote: "While you were asleep, I had time to put a plan in motion. We have a few days before we arrive at the Lighthouse, that should give me enough time to prepare you.""Prepare me for what?""For facing off against some of the most ruthless and brutal mobsters, monsters, and mercenaries in the galaxy. I hope you have it in you.""I have it in me."

3883.author: Phil Coulson and Jemma Simmons
3883.quote: "And now he's frozen, out in deep space somewhere, no idea he's already solved it.""He'll be a little disoriented. But he'll be so happy to know that time is not fixed. It's a fluid, ever-changing, beautiful thing. And he didn't miss much, did he?""I have not a single doubt you will find him.""None of us do."

3885.author: Enoch to Atarah
3885.quote: "Put Jemma Simmons in danger, and Fitz can solve anything."

3886.author: Jemma Simmons to Atarah
3886.quote: "Fitz can't solve time travel without me, but not as a hostage. As his partner. Fitz and I, we're a team."

3887.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3887.quote: "I've imagined this since I was in prison and every day since, and I wanted to do it right, but now we're stuck in another prison, and I don't know if we'll ever be able to get out of it""Fitz.""No, hold on, hold on. Just let me say this. I've realized the universe can't stop us. Because we survived the bomb of the Atlantic, we've crossed the galaxy, more than once, just to be together. So, a love like that is stronger than any curse. You and I, we are uns...""We're unstoppable together.""Yeah, which is why I can't live another day without you. So, I'm asking you, heart in hand. Jemma Simmons, will you marry me?""Absolutely."

3888.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3888.quote: "All my damage comes from you!""Well, all my pain comes from you.""And I'm allowed to want to save you!""I'll save you every time or I'll die trying. I don't care!""ME TOO, BECAUSE I LOVE YOU!""YEAH WELL I LOVE YOU TOO!""WELL THEN, WHY ARE WE YELLING?""I DON'T KNOW!"

3889.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
3889.quote: "Didn't know you liked that.""Didn't know you'd do that."

3890.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3890.quote: "Fitz, we're obviously made for each other, and I'm sorry I can't give you back the time you missed. But I can give you me. Now and forever.""The whole universe couldn't keep me from you, Jemma Simmons. I am the luckiest man on any planet."

3891.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
3891.quote: "It's complicated, but they created these anomalies. But it did provide us with a beautiful wedding venue.""Guess I had to be there.""You were.
