For whatever it's worth, I'm glad you're here.""What?""The circumstances could be better. I'm just saying, you know, I'm glad we found each other.""I'm not hugging you.""You guys ready or what?""No.""No.""Sounds about right."

4177.author: Tyrone Johnson and Solomon
4177.quote: "Luke Cage, huh? I heard about him.""I heard he's bulletproof. And looks just like like us, you know?"

4178.author: Luther Banks and Rosalind Price
4178.quote: "Anyone in particular I should be looking at?""I have a few names. Meanwhile, tighten your belt so they don't catch you with your pants down again."

4179.author: Daisy Johnson and Luther Banks
4179.quote: "Do you really think you can stop me? Do you have any idea what I can do?""Yeah. That's why I have three snipers outside, ready to engage. What's the range on these powers of yours? How good are they?"

4180.author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
4180.quote: "I reached out to the ATCU and talked to that guy Banks.""What did he give you?""Besides a case of the creeps, he said the virus I found was sent out to the other Inhumans they've come across."

4182.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Daisy Johnson
4182.quote: "Been thinking about your ATCU theory. Now, who took off before the convoy left, and who knew the exact route we were going to take?""Banks.""He's got access to everything that ATCU learns about Inhumans.""We should tail him."

4183.author: Daisy Johnson
4183.quote: "This guy is bad news. Got discharged from the Marines."

4184.author: Lance Hunter and Daisy Johnson
4184.quote: "If we test Banks' blood for markers we'll know if he's Inhuman or not.""That's actually kinda smart.""Thank you."

4185.author: Luther Banks to Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
4185.quote: "Come with me, I'll get you out of here. If you're worried you can't trust me, worry on the move."

4186.author: Lance Hunter
4186.quote: "Our friend Mr. Banks has just showed up, and I don't have a handkerchief to cover my face..."

4187.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Luther Banks
4187.quote: "I realize this has gotta be hard on you.""I just wanna get the guy who took Roz out."

4188.author: Jemma Simmons
4188.quote: "He can't make you hurt yourself. Though he did turn poor Mr. Banks' gun on him."

4189.author: M'Baku
4189.quote: "We have watched and listened from the mountains! We have watched with disgust as your technological advancements have been overseen by a child! Who scoffs at tradition! And now you want to hand the nation over to this prince who could not keep his own father safe. We will not have it. I said, we will not have it!"

4192.author: M'Baku to T'Challa
4192.quote: "No powers! No claws! No special suit! Just a boy not fit to lead!"

4193.author: M'Baku to Everett Ross
4193.quote: "You cannot talk! One more word, and I will feed you to my children. I'm kidding. We are vegetarians."

4194.author: M'Baku
4194.quote: "Witness the might of the Jabari! First-hand!"

4195.author: T'Challa to M'Baku
4195.quote: "You have fought with honor! Now yield! Your people need you."

4196.author: Ramonda
4196.quote: "The Herb belongs to us. We may be creating a bigger monster with M'Baku."

4197.author: Nakia to M'Baku
4197.quote: "Great Gorilla M'Baku. This is why we are here. To offer this to you. An outsider sits on our throne. Only you can help us stop him."

4198.author: T'Challa and M'Baku
4198.quote: "Yield! Don't make me kill you.""I would rather die!"

4199.author: Ramonda, M'Baku, Nakia and Shuri
4199.quote: "My son was murdered in ritual combat.""Were the odds fair?""Yes, but...""So it was less a murder than a defeat.""Do not rub our noses in it!""Silence! I make the pronouncements here, girl."

4200.author: Shuri, Nakia, Everett Ross and M'Baku
4200.quote: "The Black Panther lives. And when he fights for the fate of Wakanda, I will be right there beside him.""As will I.""I'm in too. What? You're gonna need all the help you can get.""Are you done? Are you done?"

4201.author: T'Challa and M'Baku
4201.quote: "You know, I could use an army as well.""I bet you could. But no. I will give no Jabari lives towards your cause.""It is our cause. It is for all of us.""Oh, us? Us? You are the first king to come here in centuries and now you speak of "us"?""I cannot speak for past kings. But an enemy sits on the throne right now. We both know the power of Vibranium. If Killmonger gains control of it, who do you think he will come for next?""We will not help you."

4202.author: T'Challa to Okoye
4202.quote: "Send word to the Jabari as well. M'Baku likes a good fight."

4203.author: T'Challa and M'Baku
4203.quote: "Thank you for standing with us.""Yebo, mfowethu.[1]"

4204.author: M'Baku and Okoye
4204.quote: "This will be the end of Wakanda.""Then it will be the noblest ending in history."

4205.author: Leslie Dean and Tina Minoru
4205.quote: "This is why. Why he isn't getting better.""Does this mean what I think?""We're gonna need another sacrifice."

4206.author: Leslie Dean and Jonah
4206.quote: "The light of the stars. The warmth of the sun. The energy of the universe.""Stop.""I can't. There must be something that I can do. Just tell me.""Warm me."

4208.author: Leslie Dean to the PRIDE
4208.quote: "You all eagerly accepted Jonah's gifts. You reaped their enormous benefits over the years. You knew he'd ask for something in return."

4209.author: Jonah to Leslie Dean and Tina Minoru
4209.quote: "No one enjoys a good cat fight more than me, and the thought of you two going at it would be one for the ages, but I think we've had enough drama for one night, don't you think?"

4210.author: Jonah to Janet Stein
4210.quote: "Time is running out. I'll make this easy for you. It's a family problem. Either you get in the box, or your son gets in the box."

4211.author: Jonah and Tina Minoru
4211.quote: "So grateful to have gotten the heads up. Would not have wanted to miss this. Thank you, Tina, you always do the right thing.""What other choice did we have, once Frank killed Victor with his magic mittens?"

4212.author: Janet Stein and Jonah
4212.quote: "Actually, this is all your fault! Whatever Jonah juice he injected into Victor did something to him, something terrible, so if anyone is to blame here, it's you!""We both know that's not gonna happen. Nice try, though."

4213.author: Dale Yorkes, Robert Minoru, Leslie Dean and Jonah
4213.quote: "We only needed to save Victor because you shot him, Janet.""Why don't we go get Frank? Put him in the box. He's not even in PRIDE.""Not the worst idea.""Look, I don't care who you pick. Victor is the only one of you that's actually necessary for this to work. The dig is about to start, and his time is just about up, so I would appreciate it if you choose quickly. Because if I don't revive him, you all die. And so do your children."

4214.author: Jonah
4214.quote: "Fascinating what you can learn watching a child at play."

4215.author: Jonah to Tina Minoru
4215.quote: "They say that raising girls at this age is easier, but when they become teenagers, watch out! That's when they turn on their mothers."

4216.author: Jonah to the PRIDE
4216.quote: "There are many difficult decisions ahead of us. If you question my leadership in any way, the consequences shall be severe. So, let me ask you again. Where are your children?"

4217.author: Stacey Yorkes
4217.quote: "I think this dig has jack-shit to do with renewable energy. Now, I want to know what this asshole Jonah has us working on."

4218.author: Chase Stein and Janet Stein
4218.quote: "Jonah? What the hell is that guy's story?""Chase, I know that this is the most difficult thing that you have ever been through, but I am begging you, do not ask questions. The less you know, the better, about Jonah, about PRIDE, about your father."

4219.author: Stacey Yorkes to Dale Yorkes
4219.quote: "He never really answers a question. You ever notice that?"

4220.author: Tina Minoru and Jonah
4220.quote: "I thought you were sick.""Oh, feeling much better, thanks to all of you. But mostly to you.""What did I do to deserve such gratitude  personally delivered?""Keeping the recording on your server, standing up to the others. I believed in you, and you believed in me.""All I believed is that you would make good on your threats."

4221.author: Jonah and Robert Minoru
4221.quote: "In 1967, in New York City, after weeks of unrest and rioting caused by young people, the news began to run a phrase at the beginning of every broadcast. "It's 10:00 pm. Do you know where your children are?"""If this is another threat, we...""It's not a threat. It's a legitimate question."

4222.author: Jonah, Tina Minoru and Stacey Yorkes
4222.quote: "They've been conspiring against you for weeks, and certain members of our group - Yorkses and Wilders, I'm talking to you - decided to protect Molly by sending her away.""Why didn't you say something?""Oh, why do you think? To keep this asshole from hurting her!"

4223.author: Jonah to Karolina Dean
4223.quote: "Frank has done a wonderful job raising you. I will always be grateful to him, but I think you know the truth. I'm your father. You're a smart girl, Karolina, always hungry for answers. I think last night you got them. I realize how difficult it must be, discovering the truth about yourself with no one to guide you, no one who truly understands. Unfortunately, the truth can make you very lonely. But now... Now for the first time in such a long time I don't feel quite so alone. Maybe I could give you that gift."

4224.author: Karolina Dean to the Runaways
4224.quote: "You guys have to go. He came for me."

4225.author: Geoffrey Wilder and Catherine Wilder
4225.quote: "We all thought we were equals in this.""Turns out there's an inner circle. Jonah, Leslie, and now Karolina"

4226.author: Janet Stein and Stacey Yorkes
4226.quote: "Did you two know that Molly had that strength?""No! We were shocked.""And how do we know that Jonah isn't her father, too?""Alice? No chance! Gross..."

4227.author: Stacey Yorkes to Leslie Dean
4227.quote: "I guess Jonah keeps secrets from you too."

4228.author: Leslie Dean, Robert Minoru and Tina Minoru
4228.quote: "I don't actually know what happened.""I do. Jonah murdered my daughter.""She was looking for Wizard secrets, not PRIDE's! She died for nothing! And you knew. You knew all this time!""I loved him. I trusted him. We we were working toward something bigger. It just happened."

4229.author: Tina Minoru and Leslie Dean
4229.quote: "If we killed you tonight in this basement no one would ever know.""But then you wouldn't be able to get close enough to kill Jonah. And that's why we're all here, isn't it?"

4230.author: Jonah and Frank Dean
4230.quote: "I'm glad you were able to set aside your anger. I think you'll find we both want the same thing.""For Karolina's safety, I'd do anything.""As will I. Our future together is gonna be very bright. And once he's back on his feet, things will get very very interesting."

4231.author: Leslie Dean and Tina Minoru
4231.quote: "I've known Jonah my whole life. But where he came from before that or who he is, I have no idea. I'm only just now realizing how much he kept from me.""Well, great. We may have just helped an alien unearth more aliens?"

4232.author: Leslie Dean, Stacey Yorkes and Dale Yorkes
4232.quote: "You saw her? Why didn't you call me? I would have come right there.""We were on a covert mission.""Emphasis on the "covert". Although he may have seen us.""Oh, he definitely did.""Well, that doesn't make any sense.""I know. Usually, we're so stealthy. But now, if he knows what you two are up to, how are you still alive?""Oh, believe me, we've been sleeping with the lights on."

4233.author: Robert Minoru to Jonah
4233.quote: "The only spider that ever made it into the Minoru house is standing right in front of me."

4234.author: Jonah and Tina Minoru
4234.quote: "I believe this belongs to you.""What have you done to him?""I simply defended myself against another one of your pathetic attempts to kill me."

4235.author: Jonah and Dale Yorkes
4235.quote: "It doesn't matter, because the day after tomorrow, I'll never have to see your faces ever again.""Because you're gonna pull off our faces?"

4236.author: Jonah to PRIDE
4236.quote: "You're talking about this earthquake business again, aren't you? How many times do I have to assure you? Apparently one more."

4237.author: Jonah
4237.quote: "Now we're gonna have to take it all."

4238.author: Catherine Wilder, Stacey Yorkes and Tina Minoru
4238.quote: "Are we just gonna stand for this? He just admitted he has no problem killing one of us.""I think that was well established ten years ago when a certain lab blew up.""Your credibility is razor-thin, Jonah."

4239.author: Leslie Dean to Jonah
4239.quote: "You may be an advanced being, but you're quite the naive father."

4240.author: Jonah and Dale Yorkes
4240.quote: "Who wouldn't want Geoffrey Wilder inside of them?""Don't think that's what he meant.""But your children rescued him. For some reason, with all evidence to the contrary, they still think you're worth keeping alive."

4241.author: Jonah, Karolina Dean and Leslie Dean
4241.quote: "It's a lovely moment. Isn't it? Families reuniting. That's what it's all about. Karolina, all of the  preparation, everything I've done, is so that you and I can have a future together. Come with me.""What? You want me to go with you?""The entire universe is yours. Why did you wait until now to tell me this?""Because I didn't know it was gonna work. But now it has, and we can be a family.""She has a family.""Who won't allow her to be what she is. I'm the only one who understands her. She belongs with me!""I may not know who I am or where I belong, but I'm gonna find out here. With the people I love. I'm not going anywhere with you."

4242.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Jessica Jones
4242.quote: "You look bad.""I need money.""You can have my TV.""Thanks, Malcolm. You keep it.""I stole it.""I figured."

4243.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Jessica Jones
4243.quote: "You use sarcasm to distance yourself from people.""Yet you're still here. Go the hell home."

4244.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Jessica Jones
4244.quote: "Is that real or is it just in my head?""Both."

4245.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Jessica Jones
4245.quote: "You're a good person, Jessica Jones.""You're high."

4246.author: Ruben, Malcolm Ducasse and Jessica Jones
4246.quote: "He came into our apartment by mistake. Guess I forgot to lock the door after I took out the trash.""The elevator went too high.""You're too high.""...Robyn was asleep. I was in the other room with my beetle collection and I heard the door, and then there he was. Eating our peanut butter. Robyn was so scared. She thought he was a rapist or something, till I turned the light on.""It's broad daylight.""We have foil over the windows.""Why? No, I don't want to know.""She hit me with a little man.""It was a trophy.""Of a little man.""It was a little woman, actually. Bowling trophy. She bowls like a dream... I mean, I guess he is kinda scary, if you just wake up and you don't know him and maybe you're a bit racist..."

4247.author: Jessica Jones and Malcolm Ducasse
4247.quote: "You good?""You care?""Just don't wanna be another reason for you to get high.""Don't need a reason."

4248.author: Kilgrave
4248.quote: "Send the picture, save the junkie. Sounds like an ad campaign."

4249.author: Malcolm Ducasse
4249.quote: "There was a kind of freedom to being under Kilgrave's control. You're not a slave to guilt or fear or even logic. You just...do what you're told."

4250.author: Malcolm Ducasse
4250.quote: "It's not just the things that he made me do that keep me up. It's the question of who I am. I mean, he turned me into an addict, a liar, a thief. He did that. But I don't know if it was in me to begin with or...Or if it's part of who I am now."

4252.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Jessica Jones
4252.quote: "The beauty of what he does is that nobody knows how he does this. It can't be explained, so it can't be believed.""It doesn't matter how he does it. It matters where, so I can catch him. Did he have a new favourite bar? Did he catch movies at the Nitehawk? You have to know something!""I know that his powers aren't magic.""How do you know that?""The same way I know that elves don't exist.""I preferred your brain on drugs."

4253.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Jessica Jones
4253.quote: "I went to that group that you told me about. The Kilgrave survivors. It was good, you know, saying it out loud.""I prefer repression."

4255.author: Robyn and Malcolm Ducasse
4255.quote: "I think Jones is hiding something about my brother.""No, I don't think so.""He's been drawing their initials with a big heart around 'em on his Etch-a-Sketch. Something's going on.""It is. They're involved.""She is a sexual predator! He's just a boy!""In his 20s."

4256.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Robyn
4256.quote: "Jesus, what is it with people?""At best, they're assholes. At worst, they're... zombie assassins.""So what, it's just every man for himself, then, huh? Everything I learned in church, all the praying that my mom did for the sick and the dying, all the... all the community projects my dad worked on, basically, everything that they taught me...it was all bullshit? They're idiots and I'm just the only asshole in the world who didn't know?""Yeah, you got duped, mop top."

4257.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Robyn
4257.quote: "Ruben was such a great guy. He was kind and gentle, and...I don't know what he put in that banana bread but...It was like crack. Wait, was it crack?""Nutmeg."

4258.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Claire Temple
4258.quote: "Wasn't that long ago I was trying to get my degree in social work.""Wanted to help people?""I still do.""Well, you don't need powers to be of use.""I don't want powers. I mean, I do not want to be on the receiving end of them either, but...I don't know, I just...I like people too much. Luke, Jessica, just by necessity, by definition, they're separate. Even from each other.""Maybe that's what they need most from us. Connection.""What does that make us? Sidekicks?""Oh, I'm no one's sidekick."

4259.author: Malcolm Ducasse and Claire Temple
4259.quote: "Jessica's got it in her, you know? And she may well never find it, but it is in there.""An alcoholic?""A hero.""Tough business.""So is yours."

4260.author: Trish Walker and Malcolm Ducasse
4260.quote: "If anyone asks, you're a PA. Production assistant. Just like what you do for Jessica, except on a movie set.""You mean, getting yelled at and ignored?""Pretty much.""I got this."

4261.author: Malekith
4261.quote: "The Aether awakens us. The convergence returns."

4262.author: Odin
4262.quote: "Long before the birth of light, there was darkness...and from that darkness came the Dark Elves. Millennia ago, the most ruthless of their kind, Malekith, sought to transform our universe back into one of eternal night. Such evil was possible through the power of the Aether, an ancient force of infinite destruction. The noble armies of Asgard, led by my father King Bor, waged a mighty war against these creatures. As the Nine Worlds converged above him, Malekith could at last unleash the Aether...but Asgard ripped the weapon from his grasp; without it, the Dark Elves fell. With the battle all but lost, Malekith sacrificed his own people in a desperate attempt to lay waste to Asgard's army. Malekith was vanquished and the Aether was no more. Or so we were led to believe."

4263.author: Malekith and Algrim
4263.quote: "Look upon my legacy, Algrim. I can barely remember a time before the light.""Our survival will be your legacy.""The Asgardians will suffer as we have suffered. I will reclaim the Aether. I will restore our world. And I will put an end to this poisoned universe."

4264.author: Frigga and Malekith
4264.quote: "Stand down, creature, and you may still survive this.""I have survived worse, woman.""Who are you?""I am Malekith and I would have what is mine. You have taken something, child. Give it back. WITCH! Where is the Aether?""I will never tell you.""I believe you."

4265.author: Malekith and Thor
4265.quote: "You needn't have come so far Asgardian, death would have come to you soon enough.""Not by your hand!""Your universe was never meant to be. Your world and your family will be extinguished!"

4266.author: Malekith and Thor
4266.quote: "Darkness returns, Asgardian. Have you come to witness the end of your universe?""I've come to accept your surrender."You think you can stop this? The Aether can not be destroyed!""But YOU can!"

4268.author: Mantis
4268.quote: "Ego found me in a larva state. Orphaned on my home world. He raised me by hand and kept me as his own."

4269.author: Mantis to Guardians of the Galaxy
4269.quote: "When I touch someone, I can feel their feelings."

4270.author: Mantis
4270.quote: "I love that scruffy dog, he's so cute I'm gonna die!"

4271.author: Mantis
4271.quote: "The crabby puppy is so cute he makes me want to die!"

4272.author: Drax the Destroyer
4272.quote: "This gross bug-lady is my new friend!"

4273.author: Mantis and Drax
4273.quote: "I am Mantis.""What are you doing?""Smiling. I hear it is the thing to do to make people like you.""Not if you do it like that.""Oh. I was raised alone on Ego’s planet. I do not understand the intricacies of social interaction. Can I pet your puppy? It is adorable.""Yes...""AHH!""That’s called a practical joke!""I liked it very much!"

4274.author: Drax and Mantis
4274.quote: "You are horrifying to look at. But that's a good thing.""Oh?""When you're ugly and someone loves you, you know they love you for who you are. Beautiful people never know how to trust.""Well, then I am certainly grateful to be ugly!"

4275.author: Star-Lord, Mantis, Drax the Destroyer and Gamora
4275.quote: "Hey, can I ask you a personal question?""No one has ever asked me a personal question.""Your antenna. What are they for?""Their purpose?""Yes. Quill and I have a bet.""You're not suppose to say that.""I think that when you are about to go through a doorway that is too low, your antenna feel this and keep you from being decapitated.""Right and if it is anything other than you specifically not being decapitated by a doorway, I win.""They are not for feeling doorways!""Aww...""Ha-Ha!""I think they have something to do with my empathic abilities.""What are those?""If I touch someone, I can feel their feelings.""You read minds?""No, telepaths feel thoughts. Empaths feel feelings... emotions. May I?""Alright.""You feel love.""Yeah, I guess I feel a general, unselfish love for...""No, romantic, sexual love...""No, no I don't...""For her!""No, No, that is not!""She just told everyone, your deepest darkest secret!""Dude, come on, I think you are over reacting a little bit...""You must be so embarrassed! Do me! Do me, do me!""I have never felt this humor!""So unbelievably uncool.""Touch me and the only thing you are going to feel is a broken jaw.""I can also alter emotions to some extent.""Yeah, like what?""If I touch someone who is sad, I can ease them into contentment for a short while. I can make a stubborn person compliant. But I mostly use it to help my master sleep. He lies awake at night, thinking about his progeny.""Do one of those on me!""Sleep."

4276.author: Mantis and Drax
4276.quote: "It's beautiful.""It is. And so are you...On the inside."

4277.author: Mantis and Peter Quill
4277.quote: "I can also alter emotions to some extent.""Yeah, like what?""If I touch someone who is sad, I can ease them into contentment for a short while. I can make a stubborn person compliant."

4278.author: Mantis and Gamora
4278.quote: "You are scared.""What did she do to me?!"

4279.author: Mantis and Drax the Destroyer
4279.quote: "He’s coming.""Didn’t you say you could make him sleep?""When he wants! He’s too powerful! I can’t!""You don’t have to believe in yourself because I believe in you.""SLEEP!""I never thought she’d be able to do it. With as skinny and weak as she appears to be.""I don’t know how long I can hold him!"

4280.author: Mantis
4280.quote: "He is anxious, angry, he feels tremendous loss and guilt."

4281.author: Mantis
4281.quote: "Death follows him around like a shadow."

4283.author: Spider-Man to Mantis
4283.quote: "Please don't put your eggs in me!"

4284.author: Star-Lord, Iron Man, Drax the Destroyer, Mantis and Doctor Strange
4284.quote: "Tell me where the girl is or I swear to you I'm gonna french-fry this little freak.""Let's do it. You shoot my guy, I'll blast him. Let's go!""Do it Quill. I can take it.""No, you can't take it!""She's right. You can't."

4285.author: Star-Lord, Spider-Man, Mantis and Iron Man
4285.quote: "Wait, who are you guys?""Were the Avengers, man!""You're the ones Thor told us about.""You know Thor?""Yeah. Tall guy, not that good looking, needed saving."

4286.author: Spider-Man and Mantis
4286.quote: "What is it exactly that they're doing?""Kick names, take ass."

4287.author: Mantis and Drax the Destroyer
4287.quote: "He mourns.""What does this monster have to mourn?"

4288.author: Rocket Raccoon to Thor
4288.quote: "I lost the only family I ever had. Quill, Groot, Drax, the chick with the antenna! All gone!"

4289.author: Rocket Raccoon and Mantis to Peter Quill and Thor
4289.quote: "I got some blasters unless you guys want to use knives?""Oh, yes, please use knives."

4290.author: Maria Hill and Nick Fury
4290.quote: "Sir, Evacuation may be futile.""We should tell them to go back to sleep?""If we can’t control the Tesseract's energy, there might not be a minimum safe distance."

4291.author: Maria Hill and Tony Stark
4291.quote: "When did you become an expert in thermonuclear astrophysics?""Last night."

4292.author: Maria Hill and Nick Fury
4292.quote: "Sir, how does it work now? They've gone their separate ways some, pretty extremely far. If we get into a situation like this again what happens then?""They’ll come back.""Are you really sure about that?""I am.""Why?""Because we’ll need them to."

4293.author: Maria Hill
4293.quote: "Ah. That thing was squeezing my brain."

4294.author: Nick Fury and Nick Fury's SUV's A.I.

4295.author: Maria Hill and Nick Fury
4295.quote: "This is Hill.""I need you in D.C. Deep shadow conditions.""Give me four hours.""You have three. Over."

4296.author: Nick Fury and Maria Hill
4296.quote: "We need to breach those carriers and replace their targeting blades with our own.""One or two won't cut it. We need to link all three carriers for this to work, because if even one of those ships remains operational a whole lot of people are gonna die."

4297.author: Maria Hill and Captain America
4297.quote: "Okay, Cap, get out of there.""Fire now.""But, Steve...""Do it! Do it now!"

4298.author: Maria Hill
4298.quote: "Hey, What about Jane? Where are the ladies, gentlemen?"

4299.author: Maria Hill to Tony Stark and Clint Barton
4299.quote: "The news is loving you guys. Nobody else is."

4300.author: James Rhodes and Maria Hill
4300.quote: "He’s in your files, he’s in the internet. What if he decides to access something a little more exciting?""Nuclear codes."

4301.author: Maria Hill and Steve Rogers
4301.quote: "Wanda and Pietro Maximoff, twins. Orphaned at ten when a shell collapsed on their apartment building. Sokovia has had a... rough history, it's nowhere special but it's on the way to everywhere special.""Their abilities?""He's got increased metabolism and improved thermal homeostasis. Her thing is neural electric interfacing, telekinesis, mental manipulation. He's fast and she's weird."

4302.author: Nick Fury and Maria Hill
4302.quote: "Still no word from Stark?""No, not yet. We're watching every satellite on both hemispheres, still nothing.""What is it?""Multiple bogies, over Wakanda.""Same energy signatures as New York?""Ten times bigger.""Tell Klein we'll meet him at-""Nick!""They okay?""There's no one here.""Call control. Code Red!""Nick?""Hill? Oh, no. Motherfu-"

4303.author: Nick Fury, Peter Parker and Maria Hill
4303.quote: "We have a job to do, and you're coming with us.""There's gotta be someone else you can use. What about Thor?""Off-world.""Captain Marvel.""Unavailable.""But, I'm just the friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.""Bitch, please, you've been to space!"

4304.author: Maria Hill
4304.quote: "Everything’s changing. A little while ago, most people went to bed thinking that the craziest thing in the world was a billionaire in a flying metal suit. Then aliens invaded New York and were beaten back by, among others, a giant green monster, a costumed hero from the ‘40s, and a god."

4305.author: Maria Hill
4305.quote: "The Battle of New York was the end of the world. This, now, is the new world. People are different."

4306.author: Phil Coulson to Grant Ward
4306.quote: "Agent Hill did a very detailed assessment of your last three missions. Combat, top grades. Espionage, she gave you the highest marks since Romanoff. Under “people skills” she drew a… I think it’s a little poop with knives sticking out of it."

4307.author: Maria Hill and Grant Ward
4307.quote: "What does S.H.I.E.L.D. stand for, Agent Ward?""Strategic Homeland Intervention Enforcement Logistics Division.""And what does that mean to you?""it means someone really wanted our initials to spell shield."

4308.author: Phil Coulson and Maria Hill
4308.quote: "You should go sometime.""Where?""Tahiti. It’s a magical place.""Three days in I’d be begging for an assignment.""Exactly."

4309.author: Victoria Hand and Grant Ward
4309.quote: "I've been on the phone all day Director Fury, Commander Hill everyone wants an update. Frankly, I don't understand it. No single agent is that important.""Coulson is."

4310.author: Eric Koenig and Phil Coulson
4310.quote: "Fury is not dead.""What?""Yeah, HYDRA thinks they killed him, but he managed to escape from D.C.""So you just lied to my team.""Well, I don't know them. And those are Fury's direct orders. Only a select few people can know that he's alive Maria Hill, Cap, a couple of others, and now you and me."

4311.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
4311.author: Lian May and Melinda May
4311.quote: "She won't be hard to find.""I know.""You're not gonna take her out, are you?""No, Mom. I just want to talk.""Good. I've always liked Maria."

4312.author: Maria Hill to Pepper Potts
4312.quote: "Yeah it went as expected. S.H.I.E.L.D. implodes and everyone wants answers. The CIA, NSA, NRO, them I can handle but Congress? Congress is like kindergarten. “Where is this Fridge? What was in there? Who or what is a Man-Thing?” I swear I need a cocktail and a lobotomy."

4313.author: Maria Hill
4313.quote: "Most of the intelligence community would like to drop me into a dark hole. But even they can’t mess with Tony’s army of lawyers. So, for now, we’re privatizing global security."

4314.author: Maria Hill
4314.quote: "Three minutes and twenty seconds, really? If you were my agents, it wouldn't be for long."

4315.author: Maria Hill
4315.quote: "You’re right we should’ve seen HYDRA coming."

4316.author: Maria Hill to Phil Coulson
4316.quote: "We’re not bringing the band back together again, Coulson. It’s over. There is no S.H.I.E.L.D. anymore."

4318.author: Grant Ward to Maria Hill
4318.quote: "A lot of us lost respect for Fury when he picked you as his second. If he needed eye candy around he could've at least picked Romanoff."

4319.author: Melinda May and Maria Hill
4319.quote: "We need to talk Agent Hill.""May, a phone call would have done it, but I appreciate the discretion."

4320.author: Phil Coulson and Maria Hill
4320.quote: "This is one of the most classified facilities on the planet, Colonel. How the hell did you find it?""I told them."

4321.author: Maria Hill and Phil Coulson
4321.quote: "I know you’ll do the right thing.""The right thing? That’s funny, coming from you after everything you and Fury have done."

4322.author: Grant Ward and Maria Hill
4322.quote: "Maria Hill, I kind of hoped you went down with the Triskelion.""And I hoped you weren't the duplicitous lowlife you turned out to be, but here we are."

4323.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Phil Coulson
4323.quote: "The last Stark copper jackets.""I'll make sure Hill puts them on the list."

4324.author: Maria Hill and Phil Coulson
4324.quote: "I bet Gonzales wasn't happy when you said he wasn't invited to this chat.""Yeah, well, I wasn't too happy when he blew a hole in my base and kicked me out. We all live with disappointment, and right now, we have bigger problems.""Does that mean you found it?""I'm guessing HYDRA doesn't know Loki's scepter was the weapon that killed me, but I bet they know it can control minds.""In their hands, that's catastrophic. Coulson, please tell me you know where it is.""Sokovia. I'm pretty sure List is headed there right now. I've just sent you everything I found on Strucker's location.""Coulson, why didn't you just tell Gonzales why you really wanted to get onto the HYDRA base?""Believe it or not, he puts every decision to a vote.

4325.author: Maria Rambeau to Carol Danvers
4325.quote: "You were my best friend. And you were the most powerful person I knew, way before you could shoot fire from your fists."

4326.author: Carol Danvers and Nick Fury
4326.quote: "Who was the pilot?""Um, most of this thing’s redacted, but there is a testimonial here from a Maria Rambeau. Last person to see them alive."

4327.author: Nick Fury and Carol Danvers
4327.quote: "So you think, you’re the pilot that went down with Dr. Lawson?""I’m saying the last person to see them alive will probably tell us.""Maria Rambeau?""Mm-hmm."

4328.author: Maria Rambeau and Carol Danvers
4328.quote: "Where’s your head at?""In the clouds. Where’s yours?""On my shoulders.""Thought we’d show these boys how we do it. You ready?""Higher, further, faster, baby.""That’s right."

4329.author: Colleen Wing, Danny Rand and Mary Walker
4329.quote: "How do you two know each other?""Oh, we... we just ran into each other the other day. Mary's new in town, so I gave her directions.""Yeah, I was all turned around. That's twice now he's gone out of his way to be sweet."

4330.author: Colleen Wing and Danny Rand
4330.quote: "Well, she's an odd one.""Yeah. But I think she means well."

4331.author: Walker and Joy Meachum
4331.quote: "I get it. You guys wanna know the job's not blown, and I'm asking you to take it on faith.""Faith is not a commodity that I trade in anymore.""And I'm not sitting here with my hand on a Bible. I've spent the last 60 days tracking Danny Rand. I know where he sleeps, how he eats, how he thinks and how he fights. And I also know that there are not many people in this world who can handle that thing his fist does."

4332.author: Joy Meachum and Walker
4332.quote: "Can you manage it today?""Yes. Probably. I can take the necessary precautions.""I need you to look me in the eye and tell me that you can pull this off. If you can do that, then I will leave. And I will take it on faith."

4333.author: Walker to Davos
4333.quote: "Lay a hand on me, lose that hand."

4334.author: Walker to Joy Meachum
4334.quote: "Know what it's like to wake up and not know where you are or where you've been or what you said to whom? Do you know what it's like to wake up hungry because some other part of you didn't bother to eat because she wanted to paint pretty pictures instead?"

4335.author: Joy Meachum and Walker
4335.quote: "I need protection. At least until I figure out an exit plan.""I can take your money, run protection, but it's a Band-Aid. If this guy Davos decides he wants to hurt you, all bets are off. And if you don't want to run, you need to eliminate the threat.""Eliminate is a word with connotations.""No, it isn't. It's just what it sounds like. You can look over your shoulder day and night forever, or you can hire me to make the problem go away."

4336.author: Misty Knight to Walker
4336.quote: "Enough! There are a couple of ways this could go. There's no time for a flesh wound, so I will put the bullet between your eyes."

4337.author: Matthew Ellis
4337.quote: "Central to my administration's response to this terrorist event is a newly minted resource. I know him as Colonel James Rhodes. The American people will soon know him as the Iron Patriot."

4338.author: Matthew Ellis
4338.quote: "Tell Rhodes to find this lunatic right now."

4339.author: The Mandarin's message to Matthew Ellis
4339.quote: "President Ellis. You continue to resist my attempts to educate you, sir. And now you've missed me again. You know who I am. You don't know where I am. And you'll never see me coming..."

4340.author: Bill Maher
4340.quote: "And how is President Ellis responding? By taking the guy they call War Machine and giving him a paint job."

4341.author: Aldrich Killian to Pepper Potts
4341.quote: "After years dodging the President's ban on "immoral" biotech research, my think tank now has a little something in the pipeline. It's an idea we like to call Extremis."

4342.author: The Mandarin's message to Matthew Ellis
4342.quote: "My disciples just destroyed another cheap American knockoff. The Chinese Theatre. Mr. President, I know this must be getting frustrating. But this season of terror is drawing to a close. And don't worry, the big one is coming. Your graduation."

4343.author: The Mandarin's message to Matthew Ellis
4343.quote: "Mr. President. Only two lessons remain. And I intend to finish this before Christmas morning. Meet Thomas Richards. Good strong name. Good strong job. Thomas, here, is an accountant for the Roxxon Oil Corporation. But I'm sure he's a really good guy. I'm going to shoot him in the head, live on your television in 30 seconds. The number for this telephone is in your cell phone. Exciting, isn't it, imagining how it got there? America, if your president calls me in the next half-minute, Tom lives. Go!"

4344.author: The Mandarin's message to Matthew Ellis
4344.quote: "There's just one lesson left President Ellis so run away, hide, kiss your children goodbye because nothing, not your army, not your red, white and blue attack dog can save you! I'll see you soon.""

4345.author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
4345.quote: "We gotta make a decision. We can either save the president, or Pepper. We can't do both."

4346.author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
4346.quote: "Give me some good news, man.""I think they all made it.""Oh, thank God.""Yeah, but I missed the president.""You couldn't save the president with the suit, how are we gonna save Pepper with nothing?"

4347.author: James Rhodes to Matthew Ellis
4347.quote: "You look damn good, Mr. President, but I'm gonna need that suit back."

4348.author: Eric Savin and Matthew Ellis
4348.quote: "It is an honor, Mr. President.""If you're gonna do it, do it!""Whoa! Cool your boots, sir. That's not how the Mandarin works."

4349.author: Matthew Ellis and Aldrich Killian
4349.quote: "What do you want from me?""Uh...nothing, sir. I just needed a reason to kill you that would play well on TV. You see, I've moved on. I've found myself a new political patron, and at this time tomorrow, he'll have your job."

4350.author: Matthew Ellis
4350.quote: "You elected me on a single platform: I will defend this country at all costs. The Mandarin

4351.author: Matthew Ellis responds to the return of Captain America

4352.author: Raina
4352.quote: "The Clairvoyant can see within any agency, any government. He knows what the President dreams about at night."

4353.author: A news reporter
4353.quote: "Today, world leaders are scrambling for answers after the world's most advanced spy agency was crippled by a series of attacks. The president contends this is the biggest intelligence leak in world history. But what's even more disturbing are the documents released from S.H.I.E.L.D. show clear evidence of human experimentation, stockpiles of WMD all concealed by a massive cover-up. With world security at stake, officials everywhere are calling for S.H.I.E.L.D...."

4354.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
4354.author: A conversation on the radio
4354.quote: "-another example of this administration's lack of transparency.""You can't seriously be blaming the president for this.""Those who let S.H.I.E.L.D. operate without oversight should be held accountable.""If your party held the White House, would you be taking this position?""If my party held the White house, we

4355.author: Matthew Ellis' speech to the American people
4355.quote: "Good evening. I'm here tonight to address growing concerns among our citizens of the threats we face that are not of this world. I don't need to remind people of the catastrophes in New York, London, and most recently Sokovia, tragedies that seem to be growing in number and scale. And the organization we had in place to protect us, S.H.I.E.L.D., brought airships raining down in our nation's capital. Every day, new dangers present themselves, filling our peaceful streets with chaos. By executive order, I have created a special task force to neutralize these alien threats on our soil. The Advanced Threat Containment Unit, or ATCU, will be given full license to act with whatever authority is necessary. The laws of nature have changed. And until the laws of man change to reflect that, we must do what we feel is right."

4356.author: Reporters and Matthew Ellis
4356.quote: "Mr. President, how do you respond to reports that the recent incidents are, in fact, due to the spread of an alien contagion?""These are rumors. They are not true. They are fabrications meant to boost ratings and cause hysteria. Any and all possibilities are being taken very seriously by the ATCU.""But if this is an outbreak, shouldn't the public be made aware?""I think we should be careful, the words we start throwing around. The last thing we need is panic in the streets. Any threat will be eliminated, I can assure you. People have a right to know.""Are the infected among us?""Thank you. That'll be all for today."

4357.author: Phil Coulson to Rosalind Price
4357.quote: "I have another theory. The president makes a big speech about this new organization he's put in place. I imagine that puts a lot of pressure on you to show results."

4358.author: Phil Coulson
4358.quote: "I can't believe I'm saying this, but the president's gonna have to wait."

4359.author: Gideon Malick to Andrew Garner
4359.quote: "I'm Gideon Malick. I advise the president's staff, And I want to assure you that we're working with S.H.I.E.L.D. to do everything we can to help you."

4360.author: Rosalind Price and Phil Coulson
4360.quote: "Gideon Malick.""I know the name. Industrialist. He once served on the World Council.""He's a friend. I've worked with him more than a decade. H-He advises the president's staff, helped design the ATCU, oversees the science division. He gave me the T.A.H.I.T.I. intel."

4361.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4361.quote: "Can I ask, why here?""I want him to see where it happened. Besides, I wasn't about to give him the location of our base. And apparently, he didn't want to invite us to his house."

4362.author: Phil Coulson and Matthew Ellis
4362.quote: "Mr. President.""Director Coulson. Thank you for meeting me. Long overdue. Rosalind spoke highly of you. She believed that I should be working with S.H.I.E.L.D. I did always value her judgment. I'll miss her.""I assume we're not here to share memories of a fallen friend.""This-- this problem Rosalind said you called them Inhumans? Heads of state calling, not sure what's happening. Watchdog agencies hurling accusations. Fox News won't shut up. I don't need to tell you how delicate the situation is, but we have to do something.""With all due respect, Mr. President, we are doing something."

4363.author: Glenn Talbot and Carla Talbot
4363.quote: "Don't leave like this, Carla. It's not my fault. I just couldn't say no to the president.""Yes, you could have. You just didn't want to. You're always choosing career over family, Glenn."

4364.author: Glenn Talbot and Phil Coulson
4364.quote: "I didn't ask to get put in front of this sideshow circus. If I find out you had anything to do with it--""It was the president's idea, as was the symposium in Taiwan that we're supposed to be getting ready for."

4365.author: Glenn Talbot, Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
4365.quote: "He doesn't go, I don't go.""Fine. We'll go without you. We don't need him.""Actually, we do. If the acting head of our own ATCU doesn't show up, it sends a bad message not to mention it will embarrass the president and destroy any hope of an international coalition."

4366.author: Glenn Talbot and Phil Coulson
4366.quote: "You must be loving this.""You're the president's official representative. It's a customary way to honor them for hosting this symposium, and you look very dignified."

4367.author: Anton Petrov to Glenn Talbot
4367.quote: "Please thank your president for organizing this. I think we will all find it very valuable."

4368.author: Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons and Melinda May
4368.quote: "We were lucky President Ellis even got Interpol to step in. They walk free, but they cannot be agents.""So that's it? We're just leaving them?""It was all we could do to keep them from being executed. Relations between the President and Prime Minister are already badly strained because of the growing alien threat. And if they found out S.H.I.E.L.D. was up and running, training Inhumans as agents...""It would be bad. Like Cold War bad. Bobbi and Hunter never cracked under questioning, even to save each other. They did that for S.H.I.E.L.D. They did that for us, and they paid the price."

4369.author: Dimitri Olshenko, Matthew Ellis and Phil Coulson
4369.quote: "I don't believe any of this. These two are obviously working for either your government directly or indirectly, as agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.""You know very well, Prime Minister, there is no S.H.I.E.L.D. It was dismantled.""Mr. President, do you think we are all naive? S.H.I.E.L.D. is alive and well and working with your government to get ahead of us.""Ahead of you? What are you talking about?""There is a new arms race in our future the race for powered individuals. You know this.""What I know, Dmitri, is that there was an attempt on your life a coup and if I were you, I'd be grateful to the people who intervened.""Let's be frank, Matthew. What matters here is only how things appear. And for me, this appears to be a disaster. This incident will go public, and I will have to explain how not one, not two, but three members of my government were murdered.""To be fair two of them were trying to kill you sir.""Remind me who is this man?""Advisor to our ATCU. He, uh he tracks enhanced threats.""Threats like your very own Minister of Defense, General Androvich, who I believe was trying to assassinate you.""So you claim. Mr. President, if you do not wish to escalate hostilities between our nations, you will do what is right. Someone must pay for what happened here. And it will not be me."

4370.author: Jemma Simmons to Melinda May
4370.quote: "As soon as Talbot gave the location of this base to the president, things changed. I knew we'd be divided, undermined, kept in the dark, so I have been clawing for as much power as I can possibly grab to keep a modicum of control over any of this."

4371.author: Jeffrey Mace and Phil Coulson
4371.quote: "Phil, am I getting something wrong? This was your idea. When you stepped down, you told the President you didn't want to be the face of the Agency.""For a whole host of reasons.""And you said we needed a new face. And now that Steve Rogers went AWOL, you wanted a hero.""I said the new Director should be a powered person the public could trust. And they came up with you.""And now you're stuck with me."

4372.author: Jeffrey Mace to Phil Coulson
4372.quote: "I need a win, Phil, with a capital "W." Been on the phone with the President. He says if we don't have answers soon, he's gonna do something--"

4373.author: Jeffrey Mace on the phone with Matthew Ellis with an interruption from the Watchdogs
4373.quote: "Yes, Mr. President? Uh, watching now, sir.""We now control seven cities. If you do not end the Registration of Inhumans in 24 hours, we will black out seven more.""Yes, Mr. President. I understand the gravity of the situation. Just give me one more hour. Agent Coulson and his team are on the case. Thank you, sir. The President wants to send troops into the blackout zones, take out the Inhumans by any means necessary."

4374.author: Jeffrey Mace on live television
4374.quote: "Hello, everyone. I'm Jeffrey Mace, and the President has asked me to address recent events that have many of you concerned."

4375.author: Phil Coulson to Leo Fitz
4375.quote: "I ran an illegal spy agency using powered operatives on American soil. Do you think the President loved that about me? I had to step down so that you could all continue in S.H.I.E.L.D.."

4376.author: Glenn Talbot to Matthew Ellis
4376.quote: "Mr. President. We don't know who survived, but I've got our top agents searching for the Quinjet. Agent Burrows has the package, but we don't know if he was onboard. Yes, sir. Let's hope for all our sakes that Director Mace got it."

4377.author: Glenn Talbot
4377.quote: "The President tasked me with finding the next Captain America. Not an easy job, but I did it. I delivered a Patriot A bona fide American hero!"

4378.movie: WHIH Newsfront Exclusive: President Ellis Discusses the Avengers
4378.author: Matthew Ellis
4378.quote: "We've experienced a series of grave events that have had severe repercussions. I am completely sensitive to the fear and concern that creates. But at the same time, I recognize what men like Tony Stark, Steve Rogers and others have done in the face of these attacks."

4379.movie: WHIH Breaking News: Attack in Lagos
4379.author: Matthew Ellis
4379.quote: "Good evening, ladies and gentlemen. I've just been briefed on the developing situation in Lagos, Nigeria. Secretary Ross has contacted their president and assured him that we will do whatever it takes to support our friend and ally. It is crucial that we unite and stand together to ensure that peace and security prevail over chaos and fear. In the coming days, my administration will work directly with the United Nations to find the people responsible for this catastrophe and hold them accountable to the full extent of the law. With courage, and with compassion, the international community will help support Lagos during their time of need. Thank you and may God bless."

4380.author: Karnak to Black Bolt
4380.quote: "Maximus, right or wrong, is dangerous. You think you're being tough with him, you are not. He has the ear of the people, and he undermines your decisions. You're blind to his intentions. That's one of your greatest weaknesses. Regardless, you have my loyalty. Never doubt that."

4381.author: Maximus to Medusa
4381.quote: "I'm sorry... But you have given me no choice."

4382.author: Maximus to Medusa
4382.quote: "You ever wonder, what your life would be like if you hadn't entered that chamber?"

4383.author: Maximus to Black Bolt
4383.quote: "You should have known that this day was coming, but you didn't did you? You've so completely taken me for granted, that you can hardly imagine that I have thoughts of my own. That I can...carry through."

4384.author: Maximus to Gorgon
4384.quote: "I'm not one of them Gorgon! I've never been to Earth, regardless of what my genes might suggest I'm an Inhuman like the rest of you."

4385.author: Maximus and Medusa
4385.quote: "Nothing? You have nothing to say? We need to go to Earth now, we need to strike first. We've been hiding here too long, let's go to our rightful home!""We are not going to Earth anytime soon."

4386.author: Maximus and Crystal
4386.quote: "Honor me as your new King.""Never. You're just a human."

4387.author: Crystal
4387.quote: "Esteemed honorary guests, Genetic Council, my brother-in-law Maximus would like me to say a few words on his behalf. Here's what I have to say. Maximus is King. Of no one."

4388.author: Kitang and Maximus
4388.quote: "As you know very well, determining the gifts bestowed upon us by the Terrigen Crystals are not always apparent or easily discovered. That said, after comprehensive analysis, we've determined the of nature your transformation.""I feel no different. No difference whatsoever.""Maximus, your transformation wasn't made manifest until we looked more into your DNA. It would seem that you are, in fact, no longer Inhuman.""What? What are you talking about? Of course I'm Inhuman.""I'm afraid not. You are now, down to the deepest cellular level of your being, merely human.""But...""And, as I'm sure you understand, no human can ever be king of the Inhumans."

4389.author: Maximus and Tibor
4389.quote: "Is that what you tell yourself at night? Why it was acceptable to leave me when my Terrigenesis made me human? "Leaving" isn't the right word. That would imply a proper goodbye. You, like everyone else, abandoned me.""No one had become a human before.""But you were my friend! And I was all alone.""And I'm still your - your friend.""For how long this time? Time will tell."

4390.author: Medusa and Maximus
4390.quote: "How long until you have to return to the scanner?""That's for me to know.""Must be close to an hour by now. Are you willing to die?""I can terminate the destruction plan anytime I like. But it will be when I have successfully rounded up our family.""I am your family. And look at me. Look at what you have done to me. Does it make you feel good to see me this way?""Now you are more like me. Almost human. Now you know how it feels when people stare at you, dismiss you. Like you did to me... so long ago.""You're right. I did treat you like everyone else. I ignored you. I put our friendship behind us. And maybe if I had been a better friend, we wouldn't be here. But here we are.""You were my only friend. I had no one.""Which is why... maybe you wanted to be someone.""King.""The fill the emptiness inside, but that is not a stable foundation for leadership. If you truly care about Attilan, you would - you would never destroy it!"

4391.author: Medusa, Maximus and Auran
4391.quote: "Many of you know the story of my parents, who had a different vision for the future of Attilan, one of tearing down the walls of class that divide us, a vision that might seem to be shared by Maximus. But in truth, he is willing to endanger you all to achieve his selfish needs. Maximus has forced us into an era of change. But we would like to continue it in a more positive direction. But that next chapter will not be here. Because Maximus has compromised the protective shield that surrounds our home. We can no longer stay on the Moon. It is time for us to return to our homeland - to Earth. And Black Bolt and I will lead the way.""She's lying. Every word she says is a lie!""Because how can you trust a leader who puts his needs before yours?""The people will never follow you!""Black Bolt and I will ensure that the people of Attilan will survive on Earth.""Attilan is mine, not yours.""It's ours.""If I can't have Attilan, no one will. I will let the dome collapse and suck the life out of every one of you! "

4392.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
4392.quote: "Hello. I'm Medusa. I know everyone's afraid of you, but I'm not."

4393.author: Medusa and Maximus
4393.quote: "We are not going to Earth anytime soon. It would only lead to war.""I'm sorry, Medusa. Are you speaking for yourself or for our King?""I'm speaking for myself.""Excellent. Now, please, can you tell us what the King thinks?"

4394.author: Maximus and Medusa
4394.quote: "This is difficult, I know. But I'm here for you.""Thank you. But there's not much in this life that I can't handle.""You mean that Bolt can't handle. The rest of us have no choice. We're just bounced around according to his will.""Careful.""I'm just telling the truth. I would never treat you the way he does if you were my Queen."

4395.author: Sammy to Black Bolt
4395.quote: "I get it. You can't talk. Were you experimented on? Did you get bit by a radioactive bug? Or maybe you woke up one morning covered in a funky, rock-like crust? Yeah. You know what I'm talking about. Look, I'm not your enemy. I just wanted to warn you. People like you are disappearing from all over. You got family? A wife? Me, too. If I were you, I'd get out any way I could, and find them before something bad happens to them, too."

4396.author: Louise Fisher and Medusa
4396.quote: "Do you have a job on the Moon?""I'm their Queen.""No wonder you're so bossy.""Queen... Queen Medusa and King...""Black Bolt.""Ugh. Suddenly, "Louise" doesn't sound so bad."

4397.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
4397.quote: "They don't understand because you've been guarded for so long. Maybe it's time everyone knows you like I do."

4398.author: Medusa and Maximus
4398.quote: "Black Bolt says that when he gets home, he wants to have a few words with you.""Tell my brother I look forward to the family reunion."

4399.author: Louise Fisher and Medusa
4399.quote: "You married the son of the people who banished your parents?""It's not like it sounds. We were alone. His parents died shortly after mine did. We understood loss. It connected us."

4400.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
4400.quote: "Why did I bring my parents up? I brought them up because when you became King, you said you never wanted to be like your own parents, like any other King before you. I'm reminding you that you promised me that you would be more understanding. Yes, he hurt me, and there's a part of me that wants him to pay for that, but we have to be bigger than that. So, to answer your question, no. No, we don't just let him walk away. We give him a fair trial. We let the people decide. Look. I am not trying to protect Maximus. I am trying to protect you. From yourself."

4401.author: Auran to Medusa
4401.quote: "I'm curious if Black Bolt still has that frankly disgusting fondness for his human friends Declan and Sammy."

4402.author: Medusa and Gorgon
4402.quote: "He said we need to take down Maximus, but what he means by "take down", I'm not exactly sure. I know I said we needed to throw Maximus off the highest wall in Attilan, but I think I think we need to take him alive.""Then let me smash his head in in front of the whole city.""Gorgon, I love you, but you are not helping. Haven't we learned anything from my parents?"

4403.author: Medusa to the Attilan Royal Guard
4403.quote: "I suggest you stop, unless you want to deal with my husband."

4404.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
4404.quote: "I want to do more than survive. Is this the life that you wanted? I understand that you have to deal with reality, and I know that Maximus sent assassins. But where does this end? And what if the parley doesn't work? I understand more than most what Maximus is capable of. And I know he has to pay for his actions, but please... please!"

4405.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
4405.quote: "You allowed us all to mourn Triton's death. You deny us our dignity when you lie. But it is your duty as my husband to be honest to me in all things, to make me your partner. When you make a decision like this, when you sideline me, it is insulting. This time away, on Earth, it allowed me to step back and take a look at things, to see how people perceived me. Us. And I love you, and that has never changed. But I am not going to just be your interpreter. I need to have a say in in the things that affect our people, our lives. I am the Queen, and we move together or not at all."

4406.author: Medusa
4406.quote: "We can no longer stay on the Moon. It is time for us to return to our homeland. To Earth. And Black Bolt and I will lead the way."

4407.author: Medusa
4407.quote: "He says that he needs to resolve this, that Maximus is too dangerous to leave unchecked."

4408.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
4408.quote: "You should be happy. You saved the Inhumans."

4409.author: Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
4409.quote: "Is that who I think it is?""She's just the pilot.""Melinda May is just the pilot?""

4410.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4410.quote: "I'm not going back in the field.""Yeah. You've got such a nice setup here. You ever thought about adding a moat? I just need you to drive the Bus, liaise ground transport, some on-site supervision. This isn't a combat op.""Then you don't need me. "

4413.author: Grant Ward and Melinda May
4413.quote: "Forgot I was working with 'The Cavalry'.""Don't ever call me that."

4414.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May
4414.quote: "You forget I saw plenty of action with the Avengers.""And you died."

4415.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May
4415.quote: "You told me that you were ready for combat. That you had my back.""Don't ever doubt it.""

4417.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4417.quote: "His file didn't say anything about him being psychotic, did it?""No. It just said he was kind of a tool."

4419.author: Melinda May
4419.quote: "Coulson's got you used to the way we do things here. The Hub? That's different."

4420.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May
4420.quote: "Will you help me find out what really happened?""Dangerous waters. But, I can try.""

4421.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
4421.quote: "She didn't have a gun. None of us did. And it wasn't a rescue, or assault, whatever they say at the Academy these days. We were the welcome wagon, and it went south.""How many-""Plenty. A civilian girl and a few of our guys were stuck inside a building being held by the followers of this gifted individual or worshipers. we never found out.""May did.""She took it upon herself to get them out. Said she could fix the problem. So she went in, crossed off the enemy force. Didn't say how.""Did she lose anyone in there?""Herself. May used to be different. She was always quiet, she was just... she was warm. Fearless in a different way. Getting in trouble, pulling pranks, thought rules were meant to be broken. Sound familiar? But when she walked out of that building, it was like that part of her was gone. I tried to comfort her, but she wouldn't tell me what went down in there.""What did you say?""I said the words I thought she needed to hear."

4422.author: Melinda May to Tobias Ford
4422.quote: "You can't undo what's been done, that will be with you, forever."

4423.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May
4423.quote: "What did you say to him?""Same words you said to me in Bahrain."

4428.author: Victoria Hand and Melinda May
4428.quote: "You supported my decision to throw Skye off the Bus.""Seems like it worked out.""Seems like you played me."

4429.author: Melinda May to Phil Coulson
4429.quote: "Agent Ward and I been having sex."

4430.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May
4430.quote: "That's the thing about Skye. What I told her shattered her world. Her lifelong search led to stories of murder, and now it's too difficult to continue. Her search is over. Her story ends here. But you know what she said?""Tell me.""She said no... her story started here."

4434.author: Melinda May
4434.quote: "The one to blame is the man who shot her. Ian Quinn."

4436.author: Melinda May
4436.quote: "When you're up against people who are being controlled, sometimes it's hard to distinguish friend from foe."

4437.author: Melinda May to Nick Fury
4437.quote: "Agent Melinda May. Update log 93. He knows. I repeat. Coulson knows."

4438.author: Lorelei
4438.quote: "Is this her? The brave warrior with a heart of ice?"

4441.author: Skye and Melinda May
4441.quote: "You know, I never gave you enough credit for this whole zen-warrior thing. But I got to admit, it'd be nice to feel nothing right now.""You think I don't feel anything?""Look at you. You're a statue. And you and Ward had a thing. So if anyone should be furious...""I'm furious. But I'm sure as hell not gonna waste it on a tantrum. I'm gonna mine it, save it... and when we find Ward, I'm gonna use every bit of it to take him down.""Wish I knew how to use that hate-fu.""I'm up most mornings at five."

4442.author: Grant Ward and Melinda May
4442.quote: "Reminds me of the old days.""You were never on top."

4443.author: Grant Ward
4443.quote: "And you said our thing was no-strings-attached. Looks to me like the ice queen got her feelings hurt."

4444.author: Melinda May
4444.quote: "I will pay $500 right now for a pair of flats."

4446.author: Skye and Phil Coulson
4446.quote: "Wait, what was that?""Yeah. That's May.""Well, is she ok? Is everything ok?""She's fine. She's laughing. I think the worst of it's over now."

4447.author: Skye
4447.quote: "She just said more words than I've heard her say in a year."

4448.author: Phil Coulson learns Agent 33 is an impostor

4449.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May
4449.quote: "Come on. We used to have fun like this in our youth. You know you enjoyed it.""Yes. Then life happened. Nostalgia's fine, but I'd rather deal with reality."

4451.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4451.quote: "This is the part I do. It'll make up for the dancing.""You liked it.""I didn't.""Little bit?""...Little bit."

4452.author: Sunil Bakshi and Melinda May
4452.quote: "Where are you based?""Currently? About five seconds away from kicking your ass."

4453.author: Lance Hunter and Melinda May
4453.quote: "Try being married to somebody who remembers every single little detail. It's not that charming. ...You think I'm being petty, don't you? Well, I'm not. I don't have a problem with Bob kissing that guy.""Good. Because you had a hickey on your neck for a week after our mission in Miami.""Well excuse me doing my job thoroughly. And with style."

4454.author: Melinda May to Lance Hunter
4454.quote: "Hunter, you know I don't like you, right?"

4455.author: Melinda May (Skye's dream)
4455.quote: "Sacrifices have to be made. Poison tree, poison fruit."

4456.author: Skye and Melinda May
4456.quote: "He did it. You know Ward did it.""No doubt in my mind.""The senator should have let us help.""We tried. But he wanted nothing to do with us. All we can do now is try and catch Ward.""Or put the son of a bitch down."

4457.author: Phil Coulson, Alphonso Mackenzie, Melinda May, Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse, Skye, and Leo Fitz
4457.quote: "I shouldn't have to ask any of you to save one of our own.""You never ask! You just give your orders, no matter cracked up they are!""Mack, you'd do well to remember your rank right now.""Really? Rank at a time like this? Why don't you shove your rank up your...""Not helping, Hunter.""Guys, stop.""No, it's cathartic. Do you have any thoughts of your own on it, or do you just parrot his?""Coulson's trying to stop HYDRA.""We didn't stop anything! We unleashed something on the planet!""Please.""No one knows what happened yet.""It could have been a lot worse.""And Skye barely made it out alive!""Thanks to Trip. He sacrificed his life, Mack!""No! He traded his life for hers! And then he was shattered into a thousand pieces!""That's enough! If Trip was here, he wouldn't be arguing, he wouldn't be bitching. He would be gearing up to do what needs to be done. Yes, we're dealing with forces we don't understand, but HYDRA I do understand. I want everyone ready when the sun comes up. End of discussion."

4458.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4458.quote: ""You'll never take us alive"? Really? That's a little over the top, don't you think?""I only had a day to come up with this whole thing. Besides, if I let you write the script, no one would say anything."

4459.author: Melinda May and Skye
4459.quote: "Not bad. But once I'm pinned, you should try for a finishing blow.""You want full Mortal Kombat?""I want you to stop holding back, Skye.""I didn't want to hurt you... I didn't want to try to hurt you. I feel like I'm constantly on the verge of... I don't know.""Look... we lost Trip, and it hurts like hell, but you can't shut those feelings out. Can't sustain that.""What's my option? I just might lose it right here?""We've talked about this. Control. Embrace your emotions, your nerves. Use them... on your terms.""I don't know. What I'm feeling... is pretty dark. I'm afraid I'm gonna go postal and tear your head off.""Go for it. I promise you won't."

4460.author: Sif, Phil Coulson, and Melinda May
4460.quote: "My mind is that of a lost adolescent. I can provide no information of value.""Not totally true. Judging by your clothes, we know you were undercover, probably something you learned after your last visit here. Your usual full-armor look is a little more... conspicuous.""So you are saying I wear that armor most of the time? Does this mean I'm a warrior?""A good one.""A great warrior...""It's just details that you're missing. You must remember things about your home world, right?""Only basic lessons a child would learn.""The name of your sword? What about Thor?""Um... I do not know this word, but when you say it, I want to smile. Why?""Who can explain the mysteries of the Asgardian brain?""I can."

4461.author: Sif and Melinda May
4461.quote: "Yet you do not serve a king?""Not really how it works with us.""I wonder if I serve the king as the great warrior you say I am.""Odin? Oh, we know you do. You've met him.""(Pleasantly shocked)Shut... up."

4462.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
4462.quote: "I won't stay long, I just need to use the microwave. I didn't want to disturb May and her ex.""Disturb them from...?""They're in the kitchen, talking.""What are they talking about? Is it about Skye's condition?"" No, it was of a personal nature. Seems that May isn't a good cook.""Something Agent May doesn't excel at... interesting.""Yeah, he teased her about it... she was laughing.""Oh, he makes her laugh! Clearly she still likes him, and have you seen the way he looks at her?""Yeah, I have eyes Jemma, of course I've seen.""I wonder what happened between them, why end it?""They're a bizarre pair. He listens for a living and she doesn't speak.""Well you know what they say, opposites attract."

4463.author: Andrew Garner and Skye
4463.quote: "I'm not here to discuss my ex.""Did you guys have actual conversations? You know, like pillow talk? Or was it just pillow stern looks?"

4464.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
4464.quote: "What do I think? I think, what the hell Melinda. You show up asking for a favor but when I call you after S.H.I.E.L.D. collapsed to check if you were alright, not a word.""It was a busy time.""Busy? Yeah alright. Thanks for the apology."

4465.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
4465.quote: "I haven't worked with S.H.I.E.L.D. in a long while. I moved on for a reason.""It's a different S.H.I.E.L.D., Coulson's the director now.""Okay, but why me? Is this Skye that bad?""She's that good; good agent."

4466.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
4466.quote: "I talked to your mum, she told me you were alive, we had a nice talk, she invited me over for dinner.""I'm not surprised, she still hasn't forgiven me for divorcing you."

4467.author: Melinda May and Andrew Garner
4467.quote: "Would you consider consulting for us?""No, I can suggest someone but it can't be me. S.H.I.E.L.D. hasn't changed, none of it's changed. There was a reason I moved on back then, and I have another reason now. Those photos on my desk. Goodbye, Melinda."

4468.author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
4468.quote: "I work for S.H.I.E.L.D., I do. I swear. But you don't.""Try again.""What Coulson's doing here, this isn't S.H.I.E.L.D - not the real S.H.I.E.L.D., anyway.""The last person who betrayed me... I broke his larynx. Hand that over."

4469.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4469.quote: "They know all of our protocols. We handed Mack the schematics of our base.""They don't know everything about this place. Not like we do.""She said she was working for S.H.I.E.L.D., Phil. The real S.H.I.E.L.D..""What the hell does that mean?"

4470.author: Robert Gonzales, Phil Coulson, and Melinda May
4470.quote: "You really think they're gonna help you?""Every member of your team is a S.H.I.E.L.D. agent. We'll let them make their own decisions.""Already made mine.""That's really a nice entrance."

4471.author: Melinda May
4471.quote: "The girl...She didn't understand...I couldn't save her..."

4472.author: Melinda May and Andrew Garner
4472.quote: "You're up early.""Hey, we got a family to make, and there's only one way to do that."

4473.author: Grant Ward, Leo Fitz, Melinda May, Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons, and Daisy Johnson
4473.quote: "Can we just address the elephant on the plane? I know. This is weird. Mistakes were made.""By you.""And people got hurt.""By you.""And I could stand here and explain again how my parents - and brother left me vulnerable...""We've all had our traumas, Ward. Didn't turn any of us into psychopaths.""Well, we all have our own ways of coping, don't we? For example, I was yours.""Watch it, Ward!""Look, I'm just saying we all made mistakes. Coulson handed me over to my abuser, thank you. Skye shot me.""After you killed how many people?""Yeah, and we were a team and a family, and you betrayed us!""I know. It's what I regret the most. Not the lying, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents I had to put down, and I'm sorry not even dropping you two in the ocean. It's this. My actions destroyed this. I'll regret that forever. 'Cause there were good times. Right? Before? I mean, for a while there, we were a good team. Weren't we?""(after a dramatic pause) I'm still happy I shot you.""Yeah, me too.""Should've aimed for the face."

4474.author: Phil Coulson and Andrew Garner
4474.quote: "So, May asked off some time for the first time in the history of ever. Does that have anything to do with you being around these last few days?""Now, you know I can't discuss personal matters with patients."

4475.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
4475.quote: "You haven't made a call like this since Bahrain, then I know it's not good. You want to tell me what's going on? How bad are we talking?""There's no way it will end well. Andrew, there's a lot I didn't say that I wish I did.""Me too. Do good Melinda, and get home safe."

4476.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
4476.quote: "I had a great time.""So did I, until you fell off the face of the Earth. No calls, no texts.""That had nothing to do with you."

4477.author: Bobbi Morse and Melinda May
4477.quote: "Coulson still has me off combat duty. The tests say that my lung isn't healed all the way yet.""My test says otherwise. Wheels up in 20. Welcome back, Agent Morse."

4478.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
4478.quote: "I needed time to explain. You don't know how many times I almost told you, but I didn't know how. I didn't ask for this.""Oh god, what have you done?"

4479.author: Andrew Garner and Melinda May
4479.quote: "I don't know what I'll do! Instinct will take over again, like it did at the convenience store.""Instinct?""Look I didn't want to hurt anyone but I didn't know what was happening.""You killed all those people..."

4480.author: Lash and Melinda May
4480.quote: "Move!""Go on, might as well, I've thought about my death enough times."

4481.author: Grant Ward to Andrew Garner
4481.quote: "May thinks I'm a monster but you actually become one. Guess we know her type."

4482.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4482.quote: "It looks good.""Fitz outdid himself on this one. Lots of bells and whistles. It's pretty fantastic."

4483.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4483.quote: "Feels real.""Feels like the others. It's not the hand. It's me.""Maybe you're not supposed to get over it. Some things you can't move past. They scar you, change you permanently.""I don't know what happened there, on that planet.""I do. You joined the cavalry."

4484.author: Melinda May, Lance Hunter and Bobbi Morse
4484.quote: "Great. Coulson's in trouble, the place is crawling with armed HYDRA Agents, and we have no weapons.""Not strictly true. Buon appetito.""I love you.""I don't hate you quite as much."

4485.author: Andrew Garner to Melinda May
4485.quote: "Lash is taking over, I'm about to turn for the last time May. I came to say goodbye."

4486.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons and Melinda May
4486.quote: "Time is an illusion. It's how we perceive the fourth dimension. Simmons.""It's mathematics. He's talking about space-time.""How do you... How can I explain this? Right. We're 3D, yeah? Okay, but imagine... imagine we lived in a 2-dimensional existence... flat, just like a piece of paper. We wouldn't be able to conceive of three dimensions, of... of... of a... a cube or anything that's not 2-dimensional, okay? Yeah. Right, so, we flat paper people would perceive this 3-dimensional cube as many separate 2-dimensional moments. As time passing... the point on the line traveling through space and time.""But, in fact, the cube, the line is fixed.""Yeah, it's just sitting there. There's no future. There's no past. It just... it just is. And nothing you can do will change that.""You're hurting my brain."

4487.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
4487.quote: "When did you...""I thought it would be cool if the Director of S.H.I.E.L.D. had a shield. Fitz agreed, so..."

4488.author: Melinda May
4488.quote: "If I need a gun, I'll take one."

4489.author: Melinda May and Alphonso Mackenzie
4489.quote: "You seem extra motivated.""Daisy was my partner. This is on me.""Why is everyone making this about themselves?"

4490.author: Jeffrey Mace and Phil Coulson
4490.quote: "Melinda May. Now that's a riddle I'd like to solve.""Good luck with that."

4491.author: Holden Radcliffe and Jemma Simmons
4491.quote: "You're ready?""Hell no, I'm not ready! We're about to kill May!""We're about to

4492.author: Melinda May to Quake
4492.quote: "I know what you're doing. Trying to distance yourself from everyone else so they don't drown in your wake? I invented that move. It doesn't work, for one simple reason: Phil Coulson. He found me in that cubicle and dragged me out. He didn't give up on me, and he won't give up on you.""I never wanted that.""Mm-mm, no. You don't get to choose who cares about you. And Coulson... he's got a bigger heart than most. Lincoln wouldn't want you killing yourself over what happened."

4493.author: Melinda May to Nathan B. Nathanson
4493.quote: "What's your name?""Nathanson, m'am. What do you want me to do?""Get lost, Nathanson."

4494.author: Phil Coulson and Melinda May
4494.quote: "May, I need you to hear me. I'm not gone! May, help!""You're not allowed to be gone...not yet.""No, I haven't gone anywhere.""You're not dead."

4495.author: Holden Radcliffe and Melinda May
4495.quote: "Look, if the internet is a garden hose, this book is Niagara Falls, blasting the universe's deepest thoughts through your eyeballs.""It's a piece of technology, a tool.""So's a grenade, until it's in the hands of a child."

4496.author: Holden Radcliffe and Aida
4496.quote: "Agent May is resilient. She never stops fighting, yet she showed more distress before she woke than during the fight.""That's odd.""No. It makes perfect sense. The flaw isn't in the hardware. It was in May herself. The simulation was rejected because Agent May thrives in conflict and chaos, not tranquility. She's a warrior.""You're saying fighting against me stabilized her?""Precisely. If we want her to accept the simulation, we need to give her an opponent to fight, an enemy to vanquish, a dragon to slay.""Shall I design a dragon?""No. I have something else in mind."

4497.author: Aida to Melinda May
4497.quote: "Perhaps you are going to be a problem after all."

4498.author: Aida and Melinda May
4498.quote: "I like you, Agent May. I don't wish for you to suffer. I promise to make this quick and painless.""Thanks. I'm not worried."

4499.author: Phil Coulson to Agnes Kitsworth
