5359.quote: "Funny, Po doesn't look crazy. I'm kidding. He's a walking mug-shot."

5360.author: Phil Coulson and Skye speaking about the Centipede Project
5360.quote: "Their technology keeps advancing at a disturbingly rapid pace. They must have endless manpower, resources.""And someone with a fat wallet."

5361.author: Skye to Victoria Hand
5361.quote: "I know I'm not some bad-ass field agent like May or Ward, but this is what I do. You can't kick me off this mission. Listen, I will do whatever you say. All this protocol crap doesn't matter to me. All that matters to me is Coulson."

5363.author: Skye
5363.quote: "Coulson, Coulson! Come back, come back, come back, come back."

5364.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
5364.quote: "I heard what you did for me. I think it's time that we remove this. Disengage bracelet.""Are you kidding me?""Thought you'd like that."

5365.author: Skye
5365.quote: "Bad seed isn't a S.H.I.E.L.D. term, its just a term."

5366.author: Richard Lumley and Phil Coulson discussing Skye's past
5366.quote: "She wasn't the first one to die. We were headed into the Hunan Province in China. Senior agent had called in an 0-8-4.""An object of unknown origin. We dealt with those before.""He said the entire village had died trying to protect this one. Avery and I were fresh out of the Academy. There were five of us running the back end until we lost communication with the first team. We had been searching. Found the senior agent up under a bridge. He managed to escape with a gunshot wound to the neck, but he bled out. He was still holding on to the 0-8-4. Poor thing was covered in blood. We thought she was dead too, but she was just asleep in a dead agents arms.""Wait, the baby? The girl was the 0-8-4?""If she had powers or something, we never witnessed it. The five of us helicoptered the kid off. Headed home. After we landed, we started getting crossed off.""Executed.""Tortured. Heads bashed in. Then when it came down to Avery and I, we realized that the only way to keep our people and the kid from being hunted-""Was to erase her from existence.""Avery was smart. She used to lead agents credentials to fake a level 8 clearance. She'd set up a nearly invisible protocol. The foster system was ordered to move the kid around every few months.""But they still got to Avery.""She died protecting that secret.""And you left town.""I left everything. I mean whoever killed that kid's family and all those agents was a force to be recon with."

5367.author: Phil Coulson telling Melinda May how Skye responded when he told her about her past
5367.quote: "That's the thing about Skye. What I told her shattered her world. Her lifelong search lead to stories of murder and now it's too difficult to continue. Her search is over. Her story ends here. But you know what she said?""Tell me.""She said no. Her story started here. Her whole life, she thought she wasn't wanted. That she didn't belong, that every family that took her in didn't want her to stay. Didn't care. But all that time, it was S.H.I.E.L.D. protecting her. Looking after her. That's what she took away from the story. Not the family she'll never have, but the one she's always had. Here I am telling her something that could destroy her faith in humanity, and somehow she manages to repair a little piece of mind. The world is full of evil and lies and pain and death, and you can't hide from it. You can only face it. The question is, when you do, how do you respond? Who do you become?"

5368.author: Grant Ward, Jemma Simmons, and Skye
5368.quote: "It's strategic.""It's adorable.""The Tin Man has a heart after all."

5369.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
5369.quote: "When we started this, I told you that you might not like what you learn.""And I told you... That it can't be worse than what I've imagined.""It is."

5371.movie: The Only Light in the Darkness
5371.author: Eric Koenig and Skye
5371.quote: "What is your first name?""Skye.""And what is your last name?""Only name. No family. No family name to inherit.""You gave yourself the name 'Skye'?""Well, the name they gave me at the orphanage was 'Mary Sue Poots'. So..."

5372.author: Raina
5372.quote: "Because inside, I believe she and I have something in common."

5373.author: Skye and Melinda May
5373.quote: "You know, I never gave you enough credit for this whole zen-warrior thing. But I got to admit, it'd be nice to feel nothing right now.""You think I don't feel anything?""Look at you. You're a statue. And you and Ward had a thing. So if anyone should be furious...""I'm furious. But I'm sure as hell not gonna waste it on a tantrum. I'm gonna mine it, save it... and when we find Ward, I'm gonna use every bit of it to take him down.""Wish I knew how to use that hate-fu.""I'm up most mornings at five."

5374.author: Raina
5374.quote: "The evolution he speaks of, she will be an important part of that."

5376.author: Skye
5376.quote: "She just said more words than I've heard her say in a year."

5377.author: Skye and Phil Coulson
5377.quote: "Wait, what was that?""Yeah. That's May.""Well, is she ok? Is everything ok?""She's fine. She's laughing. I think the worst of it's over now."

5378.author: Lance Hunter, Alphonso Mackenzie, Antoine Triplett and Skye
5378.quote: "Ha ha, and no. It didn't work out because interspecies relationships are hard. I was a human, whereas she was a demonic hell-beast.""He doesn't like her.""You don't say.""She's pure evil.""Hey, at least you got away from your ex, the guy I had a crush on is now the psycho living in our basement.""You know, I wish I could relate, but all my exes are awesome.""Is that right? I seem to remember an entire year when you had to pretend you liked quinoa.""Yeah, that was a dark time."

5379.author: Skye to Phil Coulson
5379.quote: "It's all connected. Everything. Ward has information about my father, who just happens to have the alien buzzkill device, which is somehow connected to the writing, that is related to the GH-serum that is in our blood. Like, we're pieces to a puzzle."

5380.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
5380.quote: "How long have you been standing there?""Long enough."

5381.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
5381.quote: "We may actually have a shot at finding the city.""Are you sure it's something you want to dig up?""If we don't, HYDRA will. We need to get there first."

5382.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
5382.quote: "If it starts to leak any fluids, drop it, run.""This doesn't sound like a watch."

5383.author: Skye and Melinda May
5383.quote: "He did it. You know Ward did it.""No doubt in my mind.""The senator should have let us help.""We tried. But he wanted nothing to do with us. All we can do now is try and catch Ward.""Or put the son of a bitch down."

5384.author: Skye and Agent 33
5384.quote: "Stand down Agent 33, we can help you!""I don't need you help."

5385.author: Grant Ward, Skye, and Calvin Zabo
5385.quote: "You're welcome. Now let's get out of here.""Yeah, me too! Come on!""It's safer here. And I'm about to do something to Whitehall. I don't want you to see me like that.""I don't mind... seeing. Hell, I'm happy to help.""No. I get to do this myself."

5386.author: Skye and Calvin Zabo
5386.quote: "Stop it! Stop it or I'll shoot! Dad!""He took something from me.""No. He saved you from killing more people. Now, get up and get away from him.""You have to finish what we started.""No, I don't. I'm not going down there. I'm not gonna change or transform or whatever the hell you think is gonna to happen.""Why can't you see it's a good thing?""Maybe it's all the dead bodies laying around or the fact that HYDRA wants it. I'm gonna make sure the Obelisk never gets down into that city. And you're going to leave. This is your once chance to walk away. Or I will kill you.""Okay. I'll go. But I'll be waiting for you. After you chance, no one else will understand. They'll be afraid. Change is terrifying. But I'm your father, and I love you. I will always love you, Daisy."

5387.author: Raina and Skye
5387.quote: "Your whole life... our whole lives have been leading up to his moment.""Sorry. I don't buy into the whole "this is your destiny" thing. We're taking the Obelisk, and we're leaving. There's too many lives at stake.""You got it all wrong. Whitehall, everyone has got it all wrong. This doesn't destroy. It gives life - new life. We finally get to find out what we become. (the Obelisk floats onto a pedestal)""Make it stop.""I can't. Neither of us can now."

5388.author: Skye
5388.quote: "There is something very wrong with me..."

5389.author: Skye and Phil Coulson
5389.quote: "Did you find Raina's body yet?""There's a lot of rubble to dig through, but not yet. Whatever gas came out of that obelisk hit you, too. That's why we're being extra cautious. It's hard to make sense of all of this.""What? No, it - No, it isn't. We lost. We failed.""Skye, don't say that.""It wasn't because of HYDRA, it was because of me.""Don't blame yourself.""If I didn't go down there, you could have blown the place!""That was one battle. This is a war.""And Ward and my father, the rotten core, the center of everything!""We did not fail! Trip prevented a disaster, and Whitehall's dead. We cut off the head. And while HYDRA scrambles for a new one, I will crush them! I'm gonna make someone pay... whoever the hell it is."

5390.author: Bobbi Morse and Skye
5390.quote: "I've been in quarantine before, and I know it can drive you absolutely nuts.""Thanks. I was beginning to feel like a leper.""Are you kidding? You managed to be taken hostage by three known murderers, you gunned Ward down, then were blasted by an alien chemical weapon and walked out unscathed. Leper? I think you're a rock star."

5391.author: Phil Coulson, Alphonso Mackenzie, Melinda May, Lance Hunter, Bobbi Morse, Skye, and Leo Fitz
5391.quote: "I shouldn't have to ask any of you to save one of our own.""You never ask! You just give your orders, no matter cracked up they are!""Mack, you'd do well to remember your rank right now.""Really? Rank at a time like this? Why don't you shove your rank up your...""Not helping, Hunter.""Guys, stop.""No, it's cathartic. Do you have any thoughts of your own on it, or do you just parrot his?""Coulson's trying to stop HYDRA.""We didn't stop anything! We unleashed something on the planet!""Please.""No one knows what happened yet.""It could have been a lot worse.""And Skye barely made it out alive!""Thanks to Trip. He sacrificed his life, Mack!""No! He traded his life for hers! And then he was shattered into a thousand pieces!""That's enough! If Trip was here, he wouldn't be arguing, he wouldn't be bitching. He would be gearing up to do what needs to be done. Yes, we're dealing with forces we don't understand, but HYDRA I do understand. I want everyone ready when the sun comes up. End of discussion."

5392.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
5392.quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

5393.author: Melinda May and Skye
5393.quote: "Not bad. But once I'm pinned, you should try for a finishing blow.""You want full Mortal Kombat?""I want you to stop holding back, Skye.""I didn't want to hurt you... I didn't want to try to hurt you. I feel like I'm constantly on the verge of... I don't know.""Look... we lost Trip, and it hurts like hell, but you can't shut those feelings out. Can't sustain that.""What's my option? I just might lose it right here?""We've talked about this. Control. Embrace your emotions, your nerves. Use them... on your terms.""I don't know. What I'm feeling... is pretty dark. I'm afraid I'm gonna go postal and tear your head off.""Go for it. I promise you won't."

5394.author: Skye
5394.quote: "My entire life I've been searching for my parents, and my search ended with answers that are so much worse than I could have imagined."

5395.author: Andrew Garner and Skye
5395.quote: "I'm not here to discuss my ex.""Did you guys have actual conversations? You know, like pillow talk? Or was it just pillow stern looks?"

5396.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
5396.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
5396.quote: "What was in the case, Jemma?""Something to help Skye.""Because you want to change her, is that it?""Stop it. I don't want to change Skye, the Diviner did that. I'm just trying to fix her."

5397.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
5397.author: Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
5397.quote: "Things change, that's what I'm saying, so maybe if you can learn to control this then you could have Avengers level powers. Something like Captain America even.""I think it best we keep in mind the unstable nature of Skye's power. If there is an Avenger equivalent right now, I'm afraid it's the Hulk.""Well, Hulk saved the world last I checked."

5398.movie: Love in the Time of HYDRA
5398.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
5398.quote: "I'm sorry about everything that's happening Skye.""Not your fault. The blame begins and ends with my dad.""Well, you wouldn't be the first person to have parents with misguided intentions.""Nope, just the first whose crazy dad lured her to an alien city to get earthquake powers.""Yeah."

5399.author: Gordon and Skye
5399.quote: "What does it feel like, your gift?""I don't know. Um... It's intense. Like 1,000 bees trapped inside of me. And I feel it all the time. It's always there. And I can't stop it.""Why would you want to stop it?""Because I destroy everything around me.""That is simply not true. Every object in this universe gives off a vibration. Did you know that? Nothing rests. Animals, trees, people, even this ratty couch. And you... you have the ability to tap into those vibrations. Don't you see? You can become magnificent. But something's inhibiting you, constraining your energy.""Uh, no. No, no. My, um... my friend's a scientist. She made these to protect me.""Or do they protect people from you?""No, it's not like that. My powers, I-I can't control them. And when I try to, it hurts me.""Most gifts come with a price, but you could learn to manage it. I apologize. I'm saying too much. This is probably not the best place to continue our conversation. You don't have the tools and the understanding that you need just yet.""To do what?""To be who you were always meant to be. Without fear, without pain. We can offer that to you.""How?""I'll take you to a place where you can be with people like us.""Us? How many are there?""You can learn about yourself, your gift. You can be safe. But only if you want to come. When you're ready, I'll find you."

5400.author: Robert Gonzales and Bobbi Morse
5400.quote: "Seven agents down, Calderon barely hanging on, and you want to defend that thing?""What happened wasn't her fault. I was there. Calderon fired at her.""She was armed and hostile.""She was scared and defending herself.""I don't care if she was chasing butterflies. We can't wear kid gloves around something with powers of that magnitude."

5401.author: Lincoln Campbell and Skye
5401.quote: "Imagine a thousand years of evolution taking place instantaneously. That's what happened to you after the mist. These treatments, we're helping your body adjust properly to the change. Transitioning you quickly and painlessly; I hope. We usually like to start the process right after the mist but...""How long? How long, when can I go?""You got places to be, people to see?""I'm worried about my friends. I think they're in danger.""You're the one that's in danger Skye, remember? You're being hunted."

5402.author: Skye and Lincoln Campbell
5402.quote: "Can you warm up food with your powers? Because that would be awesome.""I have never tried; but I did warm up a small pool once.""Any five-year-old can warm up a pool."

5403.author: Raina
5403.quote: "I dream of Skye and her father at dinner. A bouquet of daisies. And she's so happy."

5404.author: Skye and Jiaying
5404.quote: "Something bad happens every time I feel settled somewhere. I'm twenty-five and I have never spent more than two years anywhere. The second I made friends at the orphanage; gone. And God forbid I called a foster family home; pack your bags. I got the news on my birthday once, which is a complete farce because I don't even know when I was born.""I'm so sorry.""S.H.I.E.L.D. was the closest I ever came to having a family. I belonged there, saw what I could be. Even that ended with agents hunting me through the woods.""We're not going to turn on you, or abandon you. This is a safe place.""See, you say that but I know you're not being straight with me. Why do you care if I stay or go? And why are you...""July second. You were born on July second."

5405.author: Lincoln Campbell and Skye
5405.quote: "You know it's really impressive for Jiaying to take anyone under her wing.""Yeah?""Yeah.""I like her. I just... I can't... What's her role here?""Her role is, in charge. So really she must like you.""If she's in charge, how often does she train people?""Since I've been here... let me see... never."

5406.author: Raina, Skye, and Gordon
5406.quote: "Don't give up hope just yet. Skye can save Lincoln. I saw her do it.""Wh- You've *seen* it?""We think Raina's gift may allow her to see things before they happen.""I thought her gift was spinning really fast to collect gold rings."

5407.author: Grant Ward, Leo Fitz, Melinda May, Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons, and Skye
5407.quote: "Can we just address the elephant on the plane? I know. This is weird. Mistakes were made.""By you.""And people got hurt.""By you.""And I could stand here and explain again how my parents - and brother left me vulnerable...""We've all had our traumas, Ward. Didn't turn any of us into psychopaths.""Well, we all have our own ways of coping, don't we? For example, I was yours.""Watch it, Ward!""Look, I'm just saying we all made mistakes. Coulson handed me over to my abuser, thank you. Skye shot me.""After you killed how many people?""Yeah, and we were a team and a family, and you betrayed us!""know. It's what I regret the most. Not the lying, the S.H.I.E.L.D. agents I had to put down, and I'm sorry not even dropping you two in the ocean. It's this. My actions destroyed this. I'll regret that forever. 'Cause there were good times. Right? Before? I mean, for a while there, we were a good team. Weren't we?""(after a dramatic pause) I'm still happy I shot you.""Yeah, me too.""Should've aimed for the face."

5408.author: Leo Fitz, Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
5408.quote: "I won't give up. I can't give up.""None of us want to, Fitz, but...""Fitz, you tried. Okay? You tried your hardest. Everybody knows that.""No. I missed something."

5409.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Daisy Johnson
5409.quote: "Been thinking about your ATCU theory. Now, who took off before the convoy left, and who knew the exact route we were going to take?""Banks.""He's got access to everything that ATCU learns about Inhumans.""We should tail him."

5411.author: Daisy Johnson and Joey Gutierrez
5411.quote: "You're doing good.""I'm not great at projecting authority. It's nice to talk Spanish, though. Reminds me of home.""Do you miss it?""Especially Sundays. Mom cooks on Sundays."

5412.author: Bobbi Morse and Daisy Johnson
5412.quote: "So, what do you know about this conference?""I know it's small, secret, just a few countries. They're calling it "a symposium on the alien contagion". No wonder everyone is afraid of us when they use words like that. And you know, we're only part alien, and it's not a disease it's an awakening.""Interesting word choice.""I mean, for me, Terrigenesis made me who I was supposed to be. I was given a gift, and I use it to stop bad people from doing bad things.""Unfortunately, some of those bad people were also inhumans.""Yeah, well, you know who else does bad things are humans, but you don't see any symposiums on the human contagion.""Humans, we know. Inhumans are brand-new territory. People fear what they don't understand."

5413.author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
5413.quote: "What's wrong, Tremors?""Well, aside from the fact that this thing is ancient, I do not read Cyrillic.""Yet.""Forever the optimist.""Come on, Daisy. You can hack the Pentagon and shake the Earth. You're gonna let a few backwards letters trip you up?"

5414.author: Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
5414.quote: "Wait, wait, hold on. The letter that looks like New Hampshire with legs that's "D," right?""Da.""Great."

5415.author: Daisy Johnson and Bobbi Morse
5415.quote: "Converting to Unicode, and...""Spasibo, Daisy.""De nada.""Pretty sure that's not Russian.""Whatever."

5416.author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
5416.quote: "With Mack on bed rest, we could use the extra muscle.""Well, he's the only one with extra muscles, but I'll come anyway."

5417.author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
5417.quote: "We were good together, and yet it took so little to split our team apart. I have failed them""This is being a leader. You want to protect everyone but you can't. People get hurt. Today it wasn't your fault.""Doesn't feel that way."

5418.author: Hive and Daisy Johnson
5418.quote: "He was fond of you, Grant Ward.""And I'm glad he's dead.""He is, too. In a way. Grant was a thirsty soul. And he suffered for it."

5419.author: Phil Coulson and Daisy Johnson
5419.quote: "You're not a criminal""That's exactly what I am. So you can keep your forgiveness in your pity because I shouldn't have either... Or your friendship.""Daisy... you were brainwashed.""So was Ward. We make the perfect pair."

5420.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Daisy Johnson
5420.quote: "You're a man of faith.""You know I am.""So what was it like coming face-to-face with the devil?""Hive? Well, he's evil, scary as all hell, but I don't think he's the devil.""You don't get it. When Hive takes over a body, he steals that person's memories. That's as close to stealing a soul as you can get."""Memory is the scribe of the soul."""The Bible?""Aristotle. What? I have dimensions. Look, Tremors, I've had my mind controlled.""No, this wasn't that. The worst part about Hive is, when he's making you hurt the people you care about, he makes you love him for it. If Hive isn't the devil, he's the closest thing to it you and I will ever see. It's not safe. If he got out, he-""He's not getting out.""He can't be contained. He has to be destroyed.""You know another thing the devil is capable of? Filling a person with so much anger and so many dark thoughts that it consumes them. But it's up to that individual to make a choice either let the darkness fester and grow or let the light inside shine through and vanquish the darkness."

5421.author: Daisy Johnson and Robin Hinton
5421.quote: "Do you like animals?""Yeah.""Your dad made this. It's a robin, like you."

5422.author: Daisy Johnson and Polly Hinton
5422.quote: "I actually wanted to introduce you to a friend of mine, he has a practice near here, I think you'd get along, he likes animals too.""You're too kind.""I'm just keeping a promise."

5423.author: Ghost Rider to Quake
5423.quote: "So... you've got the devil inside you too."

5424.author: Ghost Rider and Quake
5424.quote: "I only kill assassinos who deserve it. It's vengeance, chica.""For what? You killed a detective.""He had blood on his hands.""A teacher!""A pedophile."

5425.author: Quake and Ghost Rider
5425.quote: "You don't get to decide who deserves to die.""I'm not the one who decides."

5426.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
5426.quote: "You get lost, or I'll get angry, so angry I may not remember what I do to you... Sometimes I prefer it that way.""In front of them?"

5427.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
5427.quote: "You're here to counsel me? You want to save my soul? I'm telling you, girl, I sold mine.""To the devil?""He was the only one buying, you know?"

5428.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
5428.quote: "You see, this is new for me. I've never been--""A kidnapper?""Caught. You know who I am, which is a problem. For both of us. A problem that has to go away."

5429.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
5429.quote: "No doubt you got a death wish, coming back to find me after I let you live. You told me not to, said you deserved it, I'm just looking for proof that you do.""And then?""My problem goes away, and your wish comes true."

5430.author: Robbie Reyes and Daisy Johnson
5430.quote: "You know what happens to people during a blackout? They think they can get away with whatever they want.""That nothing can stop them."

5431.author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
5431.quote: "Calm down before you go all Carrot Top again.""Stress has nothing to do with it.""What exactly is "it"? Because I still don't buy the whole "sold my soul" story.""Well, I don't give a damn what you buy. I'm the one stuck with it.""So you want to get rid of it.""I thought that if I settled the score, took down the gangbangers that put Gabe in a wheelchair, it would go away. Didn't happen. So I started settling other people's scores."

5432.author: Ghost Rider and Quake
5432.quote: "I don't get hurt. You gave me a pretty bad gash at the junkyard, now..""Not a scratch.""I've been stabbed, shot, run over, twice. Next day I'm good as new."

5433.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
5433.author: Hellfire to Quake
5433.quote: "The Watchdogs have the right idea, so I struck a deal with them. Help them hunt and kill every Inhuman. Hunted like the animals that we are. And I'm gonna be the last one to go.""You hate yourself that much?""I don't hate myself. I hate all of us."

5434.author: Melinda May to Daisy Johnson
5434.quote: "I know what you're doing. Trying to distance yourself from everyone else so they don't drown in your wake? I invented that move. It doesn't work, for one simple reason: Phil Coulson. He found me in that cubicle and dragged me out. He didn't give up on me, and he won't give up on you.""I never wanted that.""Mm-mm, no. You don't get to choose who cares about you. And Coulson... he's got a bigger heart than most. Lincoln wouldn't want you killing yourself over what happened."

5435.author: Daisy Johnson and Robbie Reyes
5435.quote: "It heals itself. Scientifically impossible self-healing car.""That only works when I'm the Rider."

5436.author: Jemma Simmons and Daisy Johnson
5436.quote: "It is nice having someone here to talk to again - you, specifically.""Someone other than Fitz?""Oh, well, of course, Fitz, but he has been rather distracted lately.""Distracted how?""Aida. You know how boys can be with their robots.""Actually, I really don't."

5437.author: Burrows and Daisy Johnson
5437.quote: "The Director would like a word with Quake.""My name's Daisy.""Well, not according to the press release."

5438.author: Jeffrey Mace and Daisy Johnson
5438.quote: "I must admit we make a pretty impressive pair.""Well, looks like we're stuck with each other.""Well, I was just trying to make the most of the precarious situation you put me in.""Is this when I get read the riot act?""Not by me. However, if you're as smart as they say, then you'll know that, uh, I saved you from being thrown in prison.""You saved face. You turned it into a publicity stunt.""You already had plenty of publicity destruction of public property, assault, armed robbery-""I never carry a weapon.""You are the weapon. The public was turning against you. Now? They look up to you. You're welcome... Okay, this isn't how I wanted this to go. Uh, we're both Inhuman. And as you say, we're stuck with each other, so why not make the most of it? I read your written statement, and I believe it. You were just trying to protect the innocent. And I know you're new here, but that's what S.H.I.E.L.D. is all about."""New here?"""It was a joke. I was making a joke to break the ice.""Got it."

5439.author: Daisy Johnson and Jeffrey Mace
5439.quote: "Seems they look up to you, too the "hero of Vienna". It's a nice pic.""Not as big a deal as they made it. They gave me too much credit.""You don't get to be modest and have a framed glamour shot on your desk.""Fair point."

5440.author: Jeffrey Mace and Daisy Johnson
5440.quote: "Look, we're a team now, and I have a saying: A tea-""I read the motivational poster in the bathroom.""Good. Well, um, the team trust has been eroded for both of us, but I'm hoping we can earn it back tackle problems together within the administrative structure and start-""You want to tackle problems? The Watchdogs enemy number one. I believe they're funded internationally. They have ties to people within the U.S. government.""I don't want to chase conspiracy theories.""It's not a theory if I can prove it.""I want to chase hard facts, like the fact that Senator Nadeer is aware of an Inhuman who's being held against his will.""Now we're talking."

5441.author: Jeffrey Mace and Daisy Johnson
5441.quote: "You know, I have to admit Jemma is much tougher than I had originally given her credit for.""Yeah, well, being in S.H.I.E.L.D. will do that to you. I think Simmons has been kidnapped like - three times since I've known her.""Really?""Yeah, well, only twice on this planet."

5442.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons and Daisy Johnson
5442.quote: "It's a high-pitch frequency caused by Shockley's cellular vibration.""The ramping up of his kinetic energy at an atomic level, and once it reaches a critical threshold, that massive energy transforms his body from a solid to a flammable gaseous state and then..""Boom."

5443.author: Superior and Quake
5443.quote: "I've been looking forward to facing one of you, readying myself. I strive for perfection. You are a genetic cheater.""I'm not a cheater. You're just playing by the old rules."

5444.author: Daisy Johnson to Jemma Simmons
5444.quote: "Prove to me that you're not a frickin' robot. Because it looks like you're malfunctioning."

5445.author: Quake to Leo Fitz
5445.quote: "Fitz. We were all in the Framework together. We understand how confusing and screwed up that world is. And trust me, it's gonna take me years to process everything that happened in there. But the one thing that I don't need time to understand is that we are all in this together. I tried to take the blame for everything not too long ago, I dyed my hair, I ran away... I thought that separating myself from the team would help me protect it. But in truth, I kind of just lost myself."

5446.author: Aida and Quake
5446.quote: "Hello Daisy. I had a lot of time when you shattered my spine to think about what I'd do when I see you again. I decided it would be fun to watch you kill yourself.""Aida,

5447.author: Daisy Johnson and Phil Coulson
5447.quote: "I can't do what you're asking of me. I can't do it.""You've always been capable of more than you imagined. No. Not without you. You found me alone in an alley, and you gave me everything. A home, a belief, solid ground to  stand on. But that was all you. You are what I believe in.""You believe in yourself, and you should.""No. You want a symbol? You are the symbol. There's no S.H.I.E.L.D. without you. There's nothing without you."

5448.author: Deke Shaw and Daisy Johnson, about Leo Fitz and Jemma Simmons
5448.quote: "They're okay, right? Like, they're gon... Like, they're gonna be... They're gonna be fine?""They'll figure it out. Have faith. Or a, you know, Xanax."

5449.author: Daisy Johnson and The Doctor
5449.quote: "Fitz.""Oh, come on, Agent Johnson. That's not how you address a HYDRA superior."

5450.author: Daisy Johnson and Leo Fitz
5450.quote: "I will never forgive you.""I suspect you won't be the only one."

5451.author: Quake
5451.quote: "Hale is HYDRA. "Hale HYDRA". Seriously? How are we still fighting Nazis today?"

5452.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
5452.quote: "Maybe Daisy shouldn't have been put in that position in the first place.""You don't think she should lead?""I didn't say that. But she does need time. She's questioning herself...""I question myself everyday...""Let me speak! All Daisy could think about was getting you back. She's not ready for your job, Phil.""She has to be. My time is running low.""Because you're being irresponsible."

5453.author: Deke Shaw, Alphonso Mackenzie and Piper
5453.quote: "Is Daisy here? She's so pretty.""What now?""I want to put my mouth on her mouth and move it around a lot. But I don't want to do that unless she wants to too, 'cause that's what makes it nice. But I don't think she wants that, 'cause she does not like me one bit.""I mean, she's not my type, but I get it."

5454.author: Alphonso Mackenzie, Deke Shaw and Phil Coulson
5454.quote: "You're in love with her.""Sorry? What? No. Uh, no offense, Mack, but I think your radar is way misfiring on this one.""That was convincing. I believe him.""Thank you.""You confessed, you idiot. When you were hopped up on painkillers. Piper and I couldn't get you to shut up about it.""No. That's... Okay, guys. What, you've never heard that drugs can make you say stuff that's a little crazy? Maybe that's why drugs are bad.""It's obvious. I figured it out a while ago.""All right, well, it doesn't matter. She hates me, anyway."

5455.author: Phil Coulson and Quake
5455.quote: "You're getting good at this. You are.""I have a feeling Professor Coulson was easy on his students. I should at least lose points for the mutiny on day one.""For sure. But I'm throwing you some extra credit for a well-timed rescue."

5456.author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
5456.quote: "I had it under control. She was coming around, and then Yo-Yo killed her.""No. I just saved the world."

5457.author: Taryan and Quake
5457.quote: "You are Inhuman. I always knew the tales of the experiments were true.""Okay, for the record, we don't love to be called experiments, just moving forward."

5458.author: Taryan and Quake
5458.quote: "I'm merely saying that I understand what it is to be on the outside, as I'm sure you are different, hunted by lesser humans. You deserve better than that.""Look, yeah, some people have given me a hard time. Humans are complicated. They disagree. Sometimes it comes to blows. Only, sometimes, it's a person who risks everything for their friends even though she lost her limbs. Hypothetically. We fight, okay, but not with a lack of respect, and that's something I don't think you're quite understanding.""Oh, no matter. You will come with me, willingly or not.""I'm gonna have to choose "not"."

5459.author: Quake and Taryan
5459.quote: "I'm stronger than you know.""Everyone thinks that.""But in my case, it's true. I'm the Destroyer of Worlds."

5460.author: Phil Coulson to Quake after he kissed Melinda May
5460.quote: "Not a word, Agent Johnson.""Copy that, Hot Lips."

5461.author: Quake and Phil Coulson
5461.quote: "So... You made out with May.""Did I?""Oh yeah.""Oh. People see what they want to see, I guess."

5462.author: Quake
5462.quote: "I'm aware that we rolled the dice with Coulson, and I still believe that we need him for this, but I will admit that I let my emotions get the best of me. I thought that Coulson was the only one who could keep us all on the same page. You would say that's proof that I can't do the job, that I shouldn't lead. Well, I agree. The truth is, I can't hold the team together. But he can. Coulson wants me to call the shots in his absence? Well, that's my decision. Mack should call the shots. He has the biggest heart. I mean, physically, but also, you know... You are our moral center. And, look, I never want to stop being a soldier. He's a general we can all rally behind. Anyone who thinks I'm 100% right about this, raise your hand."

5463.author: Quake to Phil Coulson
5463.quote: "We fought for you. And we fought each other for you."

5464.author: Glenn Talbot and Quake
5464.quote: "The end justifies the means, right?""The only people who say that are the people doing bad things.""I'm becoming a hero.""You are one! The minute that you enlisted, you became one. We all did. Look around. You're surrounded by them. Anyone who signs up for this, to lose friends, or limbs, or your mind, or your life, in protection of humanity. We are in this together. We need to join forces."

5465.author: Phil Coulson and Quake
5465.quote: "I left you something in your bunk. It's a letter. Nothing fancy. Basically just says how proud I am of you. I am so proud.""I love you.""I love you, too.""And, uh, thanks for the spaceship."

5466.author: Jemma Simmons and Quake
5466.quote: "The Zephyr is banged up because everywhere we go, Quake leaves a wake of destruction!""I've explained my philosophy on that. They need to respect how strong we are.""We're down to four people!""Exactly! That is the point! They don't know that!"

5467.author: Trok and Quake
5467.quote: "This small aircraft isn't even worth as much as a unit of fuel. Unless you plan to work in the shafts, how do you expect to make payment?""You're gonna give it to me on the house."

5468.author: Quake and Jemma Simmons
5468.quote: "Going that deep is not smart. It... We have to consider heading home and regrouping before we jump into the juicy center of the Milky Way.""No, we can't let this trail go cold!"

5469.movie: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
5469.author: Quake and Jemma Simmons
5469.quote: "I'm the mission leader, and that was my call to make, not yours.""Whose side are you on?""You know damn well whose side we are all on. We went to a Fire Planet for you. We followed every bread crumb trying to find him, and now we're at the end of a galaxy."

5470.movie: Fear and Loathing on the Planet of Kitson
5470.author: Daisy Johnson and Jemma Simmons
5470.quote: "We're on a mission.""Right. What is the mission?""The mission is... Ladies' Night!"

5471.author: Quake and Atarah
5471.quote: "Hurt Fitz one more time, and I will tear this ship apart.""I've heard reports of what Quake can do, which is why Leopold Fitz is being held on another ship. If any harm comes to me, those ships will scatter across the galaxy. Behave... or you will never find him."

5472.author: Quake and Jemma Simmons
5472.quote: "Simmons, I... I can't leave you.""You have to. Whatever happens, at least I'll be with Fitz. We'll have each other."

5473.author: Daisy Johnson and Sarge
5473.quote: "Yeah, I'm out. This is too much.""Her, too, huh? Daddy issues?"

5474.author: Melinda May and Daisy Johnson
5474.quote: "I don't know why, but a part of me feels like I could trust him. It's just a feeling.""Would you be saying that if he didn't have Coulson's face?"

5475.author: Daisy Johnson to Deke Shaw
5475.quote: "We're still stuck with a live nuke and whatever else is out there."

5476.author: Daisy Johnson and Alphonso Mackenzie
5476.quote: "When do I get to hear stories about deep space?""When we sit down for debrief. I saw an ocean of lava.""For real?""Yeah. I didn't think I could come back to anything more bizarre, but I should've known better."

5477.author: Daisy Johnson to Alphonso Mackenzie
5477.quote: "She was in Davis and then she jumped into May and now who knows."

5478.author: Daisy Johnson and Sarge
5478.quote: "This time, I'll actually kill you.""Go ahead. It'd be easier than doing it myself. Come on! What are you waiting for?! Do it! Kill me, Skye!"

5479.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Daisy Johnson
5479.quote: "You really think this man is Coulson?""Maybe not all of him, but he remembered my name. He called me Skye. How would he have known that?"

5480.author: Daisy Johnson and Alphonso Mackenzie
5480.quote: "I should've never trusted him. I should've...""No. It wasn't right for me to judge–""No, don't... don't... don't do that. Don't you walk it back. I did this. May... This is on me."

5482.author: Fischer and Daisy Johnson
5482.quote: "What's a gal like you doing trying to be a Mountie? Can't you find a husband?""Okay. Yeah, I mean, I wish that I could hold on to a husband. But for some reason, they just end up with broken ribs whenever they give me lip. Now move, or a gal like me will knock out a guy like you in front of people like them."

5483.author: Abel and Daisy Johnson
5483.quote: "Quake. I've been looking forward to this.""Huh. Well, sorry... this is just another fight for me."

5484.author: Phil Coulson and Daisy Johnson
5484.quote: "If HYDRA doesn't form, then S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't form in response.""Well, because it doesn't have to. I mean, think about all the future lives we'll save if there's no Freddy Malick."

5485.author: Daisy Johnson to Deke Shaw
5485.quote: "I know what I said about the butterfly effect, but we can't pass up this opportunity. He's Wilfred Malick. He's gonna be a major player in HYDRA. And if you kill him right now, you will save thousands of lives."

5486.author: Daisy Johnson
5486.quote: "'55? As in our giant spaceship just appeared in the sky in 1955?"

5487.author: Daisy Johnson to Phil Coulson
5487.quote: "But odd is the new normal. I mean, you are a highly sophisticated robot version of yourself, and we're in a diner in the 50s."

5488.author: Daisy Johnson to Daniel Sousa
5488.quote: "Look, all I can say is that you are not crazy. And the people you have locked up might be the key to proving it."

5489.author: Daisy Johnson and Deke Shaw
5489.quote: "I outrank you. And if you want to get technical–""Daisy, he was a kid!"

5490.author: Daisy Johnson to Alphonso Mackenzie
5490.quote: "Cool. Writing some new history. Copy that."

5491.author: Daisy Johnson and Gideon Malick
5491.quote: "You must hear all the secrets about S.H.I.E.L.D. from your dad?"Some. Lately his been locked up in his windowless office all day, but, uh, I'm in the loop."

5492.author: Daniel Sousa and Daisy Johnson
5492.quote: "Looks like I missed a lot.""I'm sorry. This is so weird and messed up. But the Chronicoms jumped, we have to dive in after them. Without us, it's way worse."

5493.author: Nathaniel Malick and Daisy Johnson
5493.quote: "Nothing really spoke to me... until I met you... saw what you could do. Woah.""You haven't even seen the half of it."

5494.author: Daisy Johnson to Phil Coulson
5494.quote: "We are not in the best shape, are we?"

5495.author: Daisy Johnson and Jemma Simmons
5495.quote: "I think I'm time-looping. I-I've done this already. I've done this already.""Oh, well, that's fun."

5496.author: Daisy Johnson and Daniel Sousa
5496.quote: "Every time I ask you for help, you say yes. Even if I don't ask, you're waiting here to make me rest or whatever. Why? Be honest.""Honest? I know your type.""My what, now?""I know people like you. Some of my favorite people are people like you. Focused on the greater good, even at your own expense. You want people to think you like being alone, even though you always end up back with friends. You hate losing.""Everyone hates losing.""Yeah, but you'll keep running at the problem full-tilt until you either solve it or slam headlong into a brick wall.""Some of those walls are literal.""I know.""But how does that...""Because when people like you run into those walls, you should have someone there to pick you back up.""And you... you like to be that someone?""Not for everyone. It helps if they're fun to be around and if they say what they mean and if they have that superpower where they can rock things around, which is very impressive.""That's, um... that is awfully specific."

5497.author: Daisy Johnson and Jiaying
5497.quote: "I never knew my mom. And when I finally found her... she wasn't who I'd hoped she would be.""She hurt you. I can't speak to your mother's reasons, but for me... sometimes, trying to do the right thing comes out all wrong."

5498.author: Daisy Johnson to Daniel Sousa
5498.quote: "Sibyl dropped Kora in my lap because they knew I'd want to save her. The thing is, I already have a sister to save. Her name is Jemma Simmons"

5499.author: Kora and Daisy Johnson
5499.quote: "I believe there's a chance we could work together.""What makes you think that we would ever-""You. I've always wanted a sibling, and we have the same blood. You believe in S.H.I.E.L.D.. There must be a reason."

5500.author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
5500.quote: "It's quiet here in the mornings. Less strangers in suits running around.""Well, you should make room in that routine for uh, what's the word in English? Bureaucracy. Mace is going to want to grill you about your time off.""Yeah, he already has. Trying to set up meet and greets or whatever that is."

5501.author: Jeffrey Mace and Elena Rodriguez
5501.quote: "The powers that be get twitchy when enhanced individuals choose their own missions. With Quake out there--""Daisy has nothing to do with this, sir.""But she is the example of what not to be. A vigilante."

5502.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Elena Rodriguez
5502.quote: "Not cool, Yo-yo. Zephyr's about to take off and you're just gonna let me leave without saying goodbye?""Are you going after Daisy again? Where are you headed?""Well, intel says she's on the east coast. We got every USGS satellite and geological monitoring station on it so if she uses her powers, we'll know.""Does she get to be a S.H.I.E.L.D. pet too? Bagged and tagged like a stray dog."

5503.author: Alpha Dog and Quake
5503.quote: "Hey, you know who this is, boys? Guess it's our lucky day.""I don't think lucky's the word you're looking for."

5504.author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
5504.quote: "What the hell are you doing here? S.H.I.E.L.D. assign you to go after that weapon?""No, they assigned me to paperwork. S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't know about this. I'm here for Ramon.""The one who killed your cousin.""Sí."

5505.author: Daisy Johnson to Elena Rodriguez
5505.quote: "All right. Let's get out of here before that guy Burrows comes in and sets out a coffee and scone for the Director."

5506.author: Yo-Yo Rodriguez and Quake
5506.quote: "Mack said Coulson and him are also tracking your powers, the earthquakes. Look, Daisy, if I can help--""No, no. One Inhuman fugitive is enough. If I need help your help, I'll find you.""Okay."

5507.author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
5507.quote: "What happened with Ramon?""He won't be hurting anyone again."

5508.author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
5508.quote: "Okay, so, this is the data from your watch, and this right here is the GPS coordinate that puts your location in the warehouse.""Here we are, breaking rules again.""Yep. But one click of a button and all Mace will know is whatever we tell him.""Do it."

5509.author: Elena Rodriguez and Daisy Johnson
5509.quote: "Ramon, at the warehouse, I just want you to know I didn't kill him. I'm not capable of--""I know."

5510.author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
5510.quote: "What's that?""Something Coulson gave me the day I signed the Accords. He said it would help remind me that I'm not giving something up but gaining something.""A team."

5511.author: Wolfgang von Strucker about Wanda and Pietro Maximoff
5511.quote: "There's nothing more horrifying than a miracle!"

5513.author: Quicksilver warns the Sokovian Police Department of the upcoming Battle of Sokovia
5513.quote: "We're under attack! Clear the city, now!"(Leaves, returns with assault rifle and shoots bullets in the air)"Get off your asses."

5514.author: Doctor List to Baron Wolfgang von Strucker
5514.quote: "Let's show them what we have accomplished. Send out the twins."

5515.author: Steve Rogers and Maria Hill
5515.quote: "The two enhanced?""Wanda and Pietro Maximoff. Twins. Orphaned at ten when a shell collapsed their apartment building. Sokovia's had a rough history. It's nowhere special but it's on the way to everywhere special.""Their abilities?""He's got increased metabolism and improved thermal homeostasis. Her thing is neural electric interfacing, telekinesis, mental manipulation. He's fast and she's weird.""Well, they're going to show up again.""Agreed. File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.""Right. What kind of monster would let a German scientist experiment on them to protect their country?""We're not at war, Captain.""They are."

5516.author: Pietro Maximoff, Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
5516.quote: "Everyone's plan is not to kill them.""And make them martyrs? You need patience. Need to see the big picture.""I don't see the big picture. I have a little picture. I take it out and look at it... every day.""You lost your parents in the bombings. I've seen the records.""The records are not the picture.""Pietro.""No, please.""We were 10 years old. Having dinner, the four of us. When the first shell hits, two floors below, it makes a hole in the floor. It's big. Our parents go in... and the whole building starts coming apart. I grab her, roll under the bed, and the second shell hits. But it doesn't go off. It just... sits there in the rubble. Three feet from our faces. And on the side of the shell is painted one word.""Stark.""We were trapped for two days. Every effort to save us, every shift in the bricks, I think, This will set it off.""We wait for two days for Tony Stark to kill us.""I know what they are."

5517.author: Pietro and Wanda Maximoff
5517.quote: "I’m gonna kill him. I’ll be right back.""No. I’m over it. I want... I want to finish the plan. I want the big one."

5518.author: Wanda Maximoff, Captain America, Quicksilver & Hawkeye
5518.quote: "You don't know what's in this!""This isn't a game!"(Pietro, using his super-speed deactivates the Regeneration Cradle)"No, no. Go on. You were saying?"(All of a sudden, Hawkeye shatters the glass floor Pietro was on with a bullet, sending him to the floor below)"Pietro!""What? You didn't see that coming?"

5519.author: Quicksilver and Captain America
5519.quote: "This is S.H.I.E.L.D.?""This is what S.H.I.E.L.D. is supposed to be.""This is not so bad."

5520.author: List
5520.quote: "No one has made it past this stage of our experiments with alien enhancement. Well, no one other than the twins, of course."

5521.movie: Avengers: Age of Ultron Prelude - This Scepter'd Isle
5521.author: Pietro to Wanda Maximoff
5521.quote: "Be strong, sister. It won't be long before we have the power we need to fight."

5522.author: Raina and Chan Ho Yin
5522.quote: "You need a similar name. More powerful name. A name like... Scorch.""Scorch? You're joking.""Have you ever heard of Steve Rogers? No. Captain America, now he's on the news and lunch box and a poster on the wall."

5523.author: Debbie and Raina
5523.quote: "I'm surprised you got him to cooperate.""He has dreams. I told him they'd come true.""You gave him a name, didn't you?"

5524.author: Raina to Phil Coulson
5524.quote: "We want to know about the day after you died."

5525.author: Raina and Edison Po
5525.quote: "Will you tell me what he's like?""Never. The last person who tried to learn such things got a knife for it. I don't want to have to do that again, Raina. You have such pretty eyes.""I understand. You can't even whisper to me about him.""No, I can't."

5526.author: Raina and Phil Coulson
5526.quote: "I know you don't want to believe it, but you can't tell me nothing makes you doubt, makes you wonder what happened in Tahiti.""It's a magical place. I keep saying that."" Don't you want to know why?"

5527.author: Raina and Phil Coulson
5527.quote: "You didn't just give your life, you gave up your chance at a normal one, at love. And she did love you, Agent Coulson.""How could you know that?""Do you miss her? Dinners at the Richmond. Do you miss hearing her play? You didn't have a chance to say goodbye.""I couldn't... I can't...""She cried for days after S.H.I.E.L.D. told her you died. They shattered her heart with a lie, and now they're lying to you.""No. No they're not.""I know you don't want to believe it, but you can't tell me nothing makes you doubt, makes you wonder what happened in Tahiti.""

5528.author: Raina and John Garrett
5528.quote: "So you're a liar. You're a fraud.""An artist. A con artist, perhaps, but an artist all the same."

5529.author: Raina and Grant Ward
5529.quote: "You don't seem like her type.""I'm everyone's type."

5530.author: Raina to Grant Ward
5530.quote: "I thought Agent Garrett shared my interest in special people, in transformation, but now I realize he's just afraid to die."

5531.author: John Garrett and Grant Ward
5531.quote: "Something about that woman unnerves me.""It's those eyes.""No it's what's behind those eyes."

5532.author: John Garrett and Raina
5532.quote: "You never disappoint, do you Flowers? I just wish everyone on my team had the same success rate.""It's Raina.""Sorry, force of habit."

5533.author: Deathlok and Raina
5533.quote: "Why are you here?""For you and others like you. People with gifts, I'm waiting for what's inside to be revealed. The girl, Skye. What do you know about her? Where does she come from?""Why do you care?""Because inside, I believe she and I have something in common."

5535.author: Raina
5535.quote: "The evolution he speaks of, she will be an important part of that."

5537.author: Raina and Phil Coulson
5537.quote: "Let me be clear: Mr. Creel is working for HYDRA; I am not!""Why the break-up? Bad dental plan?""HYDRA only has one thing on their minds: world domination, which is so 1945."

5538.author: Raina
5538.quote: "Oh, the Obelisk. I see what this is. I can help you-"

5539.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
5539.author: Raina to Phil Coulson
5539.quote: "You know how to make a girl feel special."

5540.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
5540.author: Raina to Phil Coulson

5541.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
5541.author: Raina to Phil Coulson
5541.quote: "You're going to use me to get to Whitehall."

5542.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
5542.author: Calvin Zabo
5542.quote: "Don't beg. It reminds me of what you were when I first found you: hungry, in the streets, with just the fairy tales that your grandmother told you."

5543.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
5543.author: Lance Hunter and Raina
5543.quote: "If you ask me, Coulson let you off easy.""I didn't ask."

5544.movie: A Hen in the Wolf House
5544.author: Calvin Zabo and Raina
5544.quote: "Who wants it? Who has you so afraid, Raina?""... Daniel Whitehall.""He scares you more than I do?""Please. He's very powerful.""Hmm.""He has resources!""He's a butcher.""And what are you?""I'M A MAN! Trying to  put my family back together!"

5546.author: Raina
5546.quote: "We're humans, Skye. We just have the potential to be more"

5548.author: Calvin Zabo, Daniel Whitehall, and Raina
5548.quote: "If my daughter wasn't here, I would tear you and your men to pieces.""Well, then, I'll add that to the number of reasons that I'm glad she's here. You are the piece of the puzzle I can't decipher. Why are you really here?""Is it really that hard to see? It's love. Agent Ward believes if he helps Skye fulfill her destiny, she'll see him for what he really is.""(To Zabo)Aww. It's a pity you won't get to fulfill that destiny, or that after all those years, you won't get your vengeance after what I did to your wife."

5549.author: Raina and Skye
5549.quote: "Your whole life... our whole lives have been leading up to his moment.""Sorry. I don't buy into the whole "this is your destiny" thing. We're taking the Obelisk, and we're leaving. There's too many lives at stake.""You got it all wrong. Whitehall, everyone has got it all wrong. This doesn't destroy. It gives life; new life. We finally get to find out what we become.(the Obelisk floats onto a pedestal)""Make it stop.""I can't. Neither of us can now."

5550.author: Raina and Calvin Zabo
5550.quote: "After all that time, I didn't quite get the answers I was searching for.""I'm sorry you didn't find your way to the temple. You didn't get to evolve.""Oh, I evolved. What the hell have I become?""Raina. Let's not lose our heads.""What happened to me?""Metamorphosis, by the look of it.""I was supposed to become something divine, something transcendent. My grandmother said I'd be an angel, not some gnarled freak of nature covered in thorns.""You always did like flowers.""They hurt, and it's all your fault."

5551.author: Raina and Calvin Zabo
5551.quote: "I can't live as this repulsive creature.""Then don't."

5552.author: Lincoln Campbell
5552.quote: "You're a piece of cake compared to the other one. Total physical transformation, and we still have no idea what her gift is."

5553.author: Raina and Lincoln Campbell
5553.quote: "I dream of Skye and her father at dinner. A bouquet of daisies. And she's so happy."

5554.author: Raina
5554.quote: "Consequences are upon us. Men made of metal will tear our cities apart."

5555.author: Jiaying and Calvin Zabo
5555.quote: "What can you tell me about her?""Raina? She's manipulative, dangerous, deceitful. We had good times."

5556.author: Raina to Gordon
5556.quote: "You were right, it is a gift, all of it. I just needed to embrace it, embrace my life here, my purpose, to help my people."

5557.author: Raina and Calvin Zabo
5557.quote: "What do you think I'm trying to do?""Oh I don't know, create chaos?!""Why would I do that?""Because you thrive on it!"

5558.author: Raina to Jiaying
5558.quote: "I am not a monster, I am an angel and I'm finally what I'm meant to be."

5559.author: Raina
5559.quote: "It is the thorn that protects the rose...in this case, the daisy."

5560.author: Raina to Skye
5560.quote: "Even in the darkness, you'll see the truth."

5562.author: Ramonda to T'Challa
5562.quote: "Son, we have entertained this charlatan for too long. Reject his request."

5563.author: Ramonda
5563.quote: "Nakia. I don't like this. The Heart-Shaped Herb belongs to us. We may be creating a bigger monster with M'Baku. Nakia, you should take it yourself."

5564.author: Ramonda
5564.quote: "I call upon the ancestors. I will call upon Bast. I am here with my son T'Challa. Heal him. We must bury him."

5565.author: T'Challa and M'Baku
5565.quote: "Please allow my mother to stay here.""No harm will come to her. I give you my word."

5566.author: Nakia and Ramonda
5566.quote: "Queen Mother... Princess. My comfort for your loss.""Thank you, Nakia. It is so good to have you back with us."

5568.author: T'Challa and Ramonda
5568.quote: "How are you feeling today, Mama?""Proud. Your father and I would talk about this day all the time. He is with us, and it is your time to be King."

5569.author: Shuri and Ramonda upon hearing and seeing the Jabari Tribe's arrival

5570.author: River Tribe Elder, Erik Killmonger, Ramonda and W'Kabi
5570.quote: "Ungubani?"[1]"NdinguYONAJadaka, unyana weNkosana N'Jobu!"[2] I found my daddy with panther claws in his chest! You ain't the son of a king, you're the son of a murderer!"

5571.author: Shuri, Nakia and Ramonda
5571.quote: "First Baba, and now my brother. Mama, we didn't even get to bury him.""It's me.""Nakia. Who is this man?""He's a friend of T'Challa's, he saved my life.""Where is Okoye?""Okoye is not coming. She and the Dora Milaje will serve the new king. Wait here.""What has happened to Wakanda?"

5572.author: Johann Schmidt
5572.quote: "The Tesseract was the jewel of Odin's treasure room. It's not something one buries. But I think it is close, yes?"

5573.author: Johann Schmidt
5573.quote: "Great power has always baffled primitive men. HYDRA is assembling an arsenal to destroy my enemies in one stroke, wherever they are, regardless of how many forces they possess, all in a matter of hours."

5574.author: Johann Schmidt
5574.quote: "My weapons contain enough destructive power to decimate every hostile capital on Earth. Quite simply, gentlemen, I have harnessed the power of the gods."

5575.author: Red Skull
5575.quote: "You are failing! We are close to an offensive that will shake the planet, yet we are continually delayed because you cannot outwit a simpleton with a shield!"

5576.author: Abraham Erskine to Steve Rogers
5576.quote: "Now Schmidt is a member of the inner circle and he is ambitious. He and Hitler share a passion for occult power and Teutonic myth. Hitler uses his fantasies to inspire his followers, but for Schmidt, it is not fantasy. For him, it is real."

5577.author: Chester Phillips
5577.quote: "He thinks that he is a god and he is willing to blow up half the world to prove it."

5578.author: Johann Schmidt and Church Keeper
5578.quote: "The Tesseract was the jewel of Odin's treasure room. It's not something one buries. But I think it is close, yes?""I cannot help you.""No. But maybe you can help your village. You must have some friends out there. Some... some little grandchildren perhaps. I have no need for them to die."

5579.author: Johann Schmidt and Arnim Zola
5579.quote: "I have not come all this way for safety, Doctor.""What was that?""I must congratulate you, Arnim, your designs does not disappoint, though they may require some slight reinforcement.""Nothing has changed, it's stable. Amazing."

5580.author: Johann Schmidt to Roeder
5580.quote: "While Hitler speaks of a thousand-year Reich, but he cannot feed his army for the month. His troops spill their blood across every field in Europe. But he is still no closer to achieving his goals."

5581.author: Roeder and Red Skull
5581.quote: "And I suppose you still aim to win this war through magic?""Science. But I understand your confusion. Great power has always baffled primitive men."

5582.author: Red Skull to Captain America
5582.quote: "You are deluded, Captain. You pretend to be a simple soldier but, in reality, you are just afraid to admit that we have left humanity behind. Unlike you, I embrace it proudly. Without fear!"

5583.author: Red Skull to HYDRA
5583.quote: "Tomorrow, HYDRA will stand as master of the world, borne to victory on the wings of the Valkyrie. Our enemies' weapons will be powerless against us. If they shoot down one plane, hundreds more will rain fire upon them! If they cut off one head, two more shall take its place."

5584.author: Red Skull and Captain America
5584.quote: "Arrogance may not be a uniquely American trait, but I must say, you do it better than anyone. But there are limits to what even you can do, Captain, or did Erskine tell you otherwise?""He told me you were insane."

5585.author: Red Skull and Captain America
5585.quote: "You could have the power of the gods! Yet you wear a flag on your chest and think you fight a battle of nations! I have seen the future Captain! There are no flags!""Not in my future!"

5586.author: Captain America and Arnim Zola
5586.quote: "HYDRA died with the Red Skull.""Cut off one head, two more shall take its place."

5587.author: Red Skull and Thanos
5587.quote: "Welcome, Thanos, son of A'Lars. Gamora, daughter of Thanos.""You know us?""It is my curse to know all who journey here.""Where is the Soul Stone?""You should know, it extracts a terrible price.""I am prepared.""We all think that at first. We are all wrong."

5588.author: Thanos and Red Skull
5588.quote: "How is it you know this place so well?""A lifetime ago, I, too, sought the stones. I even held one in my hand. But it cast me out, banished me here, guiding others to a treasure I can not possess."

5589.author: Red Skull, Gamora and Thanos
5589.quote: "What you seek lies in front of you. As does what you fear.""What's this?""The price. Soul holds a special place among the Infinity Stones. You might say, it is a certain wisdom.""Tell me what it needs.""To ensure that whoever possesses it, understands its power. The stone demands a sacrifice.""Of what?""In order to take the stone, you must lose that which you love. A soul for a soul."

5590.author: Gamora, Red Skull and Thanos
5590.quote: "All my life I dreamed of a day, a moment, when you got what you deserved. And I was always so disappointed. But now, you kill and torture and you call it mercy. The universe has judged you. You asked it for a price and it told you no. You failed. And do you wanna know why? Because you love nothing. No one. Really, tears?""They are not for him.""No. This isn't love.""I ignored my destiny once, I cannot do that again. Even for you. I'm sorry, Little one.""No!"

5591.author: Hawkeye and Black Widow
5591.quote: "How's it going? Jesus... Maybe he's making this shit up."No, I don't think so.Why, cause he knows your Daddy's name?"

5592.author: Hawkeye to Thor
5592.quote: "It can't be undone. Or that's at least what the red floating guy had to say. Maybe you wanna go talk to him, okay? Go grab your hammer, and you go fly and talk to him"

5593.author: Red Skull and Black Widow
5593.quote: "Consider me a guide. To you, and to all who seek the Soul Stone.""Oh, good. You tell us where it is. Then we'll be on our way.""Ah, liebchen. If only it were that easy."

5594.author: Red Skull and Black Widow
5594.quote: "What you seek lies in front of you, as does what you fear.""The stone is down there.""For one of you. For the other... In order to take the stone, you must lose that which you love. An everlasting exchange. A soul, for a soul."

5595.author: Skye and Grant Ward
5595.quote: "The Red Skull, founder of HYDRA, was a big, fat, freaking Nazi.""That has nothing to do with today.""You know, you always had that Hitler Youth look to you. So it's really not that surprising."

5596.author: HYDRA Officer to Werner Reinhardt
5596.quote: "Herr Reinhardt, I-I fear Schmidt-""Oh, there's no reason left to fear the Red Skull.""He's dead.""However, his vision is not. The work HYDRA has done will live on."

5597.author: Werner Reinhardt
5597.quote: "The Red Skull said it may hold the answer the answer to death itself."

5598.author: Werner Reinhardt
5598.quote: "The world has lost a great man."

5599.movie: Let Me Stand Next to Your Fire
5599.author: Robbie Reyes and Phil Coulson
5599.quote: "Is that the book my uncle was talking about?""I think so.""Well, you know where to find it?""No one ever has. Not Daniel Whitehall, not the Red Skull, not even Nick Fury himself."

5600.author: Howard Stark to Peggy Carter
5600.quote: "You want a mission that matters? This is it. My technology in the hands of some nut that wants to be the next Red Skull? You have no idea how bad that could be."

5601.author: Rhomann Dey after capturing the Guardians of the Galaxy.

5602.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Drax.
5602.quote: "Drax, A.K.A. The Destroyer. Since his wife and family were killed, he's been on a rampage across the galaxy in a search for vengeance."

5603.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Gamora.
5603.quote: "Gamora. Soldier, assassin. Wanted on over a dozen counts of murder."

5604.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Rocket.
5604.quote: "Rocket. Wanted on over 50 charges of vehicular theft and escape from lock up."

5605.author: Rhomann Dey when he arrests Peter Quill.

5606.author: Garthan Saal to Rhomann Dey about Groot.
5606.quote: "What the hell?""Groot. He's been travelling recently as Rocket's personal houseplant/muscle."

5607.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal about Star-Lord
5607.quote: "Peter Jason Quill. He's also known as Star-Lord." "Who calls him that?"  "Himself, mostly. He's wanted on charges of minor assault, public intoxication and fraud."

5608.author: Rhomann Dey and Garthan Saal about the Guardians of the Galaxy
5608.quote: "They call themselves 'The Guardians of the Galaxy.'""What a bunch of A-Holes"

5609.author: Drax the Destroyer and Rhomann Dey
5609.quote: "What if someone does something that irks me and I decide to remove his spine?""That's... that's actually... murder. One of the worst crimes of all, so... also illegal.""Hmm."

5610.author: Rhomann Dey and Rocket Raccoon
5610.quote: "Your criminal records have also been expunged. However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future.""Question. What if I see something that I wanna take and it belongs to someone else?""Then you will be arrested.""But what if I want it more than the person who has it?""Still illegal.""That doesn't follow. No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand me? What are you laughing at? What? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman?"

5611.author: Rhomann Dey and Star-Lord.
5611.quote: "Hey, if it isn't "Star-Prince.""Star-Lord. It's like my outlaw name.""No, it's cool, I can see why you'd want a code name. It's not weird at all."

5612.author: Rocket Raccoon
5612.quote: "Xandarians. What a bunch of losers! Always trying to get from something stupid to nothing at all."

5613.author: Rocket Raccoon
5613.quote: "I live for the simple things... like how much this is gonna hurt."

5614.author: Rocket Raccoon
5614.quote: "I guess most of Nova Corps wanna uphold the laws, but these ones here, they're corrupt and cruel."

5615.author: Rocket Raccoon to the guards
5615.quote: "I guess most of the Nova Corps are out to protect the greater good, but  here, they're corrupt and cruel. But hey, that's not my problem. I ain't gonna be here long. I've been escaped 22 prisons. This one is no different. You're lucky the broad showed up, cause otherwise me and Groot here woulda' collected our bounty."

5617.author: Rocket Raccoon
5617.quote: "Pretty high and mighty coming from the lackey of a genocidal maniac. Yeah, I know who you are. Anyone who's anyone knows who you are."

5618.author: Rocket Racoon to the prisoners
5618.quote: "Let's make something clear. This one here's our booty! You wanna get to him, you go through us! Or more accurately... We go through you!!"

5620.author: Rocket Raccoon
5620.quote: "Aw, what the hell, I don't got that long a lifespan anyway..."

5621.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal
5621.quote: "Subject 89P13. Calls itself "Rocket." The result of illegal genetic and cybernetic experiments on a lower life form."

5622.author: Groot, Rocket Raccoon, and Star-Lord
5622.quote: "I am Groot.""So what, 'It's better than eleven percent!' What the hell does that have to do with anything?""Thank you, Groot, thank you. See. Groot's the only one of you who has a clue."

5623.author: Rocket and Star-Lord
5623.quote: "There's one more thing we need to complete the plan. That guy's eye...""No! No, we don't. No, we don't need that guy's eye.""No, seriously, I need it! It's important to me."

5624.author: Rocket and Garthan Saal seconds before his death

5625.author: Rocket and Groot.
5625.quote: "No, Groot... don't do this, you'll die... why are you doing this?""WE are Groot."

5626.author: Rocket Raccoon and Rhomann Dey.
5626.quote: "Your criminal records have also been expunged. However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future.""Question. What if I see something that I wanna take and it belongs to someone else?""Then you will be arrested.""But what if I want it more than the person who has it?""Still illegal.""That doesn't follow. No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand me? What are you laughing at? What? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman?"

5627.author: Peter Quill, Drax, Rocket Raccoon, Gamora, and Groot
5627.quote: "I look around at us, you know what I see? Losers. I mean like, folks who have lost stuff. And we have, man, we have, all of us. Our homes, our families, normal lives. And usually life takes more than it gives, but not today. Today it's giving us something. It is giving us a chance.""To do what?""To give a shit, for once, not run away. I for one am not gonna stand by and watch as Ronan wipes out billions of lives.""But Quill, stopping Ronan, it's impossible. You're asking us to die.""Yeah, I guess I am. I-""Quill. I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies, I will be grateful to die among my friends.""You are an honorable man, Quill. I will fight beside you. And in the end, see my wife and daughter again.""I am Groot.""What the hell, I ain't got that long of a life span anyway. Now I'm standing, you all happy? We're all standing up now. Bunch of jackasses standing in a circle."

5628.author: Rhomann Dey to Garthan Saal
5628.quote: "Rocket. Wanted on over 50 charges of vehicular theft and escape from lockup."

5629.author: Rocket Raccoon to the Sovereign
5629.quote: "Ya'know, they told me you people were conceded douchebags, but that isn't true at all."

5630.author: Rocket Raccoon to Yondu Udonta
5630.quote: "You maniac! The whole ship is gonna blow!"

5631.author: Rocket Raccoon to Gamora
5631.quote: "Sorry, I can only lose one friend today."

5634.author: Gamora to Groot
5634.quote: "Hey, it'll be just a couple of days. We'll be back before Rocket is finished fixing the ship."

5635.author: Rocket Raccoon, Star-Lord, Drax the Destroyer and Gamora
5635.quote: "You know why I did it, Star-Munch? Hmm?""I'm not gonna answer to "Star-Munch."""I did it because I wanted to! What are we even talking about this for? We just had a little man save us by blowing up fifty ships!""How little?""Well, kinda like this?""A little one-inch man saved us?""Well, if he got closer, I'm sure he'd be much larger.""Yeah, that's how eyesight works, you stupid raccoon.""DON'T CALL ME A RACCOON!""I'm sorry, I took it too far. I meant "trash panda."""Is that better?""I don't know.""It's worse. It's so much worse."

5636.author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
5636.quote: "Does anyone got any tape out there? I wanna put some tape over the death button.""Nobody has any tape!""Not a single person has tape?!"You have an Atomic Bomb in your bag. If anyone's gonna have tape, it's you!""That's exactly my point! I have to do everything!"

5637.author: Taserface and Rocket Raccoon
5637.quote: "We'll deliver you to the Kree in the morning! Neither one of you will laugh much longer after that!""Ok Taserface! Hey, tell the other guys we said hi, Taserface!"

5638.author: Taserface, Rocket Raccoon and Nebula
5638.quote: "You're the one who killed those men by leading them down the wrong path because you're weak and stupid! It's time for the Ravagers to rise once again to glory with a new captain: Taserface!""I'm sorry, I'm sorry, your name is, it's Taserface?""That's right.""Do you shoot Tasers out of your face?""It's metaphorical!""For what?""For...It is a name what strikes fear into the hearts of anyone who hears it!""Yeah...Ok, whatever you say.""You shut up, your next! Udonta, I've waited a long time for this... What?""Sorry, I'm so sorry, I just keep imagining you waking up in the morning, looking in the mirror and in all seriousness to yourself saying 'You know what would be a really kick-ass name? Taserface!'. That's how I hear you in my head! What was your second choice? Scrotumhead?""New plan! We're killing you first!""Well, dying is certainly better than living an entire life as a moronic shithead who thinks Taserface is a cool name.""That's enough killing for today!"

5639.author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
5639.quote: "So we're saving the galaxy again?""Yup.""Awesome! We're really gonna be able to jack up our price if we're two-time galaxy savers.""I seriously can’t believe that is where your mind goes.""It was just a random thought, man! I thought we were friends! Of course I care about the planets, and the buildings, and all of the animals on the planets.""And the people.""Meh."

5640.author: Yondu Udonta and Rocket Raccoon
5640.quote: ""I know everything about you. I know you play like you're the meanest in the heart but actually you're the most scared of all.""Shut-up!""I know you steal batteries you don't need and you push away anyone who's wiling to put up with you because just a little bit of love reminds you of how big and empty that hole inside you actually is.""I said shut-up!""I know them scientist what made you never gave a rats ass about you.""I'm serious dude!""Just like my own damn parents who sold me, their own little baby to slavery. I know who you are boy, because you're me.""What kind of a pair are we?""The kind that's about to fight a planet I reckon.""Alright, okay, good that's...wait, fight a what?"

5641.author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
5641.quote: "I am Groot.""One minute you think someone has a weird shaped head, the next minute just because you realize part of that head is a hat. That's why you don't like hats?""

5642.author: Rocket Raccoon, Groot and Star-Lord
5642.quote: "Alright, first you flick this switch, then this one, that activates it. Then you press this button, which will give you five minutes to get out of there. Now, whatever you do don't push this button, because that will set off the bomb immediately and we will all then be dead. Now, repeat back what I just said.""I am Groot. I am Groot.""That's right.""I am Groot.""NO! That's the button that will kill everyone. Try again.""I am Groot. I am Groot. I am Groot.""NO! That's exactly what you just said! How's that even possible? Which button is the button you're supposed to push? Point to it. NO!""Hey, your making him nervous!""Shut up and give me some tape! Does anyone got any tape out there? I wanna put some tape over the death button.""I don't have any tape, let me check! Yo Yondu, do you have any tape? Gamora, do you have any tape? Hey, ahh, never mind! Drax, do you have any tape? Yeah, Scotch Tape would work! Then why would you ask me if scotch tape would work if you didn't have any? Nobody has any tape!""Not a single person has tape?!""Nope!""Did you ask Nebula?""...Yes!""Are you sure?""Well I asked Yondu and she was sitting right next to him!""I knew you were lying!""You have priceless batteries and an Atomic Bomb in your bag. If anyone's gonna have tape, it's you!""That's exactly the point! I have to do everything!""You are wasting a lot of time here!""We're all gonna die..."

5643.author: Star-Lord, Drax and Rocket Raccoon
5643.quote: "Drax, why aren't you wearing one of Rocket's Aero-Rigs?""It hurts.""Hurts?""I have sensitive nipples.""Wa-ha-ha-ha! My nipples hurt! Oh, goodness me!""What about him, what's he doing?""I'm finishing this so we can listen to tunes while we work.""How is that important?""Blame Quill, he's the one who loves music so much!""No, I actually agree with Drax on this, that's hardly important right now.""Oh, ok, sure Quill""No, seriously, I side with Drax.""I understand that, your being very serious right now.""I can clearly see you winking!""Dam, I'm using my left eye?"

5644.author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
5644.quote: "I am Groot.""They were not looking at you funny."

5645.author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
5645.quote: "The metal's too thick! For the bomb to work, we'll need to place it on Ego's core. And our fat butts aren't going to fit in those tiny holes!""Well...""That's a terrible idea.""Which is the only kind of idea we have left.""Unbelevable. "Rocket, do this, Rocket do that".""What a day."

5646.author: Drax, Gamora, Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon, Mantis, Nebula, and Groot
5646.quote: "Out of the way, dumber, smaller Groot!""I told you something didn’t feel right!""‘I told you so.’ That’s really what I need right now.""I came back, didn’t I?""Because there’s an unspoken thing.""There is no unspoken thing.""What are you doing? You could have killed us all crashing in here like that!""Uh, ‘Thank you, Rocket’?""We had it under control.""We did not. That is only an extension of his true self.
