He will be back soon.""What’s Smurfette doing here!?""Back rubs, dishes, killing gods, whatever I need to do to get a damn ride home.""She tried to murder me!""I saved you, you stupid fox.""He’s not a fox.""I am Groot.""I’m not a raboon either!""I am Groot.""‘Raccoon,’ whatever!""How do we kill a Celestial?""There’s the center to him - his brain, his soul, whatever it is, in some sort of shell...""It’s in the caverns below the surface.""Yondu?""If he’s got that fin back, I am so screwed."

5647.author: Rocket Raccoon, Gamora, and Star-Lord
5647.quote: "Why are we doing this again?""It's a distress signal, Rocket. Someone could be dying.""I get that, but why are we doing it?""'Cause we're nice. And maybe whoever it is will give us a little cheddar cheese for our help.""Which isn't the point.""Which isn't the point... I mean… If he doesn't pony up…""We'll take his ship.""B-b-b-bingo!"

5648.author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
5648.quote: "That place is a legend, they make the most powerful, horrific weapons to ever torment the universe. I would very much like to go there, please.""The rabbit is correct, and clearly the smartest among you!""Rabbit?""I assume you're the captain, sir?""You're very perceptive...""You seem like a noble leader. Would you join me on my quest to Nidavellir?""alright, let me just ask the Captain... oh, wait a second, it's me! Yeah, I'll go.""Wonderful."

5649.author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
5649.quote: "So, dead brother, huh? Yeah, that could be annoying.""Well, he's been dead before.""And you said that your sister and your dad...""Both dead.""But still got a mom though?""Killed by a dark elf.""A best friend?""Got stabbed through the heart.""Are you sure you're up to this particular murder mission?""Absolutely."

5650.author: Rocket Raccoon and Thor
5650.quote: "Well, if fate does want you to kill that crapsack, you're gonna need more than one stupid eyeball.""What's this?""What's it look like? Some jerk lost a bet with me in Contraxia.""He gave you his eye?""No, he gave me 100 Credits. I snuck into his room later that night and stole his eye.""Thank you, sweet rabbit.""I would've washed that. The only way I could sneak it off Contraxia was on my..."

5651.author: Rocket Raccoon and Winter Soldier
5651.quote: "How much for the gun?""Not for sale.""Okay, how much for the arm? ...Oh, I'll get that arm."

5652.author: Groot and Rocket Raccoon
5652.quote: "I am Groot...""No. No. No. No. No! Groot... No..."

5653.author: Rocket Raccoon to the Avengers
5653.quote: "Okay, who here hasn't been to space? You better not throw up on my ship."

5654.author: Rocket Raccoon to Thor
5654.quote: "I lost the only family I ever had. Quill, Groot, Drax, the chick with the antenna! All gone! I get that you miss your mom. But she's gone. Really gone. And there are plenty of people who are only kinda gone. And you can help them."

5656.author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
5656.quote: "Agent Carter, we just pulled a red ball out of D.C. All hands on deck. Meaning cover the phones.""Rose, redirect all calls to the briefing room. Covered. Shall we?"

5657.author: Peggy Carter and Roger Dooley
5657.quote: "I wonder if I might request a sick day.""What's the matter? Got a headache?""Amongst other things. Ladies' things.""Oh, geez. Yeah, sure, take the day. Go shopping, whatever makes you feel better.""Thank you for your understanding."

5658.author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
5658.quote: "Carter. Come here for a second. C'mere. C'mere. C'mere. Settle a bet for us. Is that Joe DiMaggio?""I don't follow boxing."

5659.author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
5659.quote: "Agent Carter...""Miss Carter; I don't work here anymore."

5660.author: Roger Dooley and Peggy Carter
5660.quote: "Promise you'll get the son of a bitch who did this. Say it!""We'll catch him.""Attagirl."

5661.author: Ronan the Accuser
5661.quote: "I promised Thanos I would retrieve the Orb for him only then will he destroy Xandar for me."

5662.author: Ronan the Accuser to Drax the Destroyer
5662.quote: "I don’t recall killing your family.  I doubt I’ll remember killing you either."

5663.author: Ronan the Accuser to Drax the Destroyer
5663.quote: "I was mistaken. I do remember your family. Their screams were pitiful and..."

5664.author: Ronan the Accuser
5664.quote: "Xandar, you stand accused. Your wretched peace treaty will not save you. It will be the tinder on which you burn!"

5665.author: The Broker about Ronan
5665.quote: "A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty, who will not rest until Xandarian culture, my culture, is wiped from existence!"

5666.author: Drax the Destroyer to Moloka Dar
5666.quote: "Ronan murdered my wife, Ovette, and my daughter, Kamaria. He slaughtered them where they stood. And he laughed! Her life is not yours to take. He killed my family, I shall kill one of his in return."

5667.author: Nebula to Ronan the Accuser
5667.quote: "This is one fight you won't win."

5668.author: Ronan the Accuser and Nova Corps Soldier.
5668.quote: "They call me terrorist. Radical. Zealot. Because I obey the ancient laws of my people the Kree and punish those who do not. Because I do not forgive your people for taking the life of my father and his father and his father before him. A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten.""You can’t do this. Our governments signed a peace treaty.""My government knows no shame. You Xandarians and your culture are a disease.""You will never rule Xandar.""No... I will cure it!"

5669.author: Ronan the Accuser argues with The Other before being killed by him.
5669.quote: "With all due respect, Thanos, your daughter made this mess, and yet you summon me?""I would lower my voice, Accuser!""First, she lost a battle to some primitive.""Thanos had put Gamora under your charge!""Then she was apprehended by the Nova Corps.""You are the one, here, with nothing to show for him!""Your sources say she was meant to betray us the whole time.""Lower your tone! I may be your..."

5670.author: Ronan the Accuser and Thanos
5670.quote: "I only ask that you take this matter seriously.""The only matter I do not take seriously, boy, is you. Your politics bore me. Your demeanor is that of a pouty child. And apparently, you alienated my favorite daughter, Gamora. I shall honor our agreement, Kree, if you bring me the Orb. But return to me again empty handed again... and I will bathe the starways in your blood."

5671.author: Thanos, Korath the Pursuer and Ronan the Accuser
5671.quote: "BOY! I would reconsider your current course!""Master! You cannot! Thanos is the most powerful being in the universe!""(To Korath) Not anymore." (To Thanos) "YOU CALL ME "BOY"?! I will unfurl one thousand years of Kree justice on Xandar AND BURN IT TO ITS CORE!! Then, Thanos, I'm coming for you!"

5672.author: Ronan the Accuser and Star-Lord
5672.quote: "People of Xandar, the time has come to rejoice and renounce your paltry gods! Your salvation is at hand!""Ooh, child, things are gonna get easier. Ooh child, things will get brighter. You listen to these words. Ooh child, things are gonna get easier. Ooh child, things'll get brighter. Then bring it down hard! Someday...""What are you doing?""Dance-off, bro. Me and you. Gamora... Subtle, taking it back.""What are you doing?""I'm distracting you, you big turd blossom!"

5673.author: Ronan the Accuser and Star-Lord
5673.quote: "You're mortal! How...""You said it yourself, bitch. We're the Guardians of the Galaxy."

5674.author: Ego, Gamora, Star-Lord and Drax the Destroyer
5674.quote: "A memorial to the War Over Xandar, when you single-handedly saved the galaxy.""Single-handedly?""Whoa. It’s perfect.""You’ve got to be kidding.""Why am I dead? Why did you all kill me?!""That’s Ronan. That’s you."

5675.author: Nebula and Gamora
5675.quote: "Here you stand, a hero, a Garden of the Galaxy!""A what? It's ‘Guardians of the Galaxy.’""Oh.""Why would we be ‘the Gardens of the Galaxy’?""I don’t know. I thought it was stupid.""Yeah, it would be.""It’s still wordy.""I wasn’t the one who thought of it."

5676.author: Ronan and an Accuser
5676.quote: "We'll be back for the weapon.""The core?""The woman."

5677.author: Yon-Rogg, Ronan and Korath
5677.quote: "Ronan.""The Accusers completes their operation... but the greater mission was a failure, thanks to your team."It was a trap to lure our operative Vers to Torfa and kidnap her.""Give is their location. We'll take care of the terrorist threat.""By bombing them out of the galaxy? No, we'll handle this.""A cell of Skrulls everywhere is a threat to Kree everywhere. Where are they?""They are...""Lost. They are lost for now. But we will find them.""Do so, or we will."

5678.author: Thanos and Gamora
5678.quote: "Ronan's located the Power Stone, I'm dispatching you onto his ship.""He won't like that.""The alternative is death. Ronan's obsession clouds his judgement.""

5679.author: Samantha Reyes to Foggy Nelson
5679.quote: "I'll say this once Mr. Nelson. If, god willing, your firm doesn't collapse under the weight of the chickens and the fruit baskets you've been collecting from your clientele, there will come a time when you need to ask a favor of the District Attorney's Office, and depending on how this situation resolves, that favor will either be forthcoming, or permanently withheld. Am I making myself clear?"

5680.author: Karen Page and Foggy Nelson
5680.quote: "That's Reyes?""In all her Defense Attorney destroying glory."

5681.author: Blake Tower and Foggy Nelson
5681.quote: "We need all your files in the Grote case, notes, interviews, any and all recordings and emails.""And in return we get?""I convince District Attorney Reyes to scratch the names Nelson and Murdock off her shit list."

5682.author: Marci Stahl and Foggy Nelson
5682.quote: "Rumors among my new partners? Reyes has her sights on the mayor's office.""This is my shocked face."

5683.author: Samantha Reyes
5683.quote: "Ladies and gentlemen of the jury, Frank Castle brutally tortured and murdered thirty people, thirty that we know of, he took the law into his own hands, acted as judge, jury and most violent executioner, and you will hear that the defendant's victims were criminals but the victims are not on trial here today and justice does not belong in the hands of a man like Frank Castle, this isn't the Wild West. Justice is served here in a court of law, and it is up to each of you to take back the city from lawless vigilantes like Frank Castle. This man is no hero, he's a serial killer, and he is guilty."

5684.author: Samuel Sterns
5684.quote: "This will be a somewhat novel sensation. We have begun. The dialysis machine will mix the antidote with your blood. Except the antidote will only take hold once we've achieved a full reaction. Just relax. Okay. We are comprehensive. Here you go. All right. We set to pop?"

5685.author: Samuel Sterns
5685.quote: "We could get the Nobel for this!"

5686.author: Samuel Sterns
5686.quote: "Just the three of us, this is Promethean fire!"

5687.author: Samuel Sterns and Bruce Banner
5687.quote: "We started on rats and mice, but it just completely fried them, so we had to go bigger. And we still don't know which is more toxic, the gamma or your blood.""What do you mean, my blood?""Bruce, this is all you. You didn't send me much to work with, so I had to concentrate it and make more. With a little more trial and error, there's no end to what we can do! This is potentially Olympian! This gamma technology has limitless applications. We'll unlock hundreds of cures. We will make humans impervious to disease!"

5688.author: Kathleen Sparr and Samuel Sterns
5688.quote: "Are you telling me you can make more like him?""No! Not yet. I sorted out a few pieces, but it's not like I can put together the same Humpty Dumpty, if that's what you're asking. He was a freak accident! The goal is to do it better!"

5689.author: Bruce Banner and Samuel Sterns
5689.quote: "You should know that there is a flip side to this too. If we miss on the low side, if we induce me and it fails, this will be very dangerous for you.""Ha-ha-ha. Look, I've always been more curious then cautious and that's served me pretty well, so are we gonna do this?"

5690.movie: The Avengers Prelude: Fury's Big Week
5690.author: Natasha Romanoff and Samuel Sterns
5690.quote: "Dr. Samuel Sterns?""I think perhaps once I was...but shall now become much more."

5691.movie: The Avengers Prelude: Fury's Big Week
5691.author: Samuel Sterns to Natasha Romanoff
5691.quote: "I see my future unfolding. It is an illustrious future defined by power and influence. A future that begins this very instant."

5692.author: Fox and Sarge
5692.quote: "You're... you're from S.H.I.E.L.D.""Never heard of it."

5693.author: Sarge to Dana
5693.quote: "People fantasize about doing something heroic in times like these, but I'd save your own skin."

5694.author: Sarge and Pax
5694.quote: "You can tell a lot about a world by its currency. What have we got?""Paper. With faces on it.""Great. One of those."

5695.author: Sarge and Pax
5695.quote: "See? You were right, Pax. This rock has it all. Now, are you good to come with me, secure the exit while these two scout the site? Or should we discuss that, too?""No. I'm good. I'm just I'm sorting through it. Tinker died. He was a friend.""That's what friends are for."

5696.author: Pax and Sarge
5696.quote: "You know, why not take a breath here? This place has sugar water, blue sky. Maybe kick back before it's reduced to ash.""Sounds like powering down.""Or charging up, right? I mean, didn't you ever take a load off back in your home turf, your past life or whatever?"

5697.author: Sarge and Dana
5697.quote: "Right now, you're sizing me up, wondering how much paper money a guy like me has to spend. Could be a big sale. Your heart rate goes up a little. Can you feel it?""We always do our best to meet our customers' needs.""Oh, don't worry about me. I'll be leaving satisfied. Worry about you, your heart rate, because it's about to go nuts when we rob this place."

5698.author: Sarge to Harold Simcoe
5698.quote: "I've been looking all over for you."

5699.author: Sarge to Deke Shaw
5699.quote: "You're a real talker, but you're not from here and you shouldn't be here, so I got to take you and make you sing."

5700.author: Sarge to Melinda May
5700.quote: "I've been to a lot of worlds. Some good, some garbage. But I've never been to one where people recognize my face."

5701.author: Sarge and Melinda May
5701.quote: "The Shrike are cancer. I'm going to make sure this is the last planet they ever infect.""How do you plan to do that?""To stop the spread, you cut off the limb. When their creator arrives, I'm going to burn it all down."

5702.author: Sarge and Alphonso Mackenzie
5702.quote: "I'm prepared to protect my people from whatever's coming.""You're people? They keep looking at me. Might want to get used to that.""And why's that?""Because by the end of the day, I'll be the one in charge."

5703.author: Sarge to Daisy Johnson
5703.quote: "Your world is about to be destroyed. The only two questions that matter are how to stop the monster and how to survive if we fail. She's coming."

5704.author: Sarge to Jaco and Pax
5704.quote: "Jaco and I will take the bridge. Pax, you lock down the engine bays. Then we get this ship out of here before the warhead blows."

5705.author: Sarge to Snowflake as he returned to his cell

5706.author: Izel and Sarge
5706.quote: "This host silenced most of who you are. But you still remember my name like it's a song in your head. You remember your name, too.""Pachakutiq."

5707.author: Sarge and Daisy Johnson
5707.quote: "I can feel the rage churning underneath my skin.""Use it. Let the anger out.""I don't want to. I want it gone."

5708.author: Wolfgang von Strucker about Wanda and Pietro Maximoff
5708.quote: "There's nothing more horrifying than a miracle!"

5709.author: Wanda Maximoff to Steve Rogers, referencing Tony Stark
5709.quote: "Ultron can't see the difference between saving the world and destroying it. Where do you think he gets that from?"

5710.author: Scarlet Witch to the people of Sokovia

5711.author: Doctor List to Baron Wolfgang von Strucker
5711.quote: "Let's show them what we have accomplished. Send out the twins."

5712.author: Steve Rogers and Maria Hill
5712.quote: "The two enhanced?""Wanda and Pietro Maximoff. Twins. Orphaned at ten when a shell collapsed their apartment building. Sokovia's had a rough history. It's nowhere special but it's on the way to everywhere special.""Their abilities?""He's got increased metabolism and improved thermal homeostasis. Her thing is neural electric interfacing, telekinesis, mental manipulation. He's fast and she's weird.""Well, they're going to show up again.""Agreed. File says they volunteered for Strucker's experiments. It's nuts.""Right. What kind of monster would let a German scientist experiment on them to protect their country?""We're not at war, Captain.""They are."

5713.author: Ultron to Quicksilver and Scarlet Witch
5713.quote: "I wondered why only you two survived Strucker's experiments. Now I don't. We will make it right. You and I can hurt them. But you will tear them apart... from the inside."

5714.author: Maria Hill and Steve Rogers
5714.quote: "He's all over the globe. Robotics labs, weapons facilities, jet propulsion labs. Reports of a metal man, or men, coming in and emptying the place.""Fatalities?""Only when engaged. Mostly guys left in a fugue state going on about old memories, worst fears, and "something too fast to see".""Maximoffs. That makes sense he'd go to them. They have someone in common.""Not anymore."

5716.author: Thor to Captain America
5716.quote: "The girl tried to warp my mind. Take special care. I doubt a human could keep her at bay. Fortunately, I am mighty."

5717.author: Iron Man to the Hulk
5717.quote: "Are you listening to me? That little witch is messing with your mind. You're stronger than her. You're smarter than her. You're Bruce Banner."

5718.author: Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
5718.quote: "Sometimes my teammates don't tell me things. I was kind of hoping Thor would be the exception.""Yeah, give him time. We don't know what the Maximoff kid showed him."

5719.author: Tony Stark and Nick Fury
5719.quote: "I saw them all dead, Nick. I felt it. The whole world, too. Because of me. I wasn't ready. I didn't do all I could.""Maximoff girl, she's working you, Stark. Playing on your fear.""I wasn't tricked, I was shown. Wasn't a nightmare, it was my legacy. The end of the path I started us on."

5720.author: Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
5720.quote: "You're wondering why you can't look inside my head.""Sometimes it's hard, but sooner or later every man shows himself."

5721.author: Scarlet Witch to Ultron
5721.quote: "We wait for two days for Tony Stark to kill us."

5722.author: Ulysses Klaue and Wanda Maximoff
5722.quote: "I’m afraid that I’m not that afraid.""Everybody’s afraid of something."

5723.author: Pietro Maximoff and Wanda Maximoff
5723.quote: "I’m gonna kill him. I’ll be right back.""No. I’m over it. I want… I want to finish the plan. I want the big one."

5724.author: Wanda Maximoff and Ultron
5724.quote: "You said we would destroy the Avengers. Make a better world.""It will be better.""When everyone is dead?"

5725.author: Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
5725.quote: "Please. Don't do this.""What choice do we have?"

5726.author: Wanda Maximoff and Bruce Banner
5726.quote: "I know you're angry.""No, we're way past that. I could choke the life out of you and never change a shade."

5727.author: Wanda Maximoff and Vision
5727.quote: "I looked in your head and saw annihilation.""Look again."

5728.author: Scarlet Witch and Hawkeye
5728.quote: "H-How could I let this happen?! This is all our fault!""Hey, look at me. It’s your fault, it’s everyone’s fault, who cares. Are you up for this?"

5729.author: Hawkeye and Scarlet Witch
5729.quote: "What about the core?""I'll protect it. It's my job."

5730.author: Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver
5730.quote: "Get the people on the boats.""I'm not going to leave you.""I can handle these. Come back for me when everyone else is off, not before. You understand?""You know, I'm 12 minutes older than you.""Go."

5731.author: Ultron and Scarlet Witch
5731.quote: "Wanda. If you stay here, you'll die.""I just did. Do you know how it felt? It felt like that..."

5732.author: Scarlet Witch
5732.quote: "You guys know I can move things with my mind, right?"

5734.author: Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
5734.quote: "Wanda? What about Wanda?""She's fine. She's confined in a compound currently. Vision's keeping her company.""Oh God, Tony! Every time. Every time I think you're seeing things the right way...""It's a 100 acres with a lap pool. It's got a screening room. There's worse way to protect people. She's not a U.S. Citizen and they don't grant visas to Weapons of Mass Destruction.""Protection? Is that how you see this? This is protection? It's internment, Tony. Come on, she's a kid!"

5735.author: Vision and Hawkeye
5735.quote: "Clint, You can't overpower me.""I know I can't. But she can."

5736.author: Vision and Wanda Maximoff
5736.quote: "Wanda.""Hmm?""No one dislikes you, Wanda.""...Thanks.""Oh, you're welcome. No. It's a... involuntary response in their amygdala they can't help but be afraid of you.""Are you?""My amygdala is synthetic, so...""I used to think of myself one way. But, after this. I am something else. And still me, I think. But... that's not what everyone else sees."

5737.author: Scarlet Witch and Hawkeye
5737.quote: "Oh my god. What are you doing here?""Disappointing my kids. I'm suppose to go water skiing."

5738.author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
5738.quote: "If you do this, they will never stop being afraid of you.""I can't control their fear, only my own."

5739.author: Steve Rogers and Wanda Maximoff
5739.quote: "Thanks for having my back.""It was time to get off my ass."

5740.author: Iron Man and Scarlet Witch
5740.quote: "Wanda, I think you hurt Vision's feelings.""You locked me in my room.""Okay. First, that's an exaggeration. Second, I did it to protect you."

5741.author: Okoye
5741.quote: "Why was she up there all this time?"

5742.author: Proxima Midnight and Black Widow
5742.quote: "He'll die alone. As will you.""She's not alone."

5744.author: Wanda Maximoff and Vision
5744.quote: "Vis? Is it the stone again?""It's as if it's speaking to me.""What does it say?""I don't... I don't know. Something... Tell me what you feel.""I just feel you."

5745.author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
5745.quote: "Wanda, it's time.""No.""They can't stop him, Wanda, but we can. Look at me. You have the power to destroy the stone.""Don't.""You must do it. Wanda, please... We are out of time.""I can't.""Yes, you can. You can. If he gets this stone, half the universe dies. It's not fair. It shouldn't be you, but it is. It's all right. You could never hurt me... I just feel you."

5746.author: Thanos and Scarlet Witch
5746.quote: "I understand, my child. Better than anyone.""You could never.""Today, I lost more than you can know. But now is no time to mourn. Now... is no time at all."

5747.author: Wanda makes it personal with Thanos during the Battle of Earth
5747.quote: "You took everything from me.""I don't even know who you are.""You will."

5748.author: Spider-Man gets acquainted with Captain Marvel while Scarlet Witch and Okoye assure him she has assistance getting the Nano Gauntlet to Luis' Van
5748.quote: "Hi. I'm Peter Parker.""Hey, Peter Parker. You got something for me?""I don't know how you're gonna get it through all that.""Don't worry.""She's got help."

5749.author: Wanda assures Clint that Natasha knows the Avengers beat Thanos
5749.quote: "I just wish there was a way to let her know. To tell her that we won. That we did it.""She knows. They both do."

5750.author: List
5750.quote: "No one has made it past this stage of our experiments with alien enhancement. Well, no one other than the twins, of course."

5751.movie: Avengers: Age of Ultron Prelude - This Scepter'd Isle
5751.author: Pietro Maximoff to Wanda Maximoff
5751.quote: "Be strong, sister. It won't be long before we have the power we need to fight."

5752.author: Chan Ho Yin
5752.quote: "我祖父常说每个人都是谜。有些人怀有美丽的秘密。另一些则隐藏深色的。他认为, 了解一个人真正本性的唯一方法就是刺穿他的外壳, 凝视内在。[1]"

5753.author: Melinda May, Quan Chen, Phil Coulson, Jemma Simmons and Grant Ward
5753.quote: "Everyone, this is Agent Quan, Chan Ho Yin's case agent. What can you tell us?""Not much, I'm afraid. Chan is a magician, so at first, I thought he'd made himself disappear.""File said you caught him violating his Index agreement before.""On two separate occasions. Claimed we were "hampering his artistic expression". But late last night, he was taken by professionals. The only thing they left behind was this scrap of aluminized material.""Fireproof clothing.""So whoever took him knew about his power.""Yes, and we think we know why. Over the last few days, Tech division discovered a crack into our data stream. It's the same cyber punks who hacked us before. Somehow, they got in again. It's the Rising Tide. Hello? It got real quiet. You guys still there?"

5754.author: Debbie and Raina
5754.quote: "I'm surprised you got him to cooperate.""He has dreams. I told him they'd come true.""You gave him a name, didn't you?"

5755.author: Melinda May and Phil Coulson
5755.quote: "His file didn't say anything about him being psychotic, did it?""No. It just said he was kind of a tool."

5756.author: Phil Coulson
5756.quote: "Mr. Yin, we don't want to hurt you... but we have to."

5757.author: Raina and Chan Ho Yin
5757.quote: "I apologize for last night. It was important I bring you in under the radar.""Ah, S.H.I.E.L.D.. Tell Agent Quan I don't need to be read the power protocols again. It was just a street performance. It's not like I set anyone on fire.""I don't work for S.H.I.E.L.D.. I come as a friend.""English isn't my first language; but that word means something different than you think."

5758.author: Scorch and Raina
5758.quote: "You want to make Chan Ho Yin a famous name?""No. You need a simpler name, a more powerful name, a name like...Scorch.""Scorch? Are you joking?""Have you ever heard of Steve Rogers? No. But Captain America, now, he's on the news, on a lunchbox, on a poster on the wall."

5759.author: Debbie, Raina and Scorch
5759.quote: "We don't understand what gave you this ability, but the reason you don't burn is because your blood platelets are fire-resistant.""Which is why we're removing them.""Raina, you said I have a gift.""And you're giving it."

5760.author: Melinda May and Scorch
5760.quote: "陈, 我很抱歉你过着你不想要的生活, 但是暴力将不会解决任何问题""它会阻止我被囚禁。由你, 由他们;没什么区别我得到这个礼物是有原因的。燃烧明亮。""没有回头路了""我不想回去![2]"

5761.author: Phil Coulson, Scorch and Melinda May
5761.quote: "Mr. Chan, believe it or not, this could still get worse.""You bend someone long enough and they break! Poor little Chan Ho Yin may have believed your lies, but not Scorch!""Who?""Oh, crap. They gave him a name."

5762.author: Black Widow to Captain America
5762.quote: "What about the nurse who lives across the hall from you? She seems kinda nice."

5763.author: Sharon Carter and Steve Rogers
5763.quote: "My aunt, she's kind of an insomniac.""Yeah. Hey, if you want... If you want, you're welcome to use my machine. Might be cheaper than the one in the basement.""Yeah? What's it cost?""A cup of coffee?""Thank you, but I already have a load in downstairs, and you really don't want my scrubs in your machine. I just finished a rotation in the infectious disease ward, so...""Well, I'll keep my distance.""Hopefully, not too far."

5764.author: Sharon Carter and Steve Rogers
5764.quote: "Captain, I'm Agent 13 of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s Special Service. I'm assigned to protect you.""On whose order?""His."

5765.author: Sharon Carter and Alexander Pierce
5765.quote: "With all due respect, if S.H.I.E.L.D. is conducting a manhunt for Captain America, we deserve to know why.""Because he lied to us."

5766.author: Brock Rumlow and Sharon Carter
5766.quote: "Move away from your station!""Like he said, Captain's orders.""You picked the wrong side, agent.""Depends on where you're standing."

5767.author: Sharon Carter
5767.quote: "Margaret Carter was known to most as a founder of S.H.I.E.L.D.. But I just knew her as Aunt Peggy. She had a photograph in her office. Aunt Peggy standing next to JFK. As a kid, that was pretty cool. But, it was a lot to live up to. Which is why I never told anyone we were related. I asked her once how she managed to master diplomacy and espionage at a time when no one wanted to see a woman succeed at either. And she said, "Compromise where you can. Where you can't, don't. Even if everyone is telling you that something wrong is something right. Even if the whole world is telling you to move, it is your duty to plant yourself like a tree, look them in the eye, and say, 'No, you move'."

5768.author: T'Challa and Natasha Romanoff
5768.quote: "You know where they are.""I know someone who does."

5769.author: Steve Rogers and Sharon Carter
5769.quote: "CIA has you stationed over here now?""Berlin. Joint Terrorism Task Force.""Right, sounds fun.""I know, right?"

5770.author: Sharon Carter and Steve Rogers
5770.quote: "I'm not sure you understand the concept of a getaway car.""It's low profile.""Good, 'cause this stuff tends to draw a crowd.""I owe you again.""Keeping a list. You know, he kind of try to kill me.""Sorry, I'll put it on the list, too. They're going to come looking for you.""I know.""Thank you, Sharon."

5771.author: Shuri
5771.quote: "This corset is really uncomfortable, so can we all just wrap it up and go home?"

5773.author: Shuri to T'Challa
5773.quote: "Do you think it's a good idea to bring your ex on a mission?"

5775.author: Shuri
5775.quote: "Yay, another broken white boy for me to fix."

5777.author: Shuri and Okoye
5777.quote: "Did he freeze?""Like an antelope in headlights."

5778.author: Black Panther and Shuri
5778.quote: "You are teaching me? What do you know?”“More than you."

5780.author: Shuri and T'Challa
5780.quote: "If your going to take on Klaue, you need the best that the design group has to offer. Exhibit A.""My design.""Old tech, functional, but old. Hey! People are shooting at me, wait! Let me put on my helmet! Now, look at these. Do you like that one?""Tempting, but the idea is to not be noticed. This one.""Now tell it to go on. The entire suit fits in the teeth of the necklace. Strike it.""Anywhere?""Not that hard genius!""You told me to strike it! You didn't say how hard!""I invite you to my lab and you just kick things around?""Maybe you should make it a little stronger...Hey, wait a minute...""The nanites adsorb the kinetic energy and hold it in place for redistribution.""Very nice.""Strike it again in the same spot.""You're recording?""For research purposes.""Delete that footage!"

5781.author: Shuri and Black Panther
5781.quote: "Wooh! Let's go! Look at your suit! You've been taking bullets and it's charging it up with kinetic energy!""Pull around the truck!""Show off!"

5782.author: Shuri and Black Panther
5782.quote: "What was that?""Don't worry about it, you're doing fine!"

5784.author: Shuri and Everett Ross
5784.quote: "It's like riding a hover-bike.""You have hover-bikes?"

5785.author: Shuri and Bruce Banner
5785.quote: "The structure is polymorphic.""Right. We had to attach each neuron non-sequentially.""Why didn't you just reprogram the synapses to work collectively?""Because... we didn't think of it?""I'm sure you did your best."

5786.author: Sif and Thor
5786.quote: "Where are they?""Hiding! As cowards always do!"

5787.author: Sif and Loki
5787.quote: "Loki, you must go to the All-Father and convince him to change his mind.""And if I do, then what? I love Thor more dearly than any of you, but you know what he is. He's arrogant, he's reckless, he's dangerous! You saw how he was today. Is that what Asgard needs from its King?(Loki walks off)""He may speak for the good of Asgard, but he's always been jealous of Thor."

5788.author: Sif, Loki, and Fandral
5788.quote: "Allfather, we must speak with you urgently...""My friends.""Where is Odin?""Father has fallen into the Odinsleep. Mother fears he may never awaken again.""We would speak with her...""She has refused to leave my father's bedside. You can bring your urgent matter to me, your King.(Sif and Warriors Three hesitantly kneel before Loki)""My King, we would ask that you end Thor's banishment.""My first command cannot be to undo the Allfather's last. We're on the brink of war with Jotunheim. Our people need a sense of continuity, in order to feel safe in these difficult times. All of us must stand together, for the good of Asgard."

5789.author: Fandral, Volstagg, Sif, and Hogun and Asgardian Guard
5789.quote: "Our dearest friend banished! Loki on the throne! Asgard on the brink of war! Yet you managed to consume four wild boars, six pheasants, a side of beef and two caskets of ale! Shame on you! Don't you care?""Do not mistake my appetite for apathy!""Stop it, both of you! Stop! We all know what we have to do.""We must go. We must find Thor.""You speak of treason!""Forget treason, it's suicide!""Thor would do the same for us.""Hush! Heimdall may be watching.""Heimdall demands your presence!""We're doomed."

5790.author: Heimdall, Sif, and Fandral
5790.quote: "You would defy the commands of Loki, our king? Break every oath you have taken as warriors, and commit treason to bring Thor back?""Yes.""Good.""So you will help us?""I am bound by honor to our king. I cannot open the bridge to you.""Complicated fellow, isn't he?""Now what do we do?"

5791.author: Thor and Sif
5791.quote: "You know I can't come home. My father is... is dead, and I must remain in exile.""Thor, your father still lives!"

5792.author: Thor, Hogun, Volstagg, and Sif
5792.quote: "My friends, have you forgotten all that we have done together? Fandral, Hogun, who led you into the glorious of battles?""You did.""And, Volstagg, who introduced you to delicacies so succulent you thought you'd died and gone to Valhalla?""You did.""And who proved wrong all who scoffed at the idea that a young maiden could be one of the fiercest warriors this realm has ever known?""I did!""True, but I supported you, Sif."

5794.author: Thor and Sif
5794.quote: "Sif, you've done all you could.""No! I'll die a warrior's death! Stories will be told of this day!""Live, and tell those stories yourself."

5795.author: Sif and Frigga
5795.quote: "My queen, I am so sorry for your loss.""How is he?""He mourns for his brother. And he misses her... the mortal."

5796.author: Sif and Thor
5796.quote: "I've got this completely under control!""Is that why everything's on fire?"

5798.author: Sif and Loki
5798.quote: "Betray him, and I'll kill you.""It's good to see you too, Sif."

5799.author: Phil Coulson
5799.quote: "She's a warrior. I saw her fight in New Mexico with Thor. Climbed a giant metal killing machine, speared it with her double-bladed sword. It was pretty badass."

5800.author: Lorelei to Grant Ward
5800.quote: "The graves of Asgard's enemies are littered with men who underestimated Sif."

5801.author: Phil Coulson and Sif
5801.quote: "You've visited other realms, seen different species, aliens. Have you ever encountered any that were blue?""Yes, of course.""Which ones?""Uh, Interdites, Levians, Pheragots, Kree, Sarks, Centaurians. The Frost Giants tried to conquer your Earth a millennia ago, but Asgard drove them away.""Oh. Well, thanks for that."

5802.author: Sif, Melinda May and Leo Fitz
5802.quote: "She bends and shapes the will of men for her own purposes.""Only men. Her powers don't work on women?""No. Men have an inherent weakness we do not share.""I can't imagine what she's talking about."

5803.author: Melinda May and Sif
5803.quote: "Ward won't kill me.""Do not let your feelings cloud your judgement.""I'm not. He might try to kill me, but he won't."

5804.author: Sif and Phil Coulson
5804.quote: "Lorelei's treachery has remained unchanged, no matter the world.""We'll find them. Every agent is out in the area looking.""To what end, hmm? The collar has been broken. Short of death, we have no means to end her enchantment.""Let me worry about that. Stay here. And try not to punch a hole in my airplane."

5805.author: Lorelei and Sif
5805.quote: "Kill me. I'd rather die than go back to that place.""You will not get off that easily.""Why? It's what you want. I can see it in your eyes. Or would you rather hear about how the man you loved followed me around like a dog... hear of his touch, his kiss, the look in his eyes when I...(Sif places the collar on Lorelei's neck, and Lorelei is silenced)""You were saying?"

5806.author: Grant Ward, Sif, and Melinda May
5806.quote: "It's me.""He speaks the truth.""Good to know."

5807.author: Sif, Phil Coulson, and Melinda May
5807.quote: "My mind is that of a lost adolescent. I can provide no information of value.""Not totally true. Judging by your clothes, we know you were undercover, probably something you learned after your last visit here. Your usual full-armor look is a little more... conspicuous.""So you are saying I wear that armor most of the time? Does this mean I'm a warrior?""A good one.""A great warrior...""It's just details that you're missing. You must remember things about your home world, right?""Only basic lessons a child would learn.""The name of your sword? What about Thor?""Um... I do not know this word, but when you say it, I want to smile. Why?""Who can explain the mysteries of the Asgardian brain?""I can."

5808.author: Sif and Melinda May
5808.quote: "Yet you do not serve a king?""Not really how it works with us.""I wonder if I serve the king as the great warrior you say I am.""Odin? Oh, we know you do. You've met him.""(Pleasantly shocked)Shut... up."

5809.author: Vin-Tak, Phil Coulson, and Sif
5809.quote: "Sorry. The argument was going nowhere.""(To Sif)You back with us?""Yes. My memories have returned. I am Lady Sif of Asgard, friend of the S.H.I.E.L.D.""Asgardian... well, that explains a lot.""It is true. We don't trust Kree. That is why I am here. When Heimdall saw that one landed on your world, Odin charged me of retrieving him.""So you came to pick a fight.""We know enough about Kree history to be concerned.""Well, then, if you know Kree history, perhaps you've heard the tale of Terrigenesis.""Of course. Ancient Kree descending on planets, altering the inhabitants to fight their war.""And Earth was one of them."

5810.author: Cardozo, Sif, and Phil Coulson
5810.quote: "You are a dangerous monster!""I am no monster. I am sometimes dangerous, but only toward those who are deserving.(Softly, to Coulson)I do not actually know. Is it... only toward those who are...?""No. That was... that was right.""Thanks.(To Cardozo)Answer his question, elderly man!"

5811.author: Sif and Phil Coulson
5811.quote: "Kava means keys.""Keys?""A device used to unlock...""Yeah. I know keys."

5812.author: Sif and Phil Coulson
5812.quote: "Coulson, your people make decisions based on logic.""Usually.""Usually. As do mine.""Leaving Skye with us is the logical choice, I promise.""No. No. That is not what I mean. Asgard is millennia beyond you in our pursuit of science and knowledge. And we have learned there are some things that can never be understood.""Is this little talk one of 'em?"

5813.author: Sif
5813.quote: "I wonder if I serve the king as the great warrior you say I am."

5814.author: Soren and Talos
5814.quote: "We didn't know what to do. Mar-Vell warned us not to send a signal for any reason. Or the Kree would find us.""You did the right thing."

5815.author: Talos and Soren
5815.quote: "I borrowed his likeness. I'm no thief.""It's a little like thief.""Whose side are you on?"

5816.author: Soren and Talos
5816.quote: "Nick, this was a tragedy, but it's not why we're here. What, are we fighting the weather now?""Locals say the cyclone had a face.""People say things when they're under stress. Okay, that does not mean that this is the start to another big, world--"

5817.author: Quentin Beck, "Maria Hill", Peter Parker and "Nick Fury"
5817.quote: "They were born in stable orbits. Within black holes, creatures formed from the primary elements. Air, Water, Fire, Earth. The science division had a technical name. We just called them Elementals.""Versions of them exist across our mythologies.""It turns out, the myths are real.""Like Thor.""Thor was a myth, and now I study him in my physics class.""These myths, are threats.""They first materialized on my earth many years ago. We mobilized and fought them. But with each battle they grew and got stronger. I was part of the last battalion left trying to stop them.""All we did was delay the inevitable.""Well, the Elementals are here now, attacking the same coordinates. Our satellites confirm it.""So thank Mr. Beck for destroying the other three. There's only one left. Fire.""The strongest of them all. The one that destroyed my earth. It’s the one that took my family.""I'm sorry."

5818.author: Peter Parker, "Nick Fury" and "Maria Hill"
5818.quote: "Sir, come on. There's got to be someone else you can use. What about Thor?""Off-world.""Okay, um, Doctor Strange?""Unavailable.""Captain Marvel.""Don't invoke her name.""Sir, look, I really want to help, I do. But if my aunt finds out I left my class trip, she's going to kill me. And if I'm seen like this in Europe, after the Washington Monument, my whole class will figure out who I am, and then the whole world will figure out who I am. And then, I'm done.""Okay. I understand.""I'm sorry, what?""Why don’t you get back before your teachers miss you and become suspicious. Dimitri. Take him back to the hotel, please.""Thank you, Mr. Fury. And, uh, good luck."

5819.author: Soren and Talos
5819.quote: "You got to tell him.""It was fine. The little boy handled it. We helped.""Talos!""Come off it, how was I supposed to know that the whole thing was fake? I mean that was all very, very convincing, you know. The performances, the illusion, that costume, the craftsmanship in that. I mean, this is just embarrassing for a shape-shifter. Fine! Hey, there. I hope your mission is going well. We gave the glasses to Parker, about a week ago, like you said. And, uh, it was very touching, you know? Really, really quite touching.""Talos.""And, uh, you know, shortly after that, everything kind of went off the rails, and so we need you to come back. Because everyone kept asking me where the Avengers are, and I don't know what to say to that. So you're lucky..."

5820.author: Sowande to Jessica Jones
5820.quote: "What's wrong? Have I gotten in your head the same way he did long ago?"

5821.author: Matt Murdock and Stick
5821.quote: "We're getting everyone safe.""Good.""He give you anything yet?""What do you think? If she's as sweet as she smells, I get why you're tore up about this one.""Don't bring her into this.""All these years, this is what I've been protecting you from. Your two worlds colliding.""If you had it your way, this is what my life would be. Now you're trying to spin it like you're protecting me.""Maybe I got soft in my old age.""Doubt it.""Or maybe I know what I need on the front lines. 'Cause the Iron Fist can't lead 'em like you can.""I don't wanna lead anyone, Stick.""For a man who believes in God, you sure like denying he has a plan for you.""Don't use my faith against me.""And what about this city? The place you can't live without. The place that made you what you really are. Where are you going?""Don't... You don't get to tell me who I am, all right? Trust me, I know."

5822.author: Sowande and Stick
5822.quote: "Don't move! Let's not kid each other. This is personal for every one of us. But now I have the Iron Fist. The key to what the Hand seeks. The key to life, to our salvation. The war is over.""Not yet."

5824.author: Luis imitating the Writer
5824.quote: "Well, we got everything nowadays. We got a guy who jumps, we got a guy who swings, we got a guy who crawls up the walls, you gotta be more specific."

5825.author: Peter Parker to Tony Stark
5825.quote: "That's uh, that's all on YouTube though, right? I mean that's where you found it. 'Cause you know that's all fake. It's all done on a computer."

5826.author: Peter Parker to Tony Stark
5826.quote: "Whatever happened happened; it's like my senses have been dialed to eleven."

5827.author: Peter Parker
5827.quote: "When you can do the things that I can, but you don't, and then the bad things happen, they happen because of you."

5828.author: Spider-Man to Captain America
5828.quote: "Okay. Cap. Captain. Big fan. I'm Spider-Man."

5830.author: Spider-Man to the Winter Soldier
5830.quote: "You have a metal arm? That is awesome, dude!"

5831.author: Spider-Man to Falcon
5831.quote: "You have the right to remain silent!"

5832.author: Spider-Man to Winter Soldier
5832.quote: "Hey buddy, I think you lost this!"

5833.author: Spider-Man to Captain America
5833.quote: "That thing doesn't obey the laws of physics at all!"

5835.author: Spider-Man to War Machine and Iron Man.
5835.quote: "Hey guys, you ever see that really old movie,

5837.author: Natasha Romanoff and Tony Stark
5837.quote: "I have an idea.""Me too. Where's yours?""Downstairs... Where's yours?"

5838.author: Winter Soldier and Falcon
5838.quote: "What the hell is that?""Everyone's got a gimmick now!"

5839.author: War Machine and Iron Man
5839.quote: "Jesus Tony, how old is this guy?""I don't know, I didn't carbon date him! He's on the young side."

5840.author: Tony Stark and Peter Parker
5840.quote: "So, you're the Spider-ling? Crime-Fighting-Spider? Spider-Boy?"...S-Spider-Man.""Not in that onesie, you're not.""It's not a onesie."

5841.author: Tony Stark and Peter Parker
5841.quote: "Who else knows? Anybody?""Nobody.""Not even your unusually attractive aunt?"

5842.author: Tony Stark and Peter Parker
5842.quote: "You know what I think is really cool? This webbing. That tensile strength is off the charts. Who manufactured that?""I did."

5843.author: Peter Parker and Tony Stark
5843.quote: "I've been me my whole life, and I've had these powers for 6 months. I read books, I build computers... and yeah, I would love to play football, but I couldn't then so I shouldn't now.""Sure. 'Cause you're different.""Exactly. But I can't tell anybody that, so I'm not. Look, when you can do the things that I can, but you don't... and then the bad things happen... they happen because of you."

5844.author: Tony Stark and Peter Parker
5844.quote: "Got a passport?""No I don't. I don't even have a driver's license-""You ever been to Germany?""No.""Oh, you'll love it.""I can't go to Germany!""Why?""I-I got... homework.""Alright, I'm gonna pretend you didn't say that."

5845.author: Spider-Man and Falcon
5845.quote: "Those wings carbon fiber?"Is this stuff coming out of you!?""That would explain the rigidity-flexibility ration, which, gotta say that's awesome man.""I don't know if you've been in a fight before, but there's not usually this much talking.""Alright, sorry. My bad."

5847.author: Captain America and Spider-Man
5847.quote: "Did Stark tell anything else?""That you're wrong. You think you're right. And that makes you dangerous."

5848.author: Captain America and Spider-Man
5848.quote: "You got heart, kid. Where are you from?""Queens.""Brooklyn."

5849.author: Peter Parker
5849.quote: "Nobody's actually told me why I'm in Berlin. Or what I'm doing. Something about... Captain America... going crazy?"

5850.author: Spider-Man
5850.quote: "What's up, guys? Forgot your PIN number? Whoa! You're the Avengers! What are you guys doing here? Thor, Hulk – nice to finally meet you guys. Thought you'd be more handsome in person. Iron Man! What are you doing robbing a bank? You're a billionaire."

5851.author: Peter Parker to Tony Stark
5851.quote: "Mr Stark, here is my report for tonight, I stopped a grand theft bicycle. Oh and I helped this old lady and she bought me a churro so...yeah, that was nice."

5852.author: Ned Leeds and Peter Parker
5852.quote: "What is like being famous when nobody knows it's you? It's crazy. Should we tell everyone?""No."

5853.author: Peter Parker
5853.quote: "This is my chance to prove myself."

5854.author: Spider-Man to Vulture
5854.quote: "Let go of me! Let go of me!"

5855.author: Spider-Man to Criminals
5855.quote: "Hey guys! The illegal weapons ferry deal was at 10:30. You missed it."

5856.author: Peter Parker and Liz Toomes
5856.quote: "This is really important to you.""This is my future."

5857.author: Peter Parker
5857.quote: "I'd rather just stay on the ground for a little while. Friendly neighborhood Spider-Man. Somebody's got to look out for the little guy, right?"

5858.author: Spider-Man to Robbers
5858.quote: "'Sup guys? Wait a minute... you guys aren't the real Avengers! I can tell; Hulk gives it away."

5859.author: Peter Parker
5859.quote: "Someone is collecting stuff from Avengers battles and building these crazy weapons."

5860.author: Tony Stark to Peter Parker
5860.quote: "Can't you just be a friendly neighborhood Spider-Man?"

5861.author: Liz Toomes, Betty Brant and Ned Leeds
5861.quote: "Did you guys see Spider-Man on YouTube? He fought off four guys!""Oh my gosh, she's crushing on Spider-Man.""Kind of!""Gross! He's probably, like, thirty.""Peter knows Spider-Man!"

5862.author: Vulture
5862.quote: "Eight years without any trouble from those bozos over at Stark Tower, and then this little bastard in red tights shows up, and he thinks he can tear down everything I've built."

5863.author: Peter Parker and Happy Hogan
5863.quote: "New York. Queens. It's a rough borough, but, hey, it's home.""Who you talking to? No one. Just making a little video of the trip.""You know you can't show it to anyone.""Yeah, I know.""Then why are you narrating in that voice?""Because it's fun."

5864.author: Peter Parker and Happy Hogan
5864.quote: "So why do they call you Happy?""Come on, I'm not carrying your bags.""Let's go.""Hey, should I go to the bathroom before?""There's a bathroom on it.""No pilot?""That's awesome.""Is that where you're gonna sit?""Yeah. This is your first time on a private plane?""My first time on any plane.""Should it? Should it be? Should it be making that noise?"

5865.author: Happy Hogan and Spider-Man
5865.quote: "This is you.""Oh, we're neighbours?""We're not roommates.""Suit up.""Okay, Peter, you got this.""What the hell are you wearing?""It's my suit.""Where's the case?""What case? What? I thought that was a closet...This is still my room?""Go.""My room is way bigger than...There. I found the case. I found the case. "A minor upgrade"? Oh, my God.""Put it on.""What the..? This is the coolest thing I've ever seen...""Let's go.""But, yeah. Well, I don't understand. Is it for me? Happy. Happy, wait. This is insane. Insane. Look at this thing. Look. Look at the eyes. This is the greatest day of my life. Let's go."

5866.author: Peter Parker, Ned Leeds and Michelle Jones
5866.quote: "Did Liz get a new top?""No, you've seen that before. But never with that skirt.""We should probably stop staring before it gets creepy though.""Too late. You guys are losers.""Then why do you sit with us?""Because I don't have any friends."

5867.author: Ned Leeds and Peter Parker
5867.quote: "You're the Spider-Man... from YouTube!""No! No, I'm not! This is just a costume!""You were on the ceiling!""I wasn't! I, wait, what are you  doing in my room?""May let me in, you said we were going to finish the Death Star! Wait, she doesn't know?""Nobody knows! Well, Mr Stark knows because he made me my suit but that's it!""Tony Stark made you that? Are you an Avenger?""Yeah, basically. You can't tell anyone, you have to keep this a secret!""A secret, why?""Because you know what she's like, if she finds out that there are people out there who try to kill me every night she won't let me do this anymore!""Okay, okay, okay, okay, I'm going to level with you, I don't think I can keep this a secret, this is the greatest thing that has ever happened to me!"

5868.author: Ned Leeds and Peter Parker
5868.quote: "You got bit by a spider? Can it bite me? It'd probably hurt, right? You know what, whatever. Even if it did hurt, I'll let it bite me. Maybe. How much did it hurt?""Spider's dead, Ned."

5869.author: Peter Parker and Ned Leeds
5869.quote: "Can you summon an army of spiders?""No, Ned. No."

5870.author: Ned Leeds and Peter Parker
5870.quote: "Do you know him, too?""Yeah, we met. Stole his shield."

5871.author: Ned to Peter Parker
5871.quote: "Hey, can I be your guy in the chair?""What?""You know how there's a guy, with the headset, telling the other guy where to go? Like... like if you were stuck in a burning building, I could tell you where to go, 'cause there'd be screens all around me, I can shoot around things, I can be your guy in the chair!"

5872.author: Tony Stark and Peter Parker
5872.quote: "Can't you just be a friendly... neighborhood Spider-Man?""But I'm ready for more than that now!""No, you're not.""That is not what you thought when I took on Captain America!""Trust me, kid. If Cap wanted to lay you out, he would have."

5873.author: Ned Leeds and Peter Parker
5873.quote: "Oh, what is that?""I don't know, some guy tried to vaporize me with it.""Seriously? Awesome. I mean, not awesome...totally uncool, that guy, so scary.""Yeah, well, look, I think it's a power source.""Yeah, but it's connected to all these micro-processors. That's an inductive charging plate: that's what I use to charge my toothbrush.""Whoever is making these weapons is obviously combining alien tech with ours.""That is literally the coolest sentence anyone has ever said. I just want to thank you for letting me be a part of your journey."

5874.author: Peter Parker and Ned Leeds
5874.quote: "I'm sick of him treating me like a kid! It's not cool""But you are a kid.""Yeah, a kid who can catch a bus with his bare hands!"

5875.author: Spider-Man and Iron Man
5875.quote: "How'd you find me? Did you put a tracker in my suit or something?""I put everything in your suit, including this heater."

5876.author: Peter Parker and Ned Leeds
5876.quote: "Maryland.""What's there?""I don't know... evil lair?""Evil lair?""Dude, a gang with alien guns run by a guy with wings? Yeah, they have a lair.""Badass. But how are you going to get there if it's like three hundred miles away.""It's not too far from D.C.."

5877.author: Karen and Spider-Man
5877.quote: "Good evening, Peter.""Whoa!""You have five hundred and seventy-six possible Web-Shooter combinations.""That is awesome."

5878.author: Spider-Man and Karen
5878.quote: "Wow, they're in the middle of a heist! I could catch them all red-handed, this is awesome! Okay, I'm gonna get a little closer so I can see what's happening.""Would you like me to engage Enhanced Combat Mode?""Enhanced Combat Mode? Yeah!""Activating Instant-Kill.""What? No, no, no, I don't wanna kill anybody!""Deactivating Instant-Kill.""What the hell just happened?""You jumped off a sign and landed on your face."

5879.author: Spider-Man, Karen and Spider-Man (Recording)
5879.quote: "Karen, what's up?""Hey Peter, how was your Spanish quiz?""Listen, I was wondering if you could help me: I'm trying to figure out who the guys under the bridge were that night, but I mean, I can only kinda remember part of the license plate.""I can run facial recognition on the footage of that encounter.""Footage?""Yes Peter, I record everything you see.""Everything?""Everything. It's called a Baby Monitor Protocol.""Yeah, of course it is. Alright, just roll it back to last Friday.""With pleasure.""Hey, what's up, Liz? Peter's told me a lot about you...""No, no, this is just me messing around. Go later in the day.""It is I, Thor, son of Odin!""No, this is definitely not what you want to watch...""Your impressions are very funny."

5880.author: Spider-Man and Karen
5880.quote: "Should I tell Liz that I'm Spider-Man?""Who is Liz?""Who is Liz?""She's the best; she's amazing. She's just a girl who goes to my school. And yeah, I really want to tell her that I like her...and maybe the truth. But, it's kinda weird, you know? Just walk up one day saying "Hey Liz... I'm...I'm Spider-Man."""What's weird about that?""Well, what if she's expecting someone like Tony Stark? Imagine how disappointed she'd be if she sees me.""Well, if I were her, I wouldn't be disappointed at all.""Thanks Karen. It's really nice to have somebody to talk to."

5881.author: Iron Man and Spider-Man
5881.quote: "Previously on Peter's Screws The Pooch, I tell you to stay away from this. Instead, you hacked a multi-million dollar suit so you could sneak around behind my back doing the one thing I told you not to do.""Is everyone okay?""No thanks to you.""No thanks to me? Those weapons were out there, and I tried to tell you about it, but you didn't listen. None of this would've happened if you had just listened to me! If you even cared, you'd actually be here.""I did listen, kid. Who do you think called the FBI, huh? Do you know I was the only one who believed in you? Everyone else said I was crazy to recruit a 14-year-old kid.""I'm 15.""No, this is where you zip it, alright? The adult is talking! What if somebody had died tonight? Different story, right? 'Cause that's on you. And if you died, I feel like that's on me. I don't need that on my conscience.""Yes sir. I'm sorry. I understand. I just wanted to be like you.""And I wanted you to be better. Okay, it's not working out. I'm gonna need the suit back.""For how long?""Forever.""No! No, no, no! Please, please! You don't understand! This is all I have! I'm nothing without this suit!""If you're nothing without this suit, then you shouldn't have it, okay? God, I sound like my dad.""I don't have any other clothes.""Okay, we'll sort that out."

5882.author: Adrian Toomes and Peter Parker
5882.quote: "You must be Peter.""I am.""I'm Liz's dad. Hell of a grip! Come on in."

5883.author: Adrian Toomes and Peter Parker
5883.quote: "Hey, you up for some bourbon, some gin, rum?""I'm not old enough to drink.""Right answer."

5884.author: Adrian Toomes, Peter Parker and Liz Toomes
5884.quote: "What are you gonna do, Pete?""What?""When you graduate, what do you think you're gonna do?""Oh, I don't know.""I'm just saying, all you guys who go to that school, you pretty much have your whole lives planned out, right?""Peter has an internship with Tony Stark, so I think he has enough to worry.""Really? Stark? What do you do?""Actually, I don't intern for him anymore.""Seriously?""Yeah, it got... um, boring.""It was boring? You got to hang out with Spider-Man!""Really? Spider-Man? Wow, What's he like?""Yeah, he's...nice, nice man. Solid dude.""I've seen you around, right? Have we ever, because even the voice...""He does academic decathlon with me and he was at my party.""It was a great party, really great, beautiful house, a lot of windows...""You were there for like, two seconds.""I was there longer than two seconds.""You disappeared, like you always do, like you did in D.C., too.""That's terrible what happened down there in D.C., though. Pretty scary. I'll bet you were glad when your old pal Spider-Man showed up in the elevator, though?""I actually...didn't go up, I saw it off on the ground. Very lucky that he was there that day.""...Good old Spider-Man. Here we are, end of the line. You head in there, gumdrop. I'm gonna give Peter the "dad talk".""Don't let him intimidate you. Have a safe flight.""Does she know?""Know what?""So she doesn't, good. Close to the vest, I admire that. I've got a few secrets of my own. Of all the reasons I didn't want my daughter to date! Peter, nothing is more important than family. You saved my daughter's life, and I could never forget something like that, so I'll give you one chance. You ready? You walk through those doors, and you forget any of this happened. And don't you ever, ever interfere with my business again, because if you do, I'll kill you, and everyone that you love. I'll kill you dead. That's what I'll do to protect my family. Pete, you understand? Hey. I just saved your life. Now, what do you say?""Thank you.""You're welcome. Now, you go in there, and you show my daughter a good time, okay? Just not too good."

5885.author: Vulture and Peter Parker
5885.quote: "Peter, you're young. You don't understand how the world works.""Yeah, but I understand that selling weapons to criminals is wrong!""How do you think your buddy Stark paid for that tower, or any of his little toys? Those people, Pete, those people up there, the rich and the powerful, they do whatever they want. Guys like us, like you and me... they don't care about us. We build their roads and we fight all their wars and everything. They don't care about us. We have to pick up after them. We have to eat their table scraps. That's how it is. I know you know what I'm talking about, Peter.""Why are you telling me this?""'Cause I want you to understand. And... I needed a little time to get her airborne."

5886.author: Spider-Man and Vulture
5886.quote: "I'm sorry Peter.""What are you talking about? That thing isn't even touched me yet!""True but then again... wasn't really trying to."

5887.author: Peter Parker and Michelle Jones
5887.quote: "I ah, I gotta go...""Where are you going? What are you hiding Peter? I'm just kidding, I don't care. Bye!"

5888.author: Peter Parker and Tony Stark
5888.quote: "So, to become an Avenger, are there like trials or an interview?""Just, don't do anything I would do. And definitely don't do anything I wouldn't do. There's a little gray area in there and that's where you operate. That's not a hug, I'm just grabbing the door for you. Alright, kid. Good luck out there."

5889.author: Spider-Man to Iron Man
5889.quote: "Mr. Stark, it smells like a new car in here."

5890.author: Spider-Man to Mantis
5890.quote: "Aah! Whoa. Whoa. Whoa. Please don't put your eggs in me!"

5891.author: Ebony Maw and Iron Man
5891.quote: "Your powers are inconsequential compared to mine.""Yeah, but the kid's seen more movies."

5893.author: Peter Parker and Ned Leeds
5893.quote: "Ned, hey. I need you to cause a distraction.""Holy shit. We're all gonna die! There's a spaceship! Everybody hide!"

5894.author: Spider-Man and Iron Man
5894.quote: "I know what you're gonna say to me.""You should not be here.""I was gonna go home.""I don't wanna hear it!""But it was such a long way down and I just thought about--""And now I gotta hear it.""And this suit is, ridiculously intuitive, by the way. So, if anything, its kind of your fault that I'm here.""What did you just say?""I take that back. And now I'm here in space.""Yeah. Right where I didn't want you to be. This isn't Coney Island, or some field trip. This is a one-way ticket. Do you hear me? Don't pretend you thought this through.""I did think this through. You can't be a friendly neighborhood Spider-Man if there's no neighborhood. Okay, that didn't make sense but you know what I'm trying to say."

5895.author: Iron Man and Spider-Man
5895.quote: "We got a situation. See him down there? He's in trouble. What's your plan? Go.""Okay, okay. Okay, you ever see this really old movie Aliens?"

5896.author: Spider-Man and Doctor Strange
5896.quote: "I'm Peter, by the way.""Doctor Strange.""Oh, we're using our made-up names? Um. I'm Spider-Man then."

5897.author: Spider-Man and Iron Man
5897.quote: "Let me just say, if aliens wind up implanting eggs in my chest or something and I eat one of you, I'm sorry.""I don't want another single pop culture reference out of you for the rest of the trip. You understand?""I'm trying to say that something is coming."

5898.author: Peter Parker and Tony Stark
5898.quote: "Stark... I don't feel so good.""You're alright.""I don't— I don't know what's happening. I don't... I don't wanna go. I don't wanna go, sir, please. Please, I don't wanna go. I don't wanna go. I'm sorry."

5899.author: Peter Parker catches up with Tony Stark during the Battle of Earth
5899.quote: "Hey! Holy cow! You will not believe what's been going on. Do you remember when we were in space? And I got all dusty? And I must've passed out because I woke up and you were gone. But Doctor Strange was there right. And he said 'It's been five years. Come on, they need us.' And he started doing the yellow sparkly thing that he does. Anyway...This is nice."

5900.author: Peter congratulating and sharing a brief moment with a dying Tony Stark
5900.quote: ""Mr. Stark? Hey....Mr. Stark? Can you hear me? It's Peter. We won, Mr. Stark. We won, and you did it, sir. You did it. I'm sorry....Tony...."

5901.author: Spider-Man gets acquainted with Captain Marvel while Scarlet Witch and Okoye assure him the other heroines will see she gets the Gauntlet away from Thanos' army
5901.quote: "Hey. I'm Peter Parker.""Hey, Peter Parker. You got something for me?""How are you going to get it through all that?""Don't worry.""She's got help."

5904.author: Spider-Man
5904.quote: "The world needs the next Iron Man."

5905.author: "Nick Fury" and Peter Parker
5905.quote: "Nice to finally meet you, Spider-Man.""You're Nick Fury.""Put some clothes on. Let's go for a ride."

5906.author: Peter Parker and Ned Leeds
5906.quote: "I think Nick Fury just ruined our summer vacation.""Awesome!"

5907.author: Happy Hogan and Peter Parker
5907.quote: "Heads up. Nick Fury's calling you.""I don't really wanna talk to Nick Fury.""Answer the phone.""Why?""Because if you don't talk to him, I have to talk to him. I don't want to talk to him.""You sent Nick Fury to voicemail?""I gotta go.""You do not ghost Nick Fury!"

5908.author: "Nick Fury", Quentin Beck and Peter Parker
5908.quote: "This is Mr. Beck.""We can use someone like you on my world.""Your world?""Beck is from Earth, just not ours. The Snap tore a hole in our dimension.""You're saying there's a multiverse?"

5909.author: "Nick Fury", Peter Parker and "Maria Hill"
5909.quote: "We have a job to do, and you're coming with us.""There's gotta be someone else you can use. What about Thor?""Off-world.""Captain Marvel.""Unavailable.""I'm just your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man.""Bitch, please! You've been to space."

5910.author: Quentin Beck and Peter Parker
5910.quote: "What do you want, Peter?""I want to go back on my trip, with the girl who I really like, and tell her how I feel!"

5911.author: Peter Parker and Michelle Jones
5911.quote: "MJ, I...""...am Spider-Man?""No. Of course not!""I mean it's...kind of obvious."

5912.author: Happy Hogan and Peter Parker
5912.quote: "You handle the suit, I'll handle the music.""Oh, I love Led Zeppelin!"

5913.author: Star-Lord
5913.quote: "Oh, I'm sorry. I don't know how this machine works."

5914.author: Star-Lord to the Mean Guard
5914.quote: "Hey. Take those headphones off, right now!"

5915.author: Star-Lord
5915.quote: "I'm pretty sure the answer is "I am Groot.""

5916.author: Star-Lord
5916.quote: "We promised him he could stay by your side until he kills your boss. I always keep my promises, when they're to muscle-bound whack-jobs who will kill me if I don't."

5917.author: Star-Lord
5917.quote: "I come from Earth, a planet of outlaws: Billie the Kid, Bonnie and Clyde, John Stamos."

5918.author: Star-Lord to Rocket Raccoon
5918.quote: "We've already established that you destroying the ship that I'm on is not saving me."

5919.author: Star-Lord to the Guardians of the Galaxy
5919.quote: "I look around, do you know what I see? Losers! I mean like folks who have lost stuff. Their homes. Families. And we're facing a threat that could destroy us all."

5920.author: Star-Lord to Ronan the Accuser
5920.quote: "You said it yourself, bitch! We're the Guardians of the Galaxy!"

5921.author: Meredith Quill and Peter Quill's Grandfather to Peter Quill
5921.quote: "Take my hand. Peter.""Pete, come on.""Take my hand."

5922.author: Rhomann Dey
5922.quote: "Peter Jason Quill, from Terra. Raised from youth by a band of mercenaries called the Ravagers, led by Yondu Udonta."

5923.author: Meredith Quill, Peter Quill and Peter Quill's Grandfather
5923.quote: "Why have you been fighting with the other boys again, baby? Peter?""They killed a little frog that ain't done nothing. Smooshed it with a stick.""You're so like your daddy. You even look like him. And he was an angel, composed outta pure light.""Mer, you got a present there for Peter, don’t you?""Of course. There.""I got you covered, Pete.""You open it up when I’m gone, okay? Your grandpa is gonna take such good care of you, at least until your daddy comes back to get you."

5924.author: Star-Lord and Korath the Pursuer
5924.quote: "Hey, you know what? There's another name you might know me by. Star-Lord.""Who?""Star-Lord, man. Legendary outlaw. Guys?""Move!""Oh, forget this."

5925.author: Bereet and Star-Lord
5925.quote: "Peter? What happened?""Hey, uh...uh. I..""Bereet""Bereet! Look, I'm gonna be totally honest with you. I forgot you were here."

5926.author: Gamora and Star-Lord
5926.quote: "Fool, you should've learned!""I don't learn. It's one of my issues."

5927.author: Rhomann Dey and Star-Lord
5927.quote: "Hey, if it isn't Star-Prince.""Star-Lord!""Oh right sorry, Lord. I picked this guy up a while back for petty theft, he's got a code-name."

5928.author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
5928.quote: "Oh hold up, what is a raccoon?""What is a raccoon? It's what you are, stupid!"

5929.author: Groot, Star-Lord and Rocket Raccoon
5929.quote: "I am Groot.""Well that's just as fascinating as the first 89 times you told me that. What is wrong with Giving Tree here?""Well he don't know talkin' good like me and you, so his vocabulistics is limited to "I" and "am" and "Groot," exclusively in that order.""Well I tell you what, that's gonna wear real thin, real fast, bud."

5930.author: Peter Quill and Draxy the Destroyer
5930.quote: "She betrayed Ronan, he's coming for her. That's when you...""...Why would I want to put my finger on his throat?""No, that's the symbol for slicing his throat.""I would not slice his throat, I would cut his head clean off."

5931.author: Drax the Destroyer and Peter Quill
5931.quote: "You! Man who has lain with an A'askavariian!""It was one time, man."

5932.author: Star-Lord and Rocket Racooon
5932.quote: "Here you go.""Oh, I was just kidding about the leg. I just need these two things."What?""No, I thought it'd be funny! Was it funny? No, wait, what'd he look like hopping around?""I had to transfer him 30,000 units!""

5933.author: Peter Quill and Rocket Raccoon
5933.quote: "Oh she had no idea. If I had a blacklight, this would be like a Jackson Pollock painting.""You got issues, Quill."

5934.author: Gamora and Peter Quill
5934.quote: "Why would you risk your life for this?""My mother gave it to me. My mom liked sharing with me all the pop songs that she loved growing up. I happened to have it on me when I was… The day that she… When I left Earth.""What do you do with it?""Do? Nothing. You listen to it. Or you can dance.""I'm a warrior, and an assassin. I do not dance.""Really? Well, on my planet, there's a legend about people like you. It's called Footloose. And in it, a great hero, named Kevin Bacon, teaches an entire city full of people with sticks up their butts that dancing, well, is the greatest thing there is...""Who put the sticks up their butts?""What? No. That's just a...""That is cruel.""It's a phrase people use."

5935.author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
5935.quote: "Why would you want to save the galaxy?""'Cause I'm one of the idiots that lives in it!"

5936.author: Rocket Raccoon and Peter Quill
5936.quote: "But Quill, beating Ronan... it can't be done. You're asking us to die."" Yeah... I guess I am."

5937.author: Garthan Saal and Star-Lord
5937.quote: "Peter Quill, this is Denarian Saal. For the record, I advised them against trusting you.""They got my dick message.""Prove me wrong!"

5938.author: Irani Rael and Star-Lord
5938.quote: "The fate of 12 billion people is in your hands.""Peter Quill: Hold on a second, you're being serious right now?"

5940.author: Ronan the Accuser and Star-Lord
5940.quote: "What are you doing?""I'm distracting you, you big turd blossom!"

5941.author: Star-Lord and Gamora
5941.quote: "He's going to be pissed when he finds out I switched out the orb on him.""He's going to kill you, Peter.""Oh I know. But he's about the only family I have."No... he wasn't."

5942.author: Star-Lord and Gamora
5942.quote: "What should we do next: Something good, something bad? Bit of both?""We'll follow your lead, Star-Lord.""A bit of both."

5943.author: Peter Quill, Drax, Rocket Raccoon, Gamora and Groot
5943.quote: "I look around at us, you know what I see? Losers. I mean like, folks who have lost stuff. And we have, man, we have, all of us. Our homes, our families, normal lives. And usually life takes more than it gives, but not today. Today it's giving us something. It is giving us a chance.""To do what?""To give a shit, for once, not run away. I for one am not gonna stand by and watch as Ronan wipes out billions of lives.""But Quill, stopping Ronan, it's impossible. You're asking us to die.""Yeah, I guess I am. I-""Quill. I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies, I will be grateful to die among my friends.""You are an honorable man, Quill. I will fight beside you. And in the end, see my wife and daughter again.""I am Groot.""What the hell, I ain't got that long of a life span anyway. Now I'm standing, you all happy? We're all standing up now. Bunch of jackasses standing in a circle."

5944.author: Rhomann Dey and Garthan Saal
5944.quote: "Peter Jason Quill. He's also known as Star-Lord." "Who calls him that?" "Himself, mostly. He's wanted on charges of minor assault, public intoxication and fraud."

5945.author: Star-Lord to the Guardians of the Galaxy
5945.quote: "Well, here we are: a thief, two thugs, an assassin, and a maniac, but we're not going to stand by as evil wipes out the galaxy. I guess we're stuck together, partners."

5947.author: Star-Lord
5947.quote: "Sometimes the thing you're searching for your whole life is right there by your side all along."

5948.author: Drax the Destroyer and Star-Lord
5948.quote: "There are two types of beings in the universe. Those who dance, and those who do not.""I get it, yes. I'm a dancer, Gamora is not.""You just need to find a woman who is pathetic, like you.""Thanks, buddy."

5949.author: Star-Lord and Gamora
5949.quote: "Is that a rifle?""You don't know what a rifle looks like?""It's just... swords were your thing and guns were mine, but... I guess we're both doing guns now. I just didn't know that."

5950.author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
5950.quote: "Does anyone got any tape out there? I wanna put some tape over the death button.""Nobody has any tape!""Not a single person has tape?!"You have an Atomic Bomb in your bag. If anyone's gonna have tape, it's you!""I have to do everything!"

5951.author: Ego and Peter Quill
5951.quote: "After all these years, I've found you.""And who the hell are you?""I'm your dad, Peter."

5952.author: Star-Lord and Gamora
5952.quote: "Show time, a-holes! it will be here any minute.""And it will be its last.""I thought your thing was a sword?""We've been hired to stop an inter-dimensional beast from feeding on those batteries and I'm going to stop it with a sword?""It's just... swords were your thing and guns were mine, but... I guess we're both doing guns now. I just didn't know that."

5953.author: Rocket Raccoon, Drax and Star-Lord
5953.quote: "I'm finishing this so we can listen to tunes while we work.""How is that important?""Blame Quill, he's the one who loves music so much!""No, I actually agree with Drax on this, that's hardly important right now.""Oh, ok, sure Quill""No, seriously, I side with Drax.""I understand that, your being very serious right now.""I can clearly see you winking!""Dam, I'm using my left eye?"

5954.author: Star-Lord and Gamora
5954.quote: "What's he doing?!""He said that the skin is to thick to be pierced on the outside so...""That doesn't make any sense!""I tried telling him that!""Skin has the same level of thickness on the inside as it is on the outside!""I realize that!"

5955.author: Peter Quill and Gamora
5955.quote: "Give me a break! After all this time, and he just expects to be my Dad all of the sudden!""I hear you.""I mean, this could be a trap - the Kree purists, the Ravagers, now the Sovereign - they all want us dead.""I know, but...""But what?""What was that story you told me about Zardu Hasselfrau?""Who?""The wonderful television-singer man. He had a magic boat.""David Hasselhoff?""Right.""He had a talking car, not a magic...""Why did it talk again?""Just to be a good friend, I guess.""And as a child you carried his picture in your pocket, and you told the other children he was your father, but he was out of town...""Shooting Knight Rider or touring with his band in Germany. Why are you bringing this up now? I was drunk when I told you that.""I love that story.""I don’t. It’s just sad! I was so sad because I’d see the other kids off playing catch with their dads, and I wanted that, more than anything in the world.""My point is, maybe this man is your Hasselhoff. I know it’s a long shot. But I lost my father as a child. I’d give anything...If he ends up being evil, we’ll just kill him."

5956.author: Nebula, Gamora, Drax, Star-Lord and Rocket Raccoon
5956.quote: "You’re leaving me with that fox?!""He’s not a fox. Shoot her if she does anything suspicious. Or if you feel like it. It will just be a couple days.  We’ll be back before Rocket’s finished fixing the ship.""What about your spool of songs?""I have clones.""What if the Sovereign come?""There’s no way for them to know they’re here.""I am uncertain about parting ways.""You’re like an old woman.""Because I am wise?""Hope daddy isn’t as big of a dick as you, orphan boy.""So what’s your goal here? To get everyone to hate you? ‘Cause it’s working."

5957.author: Ego, Drax the Destroyer, Star-Lord and Gamora
5957.quote: "I created what I imagined biological life to be like. Down to the most minute detail. ""Did you make a penis?""Dude!""What is wrong with you?""If he's a planet, how could he make a baby with your mother? He would smush her.""I don't need to hear how my parents...""Why? My father would tell the story of impregnating my mother every winter solstice.""That's disgusting.""It was beautiful. You earthers have hang-ups.""Yes, Drax, I got a penis.""Thank you.""And it's not half bad."

5958.author: Ego and Star-Lord
5958.quote: "Death will remain a stranger to both of us, as long as the light burns within the planet.""I'm immortal?""Mmhmm.""Really?""Yes. As long as the light exists.""Like, I could use the light to build cool things, like how you made this whole planet?""Well, it might take a few million years of practice before you get really good at it, but yes.""Well, get ready for a 800-foot statue of Pac-Man with Skeletor and Heather Locklear...""Whatever you want.""I'm gonna make some weird shit."

5959.author: Star-Lord and Kraglin Obfonteri
5959.quote: "What's that?""It's a Zune; everybody on Earth listens to it nowadays. It has over three hundred songs on it.""Three hundred? Here, Rocket grabbed the pieces and reassembled it. I think Yondu would want you to have it.""Thanks Captain."

5960.author: Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord
5960.quote: "You people have issues.""Well of course I have issues, that's my freaking father!"

5961.author: Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon, Drax the Destroyer and Gamora
