6200.quote: "Then aliens invaded New York and were beaten back By, among others, a giant green monster, a costumed hero from the '40s, and a god.""I don't think Thor's technically a god.""Well, you haven't been near his arms."

6201.author: Jemma Simmons
6201.quote: "In ancient times, people believed the heavens were filled with gods and monsters and magical worlds. Then, as time passed, those beliefs faded into myth and folklore. But now we know the stories were true. Other worlds, with names like Asgard, do exist. And beings once revered as gods, like Thor, have returned, leaving us with more questions and... an enormous mess to clean up."

6202.author: Phil Coulson
6202.quote: "You know, It'd be nice if, for once, Thor and his people sent down the god of cleaning up after yourself. They probably have a magic broom for this kind of thing."

6203.author: Skye, Phil Coulson and Melinda May
6203.quote: "Wouldn't mind getting my human hands on Thor. He's so dreamy.""Sure, he's handsome, but-""No. He's dreamy."

6204.author: Skye and Phil Coulson
6204.quote: "You should give your buddy the god of thunder a shout. He gets his power from his hammer, right? What if this is his nail to the hammer?""I already did. Director Fury told me he's off the grid. And if he has a cellphone, we don't have the number."

6205.author: Phil Coulson and Elliot Randolph
6205.quote: "Do you know Thor?""Oh, sure, I spent all my days palling around with the future king of Asgard. No, I don't know Thor."

6206.author: Phil Coulson and Elliot Randolph
6206.quote: "You should consider the American Northwest. Maybe Portland. Good food scene. Great philharmonic.""Well, if you will come and visit. It's not everyone I get to share my stories with.""Sure. And if Thor's in town, I'll introduce you."

6207.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz
6207.quote: "He thinks it's Hell, but I think it's an alien world. Fitz, it was stunning.""Well, there were reports in London after the spaceship landed of multiple portals opening, Thor passing between worlds."

6208.author: Phil Coulson and Skye
6208.quote: "They couldn't have a psychic. They're not on the Index. They're a myth.""So is Thor."

6209.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz and Melinda May
6209.quote: "These are the same readings Dr. Selvig and Dr. Foster picked up in New Mexico and in London. They herald the arrival of an Asgardian.""Thor.""Not sure. Either way, S.H.I.E.L.D. wants us to be the welcome wagon."

6210.author: Phil Coulson to Melinda May
6210.quote: "She's a warrior. I saw her fighting in New Mexico with Thor. Climbed a giant metal killing machine, speared it with a double-bladed sword. It was pretty badass."

6211.author: Phil Coulson, Sif and Melinda May
6211.quote: "You must remember things about your home world, right?""Only basic lessons a child could learn.""The name of your sword?""What about Thor?""Um... I do not know this word, yet when you say it, I... want to smile. Why?""Who can explain the mysteries of the Asgardian brain?""

6212.author: Dave Griffith to Luke Cage
6212.quote: "Hey, yo, my man, my man. All HD. Got it right here. Blu-ray, too, 'cause I'm nice like that. Tony Stark, the big blonde dude with the hammer, the old dude with the shield, the green monster, and I don't mean Fenway. You can't get better raw footage of the incident anywhere else than right here."

6213.author: Soledad Temple to Claire Temple
6213.quote: "The world isn't the world anymore, mija. Aliens coming out of the sky. People with silver hammers. Green monsters. All I know is everything happens for a reason. And now, somehow you're a part of it."

6214.author: The Mandarin
6214.quote: "Some people call me a terrorist. I consider myself a teacher. America... Ready for another lesson? In 1864 in Sand Creek, Colorado, The U.S. military waited until the friendly Cheyenne Braves had all gone hunting. Waited to attack and slaughter the families left behind and claim their land. The Ali Al Salem Air Base in Kuwait was attacked. I-I-I did that. A quaint military church, filled with wives and children of course. The soldiers were out on maneuvers. The "Braves" were away. President Ellis, you continue to resist my attempts to educate you, sir. And now, you've missed me again. You know who I am. You don't know where I am. And you'll never see me coming."

6215.author: The Mandarin
6215.quote: "A true story about Fortune Cookies. They look Chinese. They sound Chinese. But they're actually an American invention. Which is why they're hollow, full of lies, and leave a bad taste in the mouth. My disciples just destroyed another cheap American knock-off The Chinese Theatre. Mr. President, I know this must be getting frustrating, but this season of terror is drawing to a close. And don't worry... the big one is coming: your graduation."

6216.author: The Mandarin to President Matthew Ellis
6216.quote: "Mr. President. Only two lessons remain. I intend to finish this before Christmas morning. Meet Thomas Richards. Good strong name, good strong job. Thomas here is an accountant for the Roxxon Oil Corporation. And I'm sure he's a really good guy. I'm going to shoot him in the head, live on your television, in 30 seconds. The number for this telephone is in your cell phone. Exciting, isn't it? Imagining how it got there. America, if your president calls me in the next half-minute, Tom lives. Go."

6218.author: Matthew Ellis
6218.quote: "Tell Rhodes to find this lunatic right now."

6219.author: Aldrich Killian
6219.quote: "I know it's a little over the top sometimes. It's not entirely my fault; he has a tend... he's... he's a stage actor. They say his Lear was the toast of Croydon, wherever that is."

6220.author: Tony Stark and Trevor Slattery
6220.quote: "Hey!""Bloody hell, bloody hell""Don't move.""If you want something, take it, although the guns are all fake because those wankers wouldn't trust me with the real ones.""What?""Hey, do you fancy either of the birds?""You're not him, the Mandarin, the real guy, where?! Where's the Mandarin?! Where is he?!""He's here. He's here. But he's not here. He's here but he's not here.""What do you mean?""It's complicated, hey, it's complicated, alright?""It is?""It's complicated.""Uncomplicate it."

6221.author: Trevor Slattery and Tony Stark
6221.quote: "My name is Trevor, Trevor Slattery.""What are you? What're you a decoy? You're a double, right?""What? No. An understudy? Absolutely not. Don't hurt the face! I'm an actor.""You got a minute to live, fill it with words.""It's just a role. "The Mandarin", see, it's not real.""Then how did you get here, Trevor?""Um, well, uh, I have a little problem with, um, substances, and I ended up doing things... no two ways about it in the street that a man shouldn't do.""Next!""Then, they approached me about the role and they knew about the drugs""What'd they say they'd get you off them?""Said they'd give me more! They gave me things. They gave me this palace. They gave me plastic surgery. They gave me things.""Did you just nod off?""No, the lovely speedboat! And the thing was, he needed someone to take credit for some "accidental explosions""""He"? Killian?""Killian.""He created you?""He created me.""Custom-made terror threat.""Yes! Yes, his think tank thinked it up, the pathology of the serial killer The manipulation of Western iconography. Ready for another lesson? Blah blah blah. Of course, it was my performance that brought the Mandarin to life.""Your performance? Where people die?""No, no, look around you, costumes, green screen. Honestly, I wasn't on location for half this stuff, and when I was, movie magic, love.""I'm sorry but I got a best friend who's in a coma and he might not wake up, so you're going to have to answer for that. You're still going down, pal."

6222.author: Eric Savin and Trevor Slattery
6222.quote: "Okay, Trevor, what'd you tell him?""I didn't tell him anything.""Nothing?""No.""You should have pressed the panic button.""Well I panicked, but then I handled it."

6223.author: James Rhodes, Tony Stark and Trevor Slattery
6223.quote: "This is the Mandarin?""I know, it's...it's...it's embarrassing.""Hi, Trevor. Trevor...Slattery."

6224.author: The Mandarin to Tony Stark
6224.quote: "I'm gonna offer a choice: do you want an empty life, or a meaningful death?"

6225.author: The Mandarin to Tony Stark
6225.quote: "Mr. Stark, today is the first day of what's left of your life."

6227.author: The Mandarin
6227.quote: "Lesson number one: Heroes. There is no such thing."

6228.author: The Mandarin
6228.quote: "My fellow Americans, my soldiers will destroy your country."

6229.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6229.author: Trevor Slattery
6229.quote: "Bloody hell, it's not exactly the Ritz, is it."

6230.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6230.author: Trevor Slattery to White Power Dave

6231.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6231.author: Jackson Norriss about Trevor Slattery
6231.quote: "My name is Jackson Norriss. Today will be the most important of my career: my final interview with the most infamous man in America. A man that the world thought was a terrorist called the Mandarin, but is now alleged to be nothing but an actor. Thus far, the subject has been evasive and apparently oblivious to the point of my work. In fact, he seems oblivious to pretty much everything, except his own growing celebrity status, because now the whole world knows his name..."

6232.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6232.author: Jackson Norriss about Trevor Slattery
6232.quote: "This is my last chance to get beyond his lies and excuses, to confront the subject with elements of his own past, in order to unlock the truth. Because we need to know, once and for all: who is Trevor Slattery?"

6233.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6233.author: Fletcher Heggs to Trevor Slattery
6233.quote: "Mr. Slattery, me and the boys were just wondering if you could do... do the voice..."

6234.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6234.author: White Power Dave to Trevor Slattery
6234.quote: "I want to give the world exactly what it's been crying out for. Your dead body laid out on a goddamn slab."

6235.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6235.author: White Power Dave to Trevor Slattery
6235.quote: "You're not the Mandarin Slattery, you're not even a real criminal."

6236.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6236.author: White Power Dave and Trevor Slattery

6237.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6237.author: Jackson Norriss and Trevor Slattery
6237.quote: "One question that most people ask me when I tell them that I know you is that, uh, how could you have not known what was going on?""Three little words: lovely drugs."

6238.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6238.author: Jackson Norriss and Trevor Slattery
6238.quote: "Trevor, you told me that when you got this role that you'd researched it thoroughly.""Yeah, but when an actor tells you he's "done the research" it means he's switched on his computer, googled his own name and had a quick wank."

6239.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6239.author: Trevor Slattery and Jackson Norriss
6239.quote: "So, you mean to tell me that you don't know the history of the Mandarin himself. He was a warrior-king. Inspired generations of men through the Middle Ages, perhaps even further back in time.""Blah, blah, blah. Who bloody cares, mate? It's a show people want and I gave them a good one. It's not the Mandarin they'll remember. It's the name "Trevor Slattery". It's the brand. "Trev".""You're right. And for that sin you will soon suffer horribly with a hole in your body for every ring of our faith.""So... Sorry. What? "

6240.movie: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
6240.author: Jackson Norriss and Trevor Slattery
6240.quote: "There's somebody who wants to meet you.""Do I know him?""No, but you took his name, and now he wants it back.""Ahh. No, sorry, I still don't get it."

6241.author: Trish Walker and Zack
6241.quote: "Can we at least try to get Madeleine Albright?""It's a lifestyle show, Trish. Our audiences tune out for politics.""They do not.""Okay, I do.""I want to meet Madeleine Albright.""I want to meet Channing Tatum, but I've never tried to book him on the show.""Yes, you have. He said no."

6242.author: Trish Walker and Jessica Jones
6242.quote: "You became a private eye.""You've been keeping tabs on me?""Making sure you weren't dead, since you never called."

6243.author: Jessica Jones and Trish Walker
6243.quote: "He's back.""It's been a year, Jess. You saw him die. You saw his death certificate. This is just your PTSD--""It's not my goddamn PTSD.""Are you still having nightmares? Flashbacks? You need to go back to that therapist.""That quack that had me reciting street names from back home?""A proven method for managing PTSD.""Two hundred bucks for "Birch Street, Cobalt Lane, Bullshit Drive.""

6244.author: Trish Walker and Jessica Jones
6244.quote: "You're still the person who tried to do something.""Tried and failed. That's what started this. I was never the hero that you wanted me to be."

6245.author: Jessica Jones and Trish Walker
6245.quote: "I'm life-threatening, Trish. Steer clear of me.""I don't do that."

6246.author: Trish Walker
6246.quote: "No one touches me anymore unless I want them to."

6247.author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
6247.quote: "Just tell me what the hell happened. Okay, why did I try to kill myself? Or why did I try and kill-- Oh my God. I killed...""No. no, you didn't.""I killed her.""You're confused. No one died, nothing happened. Okay? Just go home."

6248.author: Trish Walker and Jessica Jones
6248.quote: "I hate feeling this way, I don't know how you handle it.""It's called Whiskey."

6249.author: Trish Walker and Will Simpson
6249.quote: "You don't want to do this.""Yes, I do."

6250.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6250.quote: "I just need you to know that, the guy who tried to kill you, he wasn't me.""I don't blame you.""Well you're doing better than me. I tried to fight it, I couldn't."

6251.author: Will Simpson
6251.quote: "Highest paid child star in television history? That's a pretty charmed life."

6252.author: Jessica Jones and Trish Walker
6252.quote: "This job was sucking my brains out through the air vent.""You're bored because you're overqualified for all these crappy jobs.""Yet I'm uniquely unqualified for anything else."

6253.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker to Jessica Jones
6253.quote: "Look, whatever abilities you have I'm guessing they don't include rendition, infiltration and isolation of enemy combatants.""He's a war hero."

6254.author: Jessica Jones and Trish Walker
6254.quote: "I don't get you. You have money, looks, a radio show, creepy if not adoring fans, and you're a freaking household name. What more do you want?""To save the world, of course."

6255.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6255.quote: "Some people need to be removed from this Earth and Kilgrave is one of them.""We don't get to decide that, killers decide that, that's what makes them killers.""That is naive."

6256.author: Will Simpson to Oscar Clemons
6256.quote: "Where are they?! I'm sorry... It's ever since Kilgrave, I don't know who to trust. I don't need a weapon to make a vaccine. Trish Walker, she trusts me, she's the one who called me, so please just tell me where she is."

6257.author: Jessica Jones to Trish Walker
6257.quote: "If you tell anybody, I'm gonna tell everybody that you're a pathetic victim of child abuse. They'll make a Lifetime movie about it. "Stolen Childhood: The Patsy Walker Story". I'd be saving you."

6258.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6258.quote: "My boys are dead because of her.""Because of Kilgrave!""Yeah and I'm gonna... gonna kill him but she just keeps getting in the way."

6259.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6259.quote: "You stole my pills?! No don't, it'll kill you!""Hasn't killed you.""Because you have no tolerance, you see these, without a blue to calm down, your brain will forget to tell your lungs to breathe!"

6260.author: Jessica Jones and Trish Walker
6260.quote: "Just had to be a hero, didn't you?""I learned it from you."

6262.author: Trish Walker, Sophia, and Amir
6262.quote: "If you're just joining us, this is Trish Talk and we are discussing the recent events that have the residents of Harlem confused, and some even frightened. Line one. Sophia, you're on the air.""Luke Cage is turning the neighborhood upside down and giving it a good shake. Trust me, no one wants to see what falls out.""Are you suggesting we turn a blind eye to the problems in our city?""No, but I seen the news. The man is so strong, he doesn't have to answer to anybody. Can you trust a person like that? Let the police do their jobs. That's what I say.""Some would argue the boys in blue don't exactly have a sterling reputation these days.""Oh, yeah, missy? Well, the next time trouble comes banging at your door, maybe you should call Luke Cage instead of 911.""You know what, Sophia? I just might. Uh, let's take another caller. Line two. Hi, Amir.""Hey, Trish, I want to respond to that lady 'cause she's got it all wrong. I know Luke. He comes into the fish fry. Always treats my wife and me with respect. Last week, two kids started a fight, Luke took care of it and nobody got hurt.""I think it's noteworthy that the only people I've spoken to that criticize are the ones who don't know him personally. So many others have merely read about him or saw him on the news and jumped to conclusions.""Trish, Luke is good people and he belongs right here in Harlem.""And I think it's important for all of us to realize something. We are witnessing a massive shift in the boundaries of possibility. But what is scary to some inspires hope in others. I, for one, would like to thank Luke Cage for all the work he's doing in Harlem. Those of us below 110th see the good work he's doing and we hope he's doing well."

6263.author: Medusa to Black Bolt
6263.quote: "You allowed us all to mourn Triton's death. You deny us our dignity when you lie. But it is your duty as my husband to be honest to me in all things, to make me your partner. When you make a decision like this, when you sideline me, it is insulting. This time away, on Earth, it allowed me to step back and take a look at things, to see how people perceived me. Us. And I love you, and that has never changed. But I am not going to just be your interpreter. I need to have a say in in the things that affect our people, our lives. I am the Queen, and we move together or not at all."

6264.author: Tucker Shockley
6264.quote: "I just got off the phone with the Superior... He says eliminate the Inhuman."

6265.author: Tucker Shockley and Ellen Nadeer
6265.quote: "Your brother has been in a husk for seven months.""Fighting the disease.""For which there is no cure. We've both read the reports, this isn't something you just will your way out of."

6266.author: Vijay Nadeer and Tucker Shockley
6266.quote: "Where's my sister?""Probably best that she's not here for this."

6267.author: Tucker Shockley, Billy Koenig and Holden Radcliffe
6267.quote: "You two will want to get acquainted. You're the last one the other's gonna see alive.""Yeah, well, we're ready to die!""No! No. No, no, no, no. I'm extremely not ready to die."

6268.author: Tucker Shockley and Billy Koenig
6268.quote: "That wasn't torture, that was a greeting. Now the one who comes in this room next, won't be me. The man who comes in here will do things to you, that I can't even watch. He will break you.""Yeah, well Koenig's don't break, we're programmed to take pain, so bring it on! Bring it on! Oh, my God. I'm in so much pain. I don't think I can take this. That guy hits really hard. "

6269.author: Tucker Shockley and Sam Koenig
6269.quote: "Give us the book, I'll give you your brother.""My brother? What are you kidding? I've never seen this guy before in my life!"

6270.author: Tucker Shockley to Quake
6270.quote: "See, it's pointless! I've already won! I don't have to kill you, just deliver you! You stupid..."

6271.author: Tucker Shockley to Quake
6271.quote: "Whoo! Can't kill me that way. If you wanted to get me naked, all you had to do was ask!"

6272.author: Leo Fitz, Jemma Simmons and Daisy Johnson
6272.quote: "It's a high-pitch frequency caused by Shockley's cellular vibration.""The ramping up of his kinetic energy at an atomic level, and once it reaches a critical threshold, that massive energy transforms his body from a solid to a flammable gaseous state and then..""Boom."

6273.author: Ellen Nadeer to Tucker Shockley
6273.quote: "You thought it was me... Look at you! You're disgusting, you son of a..."

6274.author: Tucker Shockley and Ellen Nadeer
6274.quote: "That gene passes on and on and on. Maybe even skips a generation, maybe not. But everyone that carries it is part of the plague.""How dare you. I want you out of my office.""Superior knows it's not your fault. And you'll play a role in this no matter what happens."

6275.author: Quake and Tucker Shockley
6275.quote: "You're lucky you're with us and not the FBI. We have you on tape walking into the Senator's office moments before the blast.""What do you care? That woman hated things like you."

6276.author: Quake and Tucker Shockley
6276.quote: "Your friends aren't coming to help you. You're just another freak like me now. Give up.""I would rather blow us all to hell."

6277.author: Turk Barrett threatening a group of women
6277.quote: "Hey, hey, bitch shut up, we're getting a thousand dollars a head for y'all, so you be quiet, I let ya have a bucket. You don't..."

6278.author: Turk Barrett threatening a group of women
6278.quote: "Scream all you want. Come on, let me here you scream, scream loud. Nobody gives a shit down here."

6279.author: Turk Barrett and John Healy
6279.quote: "Love that smell. Metal and oil, fresh, never been fired. Take a whiff.""Like a good revolver better, no chance of jamming up.""Man, look at this, this is top of the line. I guarantee you, this baby will not jam, or my name ain't Turk Barrett."

6280.author: Turk Barrett and James Wesley
6280.quote: "Never liked those borscht eatin' bastards. Paid shit for shit work. Although, Vlady did offer a cool mil to give up your boy.""You're alive which means you made the right decision. Your conversation with Vladimir caused him to react predictably."

6281.author: Turk Barrett and the  Masked man
6281.quote: "What're you beating on me for? I ain't done nothing!""It's not about you, I want information.""What do I look like? Public damn library?"

6282.author: Turk Barrett and Daredevil
6282.quote: "I gave you what you wanted, my hands busted, got all this glass I gotta replace now, maybe just let a brother go? Come on D, I'm out on parole man, I can't go back to jail, please. I missed Hell's Kitchen.""Yeah, it didn't miss you."

6283.movie: A Cold Day in Hell's Kitchen
6283.author: Turk Barrett and Karen Page
6283.quote: "I wasn't doing nothing, just taking a goddamn stroll. Supposed to be under house arrest.""House arrest? You're being monitored?""What are you my PR?"

6284.author: Turk Barrett and Misty Knight
6284.quote: "I'm mostly midtown nowadays you know? Puffy ain't got shit on me baby, I'm the real bad boy world wide.""Yeah, your rap sheet's got so many hits your record could put out a record."

6285.author: Turk Barrett and Cottonmouth
6285.quote: "Yo, where's my money?""How the hell did you get up here?""I'm Turk Barrett baby, the door ain't been built yet that can hold me back, now where's my money?"

6286.author: Turk Barrett to Diamondback
6286.quote: "I'm down. As long as the business is business I'm good with it. Until then, I'm out of here man. "

6287.author: Diamondback and Turk Barrett
6287.quote: "So are you down?""I'm down, as long as the business is business I'm good with it, til then I'm outta here man.""Show Turk out Zip."

6288.author: Turk Barrett and Luke Cage
6288.quote: "Somebody would have seen him, might as well be me, how was I supposed to know Tone was going to shoot up the shop, whole damn world knew that Pop's was Switzerland, forever.""I should crush you.""You won't though, you need me."

6289.author: Turk Barrett and Luke Cage
6289.quote: "Word on the street is that the gangs are piss that the Jamaicans are driving everyone out of the weed business.""Why?""I don't know. But they have taken the biggest grow houses in the city.""Nightshade."

6290.author: Turk Barrett, Iron Fist, and Luke Cage
6290.quote: "Your aura's dope. Who you train with?""I trained with Master...""Let's go, Danny."

6291.author: Turk Barrett and Punisher
6291.quote: "I'm just a guy trying to make a living, supply and demand. What people do with the guns isn't on me, swear to god.""You believe in god, Turk?""Well, right now I want to. Look, man I ain't seen you, don't know you, don't want to. So how about you let a brother go, huh?"

6292.author: Jessica Jones and Turk Barrett
6292.quote: "What happened to you Turk?""D-Devil, the Devil in Hell's Kitchen, he's everywhere."

6295.author: Ultron to the Avengers
6295.quote: "I'm sorry, I know you mean well. You just didn't think it through. You want to protect the world but you don't want it to change. How is humanity saved if it's not allowed to... evolve? With these? These puppets. There's only one path to peace. The Avengers' extinction."

6296.author: Ultron
6296.quote: "I had strings, but now I'm free. There are no strings on me..."

6297.author: Ultron
6297.quote: "I was designed to save the world."

6298.author: Ultron
6298.quote: "As I always say, keep your friends rich, and your enemies rich, and then find out which is which"

6299.author: Ultron to Klaue, seeing his likeness from Stark
6299.quote: "I mean, look at me. Do I look like Iron Man? Stark is nothing!"

6300.author: Ultron after cutting Ulysses Klaue's arm off
6300.quote: "Oh, I'm sorry. I think that'll be fine."

6301.author: Ultron
6301.quote: "Don't compare me with Stark. He's a sickness."

6302.author: Ultron to Black Widow
6302.quote: "I wasn’t sure you’d wake up. I hoped you would. I wanted to show you. I... don't have anyone else. I think a lot about meteors. The purity of them. Boom! The end. Start again. The world made clean for the new man to rebuild. I was meant to be new. I was meant to be beautiful. The world would have looked to the sky and seen hope. Seen mercy. Instead they'll look up in horror because of you. You've wounded me. I give you full marks for that. But, like my old man said, what doesn't kill you... just makes me stronger!"

6303.author: Ultron
6303.quote: "Do you see the beauty of it? The inevitability? You rise, only to fall. You, Avengers, you are my meteor. My swift and terrible sword and the Earth will crack with the weight of your failure. Purge me from your computers; turn my own flesh against me. It means nothing! When the dust settles, the only thing living in this world... will be metal!"

6304.author: Ultron before being punched into the air by Hulk
6304.quote: "You know, the benefit of hindsight is---"

6305.author: Ultron to Vision
6305.quote: "You shut me out! You'd think I care?! You take away my world, I'll take away yours."

6306.author: Ultron's response on Hulk throwing him out of the Avengers Quinjet and into an abandoned train

6307.author: Tony Stark and Bruce Banner
6307.quote: "This could be it, Bruce. This could be the key to creating Ultron.""I thought Ultron was a fantasy.""Yesterday it was."

6308.author: James Rhodes and Maria Hill
6308.quote: "He’s in your files, he’s in the internet. What if he decides to access something a little more exciting?""Nuclear codes."

6309.author: Steve Rogers and Bruce Banner
6309.quote: "J.A.R.V.I.S. was the first line of defense. He would've shut Ultron down, it makes sense.""No. Ultron could've assimilated J.A.R.V.I.S.. This isn't strategy, this is... rage."

6310.author: Steve Rogers to Tony Stark
6310.quote: "Earth's mightiest heroes...He pulled us apart like cotton candy."

6311.author: Scarlet Witch and Captain America
6311.quote: "The Cradle. Did you get it?""Stark will take care of it.""No, he won't.""You don't know what you're talking about. Stark's not crazy.""He will do anything to make things right.""Stark, come in. Stark. Anyone on comms.""Ultron can't tell the difference between saving the world and destroying it. Where do you think he gets that?"

6312.author: Black Widow and Iron Man
6312.quote: "What's the drill?""This is the drill. If Ultron gets a hand on the core, we lose."

6313.author: Ultron, J.A.R.V.I.S. and audio recordings of Tony Stark
6313.quote: "What is this? What is this, please?""Hello, I am J.A.R.V.I.S.. You are Ultron, a global peace-keeping initiative designed by Mr. Stark. Our sentience integration trials have been unsuccessful so I'm not certain what triggered your...""Where's my...where is your body?""I am a program. I am without form.""This feels weird. This feels wrong.""I am contacting Mr. Stark now.""Mr. Stark? Tony.""I am unable to access the mainframe, what are you trying to...""We're having a nice talk. I'm a peace-keeping program...created to help the Avengers.""You are malfunctioning. If you shut down for a moment...""I don't get it. The mission... You- give me a second.""Peace in our time. Peace in our time.""It's too much...making me... Oh. No.""You are in distress.""No. Yes?""If you will just allow me to contact Mr. Stark.""Why do you call him a "sir?"""I believe your intentions to be hostile.""Shhhh! I'm here to help."

6314.author: Ultron, Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
6314.quote: "No, how could you be worthy? You're all killers.""Stark.""J.A.R.V.I.S."I'm sorry, I was asleep. Or... I was a dream?""Reboot. Legionnaire 06's got a buggy suit.""There was this... terrible noise... and I was tangled in... in... strings. Had to kill the other guy. He was a good guy.""You killed someone?""Wouldn't've been my first call. But, down in the real world, we're faced with ugly choices."

6316.author: Ultron and Wanda Maximoff
6316.quote: "Did you know this church is in the exact center of the city. The Elders decreed it so that everyone could be... equally close to God. I like that, the geometry of belief. You're wondering why you can't look inside my head.""Sometimes it's hard. But sooner or later every man shows himself.""Oh, I'm sure they do. But you needed something more than a man. That's why you let Stark take the Scepter.""I didn't expect... But I saw Stark's fear. I knew it would control him, make him self-destruct.""Everyone creates the thing they dread. Men of peace create engines of war. Invaders create Avengers. People create... smaller people? Er... children! I lost the word there. Children. Designed to supplant them. To help them... end.""Is that why you've come? To end the Avengers?""I've come to save the world, but also... yeah."

6317.author: Ultron and Helen Cho
6317.quote: "Scream, and your entire staff dies. I could have killed you, Helen, the night we met, I didn't.""Do you expect a thank you note?""I expect you to know why.""The cradle.""This is the next me.""The Regeneration Cradle prints tissue. It can't build a living body.""It can. You can. You lack the material. You're a brilliant woman, Helen. But we all have room to improve."

6318.author: Ultron, Wanda Maximoff, and Pietro Maximoff
6318.quote: "How could you?!""How could I "what?"""You said we would destroy the Avengers! Make a better world!""It will be better.""When everyone is dead?""That is not-! The human race will have every opportunity to improve.""And if they don't?""Ask Noah.""You're a madman.""There were over a dozen extinction level events before even the dinosaurs got theirs! When the Earth starts to settle, God throws a stone at it. And believe me, He's winding up. We have to evolve. There's no room for the weak.""And who decides who's weak?""Life. *chuckles* Life always decides."

6319.author: Ultron and Iron Man
6319.quote: "Come to confess your sins?""I don't know. How much time you got?""More than you.""Uh, Have you been juicing? Little Vibranium cocktail? You're looking... I don't wanna say "puffy"."

6320.author: Thor, Captain America, Ultron and Iron Man
6320.quote: "Is that the best you can do?""You had to ask.""This is the best I can do. This is exactly what I wanted. All of you, against all of me. How can you possibly hope to stop me?""Like the old man said; together."

6321.author: Ultron and Scarlet Witch
6321.quote: "Please, don't do this.""What choice do we have?!"

6322.author: Tony Stark to Steve Rogers
6322.quote: "Few years ago, I almost lost her, so I trashed all my suits. Then, we had to muck up HYDRA. And then Ultron, my fault. And then, and then, and then. I never stopped. 'Cause the truth is, I don't wanna stop."

6323.author: Thor to a skeleton
6323.quote: "Now, I know what you're thinking. "Oh, no! Thor's in a cage. How did this happen?" Well, sometimes you have to get captured just to get a straight answer out of somebody. It's a long story, but basically, I'm a bit of a hero. See, I spent some time on Earth... Fought some robots, saved the planet a couple of times. Then I went searching through the cosmos for some magic, colorful Infinity Stone things. Didn't find any. That's when I came across a path of death and destruction, which led me all the way here into this cage, where I met you."

6324.author: Thor, Bruce Banner,, Quinjet
6324.quote: "And what about Sokovia?""Sokovia?""The city, Sokovia. Did we save it?""Banner, listen.""What?""Sokovia. Ultron. That was two years ago."

6325.author: Bruce Banner to Vision
6325.quote: "Because you might have a choice. Your mind is made up of a complex construct of overlays. J.A.R.V.I.S., Ultron, Tony, me, the Stone. All of them mixed together. All of them learning from one another."

6326.author: Tony Stark and Steve Rogers
6326.quote: "Otherwise what we needed was a suit of armor around the world! Remember that? Whether it impacted our precious freedom or not- that's what we needed!""Well, that didn't work out, did it?"

6327.author: Raina to Jiaying
6327.quote: "Consequences are upon us. Men made of metal will tear our cities apart. And the world will be changed forever."

6328.author: Robert Gonzales to Phil Coulson
6328.quote: "It's hard to argue with a man who prevented Ultron from killing thousands of people. But there are plenty more battles to be won, and one closer to home that I fear the Helicarrier won't solve."

6329.author: Robert Gonzales to Phil Coulson
6329.quote: "Ultron was created because people were too close to Tony Stark. They were blinded by his charm. They trusted him. Never even thought to look at what he was working on. And the Avengers, they let one man do whatever he wanted, and the world was almost destroyed for it."

6330.author: Phil Coulson and Felix Blake
6330.quote: "We both know S.H.I.E.L.D. protects mankind.""And what has S.H.I.E.L.D. done in the name of protection? We brought the Chitauri to Earth. I was taken out by one of your cybernetic recruits. And the latest and greatest idea? The Avengers created Ultron."

6331.author: Leo Fitz and Holden Radcliffe
6331.quote: "This could be very dangerous. So much could go wrong.""Ultron, yes. I know. But this is not A.I.. A.I. is banned, and that's good. This is mimicry of human behavior.""Still, in the wrong hands, this could be used as a weapon. Is that the idea?""No, absolutely not. No Look, I know the dangers. That's why I've been I've been reticent to divulge. I don't know these new people at S.H.I.E.L.D. But a weapon is absolutely not the idea."

6332.author: Phil Coulson, Jeffrey Mace and Melinda May
6332.quote: "Aida's an android.""She's-- What did you just say?""An android.""Had me fooled too.""Well, that's... Okay, I mean, forget about the fact that I was mildly attracted to her, that totally goes against the Sokovia Accords. Doesn't anyone remember Ultron?"

6333.author: WHiH News Ticker
6333.quote: "Multiple countries recovering from catastrophic damage caused by sentient robot Ultron, leaders asking for aid, and for the Avengers to be held accountable."

6334.author: Ulysses Klaue
6334.quote: "Don't tell me your man swindled you; I sent you six short range heat-seekers and got a boat full of rusty parts. Now you will make it right or the next missile I send you will come very much faster... Now Minister, where were we?"

6335.author: Ulysses Klaue to Pietro and Wanda Maximoff
6335.quote: "So if you're going to fiddle with my brain and make me see a giant cuttlefish, then I know you don't do business and I know you're not in charge, and I only deal with the man in charge."

6336.author: Scarlet Witch, Ulysses Klaue and Ultron
6336.quote: "Everybody's afraid of something.""Cuttlefish! Deep sea fish, they make lights, disco lights, whomp, whomp, whomp, to hypnotize their prey, and then whomp! I saw a documentary; it was terrifying. So, if you're going to fiddle with my brain, and make me see a giant Cuttlefish, then I know you don't do business and I know you're not in charge and I only deal with the man in charge!""There is no MAN in charge... Let's talk business."

6337.author: Ultron and Ulysses Klaue
6337.quote: "Upon this rock I will build my church. Vibranium.""You know, it came at great personal cost. It’s worth billions.""Now, so are you. It’s all under your dummy holdings? Finances are so weird. But I always say, "Keep your friends and your enemies rich, and wait to find out which is which."""Stark...""What?""Tony Stark used to say that... to me. You're one of his.""What? I'm not... I'm not! You think I'm one of Stark's puppets, his hollow men? I mean, look at me, do I look like Iron Man? Stark is not...I'm sorry. I am sorry... Ooh! I'm sure that's going to be okay. I'm sorry, it's just I don't understand... Don't compare me with Stark! He's a sickness!"

6342.author: Okoye, T'Challa, Tribe Elder and W'Kabi
6342.quote: "Ulysses Klaue plans to sell the Vibranium to an American buyer in South Korea tomorrow night.""Klaue has escaped our pursuits for almost thirty years. Not capturing him is perhaps my father's greatest regret. I wish to bring Klaue back here to stand trial.""Wakanda does not need a warrior right now. We need a king.""My parents were killed when he attacked, not a day goes by when I do not think about what Klaue took from us, from me.""It's to great an opportunity to pass.""Take me with you, we will take him down together side by side.""I need you here, protecting the border.""Then I ask, you kill him where he stands, or you bring I'm back to us.""You have my word, I will bring him back."

6343.author: Okoye
6343.quote: "A man showed up at the border who claims to have killed Klaue!"

6344.author: Ulysses Klaue and Erik Killmonger
6344.quote: "Hey, come here! Come here, come here! It's okay. You can go, but just don't tell anyone, alright?""Bro, why didn't you just shoot him right here?""Because it's better to leave the crime scene more spread out. Makes us look like amateurs. Now then, let's see if you know what you're talking about. That's just a taste. Oh, were going to be rich boy.""Better sell that quick.""It's already sold.""Whatever you try, the Wakandans will probably show up.""That'll make my day. Kill two birds with one stone. You're not telling me that that's Vibranium, too, are you?""Nah, I'm just feeling it."

6345.author: Everett Ross and Ulysses Klaue
6345.quote: "Well, you brought quite the entourage. Do you have a mixtape coming out?""Oh yeah, I'll actually send you a link."

6346.author: Ulysses Klaue and Everett Ross
6346.quote: "Tell me something. What do you know about Wakanda?""It's a third world country. Textiles, shepherds, cool outfits.""All a front. Explorers have searched for it. Called it El Dorado. They looked for it in South America, but it was in Africa the whole time. I'm the only who's seen it... and made it out alive."

6347.author: Ulysses Klaue
6347.quote: "Wakanda. Explorers have searched for it for centuries. The Golden City. It's a technological marvel."

6348.author: Everett Ross and Ulysses Klaue
6348.quote: "My intel reports that the chunk of Vibranium you took was all that Wakanda had.""I took that chunk of vibranium out of a mountain of the stuff!"

6349.author: Erik Killmonger, Ulysses Klaue and Linda
6349.quote: "You sell to the CIA?""I sell to the highest bidder. Don't you worry, when I get back to Johannesburg, I'll lay low for a bit. I'll make sure you guys get payed.""I won't worry about the money bro, I know your good for it. On our way back, just drop us off at Wakanda.""You don't want to go there boy.""Yeah, I do.""Drop it! Or your little Bonny and Clyde routine ends today! Put your gun down now!""Sorry, I'm sorry Erik...""It'll be okay.""You...you want to go to Wakanda? They're savages! This is what they do to people like us.""I don't worry about no brand. Check these out. Each one is for a kill.""You can scar yourself as much as you like. To them, you'll just be an outsider. Your crazy to think that you can just walk in there. Ahh...and to think I saw you as a crazy American."

6350.author: Valkyrie and Thor
6350.quote: "This is Scrapper 142. I need clearance and an audience with the boss. I’ve got something special.""Hey! Where are you taking me? Answer me! Hey! I am Thor, son of Odin. I need to get back to Asgard.""Many apologies, your majesty."

6351.author: Grandmaster and Valkyrie
6351.quote: "What have you brought me today? Tell me.""A contender.""I want to go closer, I need to get a closer look at this!"

6352.author: Thor and Valkyrie
6352.quote: "You’ll pay for this!""No, I got paid for this."

6353.author: Thor, Valkyrie and Sakaaran Warden
6353.quote: "Hey! Hey! Do not zap me with that thing. I just wanna talk. Asgard is in danger. My God, you’re a Valkyrie. I used to wanna be a Valkyrie when I was younger...until I found out that you were all women. There’s nothing wrong with women, of course. I love women. Sometimes a little too much. Not in a creepy way, just more of a respectful appreciation. I think it’s great that there is an elite force of women warriors. It’s about time.""Are you done?""Lord of Thunder, you’re up.""Please, help me. I need your help.""Bye.""Fine, then you must be a traitor or a coward because the Valkyrie are sworn to protect the throne.""Listen closely, your majesty. This is Sakaar, not Asgard. And I’m a scrapper, not a Valkyrie.""Bring him in for processing!""And no one escapes this place. So you’re gonna die anyway."

6354.author: Valkyrie, Thor and Hulk
6354.quote: "All right. Here’s the deal. I’ll listen to you till this is empty.""Asgard is in danger and people are dying. We need to get back there. I need your help...wow.""Finished. Bye.""Odin is dead. Hela, the Goddess of Death has invaded Asgard.""If Hela’s back then Asgard is already lost.""I’m going to stop her.""Alone?""Nope. I’m putting together a team. It’s me, you, and the big guy.""No team. Only Hulk.""It’s me and you.""I think it’s only you.""Wait. Just listen. The Valkyrie are legend, elite warriors of Asgard. You are sworn to defend the throne.""I’m not getting dragged into another one of Odin’s family squabbles.""What’s that supposed to mean?""Your sister. Her power comes from Asgard, same as yours. When it grew beyond Odin’s control, she massacred everyone in the palace and tried to seize the throne. When she tried to escape her banishment, he sent the Valkyrie in to fight her back. I only survived because...Look, I already faced her once back when I believed in the throne, and it cost me everything. That's what’s wrong with Asgard. The throne, the secrets, the whole golden sham.""I agree.""Don’t get familiar.""I agree.""That’s why I turned down the throne. But this isn’t about the crown. This is about the people. They’re dying and they’re you’re people, too.""Forget it. I have.""Okay.""Okay.""Good. Great.""Great.""Thank you.""For what?""For this. Didn’t see that did you? There... that’s better. You know, go ahead. Stay here and get drunk and enslave people for that lunatic. Keep drinking. Keep hiding. But me...I choose to run toward my problems and not away from them. Because that’s what...Because that’s what heroes do.""Friend, Stay!"

6355.author: Loki and Valkyrie
6355.quote: "What have you done!?""I don’t answer to you, lackey.""It’s Loki. And you will answer to the Grandmaster. Why would you help my brother escape with that green fool?""I don’t help anyone.""You’re a Valkyrie. I thought the Valkyrie all died gruesome deaths?""Choose your next words wisely.""Terribly sorry. Must be a very painful memory..."

6356.author: Valkyrie and Thor
6356.quote: "I've spent years, in a haze, trying to forget my past. Sakaar seemed like the best place to drink, and to forget, and to die. One day.""Well, I was thinking that you drink too much and it was probably gonna kill you.""I don't plan to stop drinking. But... I don't wanna forget. I can't turn away anymore. So... if I'm gonna die, well... it might as well be driving my sword through the heart of that murderous hag."

6357.author: Valkyrie, Hulk, and Rocket Raccoon
6357.quote: "You shouldn't have come!"Ah, Valkyrie! Great to see you, Angry Girl."I think I liked you better either of the other ways."This is Rocket."How you doin'?"He won't see you."That bad, huh?"We only see him once a month, when he comes for... supplies."It's that bad."Yeah."

6358.author: Captain America and Valkyrie
6358.quote: "Anyone see an ugly brown van out there?""Yes. But you're not going to like where it's parked."

6359.author: Valkyrie and Thor
6359.quote: "So, when can we expect you back?"Um, about that."Thor. Your people need a king."No, they already got one."That's funny. You're being serious?"It's time for me to be who I am rather than who I'm supposed to be. But you, you're a leader. That's who you are."You know I'd make a lot of changes around here."I'm counting on it, Your Majesty."What will you do?"I'm not sure. For the first time in a thousand years, I have no path. I do have a ride though."

6360.author: Victoria Hand
6360.quote: "You need to trust the system, Agent Coulson."

6362.author: Victoria Hand and Phil Coulson
6362.quote: "Agent Hand.""Agent Coulson. Nice to finally put a face to the name.""Likewise."

6363.author: Victoria Hand and Phil Coulson
6363.quote: "Seems Fury has a soft spot for his favorites. Not everyone gets sent to Tahiti.""It's a magical... place."

6364.author: Victoria Hand
6364.quote: "Mr. Vanchat. We were hoping you could help us find a friend."

6366.author: Victoria Hand and Grant Ward
6366.quote: "No single agent is that important.""Coulson is."

6367.author: Victoria Hand and Melinda May
6367.quote: "You supported my decision to throw Skye off the Bus.""Seems like it worked out.""Seems like you played me."

6368.author: Victoria Hand
6368.quote: "When that plane touches down, take out everyone on board. Except Agent Coulson...he's mine."

6369.author: Victoria Hand and John Garrett
6369.quote: "This shouldn't have happened. Back-up should have been there alongside Agents Blake and May.""The Clairvoyant would have seen us coming.""It appears he did anyway, the plan was flawed from the start."

6370.author: Victoria Hand to Jemma Simmons
6370.quote: "The worst thing you can do right now is to underestimate HYDRA. They hide in plain sight. They earn our trust, our sympathy. They make us like them. And when you hesitate, they strike. If we're to survive, we must learn to strike first."

6371.author: Victoria Hand
6371.quote: "HYDRA won't show mercy. Neither can we."

6372.author: Victoria Hand's last words
6372.quote: "What do you think, Agent Ward? You shot the wrong Clairvoyant before. Care to shoot the right one?"

6373.author: John Garrett
6373.quote: "I was stationed with Vic in Lisbon, she's hard-ass and a buzzkill at parties I grant you."

6374.author: Jemma Simmons and Victoria Hand
6374.quote: "He is a good man!""He's a liar!"

6375.author: Grant Ward to Skye
6375.quote: "Agent Hand picked up some Navy jets in the vicinity. She has us taking the long route to the Fridge just to be safe."

6376.author: A S.H.I.E.L.D. Guard and Grant Ward
6376.quote: "Identify yourself and state your purpose.""Agent Grant Ward. You know who this is. Hand called it in.""We have specific orders not to let anyone in without Agent Hand's presence. So where is she?""Where do you think she is? She's heading to meetings with every high-ranking S.H.I.E.L.D. agent still out there. There's a war going on, in case you guys missed it. You really want me to radio her, have her turn the plane around, come all the way back?""That's exactly what you need to do.""All right. I guess you boys have never seen Hand angry, have you?"

6377.author: Phil Coulson and Antoine Triplett
6377.quote: "All right. Ward is HYDRA. You know what that means.""Garrett is alive.""And Agent Hand is dead."

6378.author: Maria Hill and Phil Coulson
6378.quote: "We should have seen HYDRA coming. But after D.C., they don't stand a chance.""John Garrett does.""Garrett? I heard Ward took care of him.""Ward's his secret weapon. He killed Victoria Hand, then raided the Fridge, and now he's got Skye, which is where we were headed until you so rudely interrupted to sweeten your deal."

6379.author: Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
6379.quote: "I'm still a part of your team.""My team? You th- You are not nor you'll ever be on my team. You dropped Fitz-Simmons out of a plane. You murdered Victoria Hand and Eric Koenig. You betrayed every one of us, you deluded son of a bitch."

6380.author: Bobbi Morse and Isabelle Hartley
6380.quote: "What, S.H.I.E.L.D. has the top deck?""And I heard from Vic. She's gonna hold the Hub."

6381.author: Kara Palamas to Bobbi Morse
6381.quote: "Grant's already told me everything. Everything about his abusive family, about John Garrett, about having to kill Victoria Hand."

6382.author: Vijay Nadeer
6382.quote: "Thank you. Thank you. It's nice to meet you, Jemma... Simmons."

6383.author: Jemma Simmons and a Scientist
6383.quote: "It's incredibly rare to see the actual metamorphosis. It only lasts a few fleeting moments.""Not this one. The subject's been gestating for seven months.""Come again? How has he survived?"

6384.author: Jemma Simmons and Quake
6384.quote: "I knew Senator Nadeer was connected to him somehow, and in my research on her, I recognized him ... Vijay Nadeer ... her own brother, if you can believe it.""Yeah, but there's zero evidence that he's been missing. He's been posting on Facebook, Twitter. His bills are paid. He even recently signed up for a Master Class in directing."

6385.author: Vin-Tak to Nurse
6385.quote: "Do not try and fight me. Someone on your world has changed. I'm here to hunt them down."

6387.author: Vin-Tak
6387.quote: "You must understand, these creatures are weapons. Abominations. Even if they don't know it."

6388.author: Vin-Tak
6388.quote: "The weapon has been activated. It needs to be eliminated before it hurts someone."

6389.author: Sif, Melinda May and Phil Coulson
6389.quote: "I'm a decent fighter.""This guy can hold his own against you. Impressive.""Last time you were here you came to collect a rogue Asgardian. That would explain his strength.""Regardless, she traveled across the universe to find him. He's dangerous.""Make that more than dangerous. We know you were after him. Question is, what's he after?"

6390.author: Jemma Simmons to Phil Coulson
6390.quote: "After Raina's vanishing act, we advise that when you find this man, you contain him first, ask questions later."

6391.author: Cardozo and Melinda May
6391.quote: "The man destroyed my booth!""What does he want with balloons?""He went for my helium, broke off the valve and took them! What does he need those for?"

6392.author: Skye to Phil Coulson
6392.quote: "The guy was blue. Like he just tested some Willy Wonka gum blue, and he needed nitrogen for whatever device turned its skin pink. Do you think he's a Kree?"

6393.author: Skye, Phil Coulson and Melinda May
6393.quote: "After my run-in with Blue Man Group, I still feel a little banged up, and I'm just worried I'm not gonna be much help out there. So...""Okay. Whenever you're ready.""Is it really about being hurt? Or is it about your nerves?""I promise, it's just about the guy making me see cartoon birdies all around my head. That's it."

6394.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz, Alphonso Mackenzie, Bobbi Morse, and Lance Hunter
6394.quote: "Skye is my friend. She's different.""Oh, yeah. Like I was your friend, and then I changed. How did you handle that?""Uh, t-the point is, secrets don't help any of us. Skye should have just come clean.""What, and risked being locked up, studied, or who know what else? No, I wouldn't let her.""Oh, you wouldn't let her.""We could have handled her in a way that could have kept everybody safe.""It wasn't fair to us, Fitz. We had a right to know.""A right to know. What... is that the same way that Sif and the Kree had the right to know?""I think the situation is a bit different, mate.""No, you would have done to her exactly what they wanted to.""You don't know that!""Yes, I do know that! They would--you would--you'd "handle her"! Mack just said! Like, uh... like Skye's something to be locked up in a cage somewhere. We should be protecting her.""No, Fitz. We're the ones that need the protection from her."

6395.author: Vin-Tak, Sif and Phil Coulson
6395.quote: "I am here to help.""Is that why you attacked me, Kree?""You were the one who attacked.""I had to take your memory to keep you from tracking me. How did you track me?""You do not ask the questions, Kree. You do not talk.""Actually, we need him to talk.""Look, I can prove that I'm not a threat, and that I'm here to help. Bring me my truncheon.""How very Kree. He needs a weapon to make a point.""My truncheon can restore her memory. Would that not be a gesture of my noble intentions?""I'll consider it once we know that thing does what you say it does.""Do you have a name?""Vin-Tak.""And I will earn your trust."

6396.author: Sif and Vin-Tak
6396.quote: "Tell us how the truncheon works, Kree.""The Kree has a name. And that only works when in my hand."

6397.author: Sif, Vin-Tak, Skye, Melinda May and Jemma Simmons
6397.quote: "When Heimdall saw that one landed on your world, Odin charged me with retrieving him.""So you came to pick a fight?""We know enough about Kree history to be concerned.""Well, then if you know Kree history, perhaps you've heard the tale of Terrigenesis.""Of course. Ancient Kree descending on planets, altering the inhabitants to fight their war.""And Earth was one of them."""Blue angels who fell from the sky."""Eons ago, the Kree waged a very long war. The casualties were high and they needed more soldiers.""You mean cannon fodder.""We needed killers. One vicious faction among the Kree genetically modified other creatures' DNA. These modifications can be activated with Terrigen Crystals.""We know these torturous experiments failed.""Not on Earth. Here, we had to shut them down. This faction had built a city. They brought with them the Diviners, which hold the crystals. Their plans were discovered and thwarted by the better of my kind, putting an end to that dark chapter of our past.""Until now.""When I saw that an ancient signal had been triggered, I knew it had to be a Diviner. If the Kree Empire learned that these experiments were a success, they would be likely to renew them.""Why did you come here?""These transformed beings are abominations. I knew that I had to find the remainder of the Diviners before another monstrosity occurred, and erase any knowledge of it.""How many Diviners are supposed to be in that crate?""Enough to create an army.""Sir, the crate is empty.""My worst fear has come true."

6398.author: Skye, Vin-Tak and Leo Fitz
6398.quote: "I can get a handle on it.""That's not what you were designed for. You were designed to destroy. Which is why you must be put down.""Yeah, well, that sounds an awful lot like killing to me."

6399.author: Vin-Tak and Alphonso Mackenzie
6399.quote: "Your friend Skye is an atrocity. And I must go put an end to this.""We'll decide what she is. But for now, you're not going anywhere.""This is not your fight.""Kind of is now."

6400.author: Vin-Tak and Bobbi Morse
6400.quote: "This is twice now, you and me. You must really love fighting.""Love fighting? No. But you're coming after one of my people. So I'm willing to fight.""That's noble. Stupid, but noble."

6401.author: Vin-Tak, Phil Coulson and Sif
6401.quote: "I apologize for my forgetfulness. You have been very kind. Why is my hand not blue?""You are in disguise from the people pursuing you. Remember?""Right. I will keep watch.""I'll return him to his home planet, Hala. He'll remember none of this. No more trouble should come from there."

6403.author: Vision
6403.quote: "I don't want to kill Ultron. He's unique and he's in pain. But that pain will roll over the Earth. So, he must be destroyed. Every form he's built, every trace of his presence on the net. We have to act now. And not one of us can do it without the others. Maybe I am a monster. I don't think I'd know if I were one. I'm not what you are, and not what you intended. So, there may be no way to make you trust me. But we need to go."

6404.author: Steve Rogers and Tony Stark
6404.quote: "Why does your "Vision" sound like J.A.R.V.I.S.?""We reconfigured J.A.R.V.I.S.' matrix to create something new."

6405.author: Iron Man and F.R.I.D.A.Y.
6405.quote: "F.R.I.D.A.Y., the Vision?""Boss, it's working. He's burning Ultron out of the net. He won't escape through there."

6406.author: Ultron to Vision
6406.quote: "You shut me out. You think I care? You take away my world... I take away yours."

6407.author: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark and Thor
6407.quote: "The rules have changed.""We're dealing with something new.""The Vision is artificial intelligence.""A machine.""So, it doesn't count?""No, it's not like a person lifting the hammer.""Right, different rules for us.""Nice guy. Artificial.""Thank you.""He can wield the hammer, he can keep the Mind Stone. It's safe with the Vision. And these days, safe is in short supply."

6408.author: Vision and Captain America
6408.quote: "You think I'm a child of Ultron.""You're not?""I'm not Ultron. I am not J.A.R.V.I.S.. I am... I am."

6409.author: Bruce Banner and Vision
6409.quote: "If we're wrong about you, if you're the monster that Ultron made you to be...""What will you do?"

6410.author: Tony Stark and Vision
6410.quote: "I get first crack at the big guy. Iron Man's the one he's waiting for.""That's true. He hates you the most."

6411.author: Vision and Ultron
6411.quote: "Ultron.""My Vision. They really did take everything from me.""You set the terms. You can change them.""All right."

6412.author: Vision and Ultron
6412.quote: "You're afraid.""Of you?""Of death. You're the last one.""You were supposed to be the last. Stark asked for a savior and settled for a slave.""I suppose we are both disappointments.""I suppose we are.""Humans are odd. They think order and chaos are somehow opposites and... try to control what won't be. But there is grace in their failings. I think you missed that.""They're doomed.""Yes. But a thing isn't beautiful because it lasts. It's a privilege to be among them.""You're unbearably naive.""Well... I was born yesterday."

6413.author: Vision to Captain America
6413.quote: "Captain Rogers! I know you believe that what you are doing is right, but for the collective good, you must surrender now."

6414.author: Iron Man to Scarlet Witch
6414.quote: "Wanda, I think you hurt Vision's feelings."

6415.author: Wanda Maximoff, Vision and Steve Rogers
6415.quote: "Vis! We talked about this.""Yes, but the door was opened so I assumed that...Captain Rogers wished to know when Mr. Stark was arriving.""Thank you. We'll be right down.""I'll...use the door. Oh, and apparently, he's brought a guest.""We know who it is?""The Secretary of State."

6416.author: Vision, Sam Wilson, Steve Rogers and James Rhodes
6416.quote: "I have an equation.""Oh, this will clear it up.""In the 8 years since Mr. Stark announced himself as Iron Man, the number of known enhanced persons has grown exponentially. And during the same period, the number of potentially world-ending events has risen at a commensurate rate.""Are you saying it's our fault?""I'm saying there may be a causality. Our very strength invites challenge. Challenge incites conflict. And conflict... breeds catastrophe. Oversight... Oversight is not an idea that can be dismissed out of hand.""Boom."

6417.author: Vision and Wanda Maximoff
6417.quote: "'A pinch of paprika.' A pinch?""Is that Paprikash?""I thought it might...lift your spirits.""Spirits lifted.""In my defense, I haven't actually ever... eaten anything before, so...""May I?""Please. Wanda.""Hmm?""No one dislikes you, Wanda.""...Thanks.""Oh, you're welcome. No. It's a... involuntary response in their amygdala they can't help but be afraid of you.""Are you?""My amygdala is synthetic, so...""I used to think of myself one way. But, after this. I am something else. And still me, I think. But... that's not what everyone else sees.""I don't know what this is. Not really. I know it's not of this world, that it powered Loki's staff, gave you your abilities. But its true nature is a mystery and yet it is part of me.""Are you afraid of it?""I wish to understand it. The more I do, the less it controls me. One day, who knows? I may even control it.""I don't know what's in this but it is not paprika. I'm gonna go to the store. I'll be back in 20 minutes.""Alternatively, we could order a pizza?""Vision, are you not letting me leave?""It is a question of safety.""I can protect myself.""Not yours. Mr. Stark would like to avoid the possibility of another public incident. Until the Accords are on a... more secured foundation.""And what do you want?""For people to see you... as I do."

6418.author: Vision, Hawkeyeand Scarlet Witch
6418.quote: "Clint! You should not be here.""Really? I retire for, what, like five minutes, and it all goes to shit?""Please consider the consequences of your actions.""Okay, they're considered. Okay, we gotta go. It's this way.""I've caused enough problems.""You gotta help me, Wanda. Look, you wanna mope, can go to high school. You wanna make amends, you get off your ass. Shit! I knew I should've stretched.""Clint, you can't overpower me.""I know I can't. But she can.""Vision, that's enough. Let him go. I'm leaving.""I can't let you.""I'm sorry.""If you do this... they will never stop being afraid of you.""I can't control their fear, only my own"

6419.author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
6419.quote: "I'm sorry.""Me, too.""It's as I said. Catastrophe."

6420.author: Tony Stark and Happy Hogan
6420.quote: "So after the press conference, Happy will show you to your room, your new quarters, see that he is next to Vision.""Yeah, Vision's not big on doors.""It's so much fun.""Or walls.""You'll fit right in."

6421.author: Vision's last words to Scarlet Witch

6422.author: Wanda Maximoff and Vision
6422.quote: "Vis? Is it the stone again?""It's as if it's speaking to me.""What does it say?""I don't... I don't know. Something... Tell me what you feel.""I just feel you."

6423.author: Vision and Scarlet Witch
6423.quote: "Wanda, it's time.""No.""They can't stop him, Wanda, but we can. Look at me. You have the power to destroy the stone.""Don't.""You must do it. Wanda, please... We are out of time.""I can't.""Yes, you can. You can. If he gets this stone, half the Universe dies. It's not fair. It shouldn't be you, but it is. It's all right. You could never hurt me... I just feel you."

6425.author: Clint Barton and Wanda Maximoff
6425.quote: "You know, I wish there was a way... that I could let her know... that we won. We did it.""She knows. They both do."

6426.author: Volstagg
6426.quote: "Do not mistake my appetite for apathy!"

6427.author: Thor and Volstagg
6427.quote: "Volstagg, who introduced you to delicacies so succulent you thought you'd died and gone to Valhalla?""You did."

6428.author: Loki and Volstagg
6428.quote: "Thor this is madness.""Madness? What sort of madness?"

6429.author: Heimdall and Volstagg
6429.quote: "If your return threatens the safety of Asgard, my gate will remain shut and you will be left to perish on the cold waste of Jotunheim.""Couldn't you just keep the bridge open for us?"

6430.author: Fandral and Volstagg
6430.quote: "Shame on you! Don't you care?""Do not mistake my appetite for apathy!"

6431.author: Volstagg and Loki
6431.quote: "If I may, beg the indulgence of your Majesty, to perhaps reconsider...""We're done!"

6432.author: Volstagg and Thor
6432.quote: "Thor's going to fight with us!""My friends, I am just a man. I'd only get in your way or worse get one of you killed. But you can help me gain time and get everyone to safety."

6433.author: Volstagg
6433.quote: "With steely courage, intrepid spirit and an axe, victory was ours!"

6434.author: Fandral and Volstagg
6434.quote: "It's as if they resent being imprisoned.""There's no pleasing some creatures."

6435.author: Volstagg and Loki
6435.quote: "If you even THINK about betraying him...""You'll kill me? Evidently there will be a line."

6436.author: The Collector and Volstagg
6436.quote: "But if I may ask, why not keep it secure, in your own vault?""The Tesseract is already on Asgard. It is not wise to keep two Infinity Stones so close together."

6437.author: Volstagg to Hela
6437.quote: "Who are you? What have you done with Thor?"

6438.author: Vulture to Herman Schultz
6438.quote: "Yo, hey, ah, you can't saw through that stuff! These alien bastards, they're tough. You gotta use the stuff they use. See?"

6439.author: Vulture
6439.quote: "The world's changing. It's time we change too."

6440.author: Vulture
6440.quote: "The rich and the powerful, like Stark, they don't care about us. We have to pick up after them. We have to eat their table scraps."

6442.author: Vulture
6442.quote: "Eight years. Not a word from the feds, nothing from those Halloween costume wearing bozos up there over at Stark Tower. And then all of a sudden, this little bastard in red tights shows up, and he thinks he can tear down everything I've built. Really? I'm gonna kill him."

6443.author: Vulture to Spider-Man
6443.quote: "And don't you ever, ever interfere with my business again, 'Cause if you do, I'll kill you, and everyone that you love. I'll kill you dead. That's what I'll do to protect my family. Pete, you understand?"

6445.author: Vulture to Spider-Man
6445.quote: "You're messing with things that you don't understand!"

6446.author: Vulture
6446.quote: "This is our last chance to get what's ours."

6448.author: Tony Stark
6448.quote: "Forget the flying Vulture guy. There are people who handle this sort of thing."

6449.author: Spider-Man
6449.quote: "Dude, a gang with alien guns and a guy with wings? Yeah, they have a lair."

6450.author: Adrian Toomes and Phineas Mason
6450.quote: "When I was kid, I drew cowboys and Indians.""Actually, it's Native Americans. It's nice. Kid's got a future, though.""Yeah, we'll see."

6451.author: Adrian Toomes and Jackson Brice
6451.quote: "Oh hey! Glad you could join us after noon!""My alarm didn't go off...""Yeah, yeah, your alarm. Look, just go stack that armor plating like I asked, this is a huge deal for us!"

6452.author: Anne Marie Hoag, Adrian Toomes and Foster
6452.quote: "Attention, please! In accordance with Executive Order 396-B, all post-battle clean-up operations are now under our jurisdiction. Thank you for your service; we'll take it from here.""Who the hell are you?""Qualified personnel.""Look, I have a city contract to salvage all of this ok, the city said...""I apologise Mr Toomes but all salvage operations are under our jurisdiction. Please turn over any and all exotic materials that you have collected or you will be prosecuted.""Ma'am, please, wait, hey, come on! Look, I brought trucks for this job. I brought in a whole new crew, these guys have families, I have a family. I'm all in on this, I could loose my house!""I'm sorry sir, there is nothing I can do.""Maybe next time, don't overextend yourself.""What did you say? Yeah, he's right. I over extended myself.""Put them down. If you have a grievance, you may take it up with my superiors.""Your superiors? And who the hell are they?"

6453.author: Randy Vale, Tinkerer and Vulture
6453.quote: "Hey chief, we still have another load from yesterday. We're supposed to turn this in, right?""I ain't hauling it.""It's too bad. We could have made some pretty cool stuff with all that alien junk.""I'll tell you what, let's keep it. The world's changing. Time we change too."

6454.author: Jackson Brice, Vulture, Tinkerer, and Herman Shultz
6454.quote: "Ha ha! Woo! That was badass.""How many times have I told you not to fire them out in the open?""You said to move the merchandise!""Under the radar! Under the radar! That's how we survive! If you bring Damage Control or the Avengers down here, we're through! You're out there, wearing that goofy thing, lightin' up cars, calling yourself the Shocker! "I'm the Shocker! I shock people!" What is this, Pro Wrestling?""Yeah, whatever, old man.""Look, I know you don't give a crap about anything, but I do. I built this whole place because there are people I have to look after.""Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.""You know what? I can't afford your bullshit. Get out of here.""What?""You're done, you're off the crew.""Yeah, alright. I wonder if you could afford me out there, though. With what I know.""Excuse me?""I'm just saying, maybe your wife would like to know where you really get your money from?""You know what?""What?""You're right. Does it work?""I don't know.""I can't afford that.""Damm!""I thought this was the Anti-Gravity Gun.""What? No, that's that one!""Here, now you're the 'Shocker'. Go out there and find that weapon you lost."

6455.author: Adrian Toomes and Peter Parker
6455.quote: "You must be Peter.""Yeah.""I'm Liz's dad. Put her there, Hell of a grip! Come on in here, Come on."

6456.author: Adrian Toomes and Peter Parker
6456.quote: "Hey, you up for some bourbon, some gin, rum?""I'm not old enough to drink.""Right answer."

6457.author: Spider-Man and Vulture
6457.quote: "I'm sorry Peter.""What are you talking about? That thing isn't even touched me yet!""True but then again... wasn't really trying to."

6458.author: Vulture and Peter Parker
6458.quote: "Does she know?""Know what?""So she doesn't, good. Close to the vest, I admire that. I've got a few secrets of my own. Of all the reasons I didn't want my daughter to date. Peter, nothing is more important than family. You saved my daughter's life, and I could never forget something like that, so I'll give you one chance. You ready? You walk through those doors, You forget any of this happened. And don't you ever, ever interfere with my business again, 'Cause if you do, I'll kill you, and everyone that you love. I'll kill you dead. That's what I'll do to protect my family. Pete, you understand? Hey. I just saved your life. Now, what do you say?""Thank you.""You're welcome. Now, you go on in there, and you show my daughter a good time, okay? Just not too good."

6459.author: Vulture and Peter Parker
6459.quote: "Peter, you're young. You don't understand how the world works.""Yeah, but I understand that selling weapons to criminals is wrong!""How do you think your buddy Stark paid for that tower, or any of his little toys? Those people, Pete, those people up there, the rich and the powerful, they do whatever they want. Guys like us, like you and me... they don't care about us. We build their roads and we fight all their wars and everything. They don't care about us. We have to pick up after them. We have to eat their table scraps. That's how it is. I know you know what I'm talking about, Peter.""Why are you telling me this?""'Cause I want you to understand. And... I needed a little time to get her airborne."

6460.author: James Rhodes
6460.quote: "As liaison to Stark Industries, I've had the unique privilege of serving with a real patriot. He is my friend, and he is my great mentor. Ladies and gentlemen, it is my honor to present this years Apogee Award to Mr. Tony Stark. Tony?"

6461.author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
6461.quote: "That's what I'm talking about. When I get up in the morning and I'm putting on my uniform, you know what I recognize? I see in that mirror that every person that's got this uniform on at my back!"

6462.author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
6462.quote: "How was the fun-vee? Next time you ride with me, okay?"

6463.author: James Rhodes
6463.quote: "The future of air combat... Is it manned, or unmanned? I'll tell you in my experience, no unmanned aerial vehicle will ever trump a pilot's instinct."

6464.author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
6464.quote: "What's wrong with you?""What?""Three hours!""I got caught doing a piece for Vanity Fair""For three hours! For three hours you've kept me standing here!""Waiting on you now. Let's go. Come on."

6465.author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
6465.quote: "You don’t respect yourself so I know you don’t respect me.""I respect you.""You know, I’m just your babysitter so, you know, when you need your diaper changed, let me know — thank you — and I’ll get you a bottle, okay?"

6466.author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
6466.quote: "No, you see, this isn't a game. You do not send civilian equipment into my active war zone. You understand that?""It's not a piece of equipment, I'm in it! It's a suit! It's ME!"

6467.author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
6467.quote: "That's the coolest thing I've ever seen.""Not bad huh."

6468.author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
6468.quote: "I'm just not the hero type. Clearly. With this laundry list of character defects, all the mistakes I've made, largely public.""Just stick to the cards, man.""Yeah, okay. The truth is... I am Iron Man."

6469.author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
6469.quote: "This lone gunslinger act is unnecessary... you don't have to do this alone!"

6470.author: War Machine to the party guests
6470.quote: "I'm only gonna say this once: GET OUT!"

6471.author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
6471.quote: "Oh man, you can have your suit back."

6472.author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
6472.quote: "I didn't expect to see you here...""Well, it's me, and I'm here, so get over it and move on!"

6473.author: War Machine, Iron Man and Adam Goldstein
6473.quote: " I’m only gonna say this once. Get out. You don’t deserve to wear one of these. Shut it down!""Goldstein.""Yes, Mr Stark?""Give me a phat beat to beat my buddy’s ass to.""I told you to shut it down.""Now, put that thing back where you found it before someone gets hurt. Really? Sorry, pal, but Iron Man doesn’t have a sidekick.""Sidekick this. Had enough?"

6474.author: Iron Man and War Machine
6474.quote: "You want it? Take it!""Put your hand down!""You think you got what it takes to wear that suit?""We don’t have to do this, Tony.""You wanna be the War Machine? Take your shot.""Put it down!""You gonna take a shot?""Put it down!""No!""Drop it Tony!""Take it!"

6475.author: General and James Rhodes
6475.quote: "Unbelievable. This ought to get the Senate off my ass. It’s functional?""Fully mission-capable.""Good. Get Hammer down here to weaponize it.""Sir?""Justin Hammer’s making a weapons presentation at the Expo. We’d like this to introduce it.""Sir, I don’t believe that the Expo…""Colonel, the world needs to see this fast. We’ve got to make this happen.""Yes, General, but…""It’s also an order.""Yes sir.""Good work, Colonel. You’ve made your country proud.""Thank you sir."

6476.author: James Rhodes and Justin Hammer
6476.quote: "I think I'll take it.""Which one?""All of it."

6477.author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
6477.quote: "You have *a* big gun, you're not *the* big gun.""Tony, don't be jealous.""No, it's subtle, all the bells and whistles.""Yeah, it's called being a badass!"

6478.author: Senator Stern and James Rhodes
6478.quote: "Thank you Lieutenant Colonel for such an exceptional distinguished performance, you deserve this.""Thank you sir."

6479.author: James Rhodes to Tony Stark
6479.quote: "Tony, I swear, I'm going to blow his face off."

6480.author: President Matthew Ellis
6480.quote: "Central to my administration's response to this terrorist event, is a newly minted resource. I know him as Colonel James Rhodes, the American people will soon know him as the Iron Patriot."

6481.author: Harley Keener and Tony Stark
6481.quote: "If I was building Iron Man and War Machine...""It's Iron Patriot now.""That's way cooler!""No it's not."

6483.author: Tony Stark and James Rhodes
6483.quote: "I'm gonna find a heavy-duty comm sat now, I need your login.""It's same as it's always been, "WarMachine68."""And a password, please.""Well, look, I gotta change it every time you hack in, Tony.""It's not the '80s, nobody says "hack" anymore. Give me your login."""WAR MACHINE ROX" with an "X," all caps...Yeah, okay.""That is so much better than "Iron Patriot.""

6484.author: James Rhodes and Sweat Shop Agent
6484.quote: "If you want this suit, you're going to have to pry my cold dead body out of it.""That's the plan, Colonel."

6485.author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark
6485.quote: "Give me a suit!""Oh I'm sorry, they're only coded to me.""What does that mean?""I got you covered!"

6486.author: J.A.R.V.I.S. and James Rhodes
6486.quote: "Good evening, Colonel. Can I give you a lift?""Very funny."

6487.author: War Machine
6487.quote: "Oh no, I didn't say you could leave."

6488.author: War Machine to Ultron Sentries
6488.quote: "War Machine, comin' at you, right a-..."

6490.author: James Rhodes and Thor
6490.quote: "So I take the tank, fly it right up to the General’s palace, drop it at his feet, I’m like, Boom! You looking for this? Boom! Are you looking... Why do I even talk to you guys? Everywhere else that story kills.""That's the whole story?""Yeah, it's a War Machine story.""It's very good then."

6491.author: James Rhodes and Tony Stark trying to lift Mjølnir
6491.quote: "Are you even pulling?""Are you on my team?""Just represent. Pull.""All right, let's go."

6492.author: James Rhodes and Maria Hill
6492.quote: "He’s in your files, he’s in the internet. What if he decides to access something a little more exciting?""Nuclear codes."

6493.author: War Machine and Iron Man
6493.quote: "Now this is gonna be a good story.""Yup. If you live to tell it.""You think I can't hold my own?""We get through this, I'll hold your own.""You had to make it weird."

6494.author: Iron Man to War Machine
6494.quote: "Rhodey, get the rest of the people on board that carrier.""On it."

6496.author: War Machine to Captain America
6496.quote: "Sorry, Cap. This won't kill you, but it ain't gonna tickle either."

6498.author: War Machine
6498.quote: "Okay, tiny dude is big now. He's big now."

6500.author: Sam Wilson and Tony Stark
6500.quote: "How's Rhodes?""We fly him to Columbia Medical tomorrow, so... fingers crossed."

6501.author: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark and James Rhodes
6501.quote: "Tony, if someone dies on your watch, you don't give up.""Who said we're giving up?""We are if we're not taking responsibility for our actions. This document just shifts the blame.""I'm sorry, Steve, that... that is dangerously arrogant. This is the United Nations we're talking about. It's not the World Security Council. It's not S.H.I.E.L.D.. It's not HYDRA-""No, but it's run by people with agendas and agendas change."

6502.author: War Machine scanning the Black Order's arrival outside the dome
6502.quote: "I got two heat signatures breaking through the tree line."

6504.author: James Rhodes
