6504.quote: "What is this? What the hell is happening?"

6505.author: Thaddeus Ross, James Rhodes, Steve Rogers and Natasha Romanoff
6505.quote: "Still no word on Vision?""Satellites lost him somewhere over Edinburgh.""On a stolen Quinjet with four of the world's most wanted criminals.""You know they're only criminals because you chose them to call them that, right, sir?""God, Rhodes. Your talent for horse-shit rivals my own.""If it weren't for those Accords, Vision would have been right here.""I remember your signature on those papers, Colonel.""That's right. And I'm pretty sure I paid for that.""You having second thoughts?""Not anymore.""Mr. Secretary.""You got some nerve. I'll give you that.""You could use some of that right now.""The world's on fire, and you think all's forgiven?""I'm not looking for forgiveness. And I'm way past asking for permission. Earth just lost their best defender. So we're here to fight. If you wanna stay in our way... we'll fight you, too.""Arrest them."

6506.author: Falcon, Winter Soldier and War Machine
6506.quote: "Hey, Cap, we got a situation here.""God, I love this place.""Yeah, don't start celebrating yet, guys. We got more incoming outside the dome."

6507.author: War Machine and Falcon
6507.quote: "Focus that fire on the left flank, Sam."I'm doing it."

6508.author: James Rhodes
6508.quote: "So that... thing just stopped doing whatever the hell it was doing."

6509.author: Steve Rogers, James Rhodes, Bruce Banner and Natasha Romanoff
6509.quote: "I thought we bypassed the battery.""We did. It's still plugged in, it just... it just stopped.""Reboot and send the signal again.""We don't even know what this is.""Fury did. You tell me the second you get a signal. I wanna know who's on the other end of that thing."

6510.author: War Machine ejecting the Mark VI armor

6511.author: James Rhodes to Rocket Raccoon
6511.quote: "See you on the other side, man!"

6512.author: Black Widow, Hulk, War Machine, Captain Marvel and Captain America
6512.quote: "He used the stones again.""Hey, hey, hey, hey. We'd be going in short-handed, you know?""Look, he still got the stones, so...""So let's get 'em. We use them to bring everyone back.""Just like that?""Yeah. Just like that.""Even if there's a small chance that we can undo this, I mean we owe it to everyone who's not in this room to try."

6513.author: Hulk, War Machine and Captain Marvel
6513.quote: "If we do this, how do we know it's gonna end any differently than it did before?""Because before you didn't have me.""Hey, new girl? Everybody in this room is about that superhero life. And if you don't mind my asking, where the hell have you been all this time?""There are a lot of other planets in the universe, and unfortunately, they didn't have you guys."

6514.author: War Machine, Hulk, Scott Lang, Clint Barton and Nebula
6514.quote: "If we can do this; you know, go back in time; why don't we just find baby Thanos, you know, and...""Okay, first of all, that's horrible.""It's Thanos!""And secondly, time doesn't work that way. Changing the past doesn't change the future.""We go back, we get the stones before Thanos gets them, Thanos doesn't have the stones! Problem solved!""Bingo.""That's not how it works!""Well that's what I heard.""Who told you that?""Star Trek, Terminator, Timecop, Time After Time...""Quantum Leap?""A Wrinkle in Time, Somewhere in Time...""Hot Tub Time Machine?""Hot Tub Time Machine, Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure, basically any movie that deals with time travel!""Die Hard? No, that's not one...""Look, this is known!""I don't know why everyone believes that, but that isn't true. Think about it. If you go into the past, that past becomes your future, and your former present becomes the past, which can't now be changed by your new future!""Exactly!""So, Back to the Future is a bunch of bullshit?"

6515.author: Hulk and War Machine
6515.quote: "Did we get 'em all?""Are you telling me this actually worked?"

6517.author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang
6517.quote: "When you're small, energy's compressed, so you have the force of a 200-pound man behind a fist a 100th of an inch wide. You're like a bullet. You punch too hard, you kill someone. Too soft, it's a love tap. In other words, you have to know how to punch."

6518.author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang

6519.author: Hope van Dyne
6519.quote: "Aratrechina longicornis, commonly known as crazy ants, they're lightning fast and can conduct electricity which makes them useful to fry out enemy electronics."

6520.author: Hope van Dyne
6520.quote: "Solenopsis mandibularis. Known for their bite, the fire ants have evolved into remarkable architects. They are handy to get you in and out of difficult places."

6521.author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang

6522.author: Hope van Dyne to Hank Pym

6523.author: Hank Pym to Scott Lang
6523.quote: "The board's chairman is my daughter, Hope. She was the deciding vote. But she came back to me when she saw how close Cross was to cracking my formula."

6524.author: Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym
6524.quote: "Good morning, Hank.""Hope. Would it kill you to call me dad?""Well, Doctor Cross will be so pleased that you could find the time to join us today."

6525.author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
6525.quote: "His failures as a mentor, as a father, forced us to spread our wings.""You're a success, Darren. You deserve everything coming your way."

6526.author: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
6526.quote: "Have you been standing there watching me sleep this whole time?""Yes.""Why?""Because the last time you were here you stole something."

6527.author: Hank Pym, Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
6527.quote: "I assume that you've already met my daughter, Hope.""I did. She's great.""She doesn't think that we need you.""We don't. We can do this ourselves.""I go to all this effort to let you steal my suit, and then Hope has you arrested.""Okay, we can try this and when he fails, I'll do it myself.""She's a little bit anxious."

6528.author: Hank Pym and Hope van Dyne
6528.quote: "Hope trained in martial arts at a difficult time.""Oh, by "difficult time," he means when my mother died.""We lost her in a plane crash. It's bad enough you won't tell me how she died. Could you please stop telling me that lie?"

6529.author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
6529.quote: "Paraponera clavata.""I know. Bullet ants, right? Number one on the Schmidt pain index."

6530.author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
6530.quote: "Camponotus pennsylvanicus]]. Alternatively known as a carpenter ant. Ideal for ground and air transport.""Wait a minute, I know this guy. I'm going to call him Ant-thony]]."

6531.author: Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
6531.quote: "You know when my mother died I didn’t see him for two weeks?""He was in grief.""Yeah, so was I, and I was seven. And he never came back, not in any way that counted. He just sent me off to boarding school."

6532.author: Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym
6532.quote: "It's not your fault. She made her choice. But why didn't you tell me this sooner?"" I was trying to protect you. I lost your mother. I didn't mean to lose you too."

6533.author: Scott Lang and Hope van Dyne
6533.quote: "Hi, I'm Scott.""Did he just say "Hi, I'm Scott"?"

6534.author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
6534.quote: "I just saw Hank. I still get nothing but contempt from him.""Don’t let him rile you up, he’s just... He’s just a senile old man."

6535.author: Hope van Dyne and Luis
6535.quote: "You know he was arrested for stealing a smoothie machine, right?""Two smoothie machines..."

6536.author: Hope van Dyne and Darren Cross
6536.quote: "Darren, what are you doing?""He wasn’t any more capable of caring for you than he was for me.""This is not who you are, it’s the particles altering your brain chemistry."

6537.author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
6537.quote: "You know, I came to the house the other night to kill him, but you were there.""You're sick and I can help you. Just put the gun down.""I wasn't ready to kill you then, but I think I am now!""Drop your gun now!""You picked the wrong side, Hope."

6538.author: Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym
6538.quote: "The charges are set. We’ve got to find a way out of here and fast.""Don’t worry. I’m not gonna die, and neither are you."

6539.author: Hank Pym, Hope van Dyne and Scott Lang
6539.quote: "When did this happen?""Nothing’s happening.""Whoa, hold on. Something’s kind of happening."

6540.author: Hope van Dyne
6540.quote: "He's programmed to follow your daily routine—nine hours of sleep, five hours in front of the TV, two hours in the bathroom, whatever that's about..."

6541.author: Hope van Dyne to Scott Lang
6541.quote: "Thanks to you, we had to run. We're still running."

6543.author: Hope van Dyne
6543.quote: "We unleashed something powerful. We call her the Ghost."

6544.author: Scott Lang to Hank Pym
6544.quote: "Hold on. You gave her wings?""And blasters."

6545.author: Cassie Lang to Scott Lang
6545.quote: "Maybe you just need someone watching your back. Like a partner."

6546.author: Ant-Man and Hope van Dyne
6546.quote: "I just have one question, when Cap needed help, if I’d asked you, would you have come?""I guess we’ll never know. But if you had, you’d never been caught."

6547.author: Scott Lang, Bill Foster and Hope van Dyne
6547.quote: "How big did you get?""My record? Twenty-one feet. You?""Sixty-five feet.""Sixty-five?""If you two are finished comparing sizes.""Sixty-five."

6548.author: Ant-Man and Hope van Dyne
6548.quote: "You go low, I'll go high.""I have wings, why would I go low?"

6549.author: Ant-Man and Hope van Dyne
6549.quote: "Great job back there. Are you gonna say the same thing to me?""Good job.""Thank you."

6550.author: Iron Man and Captain America buy Ant-Man and the Wasp time to get the Quantum Tunnel in Luis' van working during the Battle of Earth
6550.quote: "Scott, how long do you need to get that thing working?""Maybe ten minutes.""Get it started. We'll bring the stones to you.""We're on it, Cap."

6552.author: Kathleen Sparr and Thaddeus Ross
6552.quote: "It's a possible Gamma sickness. Milwaukee. A man drank one of those guaraná sodas. Guess it had a little more kick than he was looking for."

6558.author: Watcher Informant
6558.quote: "Superheroes in New York? Give me a break!"

6559.author: Erik Selvig and Watcher Informant
6559.quote: "Any questions?""Yeah, can I have my shoe back?"

6561.author: Rocket Raccoon
6561.quote: "Look at Mr. Smiles over here. Where's your wife, old man? What a Class A pervert!"

6562.author: Thor and Watcher Informant
6562.quote: "This was aged for a thousand years in the barrels built from the wreck of Grunhel's Fleet. It is not meant for mortal men.""Neither was Omaha Beach, blondie. Stop trying to scare us. Come on.""Alright."

6564.author: Ignacio and Watcher Informant
6564.quote: "Look at the girl I'm with! You what I'm sayin'? She's crazy stupid fine, right?""Yeah, crazy stupid fine!"

6565.author: Watcher Informant and James Rhodes
6565.quote: "Are you Tony...Stank?""Yes, this is...this is Tony Stank! You're in the right place. Thank you for that!"

6567.author: Watcher Informant to the Watchers
6567.quote: "Oh, man. Anyway, before I was so rudely interrupted, at that time, I was a Federal Express man."

6568.author: Watcher Informant to the Watchers
6568.quote: "Hey, fellas! Hey, wait, where are you going? Hey, you were supposed to be my lift home! How will I get out of here? Hey! Oh, gee, I've got so many more stories to tell! Oh, guys! Oh, gee..."

6569.author: Watcher Informant to Spider-Man
6569.quote: "Don't make me come down there, you punk!"

6570.author: Marjorie and Watcher Informant
6570.quote: "Hey, Gary, how you doing?""Marjorie, how are you? How's your mother?"

6571.author: Bruce Banner and Thor
6571.quote: "What happened to your hair?""Oh, some creepy old man cut it off."

6572.author: Watcher Informant and Thor
6572.quote: "Now, don't you move. My hands aren't as steady as they used to be.""By Odin's beard, you shall not cut my hair, lest you feel the wrath of the mighty Thor! Please, kind sir, do not cut my hair... No! NOOOOOO!"

6573.author: Watcher Informant to Everett Ross
6573.quote: "You know what, I think I'll just take these, bring them over here and hold onto them for safe keeping."

6574.author: Watcher Informant
6574.quote: "What's the matter with you kids? You never seen a spaceship before?"

6575.author: Watcher Informant
6575.quote: "Well, the 60s were fun but now I'm paying for it."

6579.author: Ivan Vanko to Tony Stark
6579.quote: "If you can make God bleed, people will cease to believe in him, and there will be blood in the water and the sharks will come. All I have to do is sit here and watch as the world will consume you."

6580.author: Ivan Vanko's final words to Iron Man

6581.author: Ivan Vanko and Tony Stark
6581.quote: "You come from a family of thieves and butchers, and like all guilty men, you try to rewrite your history, to forget all the lives the Stark family has destroyed.""Speaking of thieves, where'd you get this design?"

6582.author: Ivan Vanko and Justin Hammer
6582.quote: "I want my bird.""A bird? You want a bird--""I want my bird.""I can get you a bird. I can get you ten birds.""I want my bird!""Well, OK. Nothing's impossible. Are you talking about... Is this a bird back in Russia?"

6583.author: Justin Hammer and Ivan Vanko
6583.quote: "That's not a helmet; it's a head. I need to put a guy in there. I need to put a person in that... in that suit.""Drone better."What? Drone better? Why is drone better? Why is drone better""People make problem. Trust me; drone better."

6584.author: Tony Stark and Ivan Vanko
6584.quote: "You sound pretty spry for a dead guy.""You too. I double cycle.""You what?""You told me double cycles more power. Good advice."

6585.author: Ivan Vanko and Tony Stark
6585.quote: "The true history of Stark name will be written. What your father did to my family over 40 years, I will do to you in 40 minutes.""Sounds good. Let's get together and hash it out.""I hope you're ready."

6586.author: Will Simpson to Jessica Jones
6586.quote: "I don't want to shoot you. He said it's not your time."

6587.author: Trish Walker and Will Simpson
6587.quote: "You don't want to do this.""Yes, I do."

6588.author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
6588.quote: "Just tell me what the hell happened. Okay, why did I try to kill myself? Or why did I try and kill-- Oh my God. I killed...""No. no, you didn't.""I killed her.""You're confused. No one died, nothing happened. Okay? Just go home."

6589.author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
6589.quote: "You have no idea what's involved here.""Well I know there's a guy who controls minds and there's a woman who flew out of the sky to save my life. I may not have your abilities, but I got eight years special ops and an entire police force to back me up."

6590.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6590.quote: "I just need you to know that, the guy who tried to kill you, he wasn't me.""I don't blame you.""Well you're doing better than me. I tried to fight it, I couldn't."

6591.author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson on opposite sides of a soundproof wall
6591.quote: "You G.I. Joe. You definitely have a screw loose. I'm guessing you left the military because you gunned down a small village.""So, what, you think because you have these abilities, you're a hero? I've seen heroes. You're not even close."

6592.author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
6592.quote: "If you're so great, why'd they let you out of Spec Ops?""That's classified."

6593.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker to Jessica Jones
6593.quote: "Look, whatever abilities you have I'm guessing they don't include rendition, infiltration and isolation of enemy combatants.""He's a war hero."

6594.author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
6594.quote: "Dart gun is accurate up to twenty feet.""He'll always keep back to a wall, he'll see you coming.""He won't see me."

6595.author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
6595.quote: "If Kilgrave gets me...""I'll take you out.""I was going to say dartgun me but sure, shoot me in the head.""Same here."

6596.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6596.quote: "Some people need to be removed from this Earth and Kilgrave is one of them.""We don't get to decide that, killers decide that, that's what makes them killers.""That is naive."

6597.author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
6597.quote: "You're coming with me. I put a bomb in the basement to kill that asshole downstairs.""Shit. You can't kill him with Hope still in jail!""Well you can't let him live, he's too dangerous."

6598.author: Miklos Kozlov and Will Simpson
6598.quote: "You're responding well to the meds.""Feels good, like old times. Give me a red.""You had a red this morning, we altered protocol after what happened in Damascus. One red to get you going. Two whites to keep you even. One blue to bring you down."

6599.author: Will Simpson to Oscar Clemons
6599.quote: "Where are they?! I'm sorry... It's ever since Kilgrave, I don't know who to trust. I don't need a weapon to make a vaccine. Trish Walker, she trusts me, she's the one who called me, so please just tell me where she is."

6600.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6600.quote: "My boys are dead because of her.""Because of Kilgrave!""Yeah and I'm gonna... gonna kill him but she just keeps getting in the way."

6601.author: Jessica Jones and Will Simpson
6601.quote: "And that fresh burn on your arm confirms that.""I didn't even feel that."

6602.author: Will Simpson and Jessica Jones
6602.quote: "Any other day you would have won this, it's your ribs isn't it?""You're on something, you're messed up.""You could have killed him a dozen times, I'm just doing what has to be done, someone has to."

6603.author: Will Simpson and Trish Walker
6603.quote: "You stole my pills?! No don't, it'll kill you!""Hasn't killed you.""Because you have no tolerance, you see these, without a blue to calm down, your brain will forget to tell your lungs to breathe!"

6604.author: William Rawlins to Cerberus Squad
6604.quote: "Success here is a matter of perspective. It can't be measured in battles won or land claimed. Gentlemen, I'm here to offer you freedom. To wage the war that must be waged to finally win this thing. What we will do is dirty and tough, but it will speed an end of this war and safeguard our nation."

6605.author: William Rawlins to Cerberus Squad
6605.quote: "I'm the only authority you will need. I point, you shoot."

6606.author: Billy Russo and Frank Castle
6606.quote: "Hey, you notice that our fearless leader didn't even give us a name?""Yeah. Heard some of the guys call him Agent Orange."

6607.author: Frank Castle and Billy Russo
6607.quote: "Why you protecting that piece of shit?""I'm protecting you. Guys like that, it's never on them! Open your eyes, man. This whole thing is bullshit! You don't like the way that it smells? Get out!"

6608.author: William Rawlins
6608.quote: "We are a fortunate people in this country. Most Americans wake up in warm beds, suck down coffee with their breakfast and go about their lives. And good for them. They deserve that life. They deserve it not because they earned it as individuals but because we've earned it as a nation. As a people. But not all of us get to take that life for granted. Our job at the CIA is to identify and contain any dangers to it. It's a job that's not always clean, or pretty, or fun. I've watched friends die and I've left good men behind in shitty countries because that was the home they were born to. I don't know a single operative with any years under their belt who hasn't had to do something that gave them nightmares. But we endure those nightmares embrace them, even so that the rest of America can sleep peacefully. That's why you're here. My name is William Rawlins. Welcome to the CIA."

6609.author: William Rawlins to Billy Russo
6609.quote: "Look at this. Industry. Coal, iron, steel. Real things. Whole country used to be built on it. We were self-sufficient. Now? Markets rule everything. This country never needed anything from anyone else. Now, we're beholden."

6610.author: Micro and Frank Castle
6610.quote: "He was born at the top of the ladder. The Rawlinses are practically royalty.  They are the power behind the throne. They're old, old Virginia money. Plantations, shipping and industry, arms. Who knows what else they have their hands in.""Sounds like you got a crush on the guy.""He's the director of covert ops, Frank. I mean, for all I know he's been waiting for somebody to look for him."

6611.author: William Rawlins and Billy Russo
6611.quote: "You serve me. You're a tool, you understand? Just like he was.""You've lost your mind. I was out of Afghanistan clean. None of this would be happening if you hadn't gone after him. You pulled me back into the mud.""I pulled you out of the mud, gutter rat! Billy, don't get confused. Men like me make the plans. Men like you shed the blood. You think you're clean? Who killed Homeland agents, huh? Not me. No, I I have everything. I have your doctored discharge papers, the money transfers. You're only as clean as I let you be, because when it's all said and done, you're just a stupid grunt, too."

6612.author: William Rawlins and Frank Castle
6612.quote: "This country needs me, Frank. I was the bulwark against our enemies. What I did was greater than you could ever measure! Do you know what you've done?""Did they take your pension away?""You are nothing but a grunt! You do not get to take me down. You are gonna beg to me. Blood loss is gonna make you weak. You're gonna slip in and out of shock. You will know pain and fear. Fear, Frank. Your ribs must be cracked. I'm gonna take all the breath out of your lungs, out of your lungs, until you can barely whisper and the last word out of your mouth is gonna be please, please, please."

6613.author: Marion James and Rafael Hernandez
6613.quote: "Looks like he got hit by a train.""I can't find it in my heart to have much sympathy."

6614.author: Bucky Barnes
6614.quote: "Hey. Pick on someone your own size."

6615.author: Bucky Barnes to Steve Rogers
6615.quote: "The 107th. Sergeant James Barnes, shipping out for England first thing tomorrow."

6616.author: Bucky Barnes to Steve Rogers
6616.quote: "This isn't a back alley, Steve. It's war!"

6617.author: Bucky Barnes to Steve Rogers after Johann Schmidt reveals his face
6617.quote: "You don't have one of those, do you?"

6618.author: Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers
6618.quote: "Don't do anything stupid until I get back.""How can I? You're taking all the stupid with you."

6619.author: Captain America and Bucky Barnes
6619.quote: "I thought you were dead.""I thought you were smaller."

6620.author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
6620.quote: "You ready to follow Captain America into the jaws of death?""Hell, no. That little guy from Brooklyn who was too dumb to run away from a fight, I'm following him."

6621.author: Bucky Barnes and Captain America
6621.quote: "I'm invisible. I'm turning into you it's like a horrible dream.""Don't take it so hard maybe she's got a friend."

6622.author: Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers
6622.quote: "I had him on the ropes.""I know you did."

6623.author: Winter Soldier to his HYDRA team

6624.author: A recording played in the Captain America Exhibit in the Smithsonian Institution
6624.quote: "Best friends since childhood, Bucky Barnes and Steven Rogers were inseparable on both schoolyard and battlefield. Barnes is the only Howling Commando to give his life in service of his country."

6625.author: Steve Rogers to Natasha Romanoff
6625.quote: "He's fast. Strong. Had a metal arm."

6626.author: Natasha Romanoff and Steve Rogers
6626.quote: "Most of the intelligence communities doesn't believe he exist, the ones who do call him the Winter Soldier. He is credited with over two dozens assassinations in the last 50 years.""So he's a ghost story."

6627.author: Natasha Romanoff to Steve Rogers
6627.quote: "Five years ago I was escorting a nuclear engineer out of Iran, somebody shot at my tires near Odessa. We lost control, went straight over a cliff, I pulled us out, but the Winter Soldier was there. I was covering my engineer, so he shot him straight through me. A Soviet slug, no rifling. "

6628.author: Arnim Zola to Bucky Barnes
6628.quote: "Sergeant Barnes... the procedure has already started. You are to be the new fist of HYDRA!"

6629.author: Alexander Pierce to Winter Soldier
6629.quote: "Your work has been a gift to mankind. You've shaped the century. I need you to do it one more time."

6630.author: Nick Fury and Steve Rogers
6630.quote: "I didn't know about Barnes.""Even if you had, would you have told me?"

6631.author: Captain America to Winter Soldier
6631.quote: "People are gonna die, Buck. I can't let that happen... Please don't make me do this."

6633.author: Bucky Barnes and Alexander Pierce
6633.quote: "The man on the bridge, who was he?""You met him earlier this week on another assignment.""I knew him."

6634.author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
6634.quote: "Thank you Buck, but I can get by on my own.""The thing is, you don't have to. I'm with you 'til the end of the line, pal."

6635.author: Captain America and Winter Soldier
6635.quote: "You know me."No, I don't!""Bucky. you've known me your entire life. Your name is James Buchanan Barnes...""Shut up!""I'm not gonna fight you. You're my friend.""You're my mission. You're... my... mission!""Then finish it. 'Cause I'm with you 'til the end of the line."

6636.author: Sam Wilson to Steve Rogers
6636.quote: "I'm very happy chasing cold leads on our missing persons case."

6638.author: Natasha Romanoff and T'Challa
6638.quote: "T'Challa, Task Force will decide who brings in Barnes.""Don't bother, Ms. Romanoff. I shall kill him myself."

6639.author: Thaddeus Ross
6639.quote: "Barnes would have been eliminated in Romania if it wasn't for Rogers. There are dead people who would be alive now. Feel free to check my math."

6640.author: Captain America and Iron Man
6640.quote: "It wasn't him, Tony! HYDRA had control of his mind!""Move!""It wasn't him!"

6642.author: T'Challa to Steve Rogers
6642.quote: "If I can help your friend find peace, I will be very grateful."

6643.author: Falcon, Captain America and Bucky Barnes
6643.quote: "Heads up, Cap. German Special Forces, approaching from the south.""Understood. Do you know me?""You're Steve. I read about you in a museum.""They've set the perimeter.""I know you're nervous. And you have plenty of reason to be. But you're lying.""I wasn't in Vienna. I don't do that anymore.""They're entering the building.""Well, the people who think you did are coming here now. And they're not planning on taking you alive.""That's smart. Good strategy.""They're on the roof. I'm compromised.""This doesn't have to end in a fight, Buck.""It always ends in a fight.""5 seconds.""You pulled me from the river. Why?""I don't know.""3 seconds!""Yes, you do.""Breach! Breach! Breach!""Buck, stop! You're gonna kill someone.""I'm not gonna kill anyone."

6644.author: Helmut Zemo and Winter Soldier
6644.quote: " Zhelaniye. Rzhavyy. Semnadtsat’. Rassvet. Pech’. Devyat’. Dobroserdechnyy. Vozvrashcheniye na rodinu. Odin. Gruzovoy vagon....Soldat?""Ya gotov otvechat."[1]"Mission report: December 16, 1991."

6645.author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
6645.quote: "Buck, do you remember me?""Your mom's name was Sarah; you used to wear newspapers in your shoes."

6646.author: Winter Soldier and Black Panther
6646.quote: "I didn't kill your father.""Then why did you run?"

6647.author: Bucky Barnes and Steve Rogers
6647.quote: "What's gonna happen to your friends?""Whatever it is, I'll deal with it.""I don't know if I'm worth all this, Steve.""What you did all those years... It wasn't you. You didn't have a choice.""I know. But I did it."

6648.author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
6648.quote: "You remember that time we had to ride back from Rockaway Beach in the back of that freezer truck?""Was that the time we used our train money to buy hot dogs?""You blew 3 bucks trying to win that stuffed bear for a redhead.""What was her name again?""Dolores. You called her Dot.""She's got to be a hundred years old by now.""So are we, pal."

6649.author: Iron Man and Winter Soldier
6649.quote: "Do you even remember them?""I remember all of them."

6650.author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
6650.quote: "Are you sure about this?""I can't trust my own mind. So, until they figure out how to get this stuff out of my head I think going back under is the best thing...for everybody."

6651.author: Shuri and Winter Soldier
6651.quote: "Good morning, Sergeant Barnes.""Bucky.""How are you feeling?""Good. Thank you.""Come, there’s much more for you to learn."

6652.author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
6652.quote: "How you been, Buck.""Not bad, for the end of the world."

6653.author: Rocket Raccoon and Bucky Barnes
6653.quote: "How much?""It's not for sale.""Not the gun, the arm!"

6654.author: Steve Rogers and Bucky Barnes
6654.quote: "Don't do anything stupid while I'm gone.""How can I? You're taking all the stupid with you."

6655.author: Bucky Barnes calls Sam Wilson and directly Hulk, after spotting an elderly Steve Rogers sitting behind them

6657.author: Wolfgang von Strucker to List
6657.quote: "Sooner or later, they will meet the twins. It's not a world of spies any more. Not even a world of heroes. This is the age of miracles, Doctor. There's nothing more horrifying than a miracle."

6658.author: List and Wolfgang von Strucker
6658.quote: "It's over. Fury has released everything to the public.""Everything he knows about."Herr Strucker, if they get word of our work here, if they find out we serve HYDRA...""HYDRA. S.H.I.E.L.D. Two sides of a coin that's no longer currency. What we have... is worth more than any of them ever knew."

6659.author: Wolfgang von Strucker
6659.quote: "We will not yield! The Americans send their circus freaks to test us. We will send them back, in bags. No surrender!"[Turns and whispers to Dr. List]"I am going to surrender."

6661.author: Captain America and Wolfgang von Strucker
6661.quote: "Baron Strucker. HYDRA's number one thug.""Technically, I'm a thug for S.H.I.E.L.D.""Well, then technically you're unemployed."

6662.author: Wolfgang von Strucker and a fortress soldier
6662.quote: "Who gave the order to attack?""Herr Strucker, it's the Avengers. They landed in the far woods. The perimeter guard panicked.""They have to be after the scepter. Can we hold them?"They're the Avengers..."

6663.author: Grant Ward and Sunil Bakshi
6663.quote: "Since Strucker is overseas, I assume you report to someone else.""That's correct."

6664.author: Dr. List, Sheikh and Octavian Bloom
6664.quote: "What this means is that there is a vacancy at a management position in this region of the world.""And who would you like to see fill it, Dr. List?""Baron von Strucker thought that Sunil Bakshi was well-groomed to serve in that capacity, so why is he not present?""He's disappeared. We think he may have been captured by S.H.I.E.L.D. Then in all likelihood, he's dead, too, if he did his duty.""You underestimate S.H.I.E.L.D. -- constantly, it would seem. Von Strucker would like this mistake to stop happening, so I'm going to make it simple S.H.I.E.L.D. will take this victory as a chance to move against us.""Come aboveground.""Whomever can remove S.H.I.E.L.D. from the landscape permanently will win Whitehall's position."

6666.author: Leo Fitz and Phil Coulson
6666.quote: "Do we have any leads?""No, but HYDRA might. HYDRA's new heads Strucker and List."

6667.author: Grant Ward and Phil Coulson
6667.quote: "I'm flattered -- bringing the robot along just for a sit-down with me.""There's no need for false modesty. We both know you're that good. But frankly, this isn't about you. I'm after bigger fish Strucker, List."

6668.author: Sunil Bakshi and Dr. List
6668.quote: "You think I poisoned the Baroness? Killed Bloom?""Someone put a bullet in his head.""I assumed it was you... or Strucker."

6669.author: Sunil Bakshi to  Dr. List
6669.quote: "I know Strucker has been experimenting on powered individuals. I believe that with a compliance upgrade, Mr. Peterson would prove quite useful to him."

6670.author: Phil Coulson and Grant Ward
6670.quote: "This wasn't the plan. What are you doing?""Getting us to Strucker."

6671.author: Grant Ward to Phil Coulson
6671.quote: "Strucker wants powered people. Bakshi alone doesn't get you to him. Deathlok does, and he can take care of himself, trust me."

6672.author: Grant Ward
6672.quote: "If Strucker's overseas, I'd say that's probably where they're going."

6673.author: Sunil Bakshi and Dr. List
6673.quote: "I thought Strucker was in Eastern Europe.""He is. But first, we're making a stop."

6674.author: Robert Gonzales and Phil Coulson
6674.quote: "Why turn yourself in now, Phil? Strucker and List have been running experiments on enhanced people. They've set up a base in the Arctic.""I have a man on the inside who fed us their location."

6675.author: List and Sunil Bakshi
6675.quote: "Well, Strucker's most pleased with our progress. And he's very anxious to see the subjects with his own eyes.""They

6676.author: Sunil Bakshi and List
6676.quote: "I doubt they'll survive.""That's a crushing disappointment, really. No one has made it past this stage of our experiments with alien enhancement. Well, no one other than the twins, of course. And Strucker has them in Sokovia."

6677.author: Phil Coulson to Maria Hill
6677.quote: "I've just sent you everything I found on Strucker's location."

6678.author: Grant Ward and Kebo
6678.quote: "These are all the names you could drum up?""You're lucky we found this many. Whitehall, Strucker, List, the leadership is gone, man. Usually, a head grows back, but not this time. The organization disintegrated."

6679.author: Werner von Strucker and Grant Ward
6679.quote: "Nobody treats me like that and lives. Do you even know who the hell I am? Do you?!""You're Werner von Strucker. Your father was Baron Wolfgang von Strucker, one of HYDRA's greatest leaders. Powerful family name doesn't mean you deserve respect. You earn that. I wondered if you had it in you. Your old man would be proud."

6680.author: Werner von Strucker and Grant Ward
6680.quote: "I should have you killed.""Okay. First thing, if you're gonna kill someone, don't threaten them. Just do it.""Oh, my father would have you-""Your father kept you in the dark and then died a meaningless death, leaving you to hide your face with no answers. I know what it's like to come from a complicated family. HYDRA's fractured, in pieces. We're gonna rebuild it."

6681.author: Werner von Strucker
6681.quote: "My father, so rarely, let me see any of his world."

6682.author: Grant Ward
6682.quote: "Strucker has many vaults. I know them all."

6683.movie: Avengers: Age of Ultron Prelude - This Scepter'd Isle
6683.author: Wolfgang von Strucker
6683.quote: "There will soon come a time where we will make our own destiny."

6684.author: Wong to the Masters of the Mystic Arts
6684.quote: "Choose your weapon wisely. No one steps foot in this Sanctum. No one."

6685.author: Wong and Stephen Strange
6685.quote: "Mr. Strange.""Uh, Stephen, please. And you are?""Wong.""Wong. Just Wong? Like Adelle? Or Aristotle. Drake. Bono... Eminem."

6686.author: Wong and Stephen Strange
6686.quote: "This section is for masters only, but at my discretion, others may use it. You should start with Maxim's Primer. How’s your Sanskrit?""I’m fluent in Google Translate."

6687.author: Wong and Stephen Strange
6687.quote: "Stephen.""Wong.""What do you want, Strange?""Books on astral projection.""You're not ready for that.""Try me Beyoncé. Oh, come on, you've heard of her. She's a huge star, right? Do you ever laugh? Come on, just give me the book.""No."

6688.author: Wong and Kaecilius
6688.quote: "Kaecilius.""You are on the wrong side of history, Wong."

6689.author: Doctor Strange and Wong
6689.quote: "Yeah, you know, you really should've stolen the whole book because the warnings... the warnings come after the spells."(laughs) "It's funny."

6690.author: Doctor Strange and Wong
6690.quote: "Seriously? You don't have any money?""Attachment to the material is detachment from the spiritual.""I'll tell the guys at the deli. Maybe they'll make you a metaphysical ham and rye.""Wait, wait, wait. I think I have two hundred.""Dollars?""Rupees.""Which is?""A...buck and a half.""What do you want?""I wouldn't say no to a tuna melt..."

6691.author: Wong and Doctor Strange explain the history of the Infinity Stones to Tony Stark
6691.quote: "At the dawn of the universe, there was nothing, then boom. The big bang sent six elemental crystals hurtling across the virgin universe. These Infinity Stones each control an essential aspect of existence.""Space, Reality, Power, Soul, Mind...and Time."

6692.author: Tony Stark, Bruce Banner, Doctor Strange and Wong
6692.quote: "Tell me his name again.""Thanos. He's a plague, Tony. He invades planets, he takes what he wants, he wipes out half the population. He sent Loki. The attack on New York, that's him.""This is it. What's our timeline?""No telling. He has the Power and Space Stones. That already makes him the strongest creature in the whole universe. If he gets his hands on all six stones, Tony-""He could destroy life on a scale hitherto undreamt of.""Do you seriously just say "hitherto undreamt of"?""Are you seriously leaning on the Cauldron of the Cosmos?""Is that what that is? ...I'm going to allow that. If Thanos needs all six, why don't we just stick this one down the garbage disposal?""No can do.""We swore an oath to protect the Time Stone...with our lives.""And I swore off dairy, but then Ben & Jerry's named a flavor after me, so?""Stark Raving Hazelnuts.""Not bad.""Bit chalky.""A Hunka-Hulka Burning Fudge is our favorite.""That's a thing?"

6693.author: Bruce Banner and Wong go their separate ways following the Attack on Greenwich Village
6693.quote: "Where are you going?""The Time Stone's been taken. The Sanctum remains unguarded. What will you do?""I'm gonna make a call."

6694.author: Doctor Strange asks Wong if everyone has been gathered for the final battle against Thanos

6695.author: Darren Cross
6695.quote: "Just imagine a soldier the size of an insect. The ultimate secret weapon."

6696.author: Darren Cross
6696.quote: "Well, I was inspired by the legend of the Ant-Man. And with my breakthrough shrinking inorganic material, I thought, could it be possible to shrink a person? Could that be done? Well, it's not a legend anymore. Distinguished guests, I am proud to present the end of warfare as we know it. The Yellowjacket!"

6697.author: Darren Cross
6697.quote: "The Yellowjacket is an all-purpose weapon of war capable of altering the size of the wearer for the ultimate combat advantage."

6698.author: Darren Cross to Hope van Dyne
6698.quote: "I spent years carrying around my anger for Hank Pym. I devoted my genius to him. I could’ve worked anywhere. I chose my mentor poorly. You didn’t even have a choice. He never believed in you. It’s a shame what we had to do, but he forced us to do it."

6700.author: Darren Cross to Hope van Dyne
6700.quote: "I deserve EVERYTHING that's coming to me!"

6701.author: Darren Cross to Hank Pym
6701.quote: "Mr. Carson introduced me to these fine gentlemen here, they’re representatives of HYDRA. They’re not what they were, they’re doing some interesting work. And I’m enjoying myself!"

6702.author: Darren Cross to Hank Pym
6702.quote: "I always suspected you had a suit stored away somewhere. Which begs the question, who is the new Ant-Man? Who is the man that my beloved mentor trusted even more than me? Scott Lang. A martyr who took on the system and paid the price, losing his family and his only daughter in the process. Exactly your kind of guy, Hank! He escapes his jail cell without leaving any clue as to how. And then he disappears magically, despite having no money to his name. And now he brings me the Ant-Man suit. The only thing that can rival my creation."

6703.author: Darren Cross
6703.quote: "Take the suit off or I’ll blow your brains out and peel it off!"

6704.author: Darren Cross to his bodyguards
6704.quote: "Get me to the roof. And radio ahead. I want to make sure the helicopter is ready to take off. You two, kill anything that comes out of that vault!"

6705.author: Yellowjacket to Ant-Man
6705.quote: "I'm gonna show you just how insignificant you are."

6706.author: Darren Cross' last words to Cassie Lang
6706.quote: "Sorry, sweetheart, you have to help daddy pay for his mistakes."

6707.author: Hank Pym and Scott Lang
6707.quote: "I took on a young protgégé called Darren Cross.""Darren Cross. He's a big deal.""But before he was a big deal, he was my assistant. I thought I saw something in him. The son I never had, perhaps. He was brilliant, but as we became close, he began to suspect that I wasn't telling him everything. He heard rumors about what was called the Pym Particle, and he became obsessed with recreating my formula. But I wouldn't help him. So he conspired against me and he voted me out of my own company.""How could he do that?""The board's chairman is my daughter, Hope. She was the deciding vote. But she came back to me when she saw how close Cross was to cracking my formula. The process is highly volatile. If one isn't protected by a specialized helmet, it can affect the brain's chemistry. I don't think Darren realizes this, and, you know, he's not the most stable guy to begin with."

6708.author: Hope van Dyne and Hank Pym
6708.quote: "He knows, he’s baiting you! We have to call it off.""We’re all taking risks.""What if he saw me here?""He didn’t. There’s no way.""How do you know that?"

6709.author: Hope van Dyne, Hank Pym and Scott Lang
6709.quote: "He’s tripling security, he’s lost his mind, and he’s on to you.""But he is not on to you.""He’s adding full body scanners to all entrances and closing exterior vents. How are we gonna get Scott inside?""The water main. You can’t add security to a water main. The pressure is too strong, but if we can decrease it, that’s how I get in.""Somebody would have to reach the building’s control centre to change the water pressure. I mean, Hank and I will be beside Cross, how are we supposed to do that?"

6710.author: Ant-Man to Yellowjacket
6710.quote: "Why don't you pick on someone your own size?"

6711.author: Hope van Dyne, Darren Cross and Hank Pym
6711.quote: "Well, Dr. Cross will be so please that you could find the time to join us today.""More like, thrilled.""I was surprised to receive any kind of invitation from you, Darren. What’s the occasion?""Oh, you’ll see. Won’t he, Hope?""We’re ready for you inside.""Ouch. I guess some old wounds never heal, huh? Don’t worry, she’s in good hands. You’re in for a treat."

6712.author: Darren Cross and Hank Pym
6712.quote: "Now before we start I’d like to introduce a very special guest, this company’s founder and my mentor, Dr. Hank Pym. When I took over this company for Dr. Pym, I immediately started researching a particle that could change the distance between atoms while increasing density and strength. Why this revolutionary idea remained buried beneath the dust and cobwebs of Hank’s research, I couldn’t tell you. But just imagine. A soldier the size of an insect. The ultimate secret weapon. An “Ant-Man”. That’s what they called you. Right, Hank? Silly, I know. Propaganda. Tales to astonish. Trumped up B.S. to scare the U.S.S.R. Hank, will you tell our guests what you told me every single time I asked you, was the Ant-Man real?""Just a tall tale.""Right. Because how could anything so miraculous possibly be real? Well I was inspired by the legend of the Ant-Man. And with my breakthrough, shrinking inorganic material, I thought, could it be possible to shrink a person? Could that be done? Well, it’s not a legend anymore. Distinguished guests, I am proud to present the end of warfare as we know it: the Yellowjacket. The Yellowjacket is an all-purpose weapon of war capable of altering the size of the wearer for the ultimate combat advantage."

6713.author: Frank and Darren Cross
6713.quote: "So it’s a suit.""Don’t be crude, Frank. It’s not a suit, it’s a… it’s a vessel. What’s a matter, you’re not impressed?""Oh, I’m impressed. I’m also concerned. Imagine what our enemies could do with this tech.""We should have a longer conversation about that, Frank. I really value your opinion. Thank you for coming. Hope?"

6714.author: Hank Pym and Darren Cross
6714.quote: "You seem a bit shocked.""Darren, there’s a reason that I buried these secrets.""So you finally admit it. We could’ve done this together, Hank. But you ruined that. That's why you're the past and I'm the future."

6715.author: Mitchell Carson and Darren Cross
6715.quote: "Dr. Cross. You sell to me first, twenty percent of your asking price, I can have the cash here in two weeks.""Deal."

6716.author: Darren Cross and Frank
6716.quote: "I’m sorry you have such deep concerns about the Yellowjacket, Frank.""Yeah, well, uh, unfortunately we can’t just do whatever we want. Would be nice though, right? But there are laws.""What laws? Of man? The laws of nature transcend the laws of man, and I’ve transcended the laws of nature.""Darren, I don’t think you understand…""Hm. We still haven’t worked out all the bugs. Goodbye, Frank."

6717.author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
6717.quote: "You know I’ve been thinking a lot about gratitude lately, and today during my morning meditation, an interesting thought occurred to me and I think it might apply to you too.""How’s that?""Gratitude can be forgiveness. I spent years carrying around my anger for Hank Pym. I devoted my genius to him. I could’ve worked anywhere. I chose my mentor poorly. You didn’t even have a choice. He never believed in you. It’s a shame what we had to do, but he forced us to do it, didn’t he? But we shouldn’t be angry, we should be grateful. Because his failures as a mentor, as a father, forced us to spread our wings.""You’re a success, Darren. You deserve everything coming your way."

6718.author: Darren Cross and Hope van Dyne
6718.quote: "Commence experiment 34C, organic atomic reduction.""Darren, maybe we should think…""Shrinking organic tissue is the centerpiece of this technology. I can’t go to the buyers with half a breakthrough. Experiment 34C results: Negative. Sanitize the workstation, bring in subject 35C."

6719.author: Hank Pym and Darren Cross
6719.quote: "Darren. How the hell did you get in here?""You left the front door open, Hank. It’s official. You’re old.""The plans! He will kill him.""Well to what do I owe this pleasure?""I have good news.""Really? What’s that?""Pym Tech, the company you created, is about to become one of the most profitable operations in the world. We’re anticipating fifteen billion in sales tomorrow alone. You’re welcome. I know this is odd, but I’d like you to be there. This is my moment, I want you to see it.""Sure, Darren. Yeah, sure. I’ll be there.""What did you see in me?""I don’t know what you mean.""All those years ago, you picked me. What did you see?""I saw myself.""Then why did you push me away?""Because I saw too much of myself."

6720.author: Hope van Dyne and Darren Cross
6720.quote: "Darren, hi.""Hope, where are you right now?""I’m at home, why?""I just saw Hank. I still get nothing but contempt from him.""Don’t let him rile you up, he’s just…he’s just a senile old man.""We need to start everyone working around the clock, get the assembly line up and running. And I’m tripling security. Full sensors at all entrances, and exterior air vents fitted with steel micro mesh.""Great. Good idea.""Thank you, Hope. I’m so lucky to have you on my team."

6721.author: Darren Cross, Computer and Hank Pym
6721.quote: "Well. How do I look? There he is. Just in time. Come on.""Twelve point verification.""Little over the top, don’t you think, Darren?""Confirming authorization.""Well, you can never be too safe.""Access granted.""I gotta hand it to you, Darren, you really did it.""And you only know the half of it, Hank."

6722.author: Mitchell Carson, Darren Cross and Hank Pym
6722.quote: "Hello, Dr. Cross. My associates agree to your terms.""Wonderful. Mr. Carson introduced me to these fine gentlemen here, they're representatives of HYDRA. They’re not what they were, they’re doing some interesting work. And I’m enjoying myself. You tried to hide your technology from me, and now it’s gonna blow up in your face. Wow. Wow! I mean, I saw the punch coming a mile away but I just figured it’d be all pathetic and weak. Well you figured wrong."

6723.author: Darren Cross, Hank Pym, Hope van Dyne and Mitchell Carson
6723.quote: "Hi, little guy. I always suspected you had a suit stored away somewhere, which begs the question, who is the new Ant-Man? Who is the man that my beloved mentor trusted even more than me? Scott Lang. The martyr, who took on the system and paid the price, losing his family and his only daughter in the process. Exactly your kind of guy, Hank! He escapes his jail cell without leaving any clue as to how, and then, he disappears magically, despite having no money to his name, and now he brings me the Ant-Man suit, the only thing that can rival my creation.""Darren, don’t do this. If you sell to these men, it’s going to be chaos.""I already have, and for twice the price, thanks to you. It’s not easy to successfully infiltrate an Avengers facility. Thankfully, word travels fast. Oh, I’ll sell them the Yellowjacket, but I’m keeping the particle to myself. They don’t run on diesel. If you want the fuel you’ll have to come to me. What do you call the only man who can arm the most powerful weapon in the world?""The most powerful man in the world.""You proud of me yet?""You can stop this, Darren. It’s not too late.""It’s been too late for a long time now.""Darren, what are you doing?""He wasn’t any more capable of caring for you than he was for me.""This is not who you are, it’s the particles altering your brain chemistry.""Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait. You’re right, I have to be the one to do it.""Here we go.""Drop your gun.""You know I came to the house the other night to kill him, but you were there.""You’re sick and I can help you just put the gun down.""I wasn’t ready to kill you then, but I think I am now!""Drop your gun, now!""You picked the wrong side, Hope."

6724.author: Darren Cross and Ant-Man
6724.quote: "Did you think you could stop the future with a heist?!""It was never just a heist!"

6725.author: Yellowjacket and Siri
6725.quote: "I'm gonna disintegrate you!""Playing Disintegration by The Cure."

6726.author: Yellowjacket and Ant-Man
6726.quote: "You insult me, Scott. Your very existence is insulting to me. You know, it'd be much easier to hit you if you were bigger.""Yeah, I agree."

6727.movie: WIRED Insider Interviews Darren Cross, CEO of Pym Technologies
6727.author: Darren Cross
6727.quote: "Well, they don't draft the stupid kids first."

6728.movie: WIRED Insider Interviews Darren Cross, CEO of Pym Technologies
6728.author: Darren Cross
6728.quote: "Hank Pym was my friend, and mentor, but mentors are meant to nurture their protege's potential, not stunt it."

6729.movie: WIRED Insider Interviews Darren Cross, CEO of Pym Technologies
6729.author: James Rondell and Darren Cross
6729.quote: "Pym Tech has yet to roll out a single new product during your time as CEO.""Is there a question?"

6730.author: Alphonso Mackenzie to Elena Rodriguez
6730.quote: "So you snap back to the same spot like a yo-yo."

6732.author: Elena Rodriguez and Alphonso Mackenzie
6732.quote: "It felt like rock crawling up my body, suffocating me in it...""I think you're talking about Terrigenesis."

6734.author: Elena Rodriguez and Alphonso Mackenzie
6734.quote: "Your work...it's too slow.""Well, I'm sorry we all don't have superspeed.""Oh, this isn't about superspeed. This is about your turtle speed. You work and then you stare and work and then more staring. We have to go.""Hurtful."

6735.author: Elena Rodriguez
6735.quote: "So many people looking for an excuse to hate."

6736.author: Yo-Yo Rodriguez and Alphonso Mackenzie
6736.quote: "Someone needs to make Radcliffe watch all the

6737.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
6737.quote: "I always worried that robots would try and kill me one day.""Really? We grew up different.""Even got a special provision in my life insurance for death by robot.""Are you serious?""Yep. If this goes sideways, my brother's gonna be one rich dude."

6738.author: Elena Rodriguez and Phil Coulson
6738.quote: "So, Mack personal time, huh?""Don't put me in the middle of this.""What middle? No middle. But you know something.""It's not for me to say. Mack's a very private person. All I know about him is what's in his file. I spent six months on a plane with the guy. I bet I know less than you.""So maybe something's on his file.""Maybe you should ask him."

6739.author: Elena Rodriguez and Alphonso Mackenzie
6739.quote: "I'm tired of playing games, Mack. Coulson said that if I wanted to know where you went today, I should ask, and he's right.""Um I went to see my ex. I've been wanting to talk to you about this, and tell you about Hope.""Hope.""Mm-hmm.""All right. That's it, then.""Elena-""No, I've been giving this a lot of thought. And you know, we go out to dinner, and then you do nothing, and then we do something, and then you go away.""Because I don't take this lightly.""Look, Mack, I like you. You know that. But this... I'm not a jealous woman. I don't pry, I don't nag. That's not me. That's a... That's a cliché. And I refuse to be a cliché.""Yes, I know.""So, if you want to be a man that has secrets and goes off and meets other women, that's fine. But that's another cliché I'm not interested in.""I love that you're not a cliché. Hope was my daughter. And she died.""Oh, my God.""No. It's-It's okay. It was 11 years ago. My ex, Nicole we had a life planned together. She got pregnant, and we were happy. But when Hope was born, it was, uh it was touch and go and she only lived for four days. Her story was over before it ever started.""Mack, I didn't know""No, I know. I know. But tomorrow's Hope's birthday. And Nicole has a hard time with it. That's why she texted me. So I went to see her so she wouldn't be alone. Maybe I wanted to spend a day remembering Hope, also. I've been wanting to tell you that for a while."

6740.author: Jemma Simmons, Phil Coulson and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
6740.quote: "Fury never said anything about deep space outposts being developed, did he?""There was nothing like this in his black box.""So, wait, S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't have a space division called S.P.E.A.R. or something? Really? I always thought you guys had people hiding on the Moon."

6741.author: Melinda May, Jemma Simmons, Alphonso Mackenzie, Leo Fitz, Yo-Yo Rodriguez and Phil Coulson
6741.quote: "Hey, could be worse.""True. We could be enslaved by an alien sociopath in a dystopian future.""Or we could be trapped inside a virtual reality fascist state.""Or stuck at the bottom of the ocean.""Or stopping a crazy robot lady.""Or falling out of a plane.""Fighting Daisy's mom.""Or fighting Daisy's dad.""Or dancing."

6742.author: Yo-Yo Rodriguez, Alphonso Mackenzie and Jemma Simmons
6742.quote: "How are you gonna feel about dating someone with robot parts?""Those aren't the parts that matter.""Mack!""What? Oh, no, come on. That's not what I meant. What I meant was that the thing I hate about robots is that they have no heart, no soul. Those are the parts that matter.""Nice save. And sweet."

6743.author: Jemma Simmons, Leo Fitz and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
6743.quote: "I was thinking we could come back to England for our honeymoon. If we ever got one.""Sounds perfect.""Don't make me the third wheel, guys."

6744.author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
6744.quote: "I had it under control. She was coming around, and then Yo-Yo killed her.""No. I just saved the world."

6745.author: Elena Rodriguez to Phil Coulson
6745.quote: "I thought America was all about freedom. When I use my powers, it should be my choice."

6746.author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
6746.quote: "It's quiet here in the mornings. Less strangers in suits running around.""Well, you should make room in that routine for uh, what's the word in English? Bureaucracy. Mace is going to want to grill you about your time off.""Yeah, he already has. Trying to set up meet and greets or whatever that is."

6747.author: Phil Coulson and Elena Rodriguez
6747.quote: "I heard Mace was calling you in. You're signing the Sokovia Accords. That's a big step.""Yeah, one you never made me take. Secret Warriors, you said. Whatever happened to "Secret?"""New boss, new rules.""I miss the old boss.""Think of it this way: now you can work with me instead of for me.""Mm, that doesn't make me feel better."

6748.author: Jeffrey Mace and Elena Rodriguez
6748.quote: "First, I'm gonna need your John Hancock.""I don't know who that is.""It's the... It just means your signature."

6749.author: Jeffrey Mace and Elena Rodriguez
6749.quote: "The powers that be get twitchy when enhanced individuals choose their own missions. With Quake out there--""Daisy has nothing to do with this, sir.""But she is the example of what not to be. A vigilante."

6750.author: Jeffrey Mace and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
6750.quote: "Your role is to act as a measured response to enhanced threats.""And if I went anyways?""You did read the Accords before you signed them, right?""Of course.""So you know that if you break the agreement, the law states I have to turn you over to Secretary Ross, and he won't hesitate to detain you on the Raft for the foreseeable future."

6751.author: Jemma Simmons and Leo Fitz to Elena Rodriguez
6751.quote: "Ah, you're a regular hummingbird, aren't you?""Yeah, which is why your new watch is such a unique challenge. Inhuman vitals require individual calibration, so my new model can account for your velocity down to the picosecond."

6752.author: Melinda May to Elena Rodriguez
6752.quote: "Turns out the Director's credentials are missing. And I have a theory where they are."

6753.author: Leo Fitz and Elena Rodrigez
6753.quote: "Now, this will track your biometrics and keep a constant GPS record, time-stamped and accurate to within a few feet.""But I didn't get you anything."

6754.author: Alphonso Mackenzie and Elena Rodriguez
6754.quote: "Not cool, Yo-yo. Zephyr's about to take off and you're just gonna let me leave without saying goodbye?""Are you going after Daisy again? Where are you headed?""Well, intel says she's on the east coast. We got every USGS satellite and geological monitoring station on it so if she uses her powers, we'll know.""Does she get to be a S.H.I.E.L.D. pet too? Bagged and tagged like a stray dog."

6755.author: Elena Rodriguez and Alphonso Mackenzie
6755.quote: "Yes, I know, Mack. You love rules. You were probably a choir boy too.""They needed somebody to sing bass."

6756.author: Melinda May to Elena Rodriguez
6756.quote: "I expected more from you, Elena. An enhanced person, a chance to do some good, our whole team rooting for you, but it turns out you're a terrible spy."

6757.author: Elena Rodriguez and Melinda May
6757.quote: "The Director's credentials? You think I took them? You see this? I came here to register. I pledge allegiance to S.H.I.E.L.D.""Then you won't mind answering a few questions."

6758.author: Melinda May and Elena Rodriguez
6758.quote: "You keep that up, you're gonna get caught. And the next time, it won't be me who does it.""So are you gonna tell them? Have me locked up?""No. But I want you to think long and hard about that on your flight."

6759.author: Quinjet Pilot and Elena Rodriguez
6759.quote: "Get comfortable. Should only be 20 minutes till touchdown.""Minutes? I thought it would at least be a couple of hours to Los Angeles.""L.A.? This one's going to Baltimore. You on the wrong jet?""No, no. That's where I'm going."

6760.author: Victor Ramon to the Watchdogs
6760.quote: "Apologies for the delay. I ran into an old acquaintance. I thought she might come in handy."

6761.author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
6761.quote: "What the hell are you doing here? S.H.I.E.L.D. assign you to go after that weapon?""No, they assigned me to paperwork. S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't know about this. I'm here for Ramon.""The one who killed your cousin.""Sí."

6762.author: Yo-Yo Rodriguez and Quake
6762.quote: "Mack said Coulson and him are also tracking your powers, the earthquakes. Look, Daisy, if I can help--""No, no. One Inhuman fugitive is enough. If I need help your help, I'll find you.""Okay."

6763.author: Quake and Yo-Yo Rodriguez
6763.quote: "What happened with Ramon?""He won't be hurting anyone again."

6764.author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
6764.quote: "Okay, so, this is the data from your watch, and this right here is the GPS coordinate that puts your location in the warehouse.""Here we are, breaking rules again.""Yep. But one click of a button and all Mace will know is whatever we tell him.""Do it."

6765.author: Elena Rodriguez and Daisy Johnson
6765.quote: "Ramon, at the warehouse, I just want you to know I didn't kill him. I'm not capable of--""I know."

6766.author: Daisy Johnson and Elena Rodriguez
6766.quote: "What's that?""Something Coulson gave me the day I signed the Accords. He said it would help remind me that I'm not giving something up but gaining something.""A team."

6767.author: Yon-Rogg to Carol Danvers
6767.quote: "I'm so proud of you. You've come a long way since that day I found you by the lake. But can you keep your emotions in check long enough to take me on? Or will they get the better of you as always? I always told you you'll be ready the day you'll knock me down as yourself. This is that moment. This is that moment, Vers!"

6768.author: Carol Danvers to Yon-Rogg
6768.quote: "I have nothing to prove to you."

6769.author: Yon-Rogg and Vers
6769.quote: "You know what time it is?""Can't sleep.""There are tabs for that.""Yeah, but then I'd be sleeping."

6770.author: Vers and Yon-Rogg
6770.quote: "I slipped.""Right. You slipped as a result of me punching you in the face.""I was already slipping when you happened to punch me in the face. The two events are not related."

6771.author: Yon-Rogg and Vers
6771.quote: "Verify: CTC39.""GRFC6300. And I'm fine, thank you for asking. Is everyone okay? What happened?""Skrull ambush. I though we lost you. Did you find Soh-Larr?""It wasn't Soh-Larr. Talos simmed him, even knew his code.""That's impossible. That code was buried in his unconscious.""The Skrulls messed with my mind. The machine that they used, I think it's how they extracted Soh-Larr's code."

6772.author: Yon-Rogg, Ronan and Korath
6772.quote: "Ronan.""The Accusers completes their operation... but the greater mission was a failure, thanks to your team."It was a trap to lure our operative Vers to Torfa and kidnap her.""Give is their location. We'll take care of the terrorist threat.""By bombing them out of the galaxy? No, we'll handle this.""A cell of Skrulls everywhere is a threat to Kree everywhere. Where are they?""They are...""Lost. They are lost for now. But we will find them.""Do so, or we will."

6773.author: Yon-Rogg, Minn-Erva, Korath, Talos and Carol Danvers
6773.quote: "What did you do to your uniform""They got in her head. Just like we thought.""The Supreme Intelligence will set her straight.""You can see they're not soldiers. Let 'em go. You can have me.""And the core?""You lies to me.""I made you the best version of yourself. What's given can be taken away."

6774.author: Captain Marvel and Yon-Rogg
6774.quote: "Arm wrestle for the Tesseract?""I used to find you amusing. Let's put an end to this!"

6775.author: Yon-Rogg and Captain Marvel
6775.quote: "I can't go back empty-handed.""You won't be empty-handed. I'm sending you with a message. Tell the Supreme Intelligence that I'm coming to end it. The war, the lies, all of it."

6776.author: Yondu Udonta to Peter Quill
6776.quote: "When I picked you up as a kid, these boys wanted to eat you. They ain't never tasted Terran before. I saved your life!"

6777.author: Yondu Udonta
6777.quote: "Do you got any other cute little buggers like this one? I like to stick 'em all in a row on my control console."

6778.author: Yondu Udonta to Peter Quill
6778.quote: "You don't give a damn about your Terra! You're scared because you're soft, in here. Here! Right here!"

6779.author: Yondu Udonta to Star-Lord
6779.quote: "Remember, boy. At the end of all this, I get the stone. You cross me, we kill you all."

6780.author: Yondu Udonta to Star-Lord
6780.quote: "No more games with me, boy! I’ll see you at the end of this!"

6781.author: Yondu Udonta to Star-Lord and Gamora
6781.quote: "Well, well, well. Quite the light show. Ain’t this sweet. But you got some business to attend to before all the nookie-nookie starts."

6782.author: Yondu Udonta to Peter Quill
6782.quote: "I may be as pretty as an angel, but I sure as hell ain't one. Hand it over, son."

6783.author: Yondu and Star-Lord.
6783.quote: "Quill?""Hey, Yondu.""I'm here on Morag. Ain't no Orb, ain't no you.""Well, I was in the neighborhood. I thought I'd save you the hassle.""Well, where are you at now, boy?""I feel really bad about this, but I'm not gonna tell you that.""I slaved putting this deal together...""Slaved? Making a few calls is "slaved"?""And now you're gonna rip me off!""I mean, really?""We do not do that to each other. We're Ravagers, we got a code.""Yeah, and that code is "steal from everybody.""When I picked you up on Terra...""Picked me up.""...these boys of mine wanted to eat you.""Yeah?""They ain't never tasted any Terran before. I stopped 'em. You're alive because of me! I will find you, I will..."

6784.author: Yondu, Kraglin Obfonteri and Horuz.
6784.quote: "Put a bounty on him! Forty K. But I want him back alive.""Yeah, Cap.""Alive?""That's what I said.""I told you when you picked that kid up, you should have delivered him like we was hired to do! He was cargo! You have always been soft on him.""You're the only one I'm being soft on! Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill. As soon as we get him back here, I'm gonna kill him myself. What we do need to worry about, is who else out there wants that Orb!"

6785.author: Yondu and Kraglin Obfonteri
6785.quote: "Yeah, Quill turned out okay. It's probably good we didn't deliver him to his dad like we was hired to do.""Yeah, that guy was a jackass."

6786.author: Yondu's last words
6786.quote: " I'm sorry I didn't do none of it right, I'm damn lucky you're my boy."

6787.author: Yondu Udonta to Groot
6787.quote: "Hey, Hey Twig! You wanna help us get out of here? There's something I need you to get and bring back to me. In the captain's quarters, there's a prototype fin, that thing I wore on my head, there's a draw next to the bunk, it's in that. It's red, you got it?"

6788.author: Yondu Udonta to Star-Lord
6788.quote: "He may have been your father, boy, but he wasn't your daddy."

6789.author: Yondu Udonta to Star-Lord
6789.quote: "I don't use my head to fly the arrow boy, I use my heart..."

6791.author: Yondu Udonta to Rocket Raccoon
6791.quote: "You idiot, the body can't survive more than 50 space jumps - we're about to make 700!"

6792.author: Star-Lord, Ego, Drax the Destroyer and Rocket Raccoon
6792.quote: "I hired Yondu to pick you up when your mother passed away. But instead of returning you, Yondu kept you. I have no clue as to why.""Well, I’ll tell you why. Because I was a skinny little kid who could squeeze into places adults couldn’t. It made it easier for thievin’.""Well, I’ve been trying to track you down ever since.""I thought Yondu was your father.""What? We’ve been together this whole time and you thought Yondu was my actual blood relative?""You look exactly alike.""One’s blue!""No, he’s not my father! Yondu was the guy who abducted me, kicked the crap out of me so I could learn to fight, and kept me in terror by threatening to eat me.""Eat you?""Yeah.""Oh, that son of a bitch."

6793.author: Star-Lord
6793.quote: "Yondu didn't have a talking car but he did have a flying arrow. He didn't have the beautiful voice of an angel but he did have the whistle of one. Both Yondu and David Hasselhoff went on kick-ass adventures and hooked up with hot women and fought robots. I guess David Hasselhoff did kind of end up being my dad after all, and it was you, Yondu. I had a pretty cool dad."

6794.author: Stakar Ogord to his team members
6794.quote: "You know it's a shame that it took the tragedy of losing Yondu to bring us all together again. But I think he would be proud knowing that we're back as a team."

6795.author: Yondu Udonta and Stakar Ogord
6795.quote: "You can go to hell then!! I don't give a damn what you think of me!""So what are you following us for?""Are you gonna listen to what I gotta say?!""I don't gotta listen to nothing, you betrayed the code. Ravagers don't deal in kids!""I told you before, I didn't know what was going on...""You didn't know 'cause you didn't wanna know, 'cause that made you rich.""I demand a seat at the table. I wear these flames, same as you!""You may dress like us, but you'll never hear the hordes of freedom when you die, Yondu, and the colors of Ogord will never flash over your grave. If you think I take pleasure in exiling you, you're wrong. You broke all our hearts."

6796.author: Star-Lord and Yondu Udonta
6796.quote: "You look like Mary Poppins.""Is he cool?""Hell yeah, he's cool.""I'm Mary Poppins, y'all!"

6797.author: Yondu Udonta, Kraglin Obfonteri, Tullk and Taserface
6797.quote: "Enough! The point is, we ain't stupid enough to help kill the Guardians of the Galaxy. The whole dang Nova Corp be on us.""That ain't right. I just gotta say this one time, Captain. No matter how many times Quill betrays you, you protect him like that none of the rest of us matter. I'm the one what sticks up for ya.""Take it easy, Kraglin.""Damn straight, lad, he's gone soft. Suppose it's time for a change in leadership."

6798.author: Yondu Udonta and Rocket Raccoon
6798.quote: "You can fool yourself and everyone else, but you can't fool me. I know who you are.""You don't know anything about me loser.""I know everything about you. I know you play like you're the meanest in the heart but actually you're the most scared of all.""Shut-up!""I know you steal batteries you don't need and you push away anyone who's willing to put up with you because just a little bit of love reminds you of how big and empty that hole inside you actually is.""I said shut-up!""I know them scientist what made you never gave a rats ass about you.""I'm serious dude!""Just like my own damn parents who sold me, their own little baby to slavery. I know who you are boy, because you're me.""What kind of a pair are we?""The kind that's about to fight a planet I reckon.""Alright, okay, good that's...wait, fight a what?"

6799.author: Star-Lord, Yondu Udonta and Rocket Raccoon
6799.quote: "Guess I should be glad I was a skinny kid, otherwise you would've delivered me to this maniac.""You still reckon that's the reason I kept you around you idiot?""That's what you told me you old doofus.""Well once I figured out what happened to those other kids, I wasn't just gonna hand you over.""You said you were gonna eat me.""That was being funny.""Not to me!""You people have issues.""Of course I have issues! That’s my fricking father!!...Thrusters are back up.""We should be going up!""We can’t. Ego wants to eradicate the universe as we know it. We have to kill him."

6800.author: Yondu Udonta, Rocket Raccoon and Groot
6800.quote: "I ain't done nothin right my whole life rat. You need to give me this.""A space suit and an Aero-Rig, I only have one of each. I...""I am Groot.""What's that?""He says welcome to the frickin Guardians of the Galaxy only he didn't use frickin."

6801.author: Rocket Raccoon and Yondu Udonta
6801.quote: "No offence, but your employees are a bunch of jerks.""I was a Kree battle slave for twenty years until Stakar freed me. He offered me a place with the Ravagers, said all I needed to do was to adhere to the code. But I was young and greedy and stupid. Like you stealing those Batteries.""That was mostly Drax.""Me and Stakar and the other captains, we weren't so different from you and your friends. The only family I ever had. But I broke the code. They exiled me. This is what I deserve.""Slow down drama queen, you might deserve this but I don't. We got to get out of here.""Where's Quill?""Off with his old man.""Ego?""Yeah. It's the day for dumb ass names. You smiled, you know for a second there I got a warm feeling but it was ruined by those disgusting-ass teeth.""You like a professional asshole or what""Pretty much pro. Why didn't you deliver Quill to Ego like you promised?""He was skinny, could fit into places that we couldn't. Good for thieving.""Uh-uh."

6802.author: Yondu Udonta, Rocket Raccoon and Groot
6802.quote: "Psst! Hey Twig, come here, come on.""Oh man, what did they do to you?""Hey, you want to help us get out of here? Huh? There's something I need you to get and bring back to me. In the captain's quarters, there's a prototype fin, that thing I wore on my head, there's a draw next to the bunk, it's in that. It's red, you got it? That's my underwear...""Yeah, I was pretty sure he didn't know what you were talking about. You have to explain it more carefully.""It's a prototype fin.""That's an Orloni. It's a fin Groot.""You explain it this time.""Alright. Alright.""That's Vorker's eye. He takes it out when he sleeps. Go on, try again.""But leave the eye here.""What?""He's going to wake up tomorrow and he's not going to know where his eye is! That's a desk. We told you it was this big!""Tell me you guys have a refrigerator somewhere full of severed human toes? Ok, that's agree to never discuss this.""The draw you want to open, has this symbol on it. Ok? What? No!""He thinks you want him to where it as a hat.""That's not what I said!""I am Groot""He's relieved that you don't want him to.""I am Groot.""He hates hats.""I am Groot.""On anyone, not just himself.""I am Groot.""One minute you think someone has a weird shaped head, the next minute just because you realize part of that head is a hat. That's why you don't like hats?""This is an important conversation right now?"

6804.author: Diamondback and Zip
6804.quote: "I like you, Zip. You've got ambition. It'll take you far as long as you stay in your place. The first of the 48 laws of power. Never outshine the master. That was the mistake Shades made. He questioned me. He doubted me. He tried to reach too far. He was on some Icarus shit. Do you know who that is?""Yeah, he had a verse with Kendrick, right?"

6807.author: Zuri and T'Challa
6807.quote: "So your mission did not go as planned."What happened to my Uncle N'Jobu? My father told me he disappeared... there was a man today wearing a ring identical to this one.""That is not possible.""He helped Klaue escape from us and he was wearing this ring. My grandfather's ring. Do not tell me what is possible, tell me the truth.""Some truths are to much to bear, T'Challa.""That is not your choice to make. What happen to him?""I promised the King to say nothing.""I am your King now!""

6808.author: Erik Killmonger, Zuri, T'Challa, Okoye and Ramonda
6808.quote: "This is for my father.""Erik!""Zuri, no.""Stop!""Zuri!""Zuri, don't!""I am the cause of your father's death. Not him. Take me.""I'll take you both, Uncle James!""NOOO!!! Zuri, no!!"
